U kunguut _ nengllugute t _ , _ sivun gh i _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ . _ tagi kau uq _ David-em _ nengllugut anganeng _ . _ David _ Abraham -en ku neng _ pi u uq _ .
abraham _ ata ke a _ Isaa c -em _ , _ isaac _ ata ke a _ Jacob -em _ , _ Jacob _ ata ke aat _ Jud ah- nkut _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ ,
Judah _ ata ke ak _ P ere z -enkuk _ , _ Z er ah- nkuk _ ( _ naange ak _ Tam ar _ ) _ , _ perez _ ata ke a _ H e z r on-em _ , _ hezron _ ata ke a _ R am -em _ ,
ram _ ata ke a _ Am min ad ab -em _ , _ amminadab _ ata ke a _ N ah sh on-em _ , _ nahshon _ ata ke a _ Sal m on-em _ ,
salmon _ ata ke a _ B o az -em _ , _ ( _ B o az -em _ naa ke a _ rahab _ ) _ . _ Boaz _ ata ke a _ O b ed -em _ , _ ( _ O b ed -em _ naa ke a _ R ut h _ ) _ , _ Obed _ ata ke a _ Jes s e- m _ ,
Jes s e _ ata ke a _ umiileg m _ David-em _ . _ David _ ata ke a _ S ol om on-em _ . _ ( _ S ol om on-em _ naa ke a _ U ri ah-m _ nuligh qes aqanga _ . _ )
solomon _ ata ke a _ R e ho b o am -em _ , _ rehoboam _ ata ke a _ Ab i j ah-m _ , _ abijah _ ata ke a _ A s a-m _ ,
a sa _ ata ke a _ J e h os h ap h at -em _ , _ Jehoshaphat _ ata ke a _ J or am -em _ , _ Joram _ ata ke a _ Uz z i ah-m _ .
Uz z i ah _ ata ke a _ Jo th am -em _ , _ Jotham _ ata ke a _ A h az -em _ , _ ahaz _ ata ke a _ H e z ek i ah-m _ ,
H e z ek i ah _ ata ke a _ Man as se h - m _ , _ manasseh _ ata ke a _ Am os -em _ , _ amos _ ata ke a _ Jo si ah-m _ .
Jo si ah _ ata ke aat _ , _ J e ch on i ah- nkut _ anglegutku llgh h iit _ allgegh kau ut _ tamaani _ Jews-et _ tugu luki _ aglagh te aqe yatki _ Babyl on -mun _ .
kingu aneng _ aglagh te llghite a _ Babyl on -mun _ , _ J e ch on i ah _ ata ke a _ S h e al ti el -em _ , _ S h e al ti el _ ata ke a _ Z er u b b ab el -em _ ,
zerubbabel _ ata ke a _ Ab i ud -em _ , _ Ab i u d _ ata ke a _ Eli ak im -em _ , _ Eli ak im _ ata ke a _ A z or -em _ ,
azor _ ata ke a _ Z ad o k -em _ , _ zadok _ ata ke a _ A ch im -em _ , _ achim _ ata ke a _ Eli ud -em _ ,
Eli u d _ ata ke a _ El e az ar -em _ , _ El e az ar _ ata ke a _ M at th an -em _ , _ matthan _ ata ke a _ Jacob -em _ ,
Jacob _ ata ke a _ Joseph -em _ . _ Joseph _ ugu ikagh a _ Mar y- m _ . _ mary _ naa ke a _ Jesus-em _ . _ Jesus _ M es si ah- nguuq _ .
Siv ungh i _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ whatete ut _ : _ 1 4 -ng uk aagut _ kingunegh ke te lghiit _ Abraham -e meng _ David -mun _ . _ 1 4 -ng uk aag utlu _ kingunegh ke te lghiit _ David -meng _ kenlanga _ Jews-et _ tugu luki _ aglagh te llegh itnun _ Babyl on -mun _ . _ taagken _ Babyl on -mun _ aglagh te llegh itneng _ 1 4 -ng uk aag utlu _ kingunegh ke te lghiit _ kenlanga _ Christ-am _ allgellegh anun _ .
Jesus _ Christ-a _ allgegh kau uq _ whaten _ : _ naange a _ mary _ aang 始gh utng waaq aq _ Joseph -mun _ , _ iwernga _ nengughte te llghite lukek _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ quminge stekagh a _ .
ugi kaghqagh an _ Joseph -em _ ken qig negh ut mineng _ kayngu s aak neghmeng _ mary _ pi luku _ , _ aksaqe luku _ pegge naqekagh a _ .
sumeghtaghagh tke ma luku _ tawaten _ pi lleghqagh ni _ , _ Atanghem _ yaquleg an _ aliigh vike luku _ qavangugh kun _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Joseph _ , _ David-em _ kingun gha _ , _ alinge gpenang _ nuligh q igu _ mary _ qayughllak _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ aqsa nge stekaqe a _ .
ighnegh nge naqngu uq _ ; _ atigh naken _ Jesus-meng _ qayughllak _ ellmi _ yug ni _ yugul iyaghq aqii _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ . _ "
qamagte luni _ tawaten _ aneghtekau uq _ apeghiigh na luku _ Atanghem _ akuzi tkekagh a _ uuknaliqe i stekete te _ whaten _ ,
" _ aghnagh aq _ yug m _ atuqe llghite kanga _ quminge luni _ , _ ighnegh nge lleqe uq _ . _ ategh kete yaghqaqe a _ E m man u el _ " _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ whangkun nilnguq _ . _ "
enkaam _ Joseph _ taghtugh luni _ Atanghem _ yaquleg an _ pi sqe llegh atun _ pi ke aq _ . _ mary _ nuligh qegkaa _ ,
iwernga _ atuqe ma ite kanga _ kenlanga _ ighnegh nge llegh anun _ . _ taagken _ Joseph -em _ Jesus-meng _ ata iqe a _ .
Jesus _ allgegh aqngan _ Beth le h em -e mi _ Judea- melngugh mi _ , _ herod _ umiileg u lghii _ . _ allgellegh an _ kingu aneng _ ighaleqetaagh neng _ liitekagh ghllag t _ asiv aghmeng _ kaate tke aat _ Jerusalem-emun _ .
Aap qugh waaq at _ , _ " _ naagu _ taghnughhagh _ allgegh lghii _ umiileg at _ Jews-et _ ? _ ighaleqetaagh a _ esghaam aagh put _ asivagh mete luku _ enkaam _ manigugh yaghtugh aqaghput _ . _ "
umiileg m _ Herod-em _ nagaqugh luku _ teggellghiigh ghllagkagh _ , _ qamagtengngwaagh lu tengllu _ Jerusalem -eghmiit _ maligte te luteng _ .
Tag siq ligh tegh luki _ qamagte luki _ chief _ priest-etlu _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ nani _ Christ-a _ allgegh yaghqau a _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ Beth le h em -e mi _ Judea- melngugh mi _ . _ Uuk naliq istem _ whaten _ igaqe kaqe a _ :
' _ elpek _ Bethlehem _ , _ Jud ah- melnguq _ , _ igleghutiste yag g iitneng _ Jud ah-m _ ukav an tellegh pig aanghi tuten _ , _ qayughllak _ elpeneng _ tagi naqngu uq _ igleghte te i sta _ , _ igleghte te i yaghqagh _ yug mneng _ Israel-eghm iineng _ . _ ' _ "
taagken _ Herod-em _ aksaqe luku _ tagsiqligh iqe ai _ ighaleqetaagh neng _ liitekagh ghllag t _ , _ liigike na luku _ qavngaq _ aliigh yuwhaagh kau ta a _ ighaleqetaagh _ .
taagken _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Beth le h em -emun _ aghulaqe lusi _ elngaatall _ ivagh teggu _ taghnughhagh _ . _ naalke gkufsigu _ ungipaate yaghtugh nakefsinga _ , _ whanga llu _ manigugh yaghtugh lleqe aqa _ . _ "
tawaten _ umiileg m _ piy is teng _ igleghtekagh t _ . _ esghagh laataghkagh at _ ataasigh _ taana _ ighaleqetaagh _ asivagh mete luku _ , _ enkaam _ elngaatall _ quya te ghllag ke aat _ . _ maligtekagh at _ kenlanga _ aghuliigh llegh anun _ taghnughhagh m _ ne an _ qule ani _ .
itegh luteng _ mangteghagh mun _ esghaghkagh at _ taghnughhagh _ , _ naange a llu _ mary _ . _ segesqughte uute luteng _ manigugh qu aat _ . _ taagken _ aqeftaghaagh teng _ qelpeghte luki _ tunqugh qu aat _ tunute yameng _ : _ gold-meng _ , _ f r an kin c en s e-meng _ , _ m yr r h -meng _ .
taagken _ kiyaghnegh m _ qavangugh kun _ yitekagh i _ Herod -mun _ uteghnigh fqiita _ pisqelluki _ enkaam _ aglaghkagh t _ nuna meggnun _ alla tgun _ tume tgun _ .
ighaleqetaagh neng _ liitekagh ghllag t _ aghulaqe yata _ , _ qavangugh kun _ Atanghem _ yaquleg an _ aliigh vike luku _ Joseph _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ makete luten _ taghnughhagh llu _ naange a llu _ anag te kek _ Egypt- mun _ . _ Tamaan lleghh aten _ uteghnigh sqe lleg mnun _ kenlanga _ qayughllak _ Herod-em _ ivagh ste naqe a _ taghnughhagh _ tuqute ste na luku _ . _ "
enkaam _ unugmi _ tawani _ Joseph -em _ makete luni _ aghulaqe te gkakek _ taghnughhagh llu _ naange a llu _ Egypt- mun _ .
Tamaan tekat _ kenlanga _ Herod-em _ tuqu llegh anun _ . _ enkaam _ apeghiigh kau uq _ Atanghem _ akuzi tkekagh a _ uuknaliqe i stekete te _ whaten _ , _ " _ tuqlugh kaqe aqa _ ighnegh ka _ tagi sqellug qu _ Egypt- meng _ . _ "
Herod-em _ liigike yamigu _ ighaleqetaagh neng _ liitekagh ghllag nun _ puughte ma ni luni _ sakrite ghllagkagh _ . _ taagken _ pilluwaghtet _ kayagtekagh i _ Beth le h em -emun _ , _ uvit ang anunllu _ tuqu q iisqelluki _ qamagte luki _ mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ allgegh nghhagh ghhagh neng _ , _ maalghug gnun _ ayumiqulleghtutka lghii nun _ kenlanga _ . _ tamaakut _ taghnughhagh t _ nakmike kaqe ai _ qayughllak _ ighaleqetaagh m _ allgellegh aneng _ maalghug ughte lghiik _ ayumiqullegh k _ , _ ighaleqetaagh neng _ liitekagh ghllag t _ apegh llegh itni _ .
tawaten _ pi llegh kun _ uuknaliq istem _ Jer em i ah- am _ uuknaliqe llegh a _ apeghiighkagh _ :
" _ ramah- mi _ nagaqugh qu aat _ legh aghllag aat aq _ . _ R ach el -nguftuq _ qiya lghii _ avaqutagh minun _ , _ repall _ ilutugh sagh yaghq aaghh aag penani _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte luteng _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ . _ "
Joseph -enkut _ Egypt- mell uki _ herod _ tuqukagh _ , _ qavangugh kun _ Atanghem _ yaquleg an _ aliigh vikekagh a _ Joseph _ 
pi ke aa _ , _ " _ makete luten _ taghnughhagh llu _ naange a llu _ uteghnigh te kek _ israel- mun _ , _ qayughllak _ tuqute i naqe yagh lghiit _ taghnughhagh meng _ tuqu laghate te ma ut _ . _ "
enkaam _ Joseph -em _ makete luni _ taghnughhagh llu _ naange a llu _ aglagh te gkakek _ israel- mun _ .
iwernga _ Joseph -em _ nagaqugh luku _ nutaghagh _ umiileg a _ Judea- m _ , _ Ar ch el a us - ngun iluku _ Herod-em _ ighnegh a _ , _ alingekagh _ tawavek _ aglagh nghmeng _ . _ qavangugh kun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh tke a _ Joseph _ Judea- tef qaan _ pi sqellug qu _ , _ enkaam _ nazareth- mun _ aglaghkagh t _ Galilee- melngugh mun _ . _ Tamaan tekat _ uuknaliqistet _ whaten _ pillgh at _ , _ apeghiigh sqellug qu _ , _ " _ M es si ah _ Nazareth -eghm ii ngu yaghqaaguq _ . _ "
Taakw aningani _ John _ paaptaaye sta _ aglagh luni _ kilgaa anun _ Judea- m _ , _ piinlegh iqe aq _ ungipaq imeng _ .
whaten _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ Av utegh qellusi _ taaqe tek _ seghleghqen neghmeng _ , _ qayughllak _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ kaate yaghtugh ma uq _ . _ "
John -nguuq _ uuknaliq istem _ Isai ah- am _ akuzi tkekagh a _ whaten _ pi aqngami _ , _ " _ kilgaa ni _ kina _ akilghuu aqe uq _ whaten _ : _ ' _ yataaghqe teggu _ Atanghem _ tume kaghqagh a _ , _ taklaghrukegte yagh teggu _ igleghavigkagh a _ ! _ ' _ "
John-em _ aatkagh i _ c amel -em _ melqugh aneng _ ulimaagh t _ , _ meqagh meng _ tafsi luni _ , _ neqek luni _ lo cus t- mengllu _ ho ne y- mengllu _ .
yug t _ aglagh uute tke aat _ ellnga nun _ Jerusalem -em engllu _ Judea- mengllu _ uvit ang anengllu _ kiiw m _ J or d an -em _ .
seghleghqe lleg teng _ qayvighqe nghatki _ , _ John-em _ paaptaay aaq egkangi _ J or d an - egni _ .
John-em _ esghagh luki _ Pharisees - el ghutetlu _ Sa dd uc ees - el ghutetlu _ tagi lghiit _ ellmi nun _ paaptaay esqell uteng _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpek si _ nemeghyagh ni _ ! _ kitum _ anag sqe isi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleghqagh aneng _ kaate naqe lghii meng _ ?
sivuke lusi _ pinitun _ pi llegh gpesigun _ ipapigh q iteggu _ seghleghqe llegh gpesineng _ avuteghqe llegh i _ .
Wh aten 始ngam _ sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte naanghite ainkut _ qayughllak _ kingunegh ke ainkut _ Abraham-em _ . _ ' _ ungipaate amsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ abraham _ kingunegh ngllagh te nayagh aa _ maaken _ uyghag neng _ !
whaa _ maaten _ qal qal im ay aq leg g iin agh lluteng _ ayuqe ut _ uqfig t _ akugh itgun _ . _ qamagte luteng _ uqfig t _ pinigh lghii meng _ piite ste i nghite ngugh t _ kepe luki _ , _ kengh egnun _ miluute yaghqaa ut _ .
megh kun _ paaptaay egh iiqu nga _ avutegh k egk anun _ seghleghqe llegh meggneng _ . _ iwernga _ tagi yaghqagh m _ kingu mneng _ paaptaaye lleqe aisi _ agleghnagh lghii gneng llu _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ kenegh meng llu _ . _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ghllag uq _ whanga mneng _ , _ repall _ talwa _ kameg kek _ tugumiiqepagningite agka _ .
taana _ tagi yaghqagh _ nanqigt iyaq leg g iin aaguq _ . _ aafte yaghqaqe ai _ pinigh lghiit _ yug t _ seghlegh neng _ , _ katam _ piitesiigh agh tem _ pekete ta mineng _ malliigh llegh atun _ g ra in -et _ . _ kagpag luki _ g ra in -et _ mallagh _ tamaa na _ miluute yaghqaqe a _ qaame yaghqaa nghite ngugh gnun _ kengh egnun _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ galilee- meng _ tagikagh _ J or d an - egnun _ , _ John -mun _ paaptaay esqell uni _ .
iwernga _ John-em _ akuzite naqutke kaqsagh kanga _ whaten _ , _ " _ whanga _ elpek _ paaptaay e yaghq aqsagh aghpenga _ . _ sangavek _ whanga mnun _ tagi ziin _ ? _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ legan _ sa aqe ziin _ paaptaay enga _ qayughllak _ tawaten _ pi kumtung _ apeghiigh lleq aghp ung _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ . _ " _ enkaam _ John-em _ paaptaayekagh a _ .
Jesus _ paaptaay e yat ni _ megh meng _ aanekagh _ . _ taagken _ qilag _ qelpegh luni _ esghagh kakek _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh kek _ uki lghiik _ d ov e- etun _ ayuqe lutek _ , _ enkaam _ ellnga kun _ nalugkagh k _ .
taagken _ me _ qilag meng _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ Un anguuq _ piniqekagh ghllag ka _ ighnegh ka _ , _ efqugh ke pigte aqa _ . _ "
taagken _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ aghulaqe tke a _ Jesus _ kilgaa nun _ , _ tughneghagh mun _ seghleghqe ste naqutke sqellug qu _ .
4 0 _ aghneq _ , _ 4 0 _ unuk _ Jesus _ negh ma ite ngughk _ ; _ taagken _ taakut _ aghnegh t _ kingu itneng _ iyataghkagh _ .
taagken _ tughneghagh m _ taku luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh ke u kangaten _ , _ neqe ughte sqe ki _ tamaakut _ uyghag t _ . _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ yuug _ kiyaghte naanghite uq _ neqe inagh ghhagh kun _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghte yaghqaa uq _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta akun _ . _ ' _ "
taagken _ tughneghagh m _ Jesus _ aglagh tke a _ Jerusalem-emun _ , _ agleghnagh lghii mun _ ne ghllag mun _ . _ tawani _ Temple- m _ uusqagh llegh akun _ nekeve ste luku _ 
pi ke aa _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh ke u kangaten _ , _ qetgegh i _ tesamavek _ ; _ qayughllak _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m nguq _ yaquleg minun _ p aq n asigh tes aghtugh lleqaaten _ ; _ iigge meggneng _ nuqnegh kete lleqe aaten _ luuraq _ itegagh ten _ uy ghagh quun nayuk ata _ . _ ' _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ iwernga _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ whaten llu _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh n _ nanghiiqu gpenaan _ sa sqellug qu _ ellnga n _ piyuke llegh ke nghite ka aneng _ . _ ' _ "
taagken _ tughneghagh m _ Jesus _ mayugh te luku _ uusq apig llegh ii mun _ naayghagh mun _ keleg tke ai _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ ataneghpag u llegh i _ nuna m _ , _ pinighnagh llegh ghllag i llu _ .
enkaam _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Qamagtengngwaagh luki _ maakut _ tuune lleqe anka _ elpenun _ , _ segesqughte luten _ manigugh yagh kuvnga _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tughneghagh _ , _ iqiten _ ! _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ whaten _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ manigugh yaghqaqe an _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh n _ , _ ellngin aag uqlu _ qepghagh te yaghqagh n _ ! _ ' _ "
taagken _ tughneghagh m _ unite yagu _ Jesus _ , _ yaquleg t _ aflengake yaghtugh qu aat _ .
Jesus-em _ nagaqugh luku _ John _ anusimingllaghvig mete ni luku _ , _ galilee- mun _ uteghnigh iqe aq _ .
nazareth- meng _ aglaghkagh _ C ap ern a um -emun _ tamaa uute na luni _ . _ C ap ern a um _ esne anite uq _ naayvagh m _ Galilee- m _ , _ nuna mi _ Z eb ul un -enkuk _ Nap h tal i- nkuk _ king unghi ta _ kiyaghfig itni _ .
Jesus-em _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ apeghiigh qagh a _ uuknaliq istem _ Isai ah-m _ uuknaliqe llegh a _ . _ Qav ng ar ugllak _ Isai ah-m _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe ai _ yug t _ kiyaghte lghiit _ nuna gkeni _ Z eb ul un -enkuk _ Nap h tal i- nkuk _ . _ taake uk _ nuna k _ naayvagh m _ tungang anil nguuk _ , _ nalla ani _ kiiw m _ J or d an -em _ , _ galilee- mete ngugh mi _ Gentile-et _ kiyaghfig itni _ !
Isai ah-m _ pi kaqe kangi _ whaten _ , _ " _ tamaakut _ kiyaghte lghiit _ seghleghqe llegh m _ mam legh qes tellgh ani _ esghaate yaghqaa ut _ nighug ghllag meng _ . _ alinge llghite a _ tuqu meng _ llangaqa _ nuna at _ saape nga lghii _ taghneghagh nge te llegh aneng _ tuqu llegh m _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ aghtaghagh te aqe ai _ . _ "
galilee- mun _ uteghnigh llegh mineng _ kenle ke luku _ Jesus-em _ piinlegh iqe a _ ungipagh ke i lleg ni _ , _ " _ Av utegh qellusi _ seghleghqen nanigh tek _ , _ qayughllak _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ kaate yaghtugh ma uq _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ igleghte te kete luku _ esne ani _ naayvagh m _ Galilee- m _ , _ esghagh kakek _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ , _ Sim on -en ku ngu f tuk _ ( _ ategh an _ allgha _ peter _ ) _ , _ An dr ew- nkuk _ . _ iqalliniigh lghiik _ negaghpag ek _ miluute aqe luku _ naayvagh mun _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ maligte gnenga _ , _ apeghtugh lleqe amtek _ iqall in iigh tengugh tesqell utek _ yug neng _ . _ "
Tawaninginaq _ negaghpag tek _ unite luki _ maligtekagh ak _ .
Taag an iq aaghaq _ esghagh kakek _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ , _ James -enkuk _ John-enkuk _ ighnegh kek _ Z eb ed ee- m _ . _ angyagh meggni _ ata ke te lghiit _ negaghpag teng _ ilaaghtugh aqe ait _ . _ Jesus-em _ tuqlugh kakek _ .
Tawaninginaq _ angyagh tek _ unitekagh ak _ ata ek llu _ enkaam _ Jesus _ maligtekagh ak _ .
Jesus _ igleghakagh _ tea- ma anun _ galilee- mi _ , _ synagogue- ng itni _ apeghtugh i aqe luni _ . _ nani _ alngunak _ ungipagh ke aq _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh aneng _ ataneghpag u llegh m _ , _ naallghute qughkagh _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ aqnighnegh neng llu _ , _ qinu yu gneng llu _ .
ungipagh _ mingite kau lghii _ naallghute qugh llegh a _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ S y ri a-mi _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ tagi tke ait _ ellnga nun _ qamagte luki _ qinuyug lghiit _ , _ allaaghhiin aagh neng _ aqnighnegh leg t _ , _ ikfiqe nga lghiit _ , _ tughneghagh leg t _ , _ sayugpagtagh kayug t _ , _ unegh ii iqe aat llu _ . _ qamagte luki _ Jesus-em _ naagh llegh u tke ai _ .
uglagh u pigte lghii m _ maligtekagh at _ galilee- meng _ , _ D e c ap ol is -meng _ , _ Jerusalem-emeng _ , _ Judea- meng _ , _ J or d an - emllu _ inglu aneng _ taag egken _ .
Jesus-em _ esghagh luki _ yug lghute ghllag t _ maligte te lghiit _ , _ qemi mun _ mayugh luni _ aqumekagh _ . _ Maligsaagh te mi _ taku laghate te yatni _ ,
apeghtugh ikagh _ :
" _ tamaakut _ liisimake i lghiit _ akluk ing allegh meggneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusillegh aneng _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ yug ke ai _ ataneghpag u llegh an _ qilag m _ .
tamaakut _ qivghu lghiit _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilutughsagh yaghqaqe ai _ .
tamaakut _ quseveg ngalghiit _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune yaghqaqe a _ nuna _ ellngit nun _ .
tamaakut _ atuqe i yu pigte lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh aneng _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune yaghqaqe ai _ piyuke llegh itneng _ .
tamaakut _ nangllegtagh lghiit _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg yagute yaghqaqe ai _ .
tamaakut _ umyugaqegtagh t _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ esghagh yaghqaqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
tamaakut _ nekeggmellegh nge ste i kayug t _ yug neng _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh ke ni yaghqaqe ai _ .
tamaakut _ amyuutke lleg nge lghiit _ atuqe te meggneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ , _ qaatke te nga te meggneng _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ yug ke ai _ ataneghpag u llegh an _ qilag m _ .
" _ quya ste lleg lgu usi _ yug t _ seghlequ uq angisi _ , _ amyuutke kangisi _ , _ iqlengiqe tke kangisi _ maligte yaaghte u te gpesineng _ whanga mnun _ .
elngaatall _ quya ghllag tek _ qayughllak _ qilag mi _ pama _ akileghtugh te yaghqagh leg ghllag u usi _ . _ amenqun _ , _ neghigh luku _ uuknaliqistet _ amyuutkekagh it _ katam _ maaten _ amyuutk ell ghistun _ elpek si _ .
" _ taghyugh stun _ ayuqe usi _ nuna m _ yug anun _ . _ iwernga _ taghyugh _ taghyughni igh u uute kuni _ , _ alla _ naten _ taghyughni ighsaghqagh u nghite uq _ . _ atugh u nanigh lleqe uq _ sa mun _ alngunak _ enkaam _ egte lleqe uq _ taagken _ yug t _ tut m aas gh aq elleqaat _ . _ "
" _ nighug stun _ ayuqe usi _ nuna m _ yug anun _ . _ negh ghllag _ qemi m _ qaye anite ngughk _ talugh nga yaghqaa nghite uq _ .
talwa _ kitum _ alngunak _ kenegh lghutagh k _ kumaghllug kek _ sagnegh mun _ asi igh te naanghite ak _ . _ itupill _ quulv aqun _ lli lleqe ak _ nighug u te sqellug kek _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ ilung anil ngughnun _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ nighug i _ kuukgute steggu _ yug nun _ esghigh sqellug qu _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh i _ , _ enkaam _ usuqe nakangat _ ata i _ qilag mete ngughk _ .
" _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenanga _ taaqesaghtugh u ni luki _ atuqe nghmeng _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh i llu _ uuknaliqiste tlu _ apeghtuusagh it _ . _ tagi u nga _ apeghtugh te kete na luki _ ipa _ sa meng _ pi sigh pig aatangi _ .
ipa _ pi amsi _ , _ qilag nkuk _ nuna nkuk _ kenlet gh uu tellgh egk enun _ kenlanga _ , _ talwa _ sas qu veg aghhaq _ allangughte naanghite uq _ liilightuusagh nite ngughk _ kenlanga _ qamagte luteng _ Liilightuus anilnguut _ apeghiigh llegh itnun _ .
Enkaangam _ kitum _ alngunak _ qaatke nghite kunigu _ ataasigh _ liilightuusagh _ , _ apeghtuusagh ke gkunigu llu _ yug nun _ qaatke fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi lleqe a _ uk aligh pig aaniluku _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ qilag m _ . _ Naqam enraq _ kitum _ alngunak _ qaatke gkumiki _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ apeghtugh kumiki llu _ ila i _ yug t _ qaatk esqelluki _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi lleqe a _ aange yaghqaa ni luku _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ qilag m _ .
enkaam _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ itegh naanghite usi _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ qilag m _ , _ wetku qun _ qaatkut ngaagh atagh aq uf si _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug neng _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ Pharisees -en engllu _ .
" _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ sivunegh si nguq _ ungipaate kaqe ait _ , _ ' _ yugtagh gpenasi _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ yugtagh lghii _ nanqig saqleg uuq _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luni _ . _ '
iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugumi yagute kunigu _ yug lgute ni _ , _ nanqigtivig mun _ aglagh saqleg uuq _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ pi kunigu _ yug lgute ni _ , _ ' _ uyuq _ nallu ghllag _ ' _ , _ agghis tenun _ aglagh saqleg uuq _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ sasii nghite ni kunigu _ yug lgute ni _ , _ aglagh saqleg uuq _ kumaghugh lghii mun _ hell- mun _ .
Enkaangam _ aghqefig gni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tuune i naqe ma luten _ tunusagh gpeneng _ , _ neqagh u uute kuvgu _ sug ag sim aniluku _ yug lgute n _ ,
tunute yan _ unite luku _ ilaliigh yaghtugh naken _ . _ taagken _ tagi luten _ tunute yan _ tuun aken _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
" _ kitum _ avutke ma kangaten _ seghletun _ pi ma ni luni _ , _ ilaliigh aghte naken _ aglagh te ma luten _ nanqigtivig mun _ , _ luuraq _ av utk is teg pek _ tuun ayuk angaten _ nanqigt iste mun _ . _ taagken _ nanqigt istem _ kelengak iste mun _ anusimingllagh ste na yu kangaten _ .
ipa _ pi amken _ , _ anusimingllagh te simak angaten _ aan aanghi tuten _ kenlanga _ nanqigt istem _ llivike sqe llegh a _ qamagte luku _ llivike gkuvgu _ .
" _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ whaten _ pi llegh _ , _ ' _ gelgaghniigh gpenasi _ ' _ .
iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ esghagh luku _ aghnagh _ qiliigh ke gkunigu _ taawa _ gelgaghniigh u uq _ qamagun _ ilu mikun _ .
enkaam _ aghenqignegh m _ iye gpek _ seghleghqe stegkangaten _ , _ iike luku _ egte naken _ ! _ itagnagh yaghqaa uq _ yugusigh n _ nalighnegh ite ghngaaghmi _ , _ iingunagh mi _ hell- mun _ miluute lleghqagh aneng _ .
aghenqignegh m _ iigge gpek _ seghleghqe stegkangaten _ , _ kepe luki _ egte naketen _ ! _ pinigh aghagh yaghqaa uq _ yugusigh n _ nalighnegh ite ghngaaghmi _ , _ iingunagh mi _ hell- mun _ pi lleghqagh aneng _ .
" _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ whaten _ pi llegh _ , _ ' _ kitum _ alngunak _ nuliigh ni _ pegtekunigu _ , _ igagh ngllagh te nakanga _ kelgute sighqagh meng _ pegte ma ni luku _ . _ '
iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pegte yaghqaqe nghite a _ wetku qun _ gelgaghniigh kan _ . _ gelgaghniigh nghite ghngaan _ pegtekunigu _ , _ g elgh aghniigh tesleq aa _ alla neng _ yug meng _ ugiigh kan _ . _ kitum _ nuligh keg kumigu _ , _ taana _ yuug _ ellnga llu _ gelgaghniigh u lleqe uq _ .
" _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i llu _ sivunegh si nguq _ ungipaate kaqe ait _ , _ ' _ akequsagh n _ avelghagh gpenaan _ , _ iwernga _ atanegh mun _ akequsagh n _ atuqe aqe gu _ ' _ .
iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ akeqe i gpenang _ atuqe luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ ategh a _ , _ nalighmeng _ sa kun _ alngunak _ . _ akeqe i gpenang _ qilag kun _ qayughllak _ aqumutagh ke a _ kiyaghnegh m _ igleghte te i llegh minun _ ,
nalighmeng _ nuna kun _ qayughllak _ itegagh iitagh ke a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ nalighmeng _ Jerusalem -kun _ qayughllak _ ne ghllag ke a _ Umiileg pag llagem _ .
akeqe i gpenang llu _ naasqugh gpegun _ qayughllak _ talwa _ ataasigh ghhagh _ nuyagh _ qategh snaanghite an _ nalighmeng _ tagnegh snaanghite an _ .
yeghlegi _ legan _ ' _ aang 始 ghh aasi _ ' _ , _ nalighmeng _ ' _ nak aaghh aasi _ ' _ . _ sa u aat _ ilate kufsiki _ taa kugnun _ tughneghagh meng _ pi u ut _ .
" _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ whaten _ pi llegh _ , _ ' _ kina _ iye igh kuvgu _ elpek llu _ iye igh yaghqaa uten _ . _ kitum _ ggute a _ mugh ug agh te kuvgu _ elpek llu _ ggute n _ mugh ug agh saghqaaguq _ ' _ .
" _ iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ seghletun _ pis tesi _ akite gpenaki _ . _ kitum _ qasaghtegkangaten _ ullungag gpegun _ inglu a llu _ tuun aken _ .
enkaam _ kitum _ aglagh u uute kangaten _ nanqigt iste mun _ , _ gg a teg ken _ ellmi _ pi na lukek _ qaasligh gken llu _ tuun ak egken _ ellnga nun _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ qelghus k agu _ akmagtagh ni _ igleghte te sqellug qu _ ataasigh mun _ mile- mun _ , _ alla _ ataasigh _ mile- a _ ilate naken _ .
kitum _ sa meng _ tungsigh vike kangaten _ , _ tuun aken _ . _ kitum _ sa meng _ navghagh vike kangaten _ , _ nav ghin naken _ .
" _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ whaten _ pi llegh _ , _ ' _ piniqe luki _ ilakumtaagh si _ , _ ugumi ke luki _ ugumi ke i lghiit _ elpesi neng _ ' _ .
iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ ' _ piniqe luki _ ugumi ke i lghiit _ elpesi neng _ , _ yughagh te kaqe teki llu _ amyuutk iste si _ kiyaghnegh mun _ quyas tesqelluki _ ' _ .
tawaten _ pi kufsi _ yug t _ liisimake lleqe aisi _ avaqutagh qu tsi _ ata gpesinun _ qilagmel ngugh mun _ . _ yuug _ tamaghhagh an _ taw ateghlluwaaq _ pi aqe a _ . _ siqinegh ni _ piite sta qaa _ seghlegh nun llu _ pinigh lghii nun llu _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ eslallugughte sta qaa _ qaatke te kayug nun llu _ qaatke te igate ngugh nun llu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ akileghtugh lleq is ii- i _ piniq isteng in aghh asi _ piniqe gkufsiki _ ? _ talwa _ tax -meng _ qerngught istet _ piniqe aqe ait _ piniq iste teng _ .
enkaam _ ilakum t aghhiin asi _ quyake aatagh kufsiki _ , _ naten _ alla u lleqe tsi _ ila itneng _ yug t _ ? _ talwa _ maniguute igate ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ quya kaqe ait _ ilakumtaagh teng _ !
elpek si _ avaqutagh ke u ta aneng _ ata gpesi _ qilagmelnguum _ pinigh tek _ tawateghpigaq _ ata gpesi _ pinigh llegh atun _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ apeghtuusagh ni _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ wataghllak _ pinitun _ pilleg si _ esghagh saq egpenaki _ . _ Esghagh saq eg kufsiki _ ata gpesi _ qilagmelnguum _ akileghtugh naanghite aisi _ .
" _ enkaam _ tuune i kuvek _ aklumalghii nun _ , _ piniiyugnegh stun _ pi gpenang _ . _ qalghightagh ste i kayugu ut _ tuune i vagilgameng _ es ghiis qelluteng _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe ut _ , _ synagogue- nillu _ tume ni llu _ usuq esqell uteng _ . _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ akileghtuus angwaagh luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
iwernga _ tuune i kuvek _ aklumalghii nun _ , _ kina _ alngunak _ ungipaate gpenaan _ ,
kitumun _ alngunak _ nalluke sqellug qu _ tuune i i llegh n _ . _ ata gpek _ esghapag aqe aaten _ enkaam _ akileghtugh lleqe aaten _ . _ "
" _ yughagh negh gpesini _ piniiyugnegh stun _ pi gpenasi _ . _ yughagh yuneghtu ut _ nekevghagh meng _ synagogue- nillu _ tume ni llu _ es ghiis qelluteng _ yug nun _ . _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ akileghtuus angwaagh luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
iwernga _ yughagh naqe negh gpeni _ , _ itegh luten _ ne gpenun _ umeg te luten _ yughagh aqe i _ ata gpenun _ al iin negh ilg ugh mun _ . _ ata gpek _ liisimake a _ aksaqe luku _ s allgh en _ enkaam _ akileghtugh lleqe aaten _ .
" _ yughagh negh gpesini _ kiyaghnegh pig mun _ maniguu sigal ngughestun _ pi gpenasi _ . _ yughagh negh meggni _ uteghpagtagh aqe ait _ akuzite t _ sa meng _ pi sigh u nghite ngugh t _ . _ sumegh meggni _ akuzillegh ghllag megteggun _ kiimsigh lleqe ni luki _ yughagh lleg teng _ pi aqe ait _ .
ellngistun _ ayuqe gpenasi _ qayughllak _ ata gpesi _ liisimake a _ aklukegk aghsi _ , _ talwa _ aapte ste gpenasi _ .
" _ enkaam _ whaten _ yughagh aqe tek _ , _ ' _ whangkuta _ ata ut _ qilag mete ngughk _ pamani _ , _ agleghnagh lghii _ ategh n _ quulv alleng li _ .
yughagh ukut _ ataneghpag u llegh n _ tagi sqellug qu _ , _ piyuke llegh n llu _ apeghiigh sqellug qu _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ katam _ qilagmel ngughestun _ .
Negh yaghq al ite qegh tikut _ aghneghmi _ whani _ .
seghevute aghte ki _ seghleghqe lleg put _ seghevute ma luki _ seghletun _ pis te put _ .
nanghiiqu lleg nge ste gpenaamta _ , _ iwernga _ yugu likut _ taagken _ seghlegh meng _ . _ ataneghpag u llegh _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghi lleq _ , _ nighughqell eq _ , _ elpek _ pi katen _ quunperugllag _ . _ amen _ . _ '
" _ seghevute kufsiki _ seghletun _ pis tesi _ , _ ata gpesi _ qilagmelnguum _ seghevute lleqe aisi _ .
iwernga _ seghevute nghite kufsiki _ seghletun _ pis tesi _ , _ ata gpesi _ seghevute naanghite ai _ seghleghqe lleg si _ .
" _ F ast- enegh pesini _ iil qesug nigh q egpenasi _ piniiyugnegh stun _ . _ aghmig igate ut _ , _ mesuuna igate ut _ liigik esqell uteng _ f ast- eng un iluteng _ . _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ akileghtuus angwaagh luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
F ast- enegh peni _ aghmig aqe i llu _ mesuuna aqe i llu _ ,
ila gpenun _ nalluke sqellug qu _ f ast- ellgh en _ . _ iwernga _ ata gpek _ aliite nghite ngugh m _ liisimake a _ sa aqe uten _ enkaam _ akileghtugh lleqe aaten _ .
" _ nuna mi _ whani _ kagpag gpenasi _ aklungi meng _ qayughllak _ kingug m llu _ anaghtaa llegh m llu _ naafqe lleqe ai _ , _ tegleg niigh tetlu _ naafqii luteng _ tegleg lleqe ut _ .
iwernga _ elpesi neng _ katam _ qilag mi _ kagpag i tek _ aklungi meng _ qayughllak _ m oth -ng ituq _ , _ an agh taa ng ituq _ naafqii yaghqagh meng _ , _ teg legh niigh teng i tuqlu _ naafqii luteng _ tegleg ugh yaghq ameng _ .
Sumeghtagh aat ku mangin agh lleqaghsi _ aklungi gpesinun _ kagpag vig i _ .
" _ iye k _ kenegh lghutagh stun _ ayuqe uk _ yugusigh mun _ . _ iiskegtekuvek _ iingunagh mi _ yugusigh n _ nighug ghllag u lleqe uq _ ,
iwernga _ iyellug mete kuvek _ iingunagh mi _ yugusigh n _ mamleg ghllagu lleqe uq _ . _ enkaam _ nighug _ ilu gpenite ngughk _ mamleg u kuni _ , _ elngaatall _ mamleg pigte uq _ !
" _ kitum _ alngunak _ qepghagh te naanghite ak _ maalghug _ umiileg k _ . _ maalghug gneng _ umiileg lgu kuni _ ugumi ke lleqe a _ ataasigh _ , _ piniqe lleqe a _ ila a _ . _ qaatke te nga lleqe uq _ ataasigh mun _ , _ pite kete naanghite a _ ila a _ . _ enkaam _ piniq naanghi taghsi _ kiyaghnegh _ piniqe ma luku _ mat- ni _ .
" _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nulqaviigh tke gpenaan _ ung v allegh si _ , _ sa meng _ neghe lleghqagh i _ , _ meghe lleghqagh i _ , _ nalighmeng _ sa meng _ aate lleghqagh i _ . _ sumeghtaghagh qagh tek qun _ , _ unguvallegh _ megnu nagh aghagh uq _ neqe meng _ , _ yugusigh llu _ megnu nagh aghagh uq _ aatkagh neng _ .
esghaqagh teki qun _ qawaag t _ , _ piitesighagh igate ut _ , _ unatagh igate ut _ , _ kagpag i igate ut _ . _ naqamllu _ ata gpesi _ qilagmelnguum _ neghqe aqe ai _ ! _ elpek si _ megnunagh atagh an ghit sii _ qawaag neng _ ?
naligh gpesi _ nulqaviigh te kete luku _ unguvallegh ni _ taa kugh lleq ag uu _ ?
" _ sangan _ nul qav iigh taq etsi _ aate yaghqagh meng _ ? _ esghaqagh teki qun _ piitesighagh at _ piite llegh it _ , _ qepghagh igate ut _ talwa _ aatkagh ngllagh igate ut _ ellmeggneng _ .
ungipaate amsi _ talwa _ solomon _ aklungi ghllag mini _ aate igate uq _ piitesighagh estun _ pinightutka lghii meng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ aasi ightugh aqe ai _ vegaagh t _ , _ iwernga _ aga _ unaami _ quug ke aqe ait _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ aasi ightugh kayugu kaki _ vegh aag et _ , _ aasi ightugh aghagh naanghite i sagh i _ elpek si _ ? _ Ugpeqillegh qes taa pig ut si _ !
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ nul qav iigh tegpenasi _ whaten _ , _ ' _ sa meng _ negh naqe sta _ ? _ ' _ nalighmeng _ ' _ sa meng _ megh naqe sta _ ? _ ' _ nalighmeng _ ' _ sa meng _ aate naqe sta _ ? _ '
Gentile-et _ tamaa na _ nulqaviigh te kaqe aat _ . _ ata gpesi _ qilagmelnguum _ liisimake ai _ qamagte luki _ aklukegk asi _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghte llegh gpesini _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh ughte stekek _ kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh a llu _ , _ piyuke llegh a llu _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune lleqe ai _ qamagte luki _ aklukegk asi _ .
nulqaviigh tke gpenaan _ unaami igh lleghqagh _ , _ qayughllak _ unaami m _ seghleliigh i _ itagnagh yaghqaa ut _ tawavek _ aghnegh mun _ . _ seghlegh ligh u aagh _ pikayug u uq _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ ilaagh aghagh gpenaan _ unaami m _ seghleliigh lleghqagh aneng _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ apeghtuusagh ni _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ nanqigte i gpenasi _ ila gpesineng _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqig g negh ill isi _ ,
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe aisi _ taw a tengng waaq _ nanqigte i llegh gpesistun _ ila gpesineng _ . _ atuqe lleqe ai llu _ elpesi nun _ ataasigh t _ tamaakut _ pi kasi _ ila gpesinun _ .
sangan _ esghagh zigu _ yug lgute gpek _ iisqughute a _ , _ elpek _ katam _ iisqughute n _ unaghsigh igh ghllag _ avelghagh luku _ ?
sa lghii meng _ yug lgute n _ pi zigu _ , _ ' _ entaa- a _ iisqughute igh qagh laken _ ' _ , _ elpek _ paninang _ iisqughute lgu luten _ unaghsigh ghllag meng _ ?
uyuq _ piniiyugnegh _ ! _ sivuke luku _ unaghsigh igh ghllag _ iye gpeneng _ nusug luku _ elngaatall _ wh ateghlluwaaq _ esghagh luku _ yug lgute n _ iisqughute igh naken _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Leg asiighw aght enun _ apeghtuusagh ke gpenaki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ , _ qayughllak _ qikmigh stun llu _ ku rug agh es tunllu _ ayuqe ut _ . _ sa u aat _ agleghnagh lghiit _ tuune gpenaki _ qikmigh nun _ luuraq _ sughug na yu kangisi _ . _ akituqagh t _ sungagh t _ miluute gpenaki _ ku rug aghnun _ , _ luuraq _ tut m aas gh aq nayuk atki _ .
" _ aapte tek _ , _ allgegh u lleqe usi _ ; _ ivagh i tek _ , _ naalkute lleqe usi _ ; _ tenglugtugh tek _ amig kun _ , _ qelpegh u lleqe aisi _ .
qayughllak _ kina _ alngunak _ aapte lghii _ , _ allgegh te yaghqaa uq _ ; _ kina _ alngunak _ ivagh i lghii _ , _ naalkute yaghqaa uq _ , _ kina _ alngunak _ tenglugtugh lghii _ amig kun _ , _ qelpegh u lleqe a _ .
kitum _ yug m _ ighnegh ni _ tungsigh kan _ neqekrangllagh meng _ , _ tuune lleqe agu _ uyghag meng _ ?
nalighmeng _ tungsigh kan _ iqallug meng _ , _ tuune lleqe agu _ nemegh yameng _ ?
Seghlegh ugh ngaagh pesi _ , _ avaqutagh si _ tuune yaghqaqe asi _ pinigh lghii meng _ tunute yameng _ . _ ata i _ qilag mete ngughk _ tuune i yug aghagh luni _ ayuqe uq _ pinigh lghii meng _ tunute yameng _ tamaakunun _ aap legh h inun _ ellmi nun _ .
" _ enkaam _ yug lgute gpesinun _ pinitun _ pi ste sug kufsi _ , _ elpek si llu _ pinitun _ pi aqe teki _ . _ tawaten _ apeghtugh i u ut _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh i llu _ , _ uuknaliqiste tlu _ igaqegkagh it _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ itegh tek _ kagpestaaghhagh kun _ amig kun _ . _ amigh k _ hell- mun _ ayuqe lghii _ nuqutu uq _ , _ tume kegte uq llu _ enkaam _ uglagh _ taakwagun _ igleghte aqe uq _ .
iwernga _ amigh k _ unguvallegh mun _ ayuqe lghii _ kagpestaaghhagh u uq _ , _ tuum llug me tuqlu _ enkaam _ qafsinkuuragh ghhagh m _ naalke aqe ai _ tume t _ unguvallegh mun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
" _ kelenga lusi _ uuknaliqiste sighwaagh neng _ . _ taku lleqe aisi _ penniigh sug nigh qelluteng _ , _ taawanginaq _ ugighsagh lghii stun _ amaa stun _ ayuqe ut _ .
liigike lleqe asi _ nangaghnegh itgun _ liigike llegh gpesistun _ uqfig t _ sa meng _ piite ste i llegh itgun _ . _ sikughllug t _ piite ste i igate ut _ grapes- meng _ nalighmeng _ figs- meng _ , _ tawateghpigaq _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ pinitun _ pi igate ut _ .
uqfig _ pinigh lghii _ piite ste i yaghqaa uq _ pinigh lghii meng _ , _ taawanginaq _ uqfig _ seghlegh _ piite ste i yaghqaa uq _ seghlegh meng _ .
uqfig _ pinigh lghii _ piite ste i naanghite uq _ seghlegh meng _ , _ uqfig _ seghlegh _ piite ste i naanghite uq _ pinigh lghii meng _ .
enkaam _ alngunak _ uqfig _ piite ste i nghite ngughk _ pinigh lghii meng _ kepe luni _ kumaghsaghqagh u uq _ .
Enkaangam _ tawatete llegh itgun _ liigike lleqe asi _ uuknaliqe i ste sighwaagh ta i _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ apeghtuusagh ni _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ ila i _ yug m _ whanga mnun _ maligsaagh tek nii qut _ enkaam _ pi aqe aatnga _ , _ ' _ atanegh ke amken _ ' _ iwernga _ itegh naanghite ut _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ qilag m _ . _ Tamaa ku ngin aat _ atuqe i lghiit _ piyuke llegh aneng _ ata ma _ qilagmelnguum _ itegh yaghqaa ut _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ qilag m _ .
nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ , _ uglagh m _ pi yaghqaqe aanga _ whaten _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ , _ atanegh _ ! _ ategh gpegun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ apegh qaghkagh ut _ . _ ategh gpegun _ aag negh squgh ke aqe aput _ tughneghagh t _ uglagh lghii neng _ yug neng _ . _ ategh gpegun _ allaaghlluwhaght iigh aataq aagukut _ uglagh ghngaan _ ! _ '
iwernga _ whaten _ pi lleqe anka _ , _ ' _ nallukngwaagh amsi _ , _ iqite tek _ whanga mneng _ , _ seghletun _ pis teni _ ' _ .
" _ kina _ alngunak _ nagate lghii _ apeghtugh i lleg mnun _ , _ qaatke gkumiki _ peghqinegh lghii tun _ yug tun _ ayuqe uq _ mangteghagh ngllaghkagh _ uyghag m _ qaye akun _ .
eslallugughte ghllag yalghiimi _ , _ kiiw t _ uleve magh meng _ , _ anuqligh ghllag yalghiimi llu _ , _ taw all ima _ mangteghagh _ ullegh ma ite ngughk _ qayughllak _ uyghag kun _ nekeftekau lghii _ .
" _ iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ nagate ghngaaghmi _ apeghtugh i lleg mnun _ , _ qaatke nghite kumiki _ , _ nalluqagh tun _ yug tun _ ayuqe uq _ mangteghagh ngllaghkagh _ qenaaghllug kun _ .
eslallugughte ghllag yalghiimi _ , _ kiiw t _ uleve magh meng _ , _ anuqligh ghllag yalghiimi llu _ , _ aga _ mangteghagh _ uulegh ke aq _ naav ngwaagh luni _ . _ "
Jesus _ tamaaken _ apeghtugh i nghmeng _ taaqe yan _ , _ yug lghute ghllag t _ saghiigha yuke aat _ ,
qayughllak _ apeghtugh ikagh _ aghtughyaghqaanghill eligh luni _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug stun _ liilightuusagh meng _ pi gpenani _ .
Jesus _ qemi meng _ ukig yan _ , _ yug lghute ghllag m _ maligtekagh a _ .
taagken _ yuug _ , _ l ep r os y- lek _ , _ tagi luni _ ellnga nun _ , _ segesqughte vike luku _ , _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ piyuke llegh ke gkuvgu _ , _ ukmangigh qagh nga _ . _ "
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ tawavek _ saafte luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ piyuke llegh ke aqa _ , _ ukmangigh u aghten _ ! _ " _ Tawaninginaq _ l ep r os y- ng iitk aq _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ wataghllak _ kina _ alngunak _ ungipaate gpenaan _ naallghute llegh gpeneng _ , _ yeghlegi _ aglagh a _ priest- mun _ esghagh ligu _ naallghute llegh n _ . _ taagken _ aghqer r aaghh aaten _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh an _ pi sqe llegh atun _ ipapigh qes qelluku _ naallghute llegh n _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ C ap ern a um -emun _ pi ke aq _ . _ kaate aqe uq llu _ , _ Rome-em _ umiil waagh an _ taku luku _ kayusii tagh tesqell uni _ pi ke aa _ ,
" _ atanegh _ , _ whangkunni _ qepghagh tek a _ , _ uniigh ma uq _ , _ ikfiqe ghllagu uq _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ naallghute yaghtugh naqe aqa _ . _ "
iwernga _ umiil waaghem _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ itagnagh nghite unga _ elpenun _ itegh vike yaghqaa lunga _ mangteghagh mnun _ . _ legan _ tawan lluten _ naallghute sqe gu _ qepghagh tek a _ enkaam _ naallghute li _ .
qelegh i kayug meng _ umiileg lgu unga _ enkaam _ whanga llu _ qelegh aqe anka _ pilluw aght enka _ . _ ataasigh _ qelegh kumkun _ , _ ' _ aghulaqe i _ ' _ aga _ aghulaqe lleqe uq _ . _ ila a _ whaten _ pi kumkun _ , _ ' _ tea- ai _ ' _ tagi lleqe uq _ . _ Qepghagh tek a _ qelegh kumkun _ , _ ' _ una _ pi aghte gu _ ' _ , _ aga _ pi lleqe a _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ nagate luku _ saghiigha yuke aq _ , _ enkaam _ yug t _ maligte te lghiit _ ellmi nun _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nallagh te igate unga _ kitu meng _ alngunak _ Israel-eghm ii meng _ , _ uu tun _ yug tun _ ugpeqe i neghtutka lghii meng _ .
ungipaate amsi _ , _ asiv agh mengllu _ pakfalla meng llu _ yug lghute t _ tagi laghate te yaghqaa ut _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ qilag m _ . _ tawani _ aqume uute luteng _ neghe lgusigh lleqe ait _ sivunegh put _ Abraham -enkut _ , _ Isaa c -enkut _ , _ Jacob -enkut _ .
iwernga _ tamaakut _ ataneghpag u llegh mete yaghqaa yagh lghiit _ aanesaghqagh u ut _ mamleg ghllag mun _ , _ tawani _ elngaatall _ qiyaaghwagh ghllag lleqe ut _ ggute teng _ terqitaagtagh magh ita _ avutegh q em _ angtalanganeng _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ umiileg u aq _ , _ " _ aglagh ghhaaten _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh gpetun _ apeghiigh lleqe uq _ . _ " _ enkaam _ tawaninginaq _ umiil waaghem _ qepghaghte nga _ naagh llegh u tke aq _ .
Jesus _ Peter -en kunun _ pi luni _ , _ esgha qaa _ aghnagh _ Peter-em _ saki a _ qavaghvig mete uq _ puqlegha luni _ .
S aaf saqminigu _ iiggagh kun _ puqlegha nga i tke aq _ , _ aga _ makete luni _ kepsiiqukagh a _ .
Ighivg aghy agu _ Jesus-mun _ tagi qugh tke ait _ tughneghagh leg t _ ilu megteggun _ enkaam _ aag negh squgh ke ai _ tughneghagh it _ akuzillegh mikun _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ qinu yuget _ naagh llegh u tke ai _ .
tawaten _ pi ke aq _ apeghiigh na luku _ uuknaliq istem _ Isai ah-m _ whaten _ pillgha _ , _ " _ tugu kaqe ai _ qinuyug lleg put _ , _ iqite kaqe ai _ aqnighnegh put _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ esghagh luki _ uvit min ilnguut _ yug lghute ghllag t _ , _ yataaghqe sqekagh i _ naayvagh m _ inglu anun _ aghvigh na luteng _ .
taagken _ apeghtugh i kayug m _ liilightuusagh meng _ taku luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ maligte lleqe amken _ natmun _ alngunak _ pi kuvek _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ kaviigh t _ riigte lgu ut _ , _ qawaag t _ unglute lgu ut _ , _ iwernga _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ ingaghte vig ite aqe uq _ . _ "
ila yan _ maligte yaaghte yan _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ maligte lleqe amken _ iwernga _ sivuke luku _ ata ka _ llivegh yaghtuqagh lakun _ . _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ maligte nga _ . _ tamaakut _ maligte te yu nghite ngugh t _ whanga mnun _ tuqu kau ut _ taghneghagh megteggun _ ; _ llivegh litki _ tuqum as lii teng _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ angyagh mun _ uugte yan _ maligsaagh teng illu _ uug llegh aatkat _ .
puglegh llghite a _ kii ngu ng iighh aaneng _ esla _ nuuskagllagan _ naafte ghllagkagh _ , _ naayvagh llu _ imaghllug ughte ghllag magh mi _ , _ repall _ angyagh _ imigh aat aqegk aa _ . _ iwernga _ Jesus _ qavaa lghii _ .
Maligsaagh tet _ taku luku _ taghtugh tekaat _ whaten _ pi magh an _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ yugu likut _ ! _ tuqu laghate te naqe ukut _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ sangafsi _ alinge tsi _ ? _ Ugpeqillegh qes taa pig u usi _ ! _ " _ taagken _ nekeve luni _ ineghtekakek _ anuq allu _ imaghllug t llu _ enkaam _ amsanaghllug ughtekagh _ .
qamagte luteng _ saghiigha yuke aat _ . _ whaten _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ N atel ngu u wa _ yuug _ una _ ? _ talwa _ anuqe m llu _ imaghllug t llu _ qaatke kangat _ ! _ "
Jesus-enkut _ kaate yameng _ inglu anun _ naayvagh m _ , _ aglaghkagh t _ G ad ar a- ghmiit _ nuna itnun _ . _ taagken _ maalghug _ yug k _ tughneghagh leg k _ ilum eg neg un _ tagi lutek _ llivegh neng _ nallaqagh ak _ Jesus _ . _ suugllug ghllag k _ repall _ kina _ alngunak _ taakwagun _ tume kun _ igleghte igate ngughk _ .
legan _ esghagh luku _ Jesus _ akilghuukagh k _ , _ " _ sa naqe zikut _ , _ ighneghagh ni _ kiyaghnegh m _ ? _ ikfiqe ste naqe zikut _ pi lleghqagh _ kaate ste gpenaan _ ? _ "
taawa nguq _ qantagha ni _ kurugagh lghute t _ , _ negh aqe ut _ .
tughneghagh t _ maniguute pigte luteng _ Jesus _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ aane stekufkut _ , _ ku rug aghnun _ itegh aates nak ef kut _ . _ "
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aanleghaate tek _ ! _ " _ aanleghaate luteng _ ku rug aghnun _ itegh aatkat _ . _ aga _ kurugagh at _ pangaleg tke aat _ asitmun _ naayvagh mun _ nagnegh luteng _ megh mi _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ .
K u rug aghneng _ aflengake i lghiit _ qim aag uutkat _ ne mun _ . _ tawani _ aap qag ket _ sa mate kek _ tughneghagh lgu yagh lghiik _ ilum eg neg un _ , _ samatagh nge i llu _ kurugagh lghute t _ .
enkaam _ qamagtengngwaagh luteng _ tamaa kum iit _ esghagh yaghtugh tke aat _ Jesus _ . _ esghagh yamegteggu _ maniguute pigte luteng _ aghulaqe sqekagh at _ nuna meggneng _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ angyagh mun _ uugte luni _ inglu anun _ naayvagh m _ aghvag iqe aq _ . _ enkaam _ C ap ern a um -emun _ aglaghkagh _ ne minun _ .
ila ita _ yug t _ ellnga nun _ tagi tke aat _ unegh ii iqe aq _ yuug _ allighagh akun _ . _ Jesus-em _ liigike luki _ ugpeqillegh tul ngit _ , _ pi ke aa _ unegh ii iqe aq _ , _ " _ ighnegh mni _ , _ quya _ ! _ seghleghqe llegh ten _ seghevute ut _ . _ "
taagken _ ila i _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ sumeghtaghaghkagh t _ , _ " _ una _ yuug _ seghleghqe ghllag uq _ . _ kiyaghnegh u yug uq _ seghevute i llegh mikun _ seghleghqe llegh neng _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ liisimake luki _ sumeghtaghagh llegh it _ , _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ sangan _ seghlegh meng _ sumeghtaghagh tsi _ ?
naligh _ akuzillegh _ piyaqnagh u i te a _ , _ ' _ seghleghqe llegh ten _ seghevute ut _ ' _ nalighmeng _ ' _ makete luten _ piyug i _ ' _ ?
liigike ste naqe amsi _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ seghevute i lleghqagh lgu ta a _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ nuna mi _ whani _ . _ " _ enkaam _ unegh ii iqe aq _ yuug _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ makete luten _ , _ allighagh n _ tugu luku _ , _ aglagh a _ ! _ "
yuug _ makete luni _ aglaghkagh _ .
yug lghute t _ esghapag luku _ tallugh yuke aat _ , _ usuqekagh at _ kiyaghnegh _ tawatel ngughmeng _ aghtughyaghqaanghill el is k angi _ yug t _ .
Taam _ kingu aneng _ Jesus-em _ igleghte te kete luku _ esgha qaa _ tax -em _ qerngughte i ste nga _ , _ aqume luni _ qepghagh vig mini _ ; _ M at th ew -nguftuq _ . _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ maligte nga _ . _ " _ enkaam _ M at th ew- m _ nekeve luni _ maligtekagh a _ .
mulu gpenateng _ Jesus-enkut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ negh yaghtuqagh t _ M at th ew- n kunun _ . _ neghe uute ma luki _ tax -meng _ qerngught is tel ghutetlu _ , _ seghleghqes tel ghutetlu _ aqume luteng _ Jesus-enkut _ neghe lgusighkagh it _ .
ila ita _ Pharisees-et _ esghagh luku _ neghe lgute yu igh i lghii _ , _ maligsaagh tengi _ aaptekagh it _ , _ " _ sangan _ apeghtughiste gpesi _ neghe lgusigh aki _ tax -meng _ qerngught iste tlu _ , _ seghleghqes tetlu _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ nagate luki _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ yugunqegtagh t _ agh all eg tagh sugh nii tut _ , _ tamaaku ngin aat _ qinuyug lghiit _ .
liite yaghtugh teggu _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ una _ akuzite nite ngughk _ igaqegkagh _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ ' _ piyuke nghite anka _ aghqe te si _ , _ itupill _ nangllegtagh sug amsi _ . _ ' _ tagi u nghite unga _ tagsigh na luki _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ , _ iwernga _ tagi u unga _ tagsigh na luki _ seghleghqes tet _ . _ "
taagken _ John-em _ Paaptaay es tem _ maligsaaghtengita _ taku luku _ Jesus _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ sangan _ whangkuta llu _ Pharisees-etlu _ awen _ fast- u aqe sta _ , _ naqam _ maligsaaghte ten _ f ast- egpen ateng _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ nulightugh yaghqagh m _ tagsiqligh iqe ai _ qivghu nga yaghqau aat _ tawan lluku _ nulightugh naqe lghii _ ? _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ iwernga _ pi lleghqagh _ kaate yaghqaa uq _ nulightugh naqe lghii _ ellngit neng _ iqite stekumegteggu _ , _ elngaatall _ tamaani _ aghnegh ni _ f ast- ellequ t _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ ilaagh naanghite ak _ aatkagh lug k _ nutaghagh meng _ liiqnegh meng _ . _ ilaagh llegh _ qellughtekuni _ piig u lleqe uq _ , _ enkaam _ piig llegh _ sulleve lleqe uq _ .
talwa _ kitum _ alngunak _ wine- egh ragh aghmeng _ imigh naanghite a _ awataghpag lug _ qayughllak _ awataghpag lug _ imigh kuni _ aafkagh luni _ imaa igh u lleqe uq _ . _ enkaam _ awataghpag lug _ atugh u yaghqaa nanigh lleqe uq _ . _ iwernga _ awataghpagraghagh _ imigh kuni _ wine- egh ragh aghmeng _ qerngagh egmek _ naave naanghite uk _ . _ "
paninang _ Jesus _ akuzi ma luku _ Jews-et _ igleghutisteng at _ itegh luni _ segesqughte luni _ manu akun _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ panike a _ whaa _ tuqun 始 ghh aaguq _ , _ iwernga _ taku luku _ saaftekuvgu _ unguvagh lleqe uq _ . _ "
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ nekeve luni _ maligtekagh a _ , _ maligsaagh teng illu _ maligte tke aat _ .
aglagh ma luki _ , _ qinuyug lghii m _ aghnagh m _ takukagh a _ Jesus _ tun utanganeng _ . _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ ayumiqullegh _ kii tel qung igalnguq _ . _ whaten _ sumeghtagh aqe aq _ , _ " _ S aaf te qegh saqum kun _ aatkagh akun _ , _ naallghute nayagh unga _ . _ " _ enkaam _ saaftekagh a _ atkuyaagh an _ kenigh akun _ .
Jesus-em _ qiive te kete luku _ esghagh luku _ aghnagh _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ panig mni _ alinge gpenang _ ! _ ugpeqe i llegh gpegun _ naallghute uten _ . _ " _ aga _ aghnagh _ naagh llegh u tke aq _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ kaate luni _ igleghut ist en kunun _ , _ esghaghkagh i _ tuqu i lghii ni _ qalghigh tagh tetlu _ , _ yug lghute t llu _ qiya aghte tete te ghllag lghiit _ .
tawavek _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aanleghaate tek _ ! _ aghnaghaghhagh _ tuqu llghite uq _ qavaa uq _ ! _ " _ iwernga _ nengl aqeg kaat _ .
Aan leghaa tes atki _ , _ itegh luni _ Jesus-em _ tugukagh a _ iiggagh kun _ , _ enkaam _ aghnaghaghhagh _ unguvaqagh _ .
enkaam _ taana _ allaaghlluwhaght illeq _ ungipagh kekagh at _ tea- ma ani _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ aghulaqekagh _ ne meng _ . _ ayaakagh k _ yug k _ maligte yu aqe ak _ , _ akilghuu magh egmek _ whaten _ , _ " _ ighneghagh ni _ David-em _ , _ nanglleg yagute kung _ ! _ "
aga _ mangteghagh mun _ itegh yan _ maligtekagh ak _ , _ enkaam _ Jesus-em _ aaptekakek _ , _ " _ Ugpeq es teg neg uu _ naallghute i lleghqagh ka _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe ak _ , _ " _ aa-a _ atanegh _ ! _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ iye gkenkun _ saafte lukek _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ ugpeqe i llegh gpetegetun _ apeghiigh li _ . _ "
enkaam _ esghagh yagutekagh k _ . _ Jesus-em _ inegh tengngwaaq akek _ , _ " _ ungipagh gpenatek _ kitumun _ alngunak _ . _ "
iwernga _ navek _ pinegh megteni _ apegh aqe ka ak _ Jesus-em _ apeghiigh qagh a _ ellmegnun _ .
taake uk _ yug k _ aghulaqe ma lukek _ , _ Jesus-mun _ tagi tke aat _ yuug _ akuzi igate ngughk _ qayughllak _ ilu mikun _ tughneghagh leg _ .
legan _ Jesus-em _ tughneghagh _ aane sta _ , _ yuug _ aga _ akuzikagh _ . _ enkaam _ yug lghute t _ saghiigha yug te luteng _ whaten _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ Wh atel ngughmeng _ allaagh lluw aght illegh meng _ esghaate igate ukut _ israel- mi _ ! _ "
iwernga _ Pharisees-et _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ umiileg ita _ tughneghagh t _ aghtughyaghqaanghill eli sim aat _ aane ste qigh sqellug qu _ tughneghagh neng _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ igleghtekagh _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ galilee- mi _ , _ apeghtugh i magh mi _ synagogue- ng itni _ , _ ungipagh ke i magh mi llu _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh aneng _ ataneghpag u llegh m _ . _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ qamagte luki _ aqnighnegh leg t llu _ qinuyug lghiit llu _ .
esghagh luki _ yug lghute ghllag t _ nanglleg yagutekagh i _ , _ qayughllak _ seghleliigh nga ghllaget _ , _ kayute ngunateng _ ; _ penniigh stun _ penniigh nigh teng ilngugh estun _ .
taagken _ maligsaaghteni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ uglagh lghii m _ yug m _ ugpeqe yug aqe ait _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ . _ Tamaa kunguut _ uspute nga lghiit _ nunivagseghagh nun _ un atagh yaqleg g iin aagh tekat _ . _ taawanginaq _ pal apig uut _ qepghagh tet _ .
Enkaangam _ yughaghte k _ Atangh anun _ unataghyaghqagh t _ , _ kayagte i sqellug qu _ qepghagh tek aghqameng _ unataghyaghqagh anun _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ qerngughte luki _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ maligsaaghteni _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghill el itk ii _ aane ste i yaghqaa luki _ tughneghagh neng _ , _ naallghute i yaghqaa luki _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ aqnighnegh neng llu _ , _ qinu yu gneng llu _ .
U kunguut _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ apostle-et _ : _ sivuligh _ , _ simon _ ( _ alla _ ategh leg _ peter- meng _ ) _ , _ An d re w _ ( _ angleg utanga _ ) _ , _ James -enkuk _ John-enkuk _ ( _ Z eb ed ee- m _ ighnegh kek _ ) _ ,
Philip -enkut _ , _ Bar th ol o me w - nkut _ , _ Th om as -enkut _ , _ M at th ew- nkut _ ( _ tax -meng _ qerngughte i ste u yagh lghii _ ) _ , _ James -enkut _ ( _ ighnegh a _ Al ph a e us-em _ ) _ , _ Th ad d a e us -enkut _ ,
Sim on -enkut _ Z e al o t- a _ , _ Judas _ Is c ari o t- lu _ ( _ uvegh ghpagte te i yaghqagh _ Jesus-meng _ ) _ .
Jesus-em _ , _ taakut _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ apostle-et _ kayagtekagh i _ qel ghu um iita _ , _ " _ Gentile- etlu _ , _ Sam ar ia- gh m iitlu _ nuna itnun _ pi fqaafsi _ .
yeghlegi _ Israel-eghm iinun _ pi tek _ qayughllak _ iflakagh stun _ penniigh stun _ ayuqe ut _ .
navek _ alngunak _ pinegh gpesini _ whaten _ ungipagh aqe tek _ , _ ' _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ kaate yaghtugh ma uq _ ! _ '
Q in u yuget _ naallghute ki _ , _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh teki _ , _ l ep r os y- l get _ naallghute ki _ , _ tughneghagh t llu _ aane ste qugh teki _ yug neng _ . _ aki u na an _ allgegh te kau usi _ , _ enkaam _ aki u na an _ tuune tek _ .
kelqe gpenasi _ mani meng _ : _ gold-meng _ , _ silver- meng _ , _ talwa _ co pp er -meng _ .
kelqe gpenasi _ akmagtagh meng _ , _ simiite kaghqagh meng _ , _ kameg meng _ talwa _ ayaviigh meng _ , _ qayughllak _ qepghagh a _ aklukegk aaneng _ tuune yaghqaa uq _ .
" _ T o w n -en un _ nalighmeng _ v i llag e- enun _ kaate negh gpesini _ ivagh i aqe tek _ kitu meng _ pinigh lghii meng _ enkaam _ ellngan ite aqe tek _ kenlanga _ aghulaqe yaghqaaghte llegh gpesinun _ .
itegh kufsi _ mangteghagh anun _ quya ta qite ki _ tawan lenguut _ whaten _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekeggmellegh a _ elpesi nite li _ . _ '
Upugh as k angisi _ , _ quya ste i llegh i _ tawan tes nakesi _ . _ iwernga _ upugha tete nghite kangisi _ , _ quya ste i llegh i _ veghte nakesi _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ upugha tete nghite kangisi _ nalighmeng _ nagate nghite kangisi _ , _ aane te kete luku _ mangteghagh meng _ nalighmeng _ aghulaqe te kete luku _ t o w n -meng _ , _ itegagh gpesi _ pagula i _ ufsug te nakesi _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ , _ S od om -eghm iitlu _ G om o rah - gh m iitlu _ aghyuu llegh q estaaghh aa yaghqaagut _ taam _ ne m _ yug aneng _ ! _ "
" _ ukughsi _ ! _ kayagtekumsi _ penniigh stun _ qung angit nil ngughestun _ amaa t _ lliigh l equsi _ enkaam _ peghqin gh ul usi _ nemeghyagh stun _ , _ nekeggmell usi _ d ov es - tun _ .
kelenga lusi _ , _ qayughllak _ yug t _ tugu lusi _ aglagh u lleqe aisi _ agghis tenun _ , _ kagsagmig lleqe aisi llu _ synagogue- meggni _ .
whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ , _ nekeve ste lleqe aisi _ sivu itgun _ igleghutiste tlu _ umiileg t llu _ . _ enkaam _ liigik esaghq aagh lleq aghpesinga _ ellngit nun llu _ Gentile- en unllu _ .
Nanqig tes te mun _ aglagh u uute kangisi _ , _ teggellghiigh gpenasi _ naten _ akuzi lleghqagh gpesineng _ , _ nalighmeng _ sa meng _ pi lleghqagh gpesineng _ . _ akuzi yaghqaaghtekufsi _ akuzite kaghqagh lgu lleqe usi _ .
akuzite t _ elpek si _ pike nghite asi _ qayughllak _ ata gpesi _ taghneghagh kek _ akuzi lleqe uk _ elpesigun _ .
" _ yug t _ ellmeng _ katam _ anglegute teng _ tuqute ste lleqe ait _ , _ ata t llu _ avaqutagh teng _ tawaten _ pi yaghqaqe ait _ . _ avaqutagh t _ angu yiite luki _ angayuqagh teng _ tuqute ste lleqe ait _ .
whanga mneng _ apallugh ke lusi _ yug m _ qamagte luni _ ugumi ke lleqe aisi _ . _ iwernga _ nuqete neghtuqagh t _ kenlanga _ kenle mun _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa ut _ .
takukagh gpesini _ amyuutke kangisi _ , _ ila anun _ t o w n -em _ qimag ggaasi _ . _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ qamagte naanghite asi _ Israel -em _ town-ngi _ , _ sivungagh ni _ ighnegh an _ yug m _ tagi lleghqagh an _ .
" _ maligsaagh a _ qaasghute i nga nghite uq _ apeghtughiste mineng _ , _ talwa _ qepghagh a _ qaasghute i nga nghite uq _ umiileg mineng _ .
itagnaghi yaghqaa uq _ maligsaagh a _ apeghtughiste mitun _ lliigh kuni _ , _ qepghagh a llu _ umiileg mitun _ lliigh kuni _ . _ naasqugh u te i lghii _ nengllugute mineng _ , _ B e el z eb ul -meng _ atigh ma katgu _ , _ nengllug utangi _ seghlegh atagh aaluki _ atigh yaghqaqe ait _ .
" _ enkaam _ alike gpenaki _ tamaakut _ amyuq e tagh tet _ . _ sa u a _ alngunak _ nallukekagh _ liitesaghqagh u uq _ , _ qamagte luni llu _ aksaqekagh _ qayvighqesaghqagh u uq _ .
elpesi nun _ sa u aat _ apeghkagh nka _ apegh yaghqaqe asi _ tea- ma anun _ . _ sigutqugh tkekagh nka _ elpesi nun _ , _ ungipagh ke yaghqaqe asi _ mangteghagh t _ qaye itneng _ .
" _ enkaam _ alike gpenaki _ yug t _ tuqute i kayug t _ yugusigh ghhagh inagh meng _ iwernga _ tuqute i naanghite ut _ unguva sigh meng _ . _ itupill _ alike teggu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ qayughllak _ hell- mi _ naafqii yaghqaa uq _ tea- ma ghhagh gkeneng _ yugusigh meng llu _ unguva sigh meng llu _ .
Pen n y-meng _ tukfigh yaghqaqe agsi _ qawaag g aak _ , _ naqamllu _ aag llegh a _ ifkagh kan _ ata gpesi _ liisimake a _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ aflengake aghagh lusi _ ayuqe aisi _ , _ qayughllak _ talwa _ nuyagh gpesi _ uglagh tal ngi _ liisimake ai _ .
enkaam _ alinge gpenasi _ , _ ata gpesi _ megnu ke aghagh aisi _ qawaag g aghneng _ !
" _ kitum _ alngunak _ ungipaate kaki _ yug t _ , _ whanga mnun _ pik niluni _ , _ whanga llu _ ata ka _ qilag mete ngughk _ ungipaate lleqe aqa _ whanga mnun _ pik niluku _ .
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ ungipaate kaki _ yug t _ whanga mnun _ pike nghite ni luni _ whanga llu _ ata ka _ qilag mete ngughk _ ungipaate lleqe aqa _ whanga mnun _ pike nghite ni luku _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ paninang _ aleghqugh qu ai _ , _ " _ sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ nekeggmellegh nge ste i yaghtugh u ni lunga _ nuna m _ yug anun _ . _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ nekeggmellegh nge ste i yaghtugh u nghite unga _ , _ taawanginaq _ pillugute ste i yaghtugh u unga _ .
tagi u unga _ yug mun _ anguyag liite sqellug qu _ ata a _ , _ aghnagh mun _ anguyag liite sqellug qu _ naange a _ , _ ukaagh anun _ anguyag liite sqellug qu _ saki a _ aghnagh _ .
enkaam _ yuug _ nengllugut angita _ anguyag liite lleqe aat _ .
" _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkunigu _ ata ni _ nalighmeng _ naa ni _ pakig gu lluku _ whanga mneng _ , _ whanga _ pikepagningite aqa _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkunigu _ ighnegh ni _ nalighmeng _ panig ni _ pakig gu lluku _ whanga mneng _ , _ whanga _ pikepagningite aqa _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ qaquuragh ni _ tugu yu nghite kunigu _ maligte naanghite aanga _ , _ enkaam _ whanga mni _ itagnagh nghite uq _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ unguvallegh ni _ ellmi nun _ pik n i kumigu _ ifla yaghqaqe a _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ unguvallegh ni _ pegtekunigu _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ allgeghsaghqagh ke a _ unguvallegh pig _ .
" _ kitum _ alngunak _ upugh as k angisi _ , _ whanga llu _ upugha lleqe aanga _ , _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ upugh as kum inga _ , _ upugha lleqe a _ kayagte i steke _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ upugh as kumigu _ uuknaliqe i sta _ uuknaliqe i ste u ta aneng _ , _ akileghtuusagh nge lleqe uq _ uuknaliqe i stetu te _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ upugh as kumigu _ elqughutngagh lghii _ yuug _ elqughute nga ta aneng _ , _ akileghtuusagh nge lleqe uq _ elqughutngagh lghii tun _ yug tun _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ nenglekegte lghii meng _ meghsi kunigu _ uk aligh pigaq _ maligte yaaghteke _ apallugh ke luku _ maligte yaaghtekete te mneng _ , _ ipa _ pi amsi _ akileghtuusagh nge pestaagh yaghqaa uq _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ maligsaaghteni _ apeghiigh yamiki _ apeghtugh aneghmeng _ , _ tamaaken _ aghulaqekagh _ ila itnun _ t o w n -et _ apeghtugh i na luni llu _ ungipagh ke i na luni llu _ .
anusimingllaghvig mete luni _ John-em _ Paaptaay es tem _ nagaqugh luku _ Christ-a _ sa aqe ta a _ , _ ila i _ maligsaaghteni _ kayagtekagh i _ Jesus-mun _ .
aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ " _ El peng waa _ tagi naqe nikagh at _ , _ nalighmeng _ kina _ tagi yaghqau a _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ ungipaate yaghtugh teggu _ John _ nagatekagh gpesineng llu _ esghaghkagh gpesineng llu _ :
aya kaayagh lghiit _ esghagh yagute ut _ , _ piyug igate yagh lghiit _ piyug yagute ut _ , _ l ep r os y- lgu y alghiit _ naallghute ut _ , _ tuuslagh yagh lghiit _ nagaqugh te yagute ut _ , _ tuqu kaayagh lghiit _ unguvagh ut _ , _ aklumalghii nun llu _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh ke ut _ .
kina _ alngunak _ ugpeqe i nanigh nghite kuni _ whanga mneng _ quya stekau uq _ ! _ "
aga _ John-em _ maligsaagh tengi _ aghulaqe yata _ , _ Jesus-em _ akuzi tkekagh a _ John _ yug lghute nun _ , _ " _ kilgaa nun _ pi aqngafsi _ , _ sa u a _ esghagh yaghtugh steggu _ ? _ vegaagh _ anuqe m _ ufsug us kang aa _ ?
sa qu tsi mi _ ? _ Esgh aghnal uku u _ aatkagh kegte aq _ yuug _ ? _ tamaaken _ aate kaqe lghiit _ kiyaghte aqe ut _ umiileg t _ mangteghagh itni _ !
sa u a mi _ esghagh yaghtugh steggu _ ? _ uuknaliqe i sta _ ? _ aa-a _ , _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ esghaghkagh i _ John _ uuknaliqe i ste inagh u nghite uq _ . _ megnu nagh aghagh uq _ 
qayughllak _ ellnga u uq _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ apeghkagh at _ whaten _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh _ pi uq _ , _ sivu gpeni _ kayagte lleqe aqa _ ungipaghteke _ , _ yataaghqesaghtigh sqellug qu _ tume kaghqagh n _ ' _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ John _ paaptaaye sta _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh u uq _ yug neng _ allgeq aghy ag g aghneng _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ uk aligh pigaq _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ qilag m _ John -meng _ megnu nagh aghagh uq _ .
John _ paaptaaye sta _ ungipagh ke i yuggaagh llegh aneng _ wh av emun _ kenlanga _ , _ suugllug t _ wayagh naqutke aqe aat _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ .
qamagte luteng _ uuknaliqiste tlu _ Moses - emllu _ liilightuusagh ita _ uuknaliq ut keng ng waat _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ kenlanga _ John-em _ tagi llegh anun _ .
John -nguuq _ uuknaliqistet _ uuknaliqe tkekagh at _ tagin aq n illegh megg teggun _ elijah _ . _ ugpeqe yu kufsigu _ uuknaliqe llegh _ , _ John _ Elij ah- nguuq _ .
sigute lgu usi _ , _ nagate tek _ !
" _ maaten _ kiyagh lleghh it _ yug t _ sa mun _ uspute naqe zingi _ ? _ Taghnughh aagh estun _ ayuqe ut _ aqume uute luteng _ akilpegaghvig ni _ , _ naghaalgute meggnun _ akilghuu te lghiit _ whaten _ ,
' _ qalghightaute amsi _ , _ tuk aleg anghi tusi _ ! _ qiyiqe te ukut _ , _ qiyiqe nghite usi _ ! _ '
" _ John _ tagi aqngami _ fast- u aqe uq _ , _ megh igate uq llu _ wine- meng _ , _ enkaam _ yug t _ whaten _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ tughneghagh lgu uq _ ' _ .
ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi aqngami _ , _ neghe lgusigh aqe ai _ , _ meghe lgusigh aqe ai llu _ yug t _ , _ enkaam _ yug t _ whaten _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ Y uuk qun _ taana _ esghaqagh teggu _ ! _ neghetu pigte uq _ , _ meghetu pigte uq _ , _ ilakumtaagh ke aat llu _ tax -em _ qerngught isteng ita _ , _ seghleghqes tetlu _ ! _ ' _ naqamllu _ kiyaghnegh m _ peghqinellegh a _ ipapigh qengng aaq _ s allghakun _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ allute luki _ allaaghlluwhaght ill eni _ atuqe kaqe ai _ Ch or az in -mi _ , _ Beth s a id a-mi _ , _ C ap ern a um -em illu _ . _ iwernga _ yug it _ avutegh qelluteng _ taaqe llghite ngugh t _ seghleghqen neghmeng _ enkaam _ Jesus-em _ aghyuugh mik ii _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Seghleghwaagh unaq nguusi _ , _ Ch or az in -eghm iini _ ! _ Seghleghwaagh unaq nguusi _ , _ Beth s a id a-gh m iini _ ! _ elpesi ni _ allaagh lluw aght illegh llaget _ apeghiighkagh t _ pi kaayagh kata _ T yr e- millu _ S id on- millu _ , _ neghigh pigte luteng _ yug it _ avutegh qelluteng _ seghleghqen nanigh nayagh tut _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ suvinagh lghii meng _ qiipaghaghqagh meng _ aate luteng _ aqume nayagh ut _ pan ete llegh teggun _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ T yr e- eghm iitlu _ S id on -eghm iitlu _ aghy ullegh q estaaghh aa yaghqaagut _ elpesi neng _ !
enkaam _ elpek si _ , _ C ap ern a um -eghm iini _ ! _ qaywa _ angl is teghllag yagh ngaagh pesi _ elpesi neng _ katam _ repall _ sumegh gpesini _ usuqe lleg nge lleqe nighllug si _ qilag mi _ , _ yeghlegi _ ukig lleqe aisi _ hell- mun _ . _ All aagh lluwh aght illegh llaget _ pi kaayagh kata _ S od om -e mi _ , _ paninang _ aghneghmi _ whani _ nekevgha nayagh uq _ !
iwernga _ ungipaate amsi _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg ke aghagh yaghqaqe ai _ S od om -eghmiit _ pakig gu lluki _ elpesi neng _ ! _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ kaay _ a ta _ , _ atanegh ke aaten _ qilag m llu _ nuna m llu _ ! _ iyamsiqa yug vike amken _ qayughllak _ liite kau nghite ngugh nun _ liite stekaqe an _ ipapighqell eq _ iigh kan _ liitekagh neng llu _ peghqinegh neng llu _ .
aa-a _ , _ Ataa y _ , _ efqugh ke llegh gpetun _ pi kau uten _ .
" _ ata ma _ tagivagh kaqe a _ sa u a _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke a _ ighnegh _ , _ iwerngaqun _ ata m _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke a _ a ta _ , _ iwerngaqun _ ighnegh m _ , _ enkaam _ ighnegh m _ nakmikegkagh minun _ liite ste lleqe a _ a ta _ .
" _ tagi tek _ whanga mnun _ qamagte lusi _ ugh legh ilghii ni _ , _ uqigtuqagh meng llu _ akmag leg ghllag ni _ , _ meghnaali ste lleqe amsi _ .
iisqaghmiitagh gka _ aate lukek _ liite i vike tengnga _ , _ qayughllak _ y aku mangin negh itu nga _ , _ ilu ka _ quseveg ng aaq _ . _ enkaam _ meghnaali lleqe usi _ unguva sigh gpesinun _ .
iisqaghmiitagh gka _ piyaqnagh u i te uk _ , _ akmag ka llu _ uqengestaaghhagh u uq _ . _ "
taagken _ Sabbath -em _ aghnegh ani _ Jesus _ igleghtekagh _ wheat -em _ piite vig akun _ . _ Maligsaagh tengi _ iyataghkagh t _ enkaam _ wheat -meng _ qesug te aqe luteng _ neghekagh t _ .
Pharisees-et _ esghagh luki _ maligsaaghtet _ wheat -meng _ qesug te aatagh lghiit _ , _ Jesus _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ ii-i _ , _ Sabbath -mi _ maligsaaghte ten _ qepghagh ut _ , _ liilightuusagh _ naafqe aat _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ At igh tuum angis tegguu _ David -enkut _ yu kullghiit _ sa kau ta i _ iyatagh aqngameng _ ?
itegh kau uq _ tab ern ac le- mun _ enkaam _ yu kullghiit _ neghe kaqe aat _ neqekrangllagh _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tuunekagh _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh megteggun _ liilightuusagh _ naafqe kaqe aat _ qayughllak _ priest- nge i na ut _ negh yaghqaqe yagh kangat _ .
At igh t iig as teg gu llu _ liilightuusagh nite ngughk _ priest-et _ temple- mi _ qepghagh negh meggni _ Sabbath -mi _ naafqe aqe kangat _ Sabbath -em _ liilightuusagh a _ ? _ naqamllu _ priest-et _ anaggute igate ut _ .
ungipaate amsi _ , _ whaante uq _ temple- mi _ kina _ aange aghagh lghii _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ nangllegtigh sqe sug amsi _ yug lgute gpesinun _ pakig gu lluku _ aghqe te gpesineng _ . _ ' _ taakut _ akuzite t _ liigikngwaagh yaq uf siki _ sa meng _ pi ta i _ , _ nanqigte nayagh nghite asi _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki _ anaggute llghite ngugh t _ ,
qayughllak _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ , _ atanegh ke a _ Sabbath -em _ . _ "
Taa ken _ Jesus _ aglagh luni _ synagogue- ng itnun _ iteghkagh _ .
taawa nguq _ yuug _ iigge an _ inglu i _ unegh ii iqe aat _ . _ ila ita _ yug t _ tawan lenguut _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ naal kef ik naluku _ anaggute llegh meng _ , _ " _ liilightuusagh mnni _ itagnaghtaa- a _ naallghute i lleghqagh _ Sabbath -mi _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ naligh gpesi _ penniigh a _ kalef kag saq an _ laawaagh mun _ Sabbath -mi _ , _ nusug nayagh es tegguu _ ?
yuug _ megnu nagh aghagh uq _ penniigh meng _ ! _ enkaam _ liilightuusagh ni _ itagnagh lghii u uq _ pinitun _ pi lleghqagh _ Sabbath -mi _ . _ "
taagken _ yuug _ uniigh nga lghii meng _ iigge leg _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ nengug te ki _ iigge ten _ . _ " _ iigge ni _ nengug tke ai _ , _ aga _ naagh llegh u tke aat _ , _ inglu megestun _ lli aqe aat _ .
taagken _ Pharisees-et _ aane luteng _ agghi saghtuqagh t _ naten _ tuqute na luku _ Jesus _ .
Jesus-em _ liisimake luku _ agghi llegh at _ , _ aghulaqekagh _ . _ yug lghute ghllag t _ malig llegh aat kaat _ , _ enkaam _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ qinuyug lghiit _ qamagte luki _ ,
ineghtekagh i llu _ ungipagh ke te qugh a mi _ pis qelluni _ .
tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ apeghiigh qagh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ pillgha _ uuknaliqe i stekete te _ Isai ah -kun _ whaten _ :
" _ una _ esgha _ nakmikegkagh ka _ qepghaghte nguluku _ . _ piniqe kaqe a _ unguva sigh gma _ efqugh ke pigte a _ . _ taghneghagh gka _ ellnga kun _ nekegte lleqe agka _ . _ ungipaate lleqe ai _ Gentile-et _ taw ateghlluwaaq _ nanqigte i lleghqagh mneng _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ .
aaghtiiraagh naanghite uq _ nalighmeng _ akilghuu naanghite uq _ , _ tume ni _ iglagtu pigte luni _ akuzi naanghite uq _ .
iike naanghite a _ vegaagh _ ullegh nga lghii _ , _ qaame yaghtugh u ngestaghkagh k _ kenegh lghutagh k _ qaam n naanghi taak _ . _ tawaten _ pi yaghqaa uq _ kenlanga _ qamagte luni _ yuug _ whaten _ piyug luni _ lliigh kan _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte llegh a _ yug neng _ av ut angituq _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh akun _ Gentile-et _ sighima lleqe ut _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-mun _ tagi tke aat _ yuug _ ayaakagh _ , _ akuzi igate ngughk _ qayughllak _ ilu mikun _ tughneghagh leg _ . _ Jesus-em _ naagh llegh u tke a _ enkaam _ akuzi yagutekagh llu _ esghagh u sag u tke aq llu _ .
yug lghute ghllag t _ saghiigha yug ghllagkagh t _ repall _ ellmeggneng _ aapqugh aagh utkat _ whaten _ , _ " _ una _ David-em _ ighnegh ke nghite agu _ ? _ "
Pharisees-et _ nagate luteng _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ yug neng _ aane ste aqe ai _ tughneghagh t _ qayughllak _ atuqe u kanga _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ B e el z eb ul -em _ , _ igleghutisteng at _ tughneghagh t _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ liisimake kangi _ sumeghtaghagh llegh it _ enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ alngunak _ ataneghpag u llegh _ aafqugh te luni _ pillugute kuni _ , _ naave lleqe uq _ . _ tanemlleqa _ ne ghllag t _ nalighmeng _ nengllugute t _ aafqugh te luteng _ pillugute kumeng _ , _ qerng agh men naanghi tut _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ tughneghagh m _ aane stekunigu _ tughneghagh _ , _ taawa _ ellmi neng _ pilluw aaguq _ enkaam _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kenlet gh uu llequq _ .
aag negh squgh u u kuma _ tughneghagh neng _ B e el z eb ul -kun _ , _ naten mi _ yug gpesi _ aane ste qugh aqe atki _ tughneghagh t _ ? _ enkaam _ yug si _ nanqigte i stekete lleqe asi _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ aag negh squgh u u kuma _ tughneghagh neng _ , _ taawa _ taam _ ipapigh qaa _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ kaate ma uq _ elpesi nun _ .
" _ kina _ alngunak _ itegh yug kuni _ iknaqe lghii m _ yug m _ mangteghagh anun _ tegleg ugh naluni _ saghya aneng _ , _ sivuke luku _ yuug _ asighqesaghqagh ke a _ . _ taagken _ wayagh tegh lleqii _ saghya i _ .
" _ kina _ alngunak _ whangam nin negh ilnguq _ kipullgin aagh tek aqa _ ; _ kitum _ alngunak _ qerngughte i lgusigh nghite kuminga _ mingite i ste u uq _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ungipaate amsi _ yug t _ seghevute lleg nge yaghqaa ut _ alngunak _ seghleghqe llegh meggneng _ , _ alngunak llu _ seghlequ ullegh meggneng _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ seghlequ uqu mi kek _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ , _ seghevute lleg nge naanghite uq _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ kipullegmun _ sa meng _ pi kunigu _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ , _ seghevute lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ kipullegmun _ sa meng _ pi kumikek _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ , _ seghevute lleg nge naanghite uq _ maaten _ kiyaghtaallegh mi _ , _ nalighmeng _ tuungligh ghhagh ani _ .
" _ uqfig _ aflengakekagh _ pinigh lghii u uq _ , _ piite stekagh i _ pinigh ut _ . _ uqfig _ aflengake llghite ngughk _ seghleghu uq _ , _ piite stekagh i _ seghleghu ut _ . _ piite ste i llegh akun _ liisimak elleq aghsi _ uqfig m _ nateghtu langa _ .
ukughsi _ nemeghyagh ni _ ! _ naten _ akuzi aqe tsi _ pinigh lghii meng _ seghlegh ugh ngaagh pesi _ ? _ sa u a _ alngunak _ yug m _ ilu anite ngughk _ aane kau yug u uq _ akuzillegh akun _ .
pinigh lghii _ yuug _ pinigh lghii meng _ ilumike i lghii _ pinigh lghii meng _ aane ste i kayugu uq _ . _ seghlegh _ yuug _ seghlegh meng _ ilumike i lghii _ seghlegh meng _ aane ste i kayugu uq _ .
" _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ yug t _ apegh yaghqagh pestaagh ke ait _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qamagte luki _ seghlegh t _ akuzite t _ atuqekagh teng _ sangita _ atuqe ma ta i _ .
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe aaten _ akuzite gpegun _ . _ akuzite gpek _ ipapigh qelleq aaten _ avute ite ni luten _ nalighmeng _ nanqigte lleqe aaten _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luten _ . _ "
taagken _ ila ita _ apeghtughiste ita _ liilightuusagh m _ , _ ila ita llu _ Pharisees-et _ pi ke aat _ Jesus _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ allaaghlluwhaght ilghii ten _ esghapag yu w amken _ liigike na luku _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgh en _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ta a _ . _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aghnegh m _ uum _ yug i _ seghleghqe ma u ut _ , _ ataasiigh negh ilnguut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ naqam _ allaaghlluwhaght ites qut _ whanga mnun _ . _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ Taan angin aghhaq _ allaaghlluwhaght illeq _ esghagh lleqaghsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ allaaghlluwh aagh ti llgha _ J on ah -mun _ .
Jonah _ iqallug ghrugllag m _ aqsaq ghw an it kaaguq _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ , _ pi nga yu t _ unug et _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ sam an saghqaaguq _ nuna mi _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ , _ pi nga yu t _ unug et _ .
nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtegkangisi _ elpek si _ kiyaghte lghii ni _ aghneghmi _ whani _ , _ nineveh-kagh mii t _ nekeve luteng _ anaggute ni lleqe aisi _ aghyuugh yaghqagh pestaagh u ni lusi _ . _ uuknaliqe i sta _ Jonah _ ungipagh yan _ nineveh-kagh mii t _ avutegh qelluteng _ seghleghqen naniq aagut _ . _ iwernga _ elpek si _ avutegh qellusi _ seghleghqen nan ill ghi tusi _ qaywa _ nagate kaqe ghngaaghpesigu _ kina _ aange aghagh lghii _ J on ah -meng _ .
nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtegkangisi _ elpek si _ kiyaghte lghii ni _ aghneghmi _ whani _ , _ queen- nge an _ S h eb a-m _ nekeve luni _ nanqigte yaghqaa ni lleqe aisi _ . _ tagi kau uq _ uyav agh pan ilngughmeng _ ne mineng _ nagate na luku _ S ol om on-em _ peghqinegh ghllag _ apeghtugh i llegh a _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ aange aghagh lghii _ S ol om on -meng _ whaante uq _ , _ taw all iim a _ ighsak aqaghsi _ . _ "
" _ tughneghagh _ yug meng _ aane gkuni _ igleghte lleqe uq _ meq ragg iil ngugh mi _ nuna mi _ , _ ivagh i lleqe uq _ meghnaali vigkagh meng _ . _ iwernga _ naalkute nghite yami _ ,
pi ke aq _ , _ ' _ kiyaghfig ke yagh ke mnun _ uteghte naqe unga _ . _ ' _ kaate yalghiimi _ paaghqite uq _ , _ aall waagh luni _ , _ mingll eg tengngwaagh luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
taagken _ aane luni _ tagi tke ai _ maaghraghvinleg _ tughneghagh t _ ellmi neng _ seghlegh atagh alghiit _ . _ Itegh aa lluteng _ yug mun _ tawan tekat _ . _ enkaam _ taana _ yuug _ sivun gh aneng _ wataqaaghaq _ seghlegh waagh ugh tekaq _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ ayuqe yaghqaa ut _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ kiyaghte lghiit _ maaten _ , _ wataqaaghaq _ seghlegh ugh tagh agh yaghqaagut _ sivugh nghaani _ pi llegh meggneng _ . _ "
paninang _ Jesus-em _ aleghqugh ma luki _ yug t _ , _ Jesus-em _ naange a llu _ anglegut angillu _ kaate luteng _ manughagh mi _ aleghqugh yug qu aat _ .
enkaam _ kitum _ ungipagh tke a _ , _ " _ ii-i _ , _ qakma _ naa n llu _ anglegute ten llu _ , _ aleghqugh yug aqe aaten _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ kinangaawa _ naa ka _ ? _ kinkungaawa t _ anglegute nka _ ? _ "
taagken _ kenigh luki _ maligsaaghteni _ , _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ Taaku s ta _ naa ka llu _ anglegute nka llu _ !
kina _ alngunak _ ata ma _ qilagmelnguum _ piyuke llegh atun _ pikumi _ , _ anglegute ke aqa _ , _ nayag ke aqa _ , _ naa ke aqa llu _ ! _ "
tawani _ ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ Jesus _ aane luni _ mangteghagh meng _ , _ naayvagh m _ esne akun _ aqume luni _ apeghtugh ikagh _ .
yug lghute ghllag t _ kangllu qaghte yatni _ , _ angyagh mun _ uugte luni _ aqumekagh _ , _ enkaam _ yug lghute ghllag t _ esne metekagh t _ .
ungipaghaate tgun _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ apeghtugh qu ai _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ piitesighagh a _ piitesighaghvig minun _ aglagh luni _ , _ ifkagh qughkagh _ piitute neng _ .
piitesighaghvig mini _ ifk aghq iyalghiimi _ piitute neng _ , _ ila i _ tume tgun _ tekite ke aat _ , _ enkaam _ qawaag t _ tagi luteng _ negh u qu ait _ .
ila i _ piitute t _ tekite ke aat _ uyghagaghtuqagh kun _ sun apag ilngugh qun _ . _ Tawaninginaq _ piite tke aat _ qayughllak _ suna a _ ugmestaaghhagh _ .
iwernga _ siqinegh _ piite yalghiimi _ maatnegh an _ paneghtekagh i _ qayughllak _ aku pag ilnguut _ .
ila i _ piitute m _ tekite ke aat _ sikughllugtuqagh kun _ , _ sikughllug t _ piite yalghiimeng _ piite vig iqe ait _ piitute t _ .
iwernga _ ila i _ piitute t _ tekite ke aat _ suna kegtagh kun _ piite ste ikagh t _ g ra in -meng _ , _ ila i _ 1 00 _ , _ ila i _ 6 0 _ , _ ila i _ 3 0 _ .
sigute lgu usi _ , _ nagate tek _ ! _ "
taagken _ maligsaaghtengita _ taku luku _ Jesus _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ sangan _ ungipaghaate meng _ atuqe aqe ziin _ apeghtugh nghpeki _ yug t _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ elpesi nun _ kiyaghnegh m _ liite stekaqe a _ talugh nga lghii _ ipapighqell gha _ ataneghpag u llegh an _ qilag m _ , _ iwernga _ ellngit nun _ liite tesi mangite a _ .
enkaam _ yuug _ liigike lleg ngekagh _ , _ wataqaaghaq _ liigike lleg nge aghagh yaghqaa uq _ , _ iwernga _ yuug _ liigik ell ep ag ilnguq _ liigike llegh a _ iqite lleqe uq _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ apeghtugh aqe anka _ ungipaghaate tgun _ , _ qayughllak _ esghaate ghngaaghmeng _ esghaate igate ngugh t _ , _ nagate ghngaaghmeng _ nagaq iigal nguut _ , _ talwa _ liigike igate ngugh t _ .
enkaam _ ellngitgun _ Isai ah-m _ uuknaliqe tke i llegh a _ apeghiigh uq _ . _ taaggun _ uuknaliqe llegh akun _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ ellngit _ nagate pestaagh lleqe ut _ taawanginaq _ liigike naanghite ait _ ; _ esghaate pestaagh lleqe ut _ , _ taawanginaq _ liigike naanghite ait _ esghaghkagh teng _ ,
qayughllak _ ellngit a _ umyugagh it _ pi neghllugtekau ut _ . _ sigute it _ tu saq negh llu ug tekaagut _ , _ iye teng llu _ quneghtekaqe ait _ . _ Tawatel ngu unghi saq umeng _ iye meggneng _ esghaate nayagh ut _ , _ sigute meggneng _ nagaqugh te nayagh ut _ , _ umyugagh megteggun _ liigike nayagh ut _ , _ enkaam _ qiive nayagh ut _ whanga mnun _ naallgh u tesqell uteng _ . _ '
" _ iwernga _ quyanaghhalek _ elpek si _ ! _ iye si _ esghaate aqe ut _ , _ sigute si llu _ nagaqugh te aqe ut _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ uuknaliq is tel ghutetlu _ , _ yug lghutagh nge an llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ esghagh yug kaqsagh ait _ esghagh kasi _ , _ iwernga _ esghagh mangite ait _ . _ nagaqugh yug kaqsagh ait llu _ nagaqugh kasi _ , _ iwernga _ nagaqugh mangite ait _ .
" _ nagate ggu _ sa meng _ pi aqe ta a _ ungipaghaate ke kaqe a _ piitesighagh a _ .
piitute t _ tume t _ saaghw itgun _ tekite ke aat _ uspute nga ut _ kitumun _ alngunak _ nagaqugh te lghii mun _ ungipagh meng _ ataneghpag u llegh meng _ ayuqe lghii meng _ . _ liigike nghite kagu _ ungipagh _ tughneghagh m _ tagi luni _ wayagh lleqe a _ tekite kaayagh lghii _ ilu akun _ .
tamaakut _ piitute t _ uyghagtuqagh kun _ suna kun _ tekite ke aat _ uspute nga ut _ kitumun _ alngunak _ nagaqugh te lghii mun _ ungipagh meng _ , _ tawaninginaq _ ungipagh _ tugukligh iqe a _ quyake sigh ke luku _ .
iwernga _ ungipagh _ ilu ani _ mulu ma ite ngughk _ qayughllak _ akugh nge llghite ngughk _ . _ enkaam _ seghleliigh yalghiimi _ nalighmeng _ amyuqetagh tke lleg nge yalghiimi _ , _ apallugh ke luku _ ungipagh _ tawaninginaq _ ugpeqe i nanigh uq _ .
tamaakut _ piitute t _ sikughllugtuqagh kun _ suna kun _ tekite ke aat _ uspute nga ut _ kitumun _ alngunak _ nagaqugh te lghii mun _ ungipagh meng _ , _ taawanginaq _ teggellghiigh llegh an _ kiyagh taagh usigh qameng _ , _ aklungi igh i yu llegh ghllag an llu _ piite vig igh aqe a _ ungipagh _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ piite ste i igate uq _ .
tamaakut _ piitute t _ tekite ke aat _ suna kegtagh kun _ uspute nga ut _ yug nun _ nagaqugh te lghii nun llu _ liigike i lghii nun llu _ ungipagh meng _ . _ enkaam _ piite ste qugh aqe ut _ ila i _ 1 00 _ , _ ila i _ 6 0 _ , _ ila i _ 3 0 _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ aapte qugh a _ ila a _ ungipaghagh an _ ellngit nun _ , _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ yug tun _ piitesighaghkagh tun _ pinigh lghii meng _ piitute meng _ piitesighaghvig mini _ ayuqe uq _ .
Unug mi _ ataasigh mi _ qav asim aluki _ , _ anguyag a _ tagi luni _ piitesighagh ke aq _ we ed s -meng _ akule itgun _ wheat -et _ , _ taagken _ aghulaqekagh _ .
