tawaten _ Peter-em _ piy is teng _ qalleg nanigh luteng _ , _ yeghlegi _ usuqekagh at _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ taawa _ liigikagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ talwa _ Gentile-et _ pillegh qal i simakangi _ avutegh qes qelluki _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ , _ unguvall eng esqell ukillu _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ ! _ "
Steph en -em _ tuqute llegh a _ kenle ke luku _ Jews-et _ amyuutkekagh it _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ enkaam _ anagkagh t _ Jerusalem-emeng _ . _ aghulaqe te tke aat _ kenlanga _ Ph o en ic ia- mun _ , _ C yp r us -mun _ , _ Antioch - munllu _ . _ igleghte te kete luku _ ungipagh kekagh it _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ Jews- ngin aghhagh nun _ .
iwernga _ ila i _ ugpeqagh t _ C yp r us - mengllu _ C yr en e- mengllu _ Antioch - etk at _ , _ kaate luteng _ ungipagh kekagh at _ atanegh _ Jesus _ talwa _ Jews- ngun ghil ngughnun _ .
Atanghem _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ ellngitnite kau lghii _ , _ enkaam _ uglagh pestaagh _ yuug _ ugpegh uute luni _ qiive te tke aq _ atanegh mun _ .
ugpeqagh t _ Jerusalem -em el nguut _ nagate luku _ peter _ , _ Barnabas _ kayagtekagh at _ Antioch -mun _ .
kaate yalghiimi _ uglagh u pigte lghii _ yuug _ ugpegh uute luni _ ayuqe uq _ , _ enkaam _ quya ghllagkagh _ qayughllak _ liigikekagh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe i nga llegh ghllag a _ yug nun _ . _ Barnabas _ pinigh lghii u lghii _ yuug _ , _ imigh nga ghllag llu _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ ugpeqe i lleg leg ghllag llu _ . _ taagken _ allangughte fqiita _ ataasiighmete kestigh sqekagh i _ atanegh mun _ . _ wataqaaghaq _ ila ita llu _ yug t _ ugpeqekagh at _ atanegh _ .
taagken _ Barnab as-em _ Saul _ ivagh yaghtuqagh a _ tarsus- mun _ .
N aal kes am igu _ kelqekagh a _ Antioch -mun _ . _ ataasigh _ ayumiqullegh _ tamaan tellegh megni _ ilate aqe lutek _ ugpeqagh nun _ apeghtugh ikagh k _ yug lghute ghllag nun _ . _ tamaani _ Antioch -mi _ ugpeqagh t _ atigh yuwhaagh ke ait _ , _ " _ Chris ti an -et _ . _ "
tamaani _ ila i _ uuknaliq istem _ Jerusalem-emeng _ Antioch -mun _ tagikagh t _ .
ataasigh _ Ag ab us -nguftuq _ , _ nekeve luni _ uuknaliqekagh _ Taghneghagnekun _ neqangisag ghllag naqe ni luku _ tea- ma ani _ . _ taawa _ negh ke igh sag ghllag ke aq _ C l a ud i us _ Umiilegpig aaluku _ .
ugpeqagh t _ ugpeqaalgu te teng _ Judea- melnguut _ kayusigh yug qu ait _ pi tu tal megestun _ .
enkaam _ qerngughte i luteng _ mani meng _ tuyugh ikagh t _ el der -en un _ Jerusalem -em el ngughnun _ Barnab as -en kug nekun _ Saul -en kug nekun _ .
nani _ tamaani _ pi llegh mi _ umiileg m _ Herod-em _ amyuutke sag u tke ai _ ila i _ ugpeqagh t _ .
John-em _ angleg utanga _ James _ tuqute stekagh a _ savigpag kun _ .
umiileg m _ Herod-em _ liigike yamigu _ Jews-en eng _ efqughtagh igh lleg ni _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ , _ qelegh tke a _ peter _ tugu sqellug qu _ . _ ( _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ Neq engh aghq eng nguluki _ Y e ast- alii mang ilngughmeng _ neqekrangllagh meng _ . _ )
peter _ tugu yatgu _ , _ umiileg m _ Herod-em _ qelegh tke a _ 1 6 - egh yag nun _ pilluw aght enun _ kelengake sqellug qu _ estamat kaghte ai ta _ kipullegte te aqe luki _ . _ yugtuqagh mi _ nanqigte yukagh a _ kingu aneng _ P ass ov er-em _ .
enkaam _ peter _ anusimingllaghvig mete stekagh a _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqagh t _ yughagh te ke ghllag ke aat _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
peter _ qavaa lghii _ maalghug _ kelengake istek _ akule gkeni _ , _ petug nga lghii llu _ malghug negh teggun _ qiipraghute tgun _ . _ allameng _ anusimingllaghvig m _ amig a _ kelengak is tel ek _ . _ whaa _ aghtekan _ Herod-em _ tagite ste naqngu kanga _ yug nun _ nanqigte sqellug qu _ .
Atanghem _ yaquleg a _ aliigh aghtekagh _ , _ enkaam _ nighug _ kuukgute ke aq _ anusimingllaghvig m _ ilu anun _ . _ yaquleg m _ peter _ tuye akun _ aghulate luku _ , _ teghtughllug qu _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ egmiinaq _ maketen _ ! _ " _ Tawaninginaq _ qiipraghute t _ ifkagh qu te tke aat _ iiggagh neng _ .
taagken _ yaquleg m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ pilugug luten _ kameg gken _ aate kek _ . _ " _ peter _ pi sqe llegh atun _ pi ke aq _ . _ yaquleg m _ pilagh te aqe a _ , _ " _ qaasligh gken _ aate lukek _ maligte nga _ . _ "
enkaam _ Peter-em _ maligtekagh a _ . _ ugpeqe mangite u aqe aqe yagh kanga _ aane te lleg ni _ , _ yeghlegi _ sumeghtagh aqe aq _ esghaghwaagh ni luni _ .
sivuligh t llu _ tuungligh ghhagh i llu _ kelengak istet _ naghughte luki _ kaate tke ak _ savikenghaagh mun _ amig mun _ . _ amigh k _ ellmi neng _ qelpegh yan _ , _ aane lutek _ iglegh tegh ng aagmek _ tume tgun _ yaquleg _ aviite qaghtekagh _ .
taagken _ Peter-em _ liigike u aqe a _ sa mate ni _ enkaam _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ taawa _ ipa u uq _ Atanghem _ kayagte ma a _ yaquleg ni _ iq itu tesqell unga _ Herod -meng _ , _ Jews -etlu _ sa lleghqagh itneng _ . _ "
liigike luku _ sa mate ni _ Mar y- n kunun _ aglaghkagh _ , _ John _ Mar k -em _ naa anun _ . _ tawani _ yug lghute _ qerngughte te luni _ yughagh te ghllagu lghii _ qerngagh mi _ .
peter _ esl ak ligh qun _ amig kun _ tenglugtugh yan _ aghnaghagh m _ qepghagh tem _ , _ R h od a-m _ qelpegh te yaghtuqagh a _ .
liisuqe yamigu _ Peter-em _ me a _ , _ quyagh llagem _ angtalanganeng _ qelpegh te gpenaan _ , _ yeghlegi _ ilu te mun _ itegh qaghte luni _ aapte qugh a _ qakma _ peter _ manugh amen niluku _ .
iwernga _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ temngi _ pi uten _ ! _ " _ iwernga _ sagiqe tke ai _ ipa u ni luku _ . _ taagken _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ yaquleg ke nghite agu wha _ . _ "
qakma _ peter _ tenglugtugh ma inagh ke aq _ . _ Qel pegh us aq megteggu _ ellnga u uq _ enkaam _ saghiigha yuke aat _ .
Peter-em _ apaqukagh i _ qall eg nan iisqelluki _ , _ enkaam _ ungipamsug te u aqe ai _ Atanghem _ aane te llegh aneng _ anusimingllaghvig meng _ . _ pi ke ai llu _ , _ " _ apegh qagh nakefsinga _ James - munllu _ ugpeqaalgutem n nunllu _ tawaten _ pi ma ni lunga _ . _ " _ taagken _ aane luni _ natmun _ pi ke aq _ .
aghtaghagh aqe a llu _ kelengak istet _ av iil ng aqaat _ peter _ , _ aling rugh umaghmeng _ kukriqekagh t _ samatagh nge a _ .
Herod-em _ ivagh te sim ay aqanga _ iwernga _ naalke ma nge i tke aat _ . _ enkaam _ kelengak istet _ aapqugh aagh tes luki _ nalluke yatgu _ tuqu qugh stekagh i _ . _ Taam _ kingu aneng _ herod _ Judea- meng _ Caesarea- lluni _ tamaan tegh r aak aq _ .
umiileg m _ Herod-em _ ugumi yagute ghllagu kangi _ T yr e- eghm iitlu _ S id on -eghm iitlu _ , _ iwernga _ tamaa kum iit _ yug t _ kayagtekagh it _ B l as tus -mun _ akuz itu n naq agh tesqell uteng _ Herod -mun _ . _ Blastus _ igleghut istek egkanga _ umiileg m _ Herod-em _ mangteghagh ghllag an _ . _ kaate luteng _ aaptekagh at _ Blastus _ akuz itu tagh tesqell uteng _ umiileg mun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau lghiit _ neqenge nanigh na yukagh meng _ Herod-em _ nuna aneng _ .
tawani _ aghneghmi _ pi vigkagh meggni _ Herod-em _ umiileg u sigh t _ aatkagh ni _ aat qugh luki _ aqume luni _ aqumutagh ghllag gmikun _ akuzikagh _ .
taaqe yan _ akuzi nghmeng _ yug t _ akilghuukagh t _ , _ " _ yugu nghite uq _ akuzi lghii _ , _ nalug iqe aat _ kiyaghnegh t _ ! _ "
Tawaninginaq _ Atanghem _ yaquleg an _ qinuyug ste ghllag qagh a _ herod _ , _ qayughllak _ tugukligh kanga _ quulv alleq _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi a _ . _ Unguv aghmi _ kingugtagh u ghllag luni _ tuqukagh _ .
taawa _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh i _ mingite ma inagh ke aat _ enkaam _ wata _ yuug _ ugpegh uute tke aq _ .
taake uk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ Saul -enkuk _ apeghiigh yamegnegu _ qepghaqagh ek _ Jerusalem-emi _ , _ Antioch -mun _ uteghnigh iqe ak _ kelqellug qu _ John _ mark _ .
Antioch -mi _ ugpeqagh m _ ila i _ uuknaliqe i ste u ut llu _ apeghtughiste u ut llu _ . _ Taaku nguftut _ Barnabas _ , _ simeon _ , _ atigh llegh ke lghii _ niger- meng _ , _ L uc i us _ ( _ C yr en e-meng _ pi _ ) _ , _ Man a en _ ( _ angli lgute anga _ umiileg m _ Herod-em _ ) _ , _ Saul -llu _ .
maniguute ma luki _ atanegh mun _ , _ f ast- em al ukillu _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aafte kek _ Barnabas-enkuk _ Saul -enkuk _ , _ qayughllak _ nakmike agka _ alla neng _ qepghaqagh meng _ qepghigh sqellug kek _ whanga mnun _ . _ "
taaqe yameng _ f ast- ellegh mengllu _ yughagh llegh meng llu _ saafte lukek _ yughagh tkellug kek _ aghulaq es tek agket _ .
Barnabas-enkuk _ Saul -enkuk _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ kayag si s tek _ , _ S el e uc ia- t k ak _ kelqellug qu _ John _ mark _ kayute u luku _ . _ tamaaken _ angyaghpag kun _ qiighqagh mun _ C yp r us -mun _ pikagh t _ . _ kaate yameng _ salamis- mun _ synagogue- ng itni _ ungipagh ke ikagh t _ akuzi ta aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
salamis- meng _ igleghakagh t _ inglu anun _ qiighqagh m _ P ap h os -mun _ kaate llegh meggnun _ kenlanga _ . _ tamaani _ nallaqagh at _ yuug _ alignagh lghii _ ategh a _ Bar - Jesus _ , _ uuknaliq este sigh waaq _ , _ Jews -a _ .
qiighqagh m _ Governor -ng an _ S erg i us _ Paul us-em _ ilakumtaagh a _ . _ S erg i us _ Paul us _ pilleg ghllag _ . _ aqfa stekakek _ Barnabas-enkuk _ Saul -enkuk _ nagate na luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ .
iwernga _ Bar - Jesus-em _ alignalghii m _ , _ ateghagh leg m _ elymas- meng _ , _ aaghtiiraagh kakek _ g overnor -a _ ugpegh na yu kan _ . _ ( _ ategh _ elymas _ , _ Greek - stun _ whaten _ pi sigh u lghii _ , _ alignagh lghii _ . _ )
taagken _ Saul -em _ , _ ateghagh ke lghii m _ Paul -meng _ , _ imigh nga lghii m _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ esghapagtugh luku _ alignagh lghii _ 
pi ke aa _ , _ " _ uyuq _ tughneghagh m _ ighnegh a _ ! _ ugumi ke an _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ pinigh lghii _ . _ iqlengasag ghllag u uten llu _ seghletun llu _ pi ste ghllagu uten _ . _ Taaq naq enghi sik ii _ iqlengiqe sigh ke nghmeng _ Atanghem _ apeghtuusagh i _ ?
whaa _ Atanghem _ aghyuugh naqe aaten _ ay aas tem meng _ , _ enkaam _ esghaa tel ghagh tugh naanghi tuten _ aghnegh m _ nighug aneng _ . _ " _ Tawaninginaq _ El y m as-em _ iye kek _ mam legh qwaa k ak _ , _ enkaam _ tamaani _ ef lugh waaghmeng _ ivagh ikagh _ kitumun _ tas luq iis qelluni _ .
Governor -a _ ugpeqe aq _ esghapag luku _ tawaten _ pi lghii _ , _ saghiigha yagutekagh a llu _ apeghtuusagh _ atanegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ .
Paul -enkut _ iglegha lgutke te lghiit _ angyaghpag kun _ igleghtekagh t _ P ap h os -meng _ , _ perga- mun _ P am ph yl ia- melngugh mun _ . _ Tamaan lluki _ John _ Mar k -em _ unite luki _ Jerusalem-emun _ uteghnigh iqe aq _ .
taagken _ Paul -enkut _ perga- meng _ , _ Antioch - etk at _ Pi si d ia- melngugh mun _ . _ Sabbath -ngugh sagu _ synagogue- ng itnun _ itegh luteng _ aqumekagh t _ .
Igleghut isteng i _ synagogu e-em _ , _ taaqe yameng _ atightugh nghmeng _ liilightuusagh neng llu _ uuknaliqiste tlu _ igaqegkagh itneng _ , _ keveg aqe tke ait _ Paul -enkut _ whaten _ pisqelluki _ , _ " _ Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ ungipagh lgu kufsi _ iknaq suug usigh qameng _ ugpegh lleg mnnun _ , _ sa aqe tsi _ akuzite k _ . _ "
taagken _ Paul _ nekeve luni _ apaqu magh mi _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Israel-eghm iini _ , _ elpek si llu _ Gentile- eni _ maniguute kayug ni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ nagate ngnga _ !
whangkuta _ Israel-eghm iini _ manigughkagh mta _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ sivunegh put _ , _ nula ste ghllag kaqe ai llu _ nunatagh u aqngata _ Egypt- mi _ . _ Taakw aningani _ qepghaghtelaagh ugh tekat _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillegh llag mikun _ aghulaqe te kaqe ai _ Egypt- meng _ .
kilgaa nite luki _ qaatku te pag ll anghi tegh ngaata _ ellmi nun _ paninang _ aflengake kaqe ai _ ket wh el l _ 4 0 _ ayumiqullegh ni _ .
taagken _ kiyaghnegh m _ naaf qes am iki _ taakut _ maaghraghvinleg _ ramke t _ C an aan - melnguut _ nuna ke yagh kangat _ pi liite stekaqe a _ sivunegh mnnun _ pagite aqe sqellug qu _ .
entaqun _ 4 5 0 - nguut _ ayumiqullegh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike llegh aneng _ sivunegh put _ kenlanga _ nuna _ pi liite llegh itnun _ . _ " _ Taam _ kingu aneng _ nanqigte i ste ngestagh u aatagh kaqe ai _ iglegh utes qelluki _ kenlanga _ samuel _ uuknaliqe i sta _ igleghte te i stekau aghte llegh itnun _ .
taagken _ umiil eng yu w aqng ata _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe a _ Saul _ umiileg ke sqellug qu _ K is h -em _ ighnegh a _ , _ B en j amin -em _ ramke aneng _ pi _ . _ umiileg u kau uq _ 4 0 _ ayumiqullegh ni _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ umiilg un anigh tesam igu _ Saul _ , _ David _ umiileg liite stekagh a _ ellngit nun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzite kegka qaa _ whaten _ , _ ' _ Jes s e- m _ ighnegh a _ David _ umiileg ughte sug aqa _ . _ Tawatel nguq _ yuug _ piyuke aqe aqa _ , _ qayughllak _ pi yaghqaqe a _ sa u a _ alngunak _ piyuke kaqe a _ . _ '
" _ Taakw aningani _ David-em _ king ungh akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe i llegh mitun _ allgegh stekaqe a _ yuguligh i sta _ Israel-eghm iinun _ . _ taana _ yuguligh i sta _ Jesus- nguuq _ .
Jesus-em _ salin _ qepghaqagh ni _ piinligh llghite luku _ John _ ungipagh ke i kau uq _ Israel-eghm iinun _ whaten _ , _ ' _ Av utegh qellusi _ , _ seghleghqen nanigh lusi _ , _ paaptaay e tek _ . _ '
John-em _ qepghaqagh ni _ taaqe yaghtugh ngestagh luku _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ kina u ni lunga _ pi aqe ste ngnga _ ? _ whanga u nghite uq _ utaqakagh i _ . _ kingu mneng _ tagi yaghqaa uq _ aange ghllag lghii _ , _ repall _ whanga _ pinigh nghite unga _ singigh anun _ item t iste ngulunga _ . _ '
" _ Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ Abraham-em _ kingun ghitni _ , _ Gentile- en illu _ maniguute kayug ni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ taana _ ungipagh a _ yuguligh llegh m _ whangkunnun _ pi u uq _ !
Jerusalem -eghmiit _ igleghte te i stekete te lghiit _ nalluke kaqe aat _ Jesus _ yuguligh i ste u ta a _ , _ qaywa _ Sabbath -a _ tamaghhagh an _ nagate ghngaaghmegteki _ uuknaliqistet _ igaqegkagh it _ . _ naqam _ uuknaliqistet _ igaqegkagh it _ apeghiigh kaqe ait _ agghi te kaqe yamegteggu _ Jesus _ tuqute na luku _ .
taawa _ legan _ temngi _ apallugh ite ghngaan _ tuqute sighqagh meng _ pilate- mun _ tuqute sqe kaqe aat _ .
legan _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pinaq nill ghistun _ pi kaqe aat _ . _ taagken _ qaquuragh meng _ ateghte luku _ llivegh kaqe aat _ ,
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
Taam _ kingu aneng _ iglegha lgutke ke ii te a _ Jesus-em _ galilee- meng _ , _ Jerusalem-emun _ esghagh aatagh kaqe aat _ qafsinegyag ni _ aghnegh ni _ . _ Ellng inguut _ ungipagh lghiit _ yug mnnun _ esghagh ma ni luku _ Jesus _ unguva luku _ .
" _ whaten _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ ungipaate amsi _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh aneng _ sivunegh mnnun _ .
apeghiigh ma a _ akequsagh ni _ whangkunnun _ kingun ghitnun _ , _ unguvagh ste llegh mikun _ Jesus _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ ' _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ whaten _ P sal m _ 2 -mi _ , _ ' _ elpek _ ighnegh ke amken _ , _ aghneghmi _ whani _ A tal ii tagh pe nga _ . _ '
kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ Jesus _ tuqu llegh meng _ enkaangam _ allameng llu _ tuqu naanghite uq _ aghyugh yaghqaa luni _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ agleghnagh lghiit _ akequsagh kekagh nka _ David -mun _ ipapestaaq _ quya ste i sigh ke lleqe anka _ elpesi nun _ . _ '
ilangani _ P sal m s-em _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ agleghnagh lghii n _ aghu snaanghite aqa _ llivegh mi _ . _ '
" _ David-em _ unguvallegh mini _ atuqe kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ . _ taagken _ qavagh yan _ qungugh kaqe aat _ sivun gh an _ saaghw itgun _ , _ yugusigh a _ aghu kau uq _ llivegh mi _ .
iwernga _ taana _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekagh a _ tuqu llegh meng _ aghu mangite uq _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ elpesi nun _ liite sqe sug aqa _ Jesus-kun _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh it _ seghevute lleg nge kayugu ut _ . _ taana ta _ ungipagh ke kegka _ elpesi nun _ .
qaatke te llegh m _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh itgun _ kina _ alngunak _ iteme te naanghite a _ seghleghqe llegh aneng _ , _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ Jesus _ , _ iteme te yaghqaa uq _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ seghleghqe llegh mineng _ .
kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ uuknaliqiste tgun _ whaten _ , _ ' _ nagate tek _ elpek si _ aygugh itagh lghii ni _ . _ sa aqe tsi _ saghiigha yug lusi _ tuqu tek _ , _ qayughllak _ unguva u lusi _ sa lleqe unga _ iwernga _ ugpeq naanghi taghsi _ talwa _ kitum _ ungipaate ghngaisi _ . _ ' _ kelenga lusi _ , _ luuraq _ tawaten _ pin ayuk afsi _ . _ "
Paul-enkuk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ synagogue- meng _ aane ma lukek _ alla _ tagis qegk agket _ tuungligh ghhagh ani _ Sabbath -em _ , _ wata _ ung i pi qu tesqell uteng _ .
aanleghaate yameng _ Jews- el ghutetlu _ , _ Gentile- el ghutetlu _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ Jews- estun _ , _ maligte tke aat _ Paul -en kugnun _ Barnab as -en kugnun _ . _ Apostle- ek _ kayemekagh ik _ kiyagh tek est iisqelluki _ sighimake luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ .
tuungligh ghhagh ani _ Sabbath -em _ qamagte vzigh luteng _ Antioch -eghmiit _ nagate yagh tke aat _ Atanghem _ ungipagh aneng _ .
Jews-et _ aqinake aat _ esghagh yamegteki _ yug lghute ghllag t _ enkaam _ Paul _ kipullgin aqaat _ , _ seghleqekagh at llu _ .
iwernga _ Paul-enkuk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ tetug gpenaki _ Jews-et _ pi ke aik _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ elpesi nun _ sivuke luni _ apegh yaghqaa yagh uq _ iwernga _ nagate yug mangite usi _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ ighsake kaqe te gpesineng _ , _ palaqe kau te gpesineng llu _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh nge lleghqagh gpesineng _ , _ whaa _ Gentile-enun _ ungipagh ke i naqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ .
tawaten _ pi ukut _ qayughllak _ Atanghem _ qelqe aqe ainkut _ whaten _ , _ ' _ nakmike kaqe amsi _ nighug u lusi _ Gentile-enun _ , _ apegh sqellug qu _ yuguligh llegh _ nunatagh ghhagh anun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ ' _ "
Gentile-et _ nagaqugh luki _ taakut _ akuzite t _ quya ghllagkagh t _ , _ pi kau lghiit llu _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ pi niigh pigte uq _ . _ " _ tamaakut _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvall eng esqelluki _ ugpeqe ikagh t _ ungipagh meng _ .
enkaam _ tamaani _ Antioch -mi _ , _ uvit ang anil ngugh nillu _ nuna ni _ Atanghem _ ungipagh a _ mingitekagh _ .
iwernga _ Jews-et _ takukagh it _ Gentile-et _ aghni ut _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ igleghutisteng illu _ Antioch -em _ naav gu un nal ukek _ Paul-enkuk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ amyu utkegk agket _ taake uk _ yug k _ , _ aghulaq es tek ag ke tlu _ nuna meggneng _ .
enkaam _ apostle- ek _ itegagh tek _ pagulangigh iqe aik _ kelgute na luku _ pegge ni luki _ kipullgin aalghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ . _ taagken _ I c on i um -emun _ aghulaqekagh k _ .
iwernga _ tamaakut _ ugpeqagh t _ Antioch - melnguut _ quya nga ghllaget llu _ , _ imigh nga lghiit llu _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ .
I c on i um -e mi _ Paul-enkuk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ pii qellegh meg etun _ synagogue- mun _ aglaghkagh k _ . _ tawani _ wh ateghlluwaaq _ akuzikagh k _ repall _ Jews- el ghutetlu _ , _ Gentile- el ghutetlu _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ .
enkaam _ I c on i um -em etel qin aq ak _ , _ tamaani _ tetug gpenatek _ ungipagh ke ikagh k _ atanegh meng _ . _ Paul-enkuk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ Atanghem _ allaaghlluwhaght is teghllag aataq akek _ yug nun _ ipa u ta a _ liigike sqellug qu _ ungipagh kekagh ak _ Atanghem _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ . _ iwernga _ ugpegh yug ma ite ngugh t _ Jews-et _ Gentile-enun _ seghletun _ sumeghtaghagh tke stekagh it _ ugpeqagh t _ .
enkaam _ I c on i um -eghmiit _ malgh ugh k egkat _ , _ ila i _ ila tke aat _ Jews-enun _ , _ ila i _ apostle- enun _ .
taagken _ ila ita _ Gentile- etlu _ , _ Jews -etlu _ maligte te luteng _ igleghutiste meggnun _ amyugh te kete yu ke agket _ apostle- ek _ , _ milugh pag aat aghhiin aqlu _ tuqute yu ke agket _ .
nagaqugh yamek _ yug nun _ tawaten _ pi naqe ni lutek _ , _ qimagkagh k _ Ly c a onia- m _ ne ghllag gkenun _ Ly st r a- munllu _ , _ D er b e- munllu _ , _ uv iteg ken ilngugh nunllu _ ne nun _ .
enkaam _ tamaani _ ungipagh kekagh ik _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ .
Ly st r a- mi nguq _ taawa _ yuug _ itegagh i _ n atel nguut _ allgegh nghhagh ghhagh u te mineng _ ima _ enkaam _ piyug igate ngughk _ .
aqumgagh mi _ tawani _ nagatekagh a _ Paul _ akuzi lghii _ . _ Paul-em _ liigikekagh a _ yuug _ ugpegh lghii _ kiyaghnegh mun _ naallghute lleqe ni luni _ .
enkaam _ qiive luku _ tawavek _ iglagtu pigte luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Nekev ngwaagh i _ itegagh gpegun _ ! _ " _ aga _ yuug _ nekefqaghte luni _ tamaani _ piyuke aq _ .
yug lghute t _ esghapag luku _ Paul-em _ naallghute i llegh a _ araghaatagh tke aat _ Ly c a onia- gh m iistun _ , _ " _ yugu luteng _ kiyaghnegh t _ taku inkut _ ! _ "
Barnabas _ Z e us - ngun i kaat _ enkaam _ Paul _ Her mes - ngun i kaat _ kiyang _ akuzi ste u ta aneng _ .
priest- nge an _ Z e us - emllu _ , _ yug t llu _ aghqer raagh yuk agket _ Paul-enkuk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ . _ enkaam _ priest- a _ tagi tke aq _ teghig ke te yameng llu _ piitesiigh agh mengllu _ Ly st r a-m _ mingllu ta an _ amig ghllag anun _ . _ ( _ temple- a _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh mun _ Z e us -mun _ amig ghllag m _ tungang anilnguq _ ) _ .
iwernga _ apostle- ek _ Barnabas-enkuk _ Paul-enkuk _ liigike yamegneki _ sa naqe ta i _ aatkagh tek _ piigugh qu aik _ . _ taagken _ aqfaasnaq _ yug nun _ qungangiite tke ak _ aragh magh egmek _ ,
" _ ukughsi _ yug ni _ , _ sangafsi _ tawaten _ pi tsi _ ? _ whangkutung llu _ yugu ukung _ elpesi s tung waaq _ ! _ ungipagh ke i yaghtugh u ukung _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ elpesi nun _ , _ tunute lusi _ sea-te u nghite ngugh neng _ manigughkagh gpesineng _ qiiv esqellusi _ unguva lghii mun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ellnga n _ ulima kaqe ai _ qilag _ , _ nuna _ , _ kellaag igh a _ , _ sa u a llu _ tamaghhagh an _ taa kun ilnguq _ .
sivugh nghaani _ agani _ kiyaghnegh m _ qamagte luki _ ramke t _ Jews- ngun ghilnguut _ piyukell ghistun _ pi stekaqe ai _ .
iwernga _ tawate tegh ngaata _ paninang _ liisimake stekau uq _ unguva ni luni _ pinitun _ pi llegh mikun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ eslallugughte sta qaa _ nunivagseghagh t _ nag us qelluki _ . _ ayumiqullegh _ kaspugte luku _ piite ste aqe ai _ piite yaghqagh t _ piite vig it _ kaate nghata _ neq elg us qellusi _ , _ quy ang as qell usillu _ . _ "
Paul-enkuk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ tawaten _ akuzi ghngaayek _ taawa _ paninang _ Ly st r a- ghmiit _ aghqer raagh naq utkegk agket _ . _ iwernga _ pegnem _ pis negh itk ak _ .
taagken _ ila i _ Jews-et _ Antioch - mengllu _ I c on i um -em engllu _ kaate tke aat _ Ly st r a-mun _ . _ Ly st r a-gh mii nun _ naa vg uu llukek _ ugum ii testek agket _ . _ enkaam _ Jews -etlu _ , _ Ly st r a-gh m iitlu _ Paul _ milugh agaatagh luku _ qamugh qu aat _ ne m _ kelut anganun _ sumegh meggni _ tuquma ni luku _ .
iwernga _ ugpeqagh t _ taku laghate te yatni _ Paul _ nekeve luni _ aglagh nqigtekagh _ ne mun _ . _ taagken _ unaami ani _ elkek _ Barnabas-enkuk _ D er b e- mun _ aglaghkagh k _ .
Paul-enkuk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ ungipagh ke ikagh k _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ D er b e- mi _ enkaam _ uglagh _ maligte yaaghte ngughtekagh _ . _ taagken _ Ly st r a-mun _ pi nqigtekagh k _ , _ taagken _ I c on i um -emun _ , _ Antioch - munllu _ pikagh k _ Pi si d ia- melngugh mun _ .
takuughaghkagh megteni _ tamaani _ apeghtugh qu aik _ ugpeqagh t _ ugpeqe i llegh it _ wata _ iknaqugh tesqelluki _ , _ kayemekagh ik llu _ ugpegh llegh it _ aghulii tesqelluki _ . _ pi ke aik _ , _ " _ uglagh pestaagh _ seghleliigh llegh _ atuq saghq ap estaa qaghput _ itegh yaghqaaghte na luta _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ "
takuughaghkagh megteni llu _ nakmiightuqagh k _ Elder - k aghqameng _ iglegh utes qelluki _ ugpeqagh t _ . _ taagken _ yughagh magh egmek _ f ast- ek ak _ . _ Taam _ kingu aneng _ atanegh mun _ ugpeqekagh megtenun _ yughagh tkekagh ik _ Elder -et _ aflengak esqelluki _ .
taagken _ Pi si d ia- kun _ igleghakagh k _ P am ph yl ia- mun _ .
tamaani _ perga- mi _ , _ P am ph yl ia- melngugh mi _ ungipagh ke ikagh k _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ . _ taaqe yamek _ tesamavek _ At tal ia- mun _ pikagh k _ .
taagken _ Antioch -mun _ angyaghpag kun _ aghulaqekagh k _ . _ ( _ tamaani _ Antioch -mi _ ugpeqagh t _ Paul-enkuk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ aghulaqe llghite lukek _ yughagh tke kaqe kegket _ . _ aapute kaqe kegket _ kiyaghnegh mun _ kayusiite sqellug kek _ ungipagh ke i llegh gkeni _ . _ Taananguuq _ qepghaqagh _ apeghiighkagh ak _ . _ )
kaate yamek _ Antioch -mun _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughtekagh ik _ . _ ungipagh tke aik _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh llegh aneng _ ell me teg neg un _ , _ apeghkagh ak llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ugpeqillegh qal i tellgh i _ Gentile-et _ .
tamaani _ muluugh ghllagkagh k _ ugpeqagh ni _ .
taagken _ Judea- meng _ ila i _ yug t _ tagi luteng _ Antioch -mun _ ugpeqagh nun _ apeghtugh ikagh t _ , _ " _ yuguligh lleg nge naanghite usi _ wetku qun _ circumcise- e kufsi _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh an _ qelegh llegh atun _ . _ "
iwernga _ Paul-enkuk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ elngaatall _ aaghtiiraaghkagh ik _ taakut _ yug t _ apeghtuusagh itneng _ . _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ nakmikegkagh it _ Paul-enkuk _ , _ Barnabas-enkuk _ , _ ila i llu _ yug t _ Antioch -meng _ pi t _ , _ Jerusalem-e tesqelluki _ aap sagh tiis qelluki _ apostle- etlu _ Elder -etlu _ qerng agh melnguut _ naligh _ apeghtuusagh _ elqughute nga ta a _ .
Kayag si s teng _ Paul -enkut _ iglegha te kete luku _ Ph o en ic ia- kunllu _ , _ Sam ar ia- kunllu _ ugpeqagh t _ tamaan lenguut _ ungipagh tke ait _ Gentile-et _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qiive uute ma ni luki _ , _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ quya te ghllag ke aat _ .
kaa sa ta _ Jerusalem-emun _ apostle- etlu _ , _ Elder -etlu _ , _ ugpeqagh t llu _ upugha tke ait _ . _ taagken _ Paul -enkut _ apegh laataghkagh at _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh llegh a _ ellmegteggun _ .
ila i _ ugpeqagh t _ Pharisees-et _ nekeve luteng _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ tamaakut _ Gentile-et _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa nghite ut _ wetku qun _ circumcise- el utengllu _ , _ qaatke te luteng llu _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh anun _ . _ "
taagken _ apostle- etlu _ Elder -etlu _ qerngughte tke aat _ agghi te kete na lukek _ taake uk _ .
Akuz it ken negh pag llak aat _ . _ taagken _ Peter-em _ nekeve luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ liisimakagh i _ qavngaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ Gentile-enun _ ungipaq is qell unga _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ugpegh esqelluki _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake i lghii m _ yug m _ tamaghhagh an _ sumeghtaghagh llegh aneng _ , _ tugukligh kaqe ai _ Gentile-et _ . _ kelgute kaqe a _ tugukligh i lleg ni _ ellngit neng _ tuune llegh mikun _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ katam _ tawaten _ whangkunnun _ tuune llegh mitun _ .
Whang ku tes tung waaq _ kiyaghute aqe ai _ ; _ whangku tes tung waaq _ ukmangigh aqe ai _ ilu it _ ugpegh nghata _ .
enkaam _ sang an始ngam _ kiyaghnegh _ sakr aas naq ut keng ngu s teggu _ qelegh llegh gpesigun _ Gentile-et _ ugpeqe ait _ qaute kete luki _ liilightuusagh put _ kiyagh tesqelluki _ ? _ talwa _ sivunegh mta llu _ whangkuta llu _ qaat ke pagning il keput _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ yuguligh lleg nge na luta _ .
iwernga _ ugpeqagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ yugul ik aqiinkut _ kayusillegh akun _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ tawateghpigaq _ Gentile-enun _ pi llegh mitun _ . _ "
taagken _ tawan tu llghiit _ qall eg nanigh waagh ulluteng _ nagatk agket _ Barnabas-enkuk _ , _ Paul-enkuk _ apegh kangik _ ell me teg neg un _ kiyaghnegh m _ allaaghlluwhaght illghi _ Gentile-enun _ .
akuzi nghmeng _ taaqe yayek _ James -em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ nagate aghte ngnga _ !
simon _ Peter-em _ ungipaate ainkut _ naten _ kiyaghnegh m _ nak mi ku q est allghi _ Gentile-et _ ellmi nun _ katam _ yugu luki _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ liigike stekaqe ai _ ellngit llu _ piniqe ni luki _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ sall gha _ Gentile-enun _ elqughute uq _ uuknaliqistet _ igaqegkagh itnun _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ atanegh _ pi kau uq _ :
' _ David-em _ mangteghagh a _ ullegh kau uq _ iwernga _ uteghnigh lunga _ nekef neqig lleqaqa _ . _ naavuma yagh ghngaan _ nallghusagh lleqe aqa _ .
taagken _ qamagte luteng _ ila i _ yug t _ Gentile- eneng _ nakmikegkagh ma _ whanga mnun _ katam _ pi u luki _ , _ ellngit a _ liite yug lleqe aat _ atanegh _ .
Atangh uuq _ tawaten _ akuzikagh _ , _ ima _ qavng ar ugllak _ ellnga n _ liite stekaqe ai _ tamaakut _ . _ ' _ "
James -em _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ enkaam _ whanga _ sume mni _ Gentile-et _ qiivekagh t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qaatku tes qugh aaf qiita _ liilightuusagh mnnun _ pi lteki _ .
itupill _ lata tgun _ neghe snanigh lteki _ neqe meng _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ qemitekagh meng _ teghig ke te yameng _ , _ aaw meng _ ; _ ineghte lteki llu _ seghleghqe sigh ke fqaan _ sex _ pi sqellug qu _ .
tawaten _ pi yaghqaa nghite ut _ qayughllak _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh an _ iinghute kaqe ai _ tamaakut _ . _ ima _ qavngarugllaggaaneng _ Jews-et _ nagate aqe ait _ liilightuusagh t _ atightugh luki _ ungipaq engh atki _ Sabbath -a _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ nani _ alngunak _ synagogue- ni _ . _ "
taagken _ apostle-et _ , _ Elder -et _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ ugpeqagh t _ nakmiighkagh t _ yug meggneng _ maligte tesaghqagh meng _ Paul -en kugnun _ Barnab as -en kugnun _ Antioch -mun _ pi naqe lghii gnun _ . _ nakmikegkagh gket _ Silas-enkuk _ Jud as-enkuk _ ateghagh ke lghii _ Bar s abb as -meng _ . _ taake uk _ yug k _ Jerusalem -eghmiit _ ugpeqagh ita _ siiv ak epig tek agket _ .
El keg nekun _ tuyugh qu ait _ lata t _ whaten _ igaqegkagh t _ : _ " _ whangkuta _ apostle- en illu _ Elder -en illu _ lata aqe ukut _ Gentile-enun _ ugpeqaalgutem nnun _ Antioch - melngughnun _ , _ S y ri a- melngughnun _ , _ C il ic ia- melngugh nunllu _ , _ quyake amsi _ !
nagaqugh ma ukut _ yug mta nguq _ ila ita _ taku lusi _ sa meng _ pi lusi _ seghlegh yug tekaq iisillu _ ku k rag yug tekaq iisillu _ . _ naqamllu _ whangkuta _ tawaten _ pi sqe mangite aput _ .
enkaam _ qerngagh emta _ agghite luta _ nakmike agput _ Jud as-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ maligte te sqellug kek _ piniqekagh mnnun _ ugpeqaalgutem nnun _ Barnab as -en kugnun _ Paul -en kugnun _ , _ elpesi nun _ pi naqe lghii gnun _ .
taake uk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ Paul-enkuk _ tuqute yagh ghngaistek _ pi kau uk _ apallugh ke luku _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ .
Jud as-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ kayagte naqe agput _ aapgh waagh esqelluki _ taakut _ ataasigh t _ lata tkekagh put _ elpesi nun _ .
agleghnagh lghii m llu _ taghneghagh m _ , _ whangkuta llu _ itagnaq amsi _ allute luki _ Jews-et _ liilightuusagh it _ atuqe nghite yagh ghngaaghpesiki _ pisqelluki _ . _ iwernga _ ukut _ liilightuusagh t _ elpesi nun _ atuqe sug aput _ :
neghe gpenasi _ neqe meng _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ aaw meng _ , _ teghig ke te yameng _ qemitekagh meng _ , _ nuqe tu taq iteg gu llu _ sex-kun _ seghleghqe llegh _ . _ maligtekufsiki _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ taawa _ pinitun _ pi lleqe usi _ . _ Taw ateng inaq _ lata amsi _ . _ "
taagken _ taakut _ yug t _ aghulaqekagh t _ Jerusalem-emeng _ Antioch -mun _ . _ kaate yameng _ qerngughte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ tuunekagh it _ lata t _ .
atightugh luki _ lata t _ elngaatall _ quya te ghllag ke aat _ qayughllak _ ilutugh llegh iit _ .
Jud as-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ elkek llu _ uuknaliqe i ste u lghiik _ , _ enkaam _ ungipagh ke ii aghagh ta ghllag ke ak _ ugpeqagh nun _ ugpegh llegh it _ iknaqugh tesqelluki _ .
Tamaan tel qin agh lutek _ aghulaqe yu ke ak _ . _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ aghulaq es tek agket _ whaten _ pi lukek _ , _ " _ nekeggmellegh lgute k _ iglegha llegh gpetegni _ . _ " _ taagken _ uteghnigh iqe ak _ kayag t iste meg nun _ Jerusalem -em el ngughnun _ .
iwernga _ silas _ tamaan suk aq _ .
taake uk _ Paul-enkuk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ Antioch - met aagh aq ak _ . _ elkek llu _ maligte te lutek _ uglagh pigte lghii nun _ ugpeqagh nun _ apeghtugh ikagh k llu _ ungipagh ke ikagh k llu _ ungipagh aneng _ Atanghem _ .
tagtalmi _ Paul-em _ pi ke aa _ Barnabas _ , _ " _ takuughagh kau ltegneki _ ungipagh ke i vikekagh pung _ Atanghem _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ esghagh yaghtugh ltegneki _ nateghtu langi _ ugpeqaalgu tep ung _ . _ "
Barnab as-em _ kelqe sug qu a _ John _ mark _ ,
iwernga _ Paul-em _ kelqe sug ma ite kanga _ , _ qayughllak _ P am ph yl ia- mell uteng _ John _ Mar k -em _ unite kakek _ qepghaqagh eng _ taaqe ste gpenaan _ .
Paul-enkuk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ aaghtiiraagh tke ghllag luku _ pelleghmun _ aghulaqe te tke ak _ . _ Barnab as-em _ kelqellug qu _ mark _ angyaghpag kun _ C yp r us -mun _ pi ke aq _ .
enkaam _ Paul-em _ aghulaqe vagilgami _ nakmikegkagh a _ silas _ kel qen naluku _ . _ taagken _ ugpeqagh t _ yughagh tkellug kek _ neghyuke tke agket _ atanegh mun _ aflengake sqellug kek _ .
igleghtekagh k _ S y ri a- kunllu _ C il ic ia- kunllu _ iknaqugh saam iita _ ugpeqagh t _ ugpegh llegh it _ .
Paul _ D er b e- t kaq _ enkaam _ taagken _ nagneqe aq _ Ly st r a-mun _ , _ tamaani _ nallagh qagh a _ ugpeqe aq _ yuug _ ategh ke lghii _ Timoth y-meng _ . _ naange a llu _ ugpeqagh u lghii _ Jews -a _ , _ naqam _ ata a _ greek- a _ .
ugpeqagh t _ qamagte luteng _ Ly st r a- mel nguutlu _ I c on i um -em el nguutlu _ akuzite kaqe kangat _ Timoth y _ pi niigh pigte ni luku _ .
Paul-em _ kelqe sug qu a _ Timoth y _ kayute u luku _ enkaam _ circumcise- es tekaa _ . _ tawaten _ pi stekagh a _ tugukligh sqellug qu _ Jews-enun _ , _ qayughllak _ tamaan lenguut _ Jews-et _ liisimake kangat _ ata a _ Greek -ngu l ghii _ .
taagken _ iglegha u luteng _ ne ghllag nun _ kaate negh meggni _ ugpeqagh t _ qaatke te sqe aqe kangit _ apostle- etlu _ , _ Elder -etlu _ liilightuusagh ngllagh qite te nun _ Jerusalem-emi _ .
enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ wata _ ugpeqagh igh aghaghkagh t _ , _ nula ma inagh ke aat llu _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ .
Paul -enkut _ igleghtekagh t _ akule gkenkun _ Ph r y g ia- mllu _ , _ Gal at ia- mllu _ , _ qayughllak _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ ungipagh te simangil k angi _ ungipagh meng _ Asi a-mi _ .
tughwaagh luteng _ M y si a-mun _ nagnegh naqe kaayagh lghiit _ B it h y n ia- mun _ , _ iwernga _ Jesus-em _ taghneghagh gkenka _ pis negh itk ii _ .
enkaam _ M y si a _ naghughte luku _ tesamavek _ T ro as -mun _ pikagh t _ .
Unug mi _ tawani _ Paul-em _ esghaghwaagh llegh kun _ esgha qaa _ yuug _ Macedonia- gh mii _ tagsigh ragh lghii _ . _ yug m _ maniguute pigte luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tagi luten _ Macedonia- mun _ kayusiite aghte kut _ ! _ "
legan _ Paul-em _ esghaghwaagh llegh an _ kingu aneng _ yataaghqe ukut _ Macedonia- mun _ pi na luta _ , _ qayughllak _ liigik eg kefut _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh qite yu kanginkut _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ tamaani _ .
enkaam _ tel an ang ameng _ nangaqaghte ukut _ T ro as -meng _ Sam oth ra ce- mun _ . _ unaami ani _ Ne ap ol is -mun _ pi ukut _ .
taagken _ qute kun _ kaate ukut _ ne ghllag mun _ philippi- mun _ Macedonia- melngugh mun _ Rome-eghm iit _ neli ke ii te nun _ . _ qafsina t _ aghnegh t _ tamaan tukut _ .
Tamaan sim aluta _ Sabbath -ngugh sagu _ mingllute m _ amig ghllag akun _ aane luta _ kiiw gnun _ pi ukut _ , _ Jews-et _ tawani _ yughagh te aqe na yu kata _ . _ aghnagh m _ ila i _ tawan tu teftut _ enkaam _ aqume uute luta _ aleghqugh aput _ .
ataasigh _ nagate lghii _ Ly d ia- nguftuq _ , _ Th yat ir a-gh mii _ , _ akilpegagh qagh yu k _ esnegrukegtagh meng _ qiipaghagh meng _ , _ maniguute kayug _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ Atanghem _ liigikes tengngwaaq ii _ Paul-em _ akuzi ta i _ Ly d ia- mun _ enkaam _ ugpeqekagh i _ .
qamagte luteng _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ paaptaay e y ameng _ Ly d ia- m _ aqelqagh ngllagh ainkut _ , _ " _ sumegh gpesini _ ipapik _ ugpegh ma kuma _ atanegh kun _ , _ whangkun nit aghh nay an ghit sii _ ? _ " _ enkaam _ sagiqe sigh nkut _ ellngit nite ukut _ .
ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ kiiw m _ esneng anil ngugh mun _ yughagh te vig mun _ aglagh ma luta _ , _ nall agh aghput _ qepghagh tel aaq _ aghnagh aq _ ilu mikun _ tughneghagh leg _ . _ Taam _ tughneghagh m _ uuknaliqe tke ste aqe kangi _ sa u aat _ sa yaghqagh t _ siv ut gh ulluki _ . _ enkaam _ pilii tes tengita _ aklungi igh i sigh ke u kangat _ .
Taam _ aghnaghagh m _ maligsaagh ainkut _ Paul -llu _ whangkuta _ akilghuu magh mi _ , _ " _ ukut _ yug t _ qepghagh tekii _ Aang elleghpig aam _ kiyaghnegh m _ ! _ ungipaate aqe aisi _ naten _ yuguligh lleg nge lleghqagh meng _ ! _ "
qafsineg ghllag _ aghneq _ tawaten _ pi uq _ . _ qenwat llu _ Paul-em _ qinuyagute luku _ tughneghagh _ ilu anite ngughk _ qiive luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ategh akun _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ qelegh amken _ aan esqell uten _ ellnga neng _ ! _ " _ Tawaninginaq _ tughneghagh _ ilu aneng _ aanekagh _ .
Pil ii tes tengita _ liigike yamegteggu _ allgegh u tutk esaghq aan an iim at s eng _ aghnagh aq _ , _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ akugh ke aqe agket _ . _ Qam ugh siigh meng _ aglagh tke agket _ igleghut ist enun _ akilpeg aghvig melngughnun _ .
taagken _ igleghutistet _ aglagh te lukek _ Rome-eghm iit _ nanqigt isteng itnun _ pi ke ait _ , _ " _ yug k _ ukuk _ Jew -ngu uk _ , _ seghleliighqagh ii u uk _ maani _ .
apeghtugh i aqe uk _ kiyaghtaa lleghmeng _ whangkuta _ Rome-eghm iini _ liilightuusagh mta _ iinghute ke ii te neng _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ apeghtuusagh ik _ atuqe naanghite aput _ . _ "
enkaam _ yug lghute _ ilate qaghtagh te luni _ sughukagh gket _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ . _ Nanqig t istet _ qelegh tke agket _ aatkagh ik _ qes ugum eng _ mataghte qugh luki _ anag ul gh esqell ukek _ .
Anag ul egh taa neghmeng _ taaqe lukek _ anusimingllaghvig mun _ kanaghtekagh gket _ . _ taagken _ anusimingllaghvig m _ umiileg anun _ m aghq a tut ngwaagh es qegk agket _ .
anusimingllaghvig m _ umiileg an _ tawaten _ kayagte yatni _ il uk lighpig aghmun _ qamavek _ kanaghtekakek _ . _ taagken _ um ughllag meng _ unaghsigh meng _ tu ku ghu sigh lukek _ , _ maghqatekagh it _ taakut _ tukughte te t _ qaprag yaghqaa gpenakek _ .
nani _ tamaani _ unug em _ qukaa ni _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ yughagh magh egmek _ ilagaghkagh k _ usuqe i llegh meng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ anusimingllaghagh t _ tawan lenguut _ nagatk agket _ .
nuuskagllagan _ nuna _ tu y ep egh taq aq _ , _ repall _ anusimingllaghvig _ tunemaghtuumagh an _ aghula tke a _ . _ Tawaninginaq _ amig t _ qelpegh aghtagh tke aat _ , _ anusimingllaghagh neng llu _ qiipraghute t _ ilefkaghaghtagh tke aat _ .
anusimingllaghvig m _ umiileg a _ taghtugh yalghiimi _ , _ amig t _ qelpatu te ut _ . _ sumegh mini _ anusimingllaghagh t _ qimagugh te ma ni luki _ savigpag ni _ nusug luku _ ellmi neng _ tuqute naqekagh _ .
iwernga _ Paul-em _ iglagtu pigte luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tuqute naqe gpenang _ elpeneng _ qayughllak _ qamagte luta _ whaan tu tukut _ ! _ "
anusimingllaghvig m _ umiileg a _ kenegh meng _ tungsigh luni _ itegh qaghtekagh _ . _ Aling ruugh em _ ungelegte magh mi _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ manu gkenkun _ segesqughtekagh _ .
taagken _ aan u tut kell ukek _ aaptekakek _ , _ " _ yug gni _ uku gh tek _ , _ naten _ sa lunga _ yuguligh lleg nge nayagh zinga _ ? _ "
pikagh ak _ , _ " _ ugpeqe gu _ atanegh _ Jesus _ enkaam _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe uten _ , _ nengllugute ten llu _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe ut _ . _ "
taagken _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ ungipagh kekagh ak _ atanegh _ ellnga nun llu _ nengllugut ang anunllu _ .
tawani _ unugmi _ anusimingllaghvig m _ umiileg an _ ughvugh te qii _ taake uk _ yug k _ anag ul ellgh egkenka _ kii ik _ . _ taagken _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ paaptaaye inagh magh meng _ pikagh t _ .
Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ ellmeggnun _ aglagh te lukek _ neghes tek agket _ . _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ quya te ghllag ke aat _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kangat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
aghte yagu _ Rome-eghm iit _ nanqigt isteng ita _ keveg aqekagh it _ umiil w aat eng _ ungipaate yaghtigh sqellug qu _ anusimingllaghvig m _ umiileg a _ whaten _ , _ " _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ aane ste kek _ . _ "
enkaam _ anusimingllaghvig m _ umiileg an _ Paul _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Nanqig t istet _ kayagte te ii stek _ aan esl am teg nguq _ enkaam _ aane lghaatek _ , _ aghulaqe tek _ nekeggmell utek _ . _ "
iwernga _ Paul-em _ umiileg u aaghet _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Rome-eghm ii ngugh ngaam tung _ yugtuqagh mi _ anag ul egh taak aqiin kung _ , _ talwa _ ipapigh q utk egpenaan _ sa meng _ anaggu sim at f ung _ . _ taagken _ anusimingllagh ainkung _ . _ En ragh ngam _ whaa _ maaten _ aksaqe luku _ aanes naq in ku ung _ ? _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ Ell meggneng _ nanqigt istet _ tagi luteng _ aane ste linkung _ . _ "
Paul-em _ tawaten _ piy is teng _ umiileg u aaghet _ ungipaate yaghtugh qu ait _ nanqigt istet _ . _ enkaam _ nanqigt istet _ alingekagh t _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ nagaqugh lukek _ Rome-eghm iing ut kek _ .
taagken _ taku lukek _ qivghuke lukek _ aanes tek agket _ anusimingllaghvig meng _ , _ aghulaq es qegk ag ke tlu _ .
enkaam _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ anusimingllaghvig meng _ aane yamek _ , _ Ly d ia- n kunun _ pikagh k _ . _ tawani _ laalighfike luki _ ugpeqagh t _ kayeme luki _ aghulaqekagh k _ .
Paul -enkut _ igleghtekagh t _ Am ph ip ol is - kunllu _ , _ Ap oll onia- kunllu _ Th es sal onic a-mun _ kaate llegh meggnun _ kenlanga _ . _ tamaani _ Jews-et _ synagogue- elget _ .
Paul _ pi aqe llegh mitun _ synagogue- mun _ pi ke aq _ . _ pingayut ni _ Sabbath -en i _ Paul-em _ liigike ste naqutkekagh i _ yug t _ Christ-ameng _ akuzite tgun _ igaqegkagh tgun _ .
Uuk nal iqellegh teggun _ liigike ste naqutkekagh a _ ipa _ Christ-a _ tuqu yaghqagh pestaagh u ni luku llu _ unguvagh yaghqagh pestaagh u ni luku llu _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ una _ Jesus _ apegh kegka _ elpesi nun _ Christ- anguuq _ . _ "
ila i _ Jews-et _ ugpegh luteng _ ila tke aat _ Paul -en kugnun _ Sil as -en kugnun _ . _ tamaakut llu _ Greek - el ghutet _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ aghnagh lghute t llu _ pingwaagh t _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ .
taagken _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ Jews-et _ aqinake lukek _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ tes qag an taq elghii neng _ sa igate ngugh neng _ yug neng _ qerngughte i luteng _ seghleliighqagh ii ghllagkagh t _ . _ qenwat _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ Th es sal onic a- ghmiit _ qap r aghq egkiit _ . _ taagken _ ketanqusnaq _ J as on -en kunun _ aglagh luteng _ itegh qaghtagh tke aat _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ aane te na lukek _ yug lghute nun _ .
iwernga _ naalke nghite yamegtekek _ , _ J as on- llu _ ila i llu _ ugpeqagh t _ qamughsiighkagh it _ Th es sal onic a-m _ igleghutisteng itnun _ . _ akilghuukagh t _ , _ " _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ navek _ alngunak _ pinegh megteni _ seghleliighqagh ii aqe uk _ , _ whaa _ maani llu _ tawaten _ pi aqe uk _ .
Caesar -em _ liilightuusagh i _ kipullegmun _ pi aqe aik _ whaten _ pillegh meg neg un _ , _ ' _ Jesus _ umiil eg pig aaguq _ , _ Caesar _ umiileg u nghite uq _ . _ ' _ J as on-em _ ell megg n i testaq aak _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ . _ "
tawaten _ pi yata _ yug t llu _ igleghutisteng illu _ Th es sal onic a-m _ sakraa ghllagkagh t _ .
taagken _ igleghutistet _ pi ke ait _ J as on -enkut _ , _ " _ qelegh te agput _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ elpesi nun _ aghulaqe ste sqellug kek _ Th es sal onic a-meng _ , _ iwernga _ sivuke lusi _ man il it ikut _ . _ aghulaqe gkayek _ mani i _ vegh ulleq aghput _ . _ " _ taagken _ aglagh stekagh it _ .
mamlegte ghesnagh yagu _ ugpeqagh t _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ aghulaq es tek agket _ B er ea- mun _ . _ kaate yamek _ synagogue- mun _ pikagh k _ .
tamaakut _ Jews-ngit _ nagate yu kestagh lukek _ ayuqe kegket _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ , _ Th es sal onic a- melngugh neng _ . _ Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ Jews-et _ ellmeggneng _ liite naqekagh it _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ , _ liigike na luki _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ apeghtugh i llegh ik _ ipa u ta i _ .
enkaam _ uglagh pigte lghiit _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ , _ uglagh pigte lghiit llu _ pingwaagh t _ Greek -et _ aghni ut llu _ yug it llu _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ .
iwernga _ Jews-et _ Th es sal onic a- melnguut _ nagaqugh yamegteggu _ Paul _ ungipagh ke i ni luku _ akuzi ta aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ B er ea- mi _ , _ B er ea- t kat _ . _ kaate luteng _ qap r aghq ii kat _ yug neng _ seghleliighqagh iikagh t _ tamaani _ .
enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ Paul _ esne mun _ atghagh te qagh stekagh at _ iwernga _ Silas-enkuk _ Timoth y- nkuk _ B er ea- m etk ak _ .
yug t _ igleghte te i lghiit _ Paul -meng _ maligte tke aat _ athens- mun _ kenlanga _ . _ uteghnigh naqe yata _ B er ea- mun _ Paul-em _ lipeghsagh kakek _ Silas-enkuk _ Timoth y- nkuk _ taku s qelluni _ pi yaghqaaghte ghesnagh kayek _ .
athens- mi _ Paul _ utaqa i te kete luku _ Sil as -en kugneng _ Timoth y- n kugneng _ , _ yuvghiigh yalghiimi _ tamaani _ seghleghyug ghllagkagh _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh ngllagh qaghtu pigte uq _ .
enkaam _ Paul-em _ synagogue- mi _ Jews -etlu _ Gentile- etlu _ , _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ liigike ste naqutkekagh i _ Jesus _ , _ Christ- angun iluku _ . _ akilpegaghvig mi llu _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ kinku t _ alngunak _ tawan neghata _ apegh aqe kanga _ Christ-a _ .
ila ita _ apeghtughiste ita _ E pi c ur e an -etlu _ , _ S t o ic -etlu _ taku luku _ Paul _ aaghtiiraaghkagh at _ . _ ila ita _ ila teng _ aaptekagh it _ , _ " _ una _ akuz iv all ughllak _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ ? _ " _ tamaakut _ ila ita _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ llangaqa _ n aku miit _ kiyaghnegh it _ akuzite kaqe ai _ . _ " _ tawaten _ pikagh t _ qayughllak _ Paul-em _ ungipagh ke u kanga _ Jesus _ , _ unguvallegh a llu _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
taagken _ Paul -mun _ maligte stekagh t _ agghis tenun _ Are o pag us - melngughnun _ . _ enkaam _ kaate yameng _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ taana _ nutaghagh _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe ken _ lii su w aghput _ .
sa u a _ taana _ apegh kan _ allaaghlluwh aaguq _ whangkunni _ , _ enkaam _ liigik su w aghput _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ . _ "
( _ sa u aat _ nutaghagh t _ apeghtuusagh t _ pi nghata _ At h en s -eghm iitlu _ , _ n akum iitlu _ tamaavek _ lli aqe aat _ apegh yu w aq iitlu _ nagate yug aqe ait llu _ . _ )
enkaam _ Are o pag us -mi _ Paul-em _ nekeve luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ At h en s -eghm iini _ , _ liigike amsi _ elngaatall _ maniguute kayugu usi _ elpek si _ yug ni _ .
igleghte yalghiinga _ qagani _ akule mi _ , _ esghagh anka _ manigugh vig lghute si _ , _ aghqefig llu _ ataasigh _ igaqe vike nga lghii _ whaten _ , _ ' _ nallukekagh mun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ' _ Taananguuq _ kiyaghnegh _ nalluke ghngaaghpesigu _ manigughkagh i _ apegh yug kegka _ elpesi nun _ .
Taam _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe a _ nuna _ , _ sa u a llu _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ nuna mete ngughk _ . _ atanegh ke a _ qilag m llu _ nuna m llu _ enkaam _ maniguut f ingll aq an i sig atuq _ .
Taananguuq _ kiyaghnegh _ tuune i kayug _ unguvallegh meng _ , _ aneghnegh meng _ , _ sa meng llu _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ yug nun _ . _ aklu ke yaghqagh ke nghite a _ yug t _ kayusillegh at _ qayughllak _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ akl ukig at aa _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe a _ ataasigh _ yuug _ , _ enkaam _ taagken _ ataasigh meng _ allgegh kau uq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ yuug _ nuna mete ngughk _ whani _ . _ I ing ke rugllak _ yataaghqe kaqe ai llu _ qakun _ yug t _ allgegh yaghqaa ta i _ , _ nani llu _ kiyaghte yaghqaa ta i _ .
tawaten _ pi kaqe ai _ yug nun _ iv iis qelluni _ luuraq _ naal ken nayuk ang atni _ . _ naqamllu _ naligh ghhagh inagh mnneng _ uyav an neghituq
qayughllak _ ' _ ellnga kun _ kiyaghteng ngu u kutlu _ , _ qaprag u ukut llu _ , _ allgegh kau ukut llu _ . _ ' _ talwa _ ila i _ ig angllagh tesi _ whaten _ pi kau lghiit _ , _ ' _ ipapestaaq _ avaqutagh ke ainkut _ . _ '
" _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh ke ta aneng _ sumeghtaghaatk esaghq aq enghi taghput _ yug t _ ulim aa ghistun _ gold-meng _ , _ silver- meng _ , _ nalighmeng _ uyghag meng _ ayuqe luki _ . _ yug t _ sumeghtagh all ghistun _ ayuqe nghite uq _ .
sivugh nghaani _ agani _ yug t _ salin _ nalluke luku _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aghyuugh yug mangite ai _ aghy uus aq egh ngaata _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ qelegh u ai _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ naan sagh ngaata _ avutegh qelluki _ , _ seghleghqen nan iisqelluki _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tawaten _ qelqe aqe ai _ qayughllak _ nekegtekaqe a _ aghneq _ nanqigtivig u luku _ . _ nakmikegkagh mikun _ yug kun _ yuug _ tamaghhagh an _ taw ateghlluwaaq _ nanqigte yaghqaqe a _ . _ liite ste na luku _ nakmikegkagh ni _ yuug _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ "
nagate luku _ Paul-em _ apegh kanga _ yuug _ unguvagh te sim aniluku _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ ila ita _ legasiighwagh tkekagh at _ , _ iwernga _ ila ita _ pi ke aat _ Paul _ , _ " _ wataqaaghaq _ nagas uw aghput _ alla _ apegh naqe gkuvgu _ . _ "
taagken _ Paul-em _ unitekagh i _ ,
iwernga _ ila ita _ maligsaagh luku _ Paul _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ . _ ataasigh _ D i on y si us -nguftuq _ , _ Are o pag us -mi _ agghi sta _ , _ aghnagh llu _ ategh ke lghii _ D am aris -meng _ , _ kinku t llu _ ila i _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ .
Taam _ kingu aneng _ Paul _ Cor in th - etk aq _ athens- meng _ .
tamaani _ nallagh qagh a _ J e w _ ategh a _ A qu il a _ , _ P on tus -mi _ allgeghkagh _ . _ italy- meng _ kaate negh ghhagh u uk _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ P ris c ill a-nkuk _ , _ qayughllak _ Umiilegpig aam _ C l a ud i us-em _ eflegh ke te qugh u i _ Jews-et _ Rome- e meng _ . _ Paul-em _ laalighfike lukek _ 
el k egk en itkaq _ qayughllak _ qepghaqagh ak _ ellnga n _ qepghaqagh atun _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ tiinta ngllagh llegh m _ aki a _ kiyagh usi qegk angat _ .
Sabbath -a _ tamaghhagh an _ Paul _ synagogue- mun _ pi luni _ ungipagh aqe lghii _ Jews-en unllu _ , _ Greek -en unllu _ ugpegh esqelluki _ .
Silas-enkuk _ Timoth y- nkuk _ kaate tke ak _ Macedonia- meng _ , _ taagken _ kenle ke luku _ Paul _ ungipagh ke i inagh luni _ lli aqe aq _ . _ Jews-enun _ aapte qugh a _ Jesus _ , _ Christ- angun iluku _ .
Jews-et _ kipullgin aagh yat nillu _ seghletun llu _ akuzite kete yatni _ , _ aatkagh mi _ pagula i _ ufsug te luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ifla kufsi _ elpek si _ pil qagh si _ , _ whanga _ pil qen naanghi taqa _ . _ whaken _ kenle ke luku _ Gentile-enun _ ungipagh ke i naqe unga _ . _ "
enkaam _ unite luki _ Jews-et _ T it i us _ J us tus -mun _ lli aqe aq _ , _ gentile- mun _ maniguute kayug mun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ mangteghagh a _ synagogu e-em _ saaghw anite ngughk _ .
S ynagogu e-em _ igleghte te i ste nga _ C ris p us -nguftuq _ . _ qamagte luteng _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ ugpeqekagh at _ atanegh _ . _ Cor in th -eghm iil ghutetlu _ nagate luku _ Paul _ ugpegh luteng _ paaptaayekagh t _ .
taagken _ unugmi _ ataasigh mi _ Paul _ esghaghwaagh llegh kun _ Atanghem _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ alinge gpenang _ , _ yeghlegi _ ungipagh ke i kestagh a _ iilqayug fqaavek _ 
qayughllak _ elpen it aqunga _ . _ kitumun _ alngunak _ aqnigh snaanghite amken _ , _ qayughllak _ ne ghllag mi _ whani _ uglagh pigte lghii _ yuug _ whanga _ pi kaqe a _ . _ "
enkaam _ Paul _ tamaani _ apeghtugh ikagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ ataasigh _ ayumiqullegh _ alla _ aghvinleg _ tanqigh t _ ilate luki _ .
gallio _ , _ Rome-em _ umiileg ughte ste aqe yagu _ Gre e ce- mun _ , _ Jews-et _ qerngughte te luteng _ sughug luku _ Paul _ aglagh tke aat _ nanqigtivig mun _ .
kaat ute te luku _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ U um _ yug m _ apeghtugh aqe ai _ yug t _ kiyaghnegh _ manigigh sqellug qu _ alla u luku _ liilightuusagh mnneng _ ! _ "
iiwenllu _ Paul _ akuzi naqe aqe uq _ , _ G all i o - m _ Jews-et _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ una _ yuug _ tegleg uqagh u yagh kan _ , _ yugtagh kaayagh kan _ nalighmeng _ sa u a _ alngunak _ seghlegh pestaagh _ pi kaqsagh kagu _ ilapga pestaagh nayagh amsi _ .
iwernga _ una _ yuug _ tawaten _ pi mangite uq _ . _ A aght iiraagh ut keng ngun ghit asi _ Rome-em _ liilightuusagh i _ , _ aaghtiiraagh ut keng ngwaa si _ elpek si _ katam _ liilightuusagh si _ , _ akuzite t llu _ ategh t llu _ sa meng _ pi sigh u ta i _ . _ tamaaken _ nanqigte i yaghqaa nghite unga _ , _ elpesi neng _ pi teki _ . _ "
enkaam _ eflegh ke te qugh u i _ aan esqelluki _ .
taagken _ yug t _ akuqagh luku _ synagogu e-em _ igleghte te i ste nga _ S ost h en es _ , _ qevute i aqe aat _ nanqigtivig m _ manughagh ani _ iwernga _ G all i o - m _ avelghagh ke ii naqe ai _ .
Taam _ kingu aneng _ Paul _ paninang _ ugpeq an itkaq _ qafsineg ghllag _ aghneq _ Cor in th -mi _ . _ taagken _ angyaghpag kun _ aghulaqekagh _ S y ri a-mun _ kelqellug kek _ P ris c ill a-nkuk _ A qu il a-nkuk _ . _ kaate yameng _ C en ch re a-mun _ Paul _ qigughkagh _ liigike sqellug qu _ akequsagh ni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ apeghiigh llegh a _ .
kaate luteng _ ephesus- mun _ , _ tamaani _ Paul-em _ unite kakek _ P ris c ill a-nkuk _ A qu il a-nkuk _ , _ synagogue- elluni _ liigike ste naqutkekagh a _ Jews-enun _ Jesus _ , _ Christ- angun iluku _ .
Ell megg n itagh iis q egkaq saq angat _ iwernga _ pipag nigh nge i tke aq _ .
enkaam _ aghulaqe naqe yami _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ alla _ tagi lleqe unga _ . _ " _ taagken _ ephesus- meng _ angyaghpag kun _ aghulaqekagh _ .
kaate luni _ Caesarea- mun _ nagneqe aq _ Jerusalem-emun _ laalighfike na luki _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ taagken _ Antioch - etk aq _ .
Tamaan tagh lluni _ aghulaqekagh _ . _ igleghte te kete luku _ Gal at ia- kunllu _ Ph r y g ia- kunllu _ , _ qamagte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ kayeme magh ita _ pi ke ai _ .
Paul _ tawaten _ aneghte ma luku _ apollos _ , _ ephesus- mun _ kaate tke aq _ . _ Jew -ngu l ghii _ allgeghkagh _ A le x and ri a-mi _ . _ elngaatall _ akuzi lleg ghllag llu _ liite te ghllag ke aq llu _ akuzite neng _ igaqegkagh neng _ .
salin _ A le x and ri a- m elluku _ kitum _ apeghtugh kaqe kanga _ Atanghem _ tumang aneng _ . _ enkaam _ sagiqe pigte luni _ akuzit keng nguk ang allu _ apeghtuusagh ke u kanga llu _ elqughaghte luku _ Jesus _ , _ apeghtuusagh i llu _ . _ naqam _ liisimake kanga _ paaptaaye llegh _ John-em _ apeghtugh te llegh igh u naaghtu te _ ayuqe lghii _ .
ephesus- mi _ apollos _ synagogue- elluni _ tetug gpenani _ ungipagh ke ikagh _ . _ P ris c ill a-nkuk _ A qu il a-nkuk _ nagate luku _ aqelqagh ngllaghkagh ak _ liigik estagh aghnaluku _ kiyaghnegh m _ tumang aneng _ , _ wataqaaghaq _ elqughaghte luku _ .
apollos _ Gre e ce- mun _ piyug yan _ , _ ugpeqagh t _ kayemekagh at _ enkaam _ lata ke aat _ Gre e ce- eghm iit _ ugpeqagh itnun _ upugha te sqellug qu _ . _ taakut _ Gre e ce- eghm iit _ ugpeqe kaqe kangat _ Jesus _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusillegh akun _ . _ Ap oll os -em _ kaate luni _ elngaatall _ iknaqugh saq aqegkangi _ ugpegh llegh it _ apeghtugh i llegh mikun _ .
yugtuqagh mi _ aaghtiiraagh ghllagkagh i _ Jews-et _ , _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ ipapigh qu siq luki _ Jesus _ , _ Christ- angun iluku _ .
apollos _ Cor in th - m elluku _ , _ Paul _ qute kun _ igleghakagh _ ephesus- mun _ kenlanga _ . _ tamaani _ ila i _ maligsaaghtet _ nallagh luki _ 
aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ allgegh sim as tekek _ ugpegh aqngafsi _ ? _ " _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ nakaa _ , _ nallukngwaagh agput _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ . _ "
aapte laataghkagh i _ , _ " _ sa mun mi _ paaptaay em at si _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ John-em _ paaptaaye llegh atun _ . _ "
Paul-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ John-em _ paaptaay egh illgha _ avutegh qelluteng _ seghleghqen nan il ghi nun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ pi kaqe ai llu _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ kingu mineng _ tagi yaghqagh _ , _ taana _ Jesus- nguuq _ . _ "
nagaqugh yamegteggu _ taana _ , _ paaptaayekagh t _ ategh akun _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ .
Paul-em _ saaf saq miniki _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ iteghkagh k _ ellngit nun _ . _ taagken _ akuzikagh t _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh stun _ ulu stun _ , _ uuknaliqe magh meng llu _ pikagh t _ .
entaqun _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ yuug _ tawan tuq _ .
pingayut ni _ tanqigh ni _ Sabbath -a _ tamaghhagh an _ Paul-em _ tetug qagh gpenani _ aleghqugh qu ai _ yug t _ synagogue- mi _ . _ aaghhe naqutkekagh i _ , _ liigike ste naqutkekagh i _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
iwernga _ ila i _ pineghllug lghiit _ ugpegh y un ghit kat _ , _ enkaam _ sivu itni _ yug t _ seghletun _ akuzi tkekagh at _ kiyaghtaa lleq _ Atanghem _ apeghtuusagh a _ . _ enkaam _ Paul-em _ unitekagh i _ kel qelluki _ ugpeqagh t _ . _ taagken _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ T yr an nus -em _ apeghtugh i vig ani _ , _ Paul-em _ aleghqugh aqe kangi _ yug t _ .
tawaten _ pi ke aq _ maalghug _ ayumiqullegh k _ , _ enkaam _ tamaghhagh meng _ Jews -etlu _ Greek -etlu _ Asi a- melnguut _ nagaqugh qu ait _ akuzi ta i _ Atanghem _ .
kiyaghnegh _ allaaghlluwhaght iigh aataq aq _ saghiigha nagh lghii meng _ Paul -kun _ .
talwa _ ila ita _ yug t _ Paul-em _ kakegllugiitagh i llu _ , _ aatkagh i llu _ lli nghmegteki _ qinu yu gnun _ naallghute aqe lghiit _ , _ tughneghagh t llu _ ilung it nilnguut _ aane aqe lghiit _ .
ila i _ Jews-et _ iglegha u lghiit _ nuna nun _ , _ yug neng _ aag negh squgh u u kangit _ tughneghagh t _ . _ taagken _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ ategh a _ aane ste qugh sigh ke naqutke kaqsagh kangat _ . _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ qelegh amken _ aan esqell uten _ taaggun _ ataasigh kun _ Jesus-kun _ Paul-em _ ungipagh kekagh akun _ . _ "
S c ev a-m _ m aaghr aghv il ek _ ighnegh i _ tawaten _ pikagh t _ . _ ( _ taana _ sceva _ Jew -ngu l ghii _ high _ priest- a _ . _ )
iwernga _ tughneghagh m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ liisimake aqa _ Jesus _ , _ liisimake aqa _ Paul _ , _ elpek si _ kinku u tsi _ ? _ "
taagken _ yug m _ ilu mikun _ tughneghagh leg m _ qetgegh vike luki _ taakut _ yug t _ qevute i aqe ai _ , _ iknaq epig tut mineng _ qamagte luki _ ava igh lleg kekagh i _ . _ enkaam _ mangteghagh aneng _ aane qagh tate luteng _ qimagugh tke aat _ amsikagh meng _ , _ kiitigh qu lleg ligh luteng _ .
qamagte luteng _ Ephesus -eghmiit _ , _ Jews -etlu _ Greek -etlu _ alingruugh tke aat _ taana _ nagaqugh luku _ , _ enkaam _ ategh a _ Jesus-em _ wataqaaghaq _ quulv aqaat _ .
uglagh pigte lghiit _ ug pen ghh aq an iit _ yugtuqagh mi _ apeghraghkagh it _ alignaghtaagh lleg teng _ .
uglagh pigte lghiit _ alignaghtaagh kayugu yagh lghiit _ tagite uute luki _ alignaghtaagh sigh t _ igagh teng _ panegh qugh qu ait _ yug lghute t _ esghaam an ghitni _ . _ igagh lghute t _ ak itu l es ugh yaq megteki _ 5 0 ,000 _ silver _ d ra ch m as -et _ akike ait _ .
tamaa na _ apallugh ke luku _ wataqaaghaq _ akuzi ta i _ Atanghem _ mingitekagh t _ , _ enkaam _ uglagh pigte lghiit _ ugpeqekagh it _ .
kingu itneng _ tamaakut _ Paul _ qakiqniqekagh _ Jerusalem-emun _ pi na luni _ , _ Macedonia- kunllu _ Gre e ce- kunllu _ aag luni _ . _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ Jerusalem-e tagh llunga _ taagken _ Rome- esaghq apestaagh uunga _ . _ "
taagken _ Paul-em _ kayute gni _ Timoth y- nkuk _ E r as tus -enkuk _ kayagtekakek _ aglagh kestigh sqellug kek _ Macedonia- mun _ , _ ellnga _ Asi a- me tagh aqaq _ .
nani _ tamaani _ pi llegh mi _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ Ephesus -eghmiit _ elngaatall _ seghleliigh tkekagh at _ kiyaghtaa lleq _ Atanghem _ apeghtuusagh kekagh a _ .
tamaa na _ seghleliigh llegh _ D em et ri us-em _ silver- meng _ ulim as tem _ piinlegh iqe a _ . _ tawaten _ pi ke aq _ qayughllak _ ulima lgutke te lghiit _ elngaatall _ mani ngllagh sigh ke u kangit _ silver- meng _ ulimaagh t _ tem p le- eng waaghh aat _ . _ tamaakut _ tem p le- eng waaghh aat _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh mun _ artemis- mun _ maniguute vig stun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
D em et ri us-em _ ulim algut nillu _ ila i llu _ tawatel ngughmeng _ ulima kayug t _ qerngughte luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ukughsi _ yug ni _ , _ liisimakagh i _ elngaatall _ mani ngllagh aqe ukut _ qepghaqagh mnneng _ .
iwernga _ esghapag agh sillu _ nag atagh sillu _ Paul-em _ pillgha _ . _ pi aqe uq _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ kiyaghnegh pigu nghite ni luki _ . _ enkaam _ uglagh pigte lghii _ yuug _ allangughte qugh aa _ maani _ ephesus- mi _ , _ maan ing in aag penaan _ tea- ma ghhagh ani llu _ Asi a-mi _ pi aqe uq _ .
seghleghhalek _ sa nghite kumta _ qepghaqagh ut _ ukavagh lleqe uq _ . _ liisimakagh i _ qamagte luteng _ Asi a-gh m iitlu _ nunataghh aan il nguutlu _ manigugh aqe aat _ aghnagh _ kiyaghnegh _ artemis _ . _ sa nghite kumta _ yug t _ sumeghtaghagh tke sag u lleqe aat _ temple- a _ megnu nagh ite ni luku _ , _ Ar tem is - emllu _ aange llegh ghllag a _ sea-te u nanigh lleqe uq _ . _ "
taakut _ yug t _ nagate luku _ D em et ri us _ elngaatall _ sakraakagh t _ , _ akilghuu ghllagkagh t llu _ , _ " _ aange ghllag uq _ artemis- nga _ Ephes us-em _ ! _ "
mulu gpenateng _ qamagte luteng _ Ephesus -eghmiit _ ke tan qwaagh aatkat _ akilghuu magh meng _ nalluke ghngaaghmegteki _ sa aqe ta i _ . _ Paul-em _ igleghalgute kek _ G ai us-enkuk _ A ris t ar ch us-enkuk _ Macedonia- gh mii k _ tamaan le nguuk _ uvit ang itni _ . _ ila ita _ yug t _ taake uk _ akuqagh lukek _ qamugh ke lukek _ ket ar w ak at _ qerngughte te vig ghllag mun _ maligte luki _ yug lghute ghllag t _ .
Paul _ itegh yug kaayagh lghii _ yug lghute _ aleghqugh na luku _ iwernga _ ugpeqagh t _ ighlekekagh at _ .
talwa _ ila ita _ Asi a-m _ igleghutisteng ita _ keveg aqe tke aat _ ilakumtaagh eng _ Paul _ wataghllak _ itegh fqaan _ qerngughte te vig ghllag mun _ pi sqellug qu _ .
taakut _ qerngughut fig llag melnguut _ wanlegi _ nepug ghllag ughtekagh t _ . _ ila i _ yug t _ sa meng _ akilghuu ghllaget _ , _ ila i _ sa meng _ alla neng _ akilghuu ghllaget _ . _ kiyang _ allute luteng _ nalluke kangat _ sangameng _ qerngugh usim at s eng _ .
taagken _ yuug _ ategh ke lghii _ A le x an der -meng _ , _ Jews-et _ apeghtugh waagh luku _ sa meng _ pi lleghqagh meng _ , _ akuzi yaghtigh sqekagh at _ sivu itnun _ yug lghute ghllag t _ . _ A le x an der -em _ iigge ni _ nengug tke ai _ nag a tesqell uni _ yug nun _ .
iwernga _ yug lghute ghllag t _ liigike yamegteggu _ alexander _ Jew -ng utanga _ , _ qerng aghllag meng _ akilghuu ghllagkagh t _ , _ " _ aange ghllag uq _ artemis- nga _ Ephes us-em _ ! _ " _ tawaten _ akilghuukagh t _ ket wh el l _ maalghug _ aflu k _ .
ataasigh m _ Ephes us-em _ umiil waagh an _ nepiigh ste qaghte yamiki _ yug lghute t _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Ephesus -eghm iini _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh ghllag mi _ liisimake a _ ephesus _ aflengake i stekagh a _ aange lghii m _ Ar tem is -em _ temple- nge an _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m llu _ uyghag m _ ifkaghkagh m _ qilag meng _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ aygughike naanghite ainkut _ taa kugneng _ aflengak es teng ut fut _ enkaam _ nepiigh tek _ . _ sa u a _ teme igh ghllag _ apeghiigh vagilgafsigu _ sumeghtaghagh tek _ .
taake uk _ yug k _ whavek _ tagite kaqe agsi _ talwa _ sa meng _ tegleg nghite ghngaayek _ tem p le- eneng _ , _ akuzi tke nghite ghngaagnegu llu _ sa meng _ seghlegh meng _ kiyaghnegh ut _ artemis _ .
una _ nanqigtivig u nghite uq _ . _ D em et ri us -enkut _ qepghaghte kullghiit _ sa meng _ apallugh lgu kumeng _ nanqigtivig mun _ aglagh lit _ . _ tawani _ nanqigt ist enun _ apegh nakangit _ apallugh teng _ enkaam _ elngaatall _ avutkeiiraagh ghhaat _ .
wata _ sa meng _ pi yaghqagh lgu kufsi _ sa meng _ tamaaken _ qerngughut fig pig aghmi _ agghi te kete nakesi _ .
tawaten _ pi amsi _ qayughllak _ Rome-em _ umiileg ita _ nagaqugh kumegteggu _ una _ seghleliigh llegh _ aghneghmi _ whani _ , _ taana _ apallugh ke luku _ qaatke te nghite ni luta _ liilightuusagh meggnun _ pi naqe ainkut _ . _ Sameng 始ngam _ pi lleqe steki _ qayughllak _ apallugh ite ukut _ seghleliighqagh ii lleg mnnun _ . _ "
Taam _ umiil waaghem _ tawaten _ pi luki _ aglagh uute stekagh i _ .
taana _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag _ alpag yan _ Paul-em _ aqfa stekagh i _ ugpeqagh t _ . _ kayeme luki _ aghulaqekagh _ Macedonia- mun _ .
enkaam _ Macedonia- kun _ igleghte te kete luku _ laalighqwaagh vikekagh i _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ kayeme magh ita _ pi ke ai _ . _ taagken _ nagneqe aq _ Gre e ce- mun _ ,
tamaan tekaq _ pi nga yu t _ tanqigh t _ . _ yataaghqe aqe uq llu _ angyaghpag kun _ S y ri a- n naluni _ , _ liigikekagh i _ Jews-en 始nguq _ yataaghqe aqe ut _ tuqute na luku _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ uteghte yu ke aq _ Macedonia- kun _ Jerusalem-emun _ .
Malig tes te kef tii _ S o p ate r _ , _ ighnegh a _ P yr r h us-em _ , _ B er ea- gh mii _ , _ A ris t ar ch us-enkuk _ S e c un d us-enkuk _ Th es sal onic a-gh mii k _ , _ G ai us _ D er b e- gh mii _ , _ T y ch ic us-enkuk _ T ro ph im us-enkuk _ Asi a-gh mii k _ , _ Timoth y- llu _ .
taakut _ aghulaqe kestagh luteng _ T ro as -mun _ , _ tamaani _ utaqa i ut _ whangkunneng _ .
kingu aneng _ neqenghaghqe llegh an _ Y e ast- alii mangil nguum _ neqekrangllagh m _ , _ philippi- meng _ angyaghpag kun _ aghulaqe ukut _ . _ tallimat _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ kaate aput _ ila put _ T ro as -mi _ . _ Tamaan tukut _ maaghraghvinleg _ aghneq _ .
sivuligh mi _ aghnegh ani _ santillegh m _ T ro as -eghmiit _ ugpeqe ait llu _ whangkuta llu _ qerngughte te ukut _ negh na luta _ Atanghem _ neqenghaghqe llegh aneng _ . _ sivuke luni _ Paul _ ungipagh ke ikagh _ unug em _ qukaa nun _ kenlanga _ , _ qayughllak _ unaami _ aghulaqe yug u lghii _ .
Qem tam el nguukut _ kenegh lghutaghtuqagh mi _ .
nukalpigagh _ E ut y ch us _ , _ aqume luni _ qergese m _ esne akun _ nagatekagh _ . _ Paul _ ungipagh ke i ma luku _ qenwat _ E ut y ch us _ qavaghni ke aq _ . _ qenwat llu _ umu qite luni _ qavagh yalghiimi _ eslate mun _ ifkaghkagh _ pamaken _ pingay aaneng _ qemtagh m _ . _ aane luteng _ tugu yaq megteggu _ tuqu luni _ .
iwernga _ Paul-em _ uki ragkiigh luni _ segesqughte vike luku _ qetekagh a _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ alinge gpenasi _ , _ whaa _ unguvagh ma uq _ ! _ "
taagken _ mayugh uute luteng _ Paul-em _ neqekrangllagh _ aavgugh luku _ neghekagh t _ . _ aleghqugh tke aat _ unug llegh ke sigh _ kenlanga _ aghte llegh mun _ , _ taagken _ Paul _ aghulaqekagh _ .
ugpeqagh t _ nukalpigagh _ aglagh tke aat _ ne anun _ ilutu lleg nge ghllag luteng _ unguvallegh a _ apalluq lluku _ .
angyaghpag kun _ aghulaqe ukut _ A s s os -mun _ sivungagh ni _ Paul-em _ , _ qayughllak _ qute kun _ A s s os -mun _ pi luni _ wetku _ tamaani _ uugte naqe ni lghii _ angyaghpag mun _ .
kaate yan _ A s s os -mun _ qaake luku _ angyaghpag mun _ M it yl en e- e tukut _ .
unaami ani _ M it yl en e-meng _ aghulaqe luta _ aghuliigh ukut _ Ch i os -em _ tung angakun _ . _ taagken _ unaami ani _ kaate ukut _ Sam os -mun _ , _ enkaam _ awakaghaani _ kaate ukut _ miletus- mun _ .
Paul-em _ naghughte yukagh a _ ephesus _ qayughllak _ Asi a-mi _ kimaawi yu nghite ngughk _ . _ pi lleghqagh lgu kuni _ Jerusalem-emun _ kaa su pig teng ngul ghii _ angiite na luni _ Pen te c os t- mun _ .
miletus- mete luni _ Paul-em _ tagsiqligh iqe ai _ ugpeqagh t _ elder-ngit _ Ephesus - melnguut _ .
kaa sa ta _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ liisimakagh i _ naten _ kiyaghtaa l qa _ elpesi nite lunga _ Asi a-mun _ kaate yuwhaagh lleg mneng _ ima _ .
qepghagh te kaqe aqa _ atanegh _ qusevegte pigte lunga _ , _ qunituumagh ma llu _ qaywa _ Jews-et _ seghleliigh q eghllag ngaat ngallu _ , _ tuqute naqutke ghngaatnga llu _ .
iwernga _ liisimakagh i _ nuqe tu sigat anka _ sa u aat _ kayute kaghqagh si _ ungipagh ke i negh mni _ , _ apegh tunem si _ yugtuqagh mi llu _ ne gpesini llu _ .
qevuute luki _ qelegh aqe yagh anka _ Jews -etlu _ Greek -etlu _ avutegh qelluki _ seghleghqen naniq ata _ qiiv esqelluki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ ugpeq is qell ukillu _ atanegh mnneng _ Jesus _ Christ-ameng _ .
whaa _ maaten _ qaatke te lunga _ agleghnagh lghii gnun _ taghneghagh gnun _ Jerusalem -en naqunga _ , _ nalluke aqa _ sa yaghqaqe aatnga _ Jerusalem -eghmiit _ .
iwerngaqun _ tea- ma ghhagh itni _ nuna ni _ takukagh mni _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ ungipaate aqe aanga _ Jerusalem-emi _ seghleliigh lleqe ni lunga llu _ anusimingllagh lleqe ni lunga llu _ yug nun _ .
iwernga _ whanga _ katam _ unguvallegh ka _ waakigate aqa _ apeghiigh qaghte na luku _ qepghaqagh _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ qelegh tke a _ whanga mnun _ . _ apegh sqe kaqe ai _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh aneng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
" _ liisimake aqa _ allameng _ esgh aghnaanghi tagh pesinga _ , _ elpek si _ ungipagh iqe tekagh mni _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aghneghmi _ whani _ ungipaate naqe amsi _ malgh uk l ill ngun aan _ , _ naligh i _ ifla kan _ whanga _ pil qen ghi taqa _ ,
qayughllak _ nuqe tu simangit aqa _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ liite sug qu a _ elpesi nun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ penniigh stun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ enkaam _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ elpesi nun _ aflengake sqe ai _ katam _ tawaten _ penniigh niigh tem _ aflengake llegh atun _ penniigh ni _ . _ enkaam _ keleng angwaagh lusi _ , _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ yug i _ kelengak ngwaagh luki _ . _ aflengake teki _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ tukfigh kaqe ai _ ellmi _ katam _ aaw mikun _ .
liisimake aqa _ unite kumsi _ apeghtughiste sighwaaghet _ taku lleqe aisi _ . _ katam _ tawatete ut _ ugighsagh lghii stun _ amaa stun _ naafqii naqe lghiit _ penniigh meng _ , _ naaf qen naqutk elleq iit _ ugpeqagh t _ apeghtugh i llegh megteggun _ .
talwa _ ila i _ ugpeqaalgu tesi _ iqlengiqe yaghqaa ut _ ugpeq esqelluki _ apeghtugh i lleg teng _ , _ ugpegh te qegh te ku megteki _ maligsaagh tek naluki _ .
enkaam _ keleng angwaagh lusi _ puugh telleng nayuk afsi _ . _ neqamike luku _ pi nga yu t _ ayumiqullegh t _ kelenga sagh uqagh ke amsi _ qamagte lusi _ tamaaken _ aghneghtuumaan _ , _ unugtugh magh an _ seghleliigh llagh ngaaghma _ , _ qunituumagh ma _ .
" _ naange niite kete naqe aqa _ , _ neghyuke te amsi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aflengak esqellusi _ , _ ungipagh mun llu _ piniqe llegh anun _ quyas tesqellusi _ . _ nagate llegh gpesigun _ taana _ ungipagh _ ugpegh lleg si _ iknaqugh lleq utlu _ allgegh lleq agh sillu _ elpek si _ pi liite yaghqagh i _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ taana _ pi liite yaghqagh _ tamaakunun _ pi u uq _ aaftekagh minun _ ellmi nun _ katam _ yugu luki _ .
elpesi nite aqngama _ mani gpesineng llu _ aatkagh gpesineng llu _ qiliigh mangite unga _ .
Liisimak aghpesinga _ sa u a _ aklukegk aqa _ , _ ila ma llu _ whangam nilnguut _ aklukegk iit _ qepghaat kay uw aanka _ allgegh h naluki _ .
sa u a _ qamagte luku _ pi kaqe aqa _ elpesi nun _ usputagh u sqellug qu _ , _ whanga mtun _ ughleghiigh llegh gpesigun _ kayusii tesqelluki _ pi pagning ilnguut _ . _ neqamike luku _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ whaten _ pillgha _ , _ ' _ quyanagh aghagh uq _ tuune i i llegh _ allgegh te llegh meng _ . _ ' _ "
Paul _ tawaten _ akuzi nghmeng _ taaqe yami _ , _ segesqughte luni _ yughagh lgusighkagh i _ .
qamagte luteng _ qiya magh meng _ Paul _ qete aqe luku _ naagh aataghkagh at _ .
qivghuke lleghpigagh ke kangat _ qayughllak _ pi kaqe kangi _ allameng llu _ esghagh naanghite ni luteng _ . _ taagken _ qanig ke aat _ angyaghpag mun _ .
unite yamteki _ ugpeqagh t _ angyaghpag mun _ uugg llu ta _ nangaqaghte ukut _ C os -mun _ . _ unaami ani _ R h od es -mun _ kaa llu ta _ taagken _ nagnegh ukut _ patara- mun _ .
tawani _ angyaghpag meng _ naalkute ukut _ Ph o en ic ia- n naqelghii meng _ enkaam _ uugg llu ta _ aghulaqe ukut _ .
esghagh yamteggu _ qiighqagh _ C yp r us _ uughqa akun _ nagnegh ukut _ S y ri a-m _ esne akun _ T yr e- mun _ . _ tawani _ usingigh aat _ angyaghpag _ .
tamaani _ ivagh luki _ ugpeqagh t _ naal kes am teki _ ellngit nite ukut _ ataasigh _ santillegh _ . _ Agleghnalghiig nekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ ugpeqagh t _ Paul _ Jerusalem-e tes naniq aat _ .
Aghulaq saghqaagh tengng amta _ ugpeqaalgutem ta _ nulighh ghqu te lghiit _ , _ avaqutagh ke te lghiit _ maligte ainkut _ esnagh mun _ . _ tawani _ segesqughte uute luta _ yughagh te ukut _ .
taagken _ uugte ukut _ angyaghpag mun _ , _ qan ii ghis te put _ ne meggnun _ aglagh uute ut _ .
aghulaqe luta _ T yr e-meng _ kaate ukut _ P t ol em a is -mun _ . _ tamaani _ quyake luki _ ugpeqaalgu te put _ ataasigh _ aghneq _ ellngit nite ukut _ .
Un am ingani _ Caesarea- mun _ kaa llu ta _ Philip -en kun itukut _ ev ang el is t- e mi _ . _ M aaghraghvin leq egkangat _ nakmikegkagh t _ kayute u luki _ .
Es tam aneng _ panig leg _ ugiigh ma ite ngugh meng _ , _ qamagte luteng _ uuknaliqistet _ .
salin _ tamaan sim aluta _ uuknaliqe i sta _ agabus _ , _ Judea- meng _ kaa tuq _ .
Whang kun nun _ tagi luni _ Paul-em _ tafsi a _ iike luku _ asigh qelluki _ itegagh ni llu _ iigge ni llu _ pi inkut _ , _ " _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ pi uk _ , _ ' _ Jerusalem-emi _ tafsi m _ uum _ y um anga _ Jews-et _ asighqesaghqagh ke aat _ , _ taagken _ tuune lleqe aat _ Gentile-enun _ . _ ' _ "
whangkuta llu _ ila ita llu _ yug t _ nagate luku _ agabus _ tawaten _ pi lghii _ igh leg aatk es agh aghput _ Paul _ Jerusalem - ete f qaan _ pi sqellug qu _ .
iwernga _ Paul-em _ pi inkut _ , _ " _ sangafsi _ qiya magh gpesi _ tawaten _ pi ste ngnga _ ? _ Seghl el iigh qagh pesinga _ ! _ whaa _ apeghiigh waagh lunga _ ayuqe unga _ asighqesaghqagh u lunga _ Jerusalem-emi _ , _ talwa _ tuqu yaghqaa lunga _ apallugh ke luku _ atanegh _ Jesus _ . _ "
Paul _ sagiqe yan _ iil qay ag ut aghput _ enkaangam _ piigh ut _ , _ " _ yeqay _ Atanghem _ piyuke llegh a _ apeghiigh li _ . _ "
enkaam _ qafsina _ aghneq _ atugh luku _ yataagh qell uta _ aghulaqe ukut _ Jerusalem-emun _ .
ila ita _ ugpeqagh t _ Caesarea- ghmiit _ maligte ainkut _ , _ kaate yamta _ Jerusalem-emun _ aglagh te ainkut _ tukughqagh mnnun _ M nas on -en kunun _ , _ C yp r us -eghm ii mun _ . _ Ugpeq aq suwhaagh teggun _ maligte te luni _ ugpeqekagh a _ Jesus _ .
Jerusalem-emi _ ugpeqaalgutem ta _ quyake luta _ upugha te ainkut _ .
unaami ani _ Paul _ maligte luku _ esghagh yaghtugh yaq efut _ James _ , _ Elder -etlu _ qamagte luteng _ tawan teftut _ .
Paul-em _ quyakekagh i _ . _ taagken _ ungipagh tke ai _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh llegh aneng _ qepghagh llegh mikun _ Gentile- en ill uni _ .
nagate luku _ usuqekagh at _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ taagken _ pi ke aat _ Paul _ , _ " _ Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ liisima kan _ uglagh pestaagh ghllag t _ Jews-et _ ugpeqe aat _ Christ-a _ . _ elngaatall _ qaatke te manginagh yug aqe ut llu _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh anun _ .
Ungip aataq iin nguq _ apeghtugh aq aten nguq _ qamagte luki _ Jews-et _ , _ Gentile-et _ nun angit nilnguut _ qaatke te fqiita _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh anun _ pisqelluki _ . _ pi aqe aten llu nguq _ ighnegh it _ circumcise- enghi sagh ngaata _ , _ talwa nguq _ atuqe snanigh aqe an _ Jews-et _ kiyaghtaa llgh at _ .
kaate ma ni luten _ nagaqugh pestaagh naqngu aten _ . _ sa naqe sta ngam _ ?
itagnagh pigte nayagh uq _ pi sqe lleg mtestun _ pi yagh kuvek _ . _ estamat _ yug mta _ apeghiigh yaghtugh ngestagh ma ait _ akeqe i llegh eng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
elpek llu _ maligte luki _ temple- mun _ ukmangigh yagh a _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh an _ qelegh llegh atun _ . _ tukfigh naketen llu _ teghig ke sagh t _ aghqe te kaghqagh si _ enkaam _ aghqerragh ghhaasi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ Taam _ kingu aneng _ yug t _ taakut _ taawa _ meq es tengngwaagh luteng _ qigugh yaghqaaghte lleqe ut _ liilightuusagh t _ pisqell ghistun _ . _ elpek llu _ ukmangigh kuvek _ qamagte luteng _ Jews-et _ liigike lleqe aat _ qaatke te nga llegh n _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh anun _ . _ liigike lleqe aat llu _ nagaqughkagh eng _ tamaa na _ temngingu ta a _ .
taakut _ Gentile-et _ ugpeqe ait _ ungipaate kaqe aput _ lata tgun _ qaatk esqelluki _ ukut _ , _ ' _ neghe gpenasi _ neqe meng _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ . _ neghe gpenasi _ aaw meng _ . _ neghe gpenasi _ qemitekagh meng _ teghig ke te yameng _ . _ nuqete aqe tek llu _ sex-kun _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ . _ ' _ "
enkaam _ unaami ani _ Paul _ ukmangigh yaghtuqagh _ liilightuusagh t _ pisqell ghistun _ maligte luki _ estamat _ yug t _ ukmangigh yaghtugh lghiit _ . _ taagken _ Paul _ temple- mun _ itegh luni _ priest-et _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ santillegh _ atugh luku _ estamat _ yug t _ ukmangighsagh llegh eng _ apeghiigh naqe aat _ liilightuusagh t _ pisqell ghistun _ . _ tukfigh lleqe anka _ teghig ke sagh t _ aghqe te kaghqagh it _ enkaam _ aghqerragh u aghte te aatagh qagh nakesi _ taakut _ yug t _ . _ "
iiwenllu _ santillegh _ naange naqe aqe uq _ taakut _ yug t _ ukmangighsagh llegh at _ , _ Asi a-meng _ pi t _ Jews-et _ esghaghkagh at _ Paul _ temple- mete luku _ . _ aga _ akuqagh luku _ akilghuukagh t _ ,
" _ Israel-eghm iini _ , _ tagi aghte tek qun _ ! _ una _ yuug _ navek _ alngunak _ pi nghmini _ seghlequugh aqiinkut _ Jews-en i _ whangkuta _ , _ liilightuusagh put llu _ . _ wataqaaghaq _ seghlegh atagh aaguq _ tagite aqe yamiki _ Gentile-et _ temple- mun _ liilightuusagh t _ iinghutekagh it _ . _ sakusiiqe aqe a llu _ una _ agleghnagh lghii _ temple- a _ . _ "
( _ tawaten _ pi ke ait _ sumegh meggni _ Paul -mun _ gentile- a _ itghute ma ni luku _ temple- mun _ , _ qayughllak _ Jerusalem-emi _ esghagh kaqe kegket _ T ro ph im us-enkuk _ qerng agh mell ukek _ . _ trophimus _ Gentile- ngul ghii _ Ephesus -eghm ii _ . _ )
Jerusalem -eghmiit _ ugumi yug ghllagkagh t _ , _ ketanqusnaq _ aglagh uute tke aat _ temple- mun _ akilghuu te magh meng _ , _ seghleliighqagh ii ghllagkagh t _ . _ temple- mi _ Paul _ akuqagh luku _ qamugh qu aat _ eslate mun _ . _ Tawaninginaq _ kitum _ amig ghllag t _ umeg ke ai _ .
tuqute naqutke ma luku _ Paul _ Rome-eghm iit _ pilluwagh tengita _ umiileg at _ ungipangekagh _ qaga _ iingunagh mi _ seghleliighqagh ii ghllagu ni luku _ .
Tawaninginaq _ Rome-eghm iit _ pilluwagh tengita _ umiileg at _ kelqekagh _ umiil waagh nengllu _ pilluw aght en engllu _ enkaam _ aqfaasnaq _ aglaghkagh t _ . _ yug lghute ghllag t _ esghagh luki _ pilluwaghtet _ qevute ta igh na nigh ke aat _ Paul _ .
taagken _ pilluwaghtet _ umiileg ita _ tugu luku _ Paul _ asighqe stekagh a _ malghugnegh neng _ qiipraghute neng _ . _ Pilluw aghtet _ umiileg ita _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ kinangaawa _ una _ yuug _ ? _ sa ma a _ ? _ "
ataasigh kun _ akilghu umeng _ kiim sii saq megteggu _ repall _ umiileg m _ liigik enghit kii _ sa meng _ pi ta i _ . _ enkaam _ pilluwaghtet _ umiileg ita _ yug minun _ aglagh te sqekagh a _ Paul _ pilluwaghtet _ mangteghagh itnun _ .
T utem qii raagh nun _ kaat ute te luku _ pilluwaghtet _ kevegkagh at _ Paul _ , _ qayughllak _ yug lghute ghllag t _ suugllug ughte ghllag lghiit _ .
yug lghute ghllag t _ malig llegh aat kaat _ akilghuu te magh meng _ , _ " _ tuqute ggu _ ! _ "
Pilluw aghtet _ itghute naqe yatni _ Paul-em _ aaptekagh a _ pilluwaghtet _ umiileg at _ Greek - estun _ , _ " _ A legh quq aghn ay anghi si kaan _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh a qaa _ , _ " _ awii _ Greek - estun _ akuzi kayugu ziin _ ?
Taan angun ghis iin _ Egypt- eghm ii _ qavnganghhaq _ qerngughte ikagh _ yug meng _ awite te na luku _ Rome-em _ kav em enga _ , _ kilgaa nun _ aghulaqe tke ai _ 4 ,000 _ yug t _ ategh leg t _ , _ Yug tagh tet _ ? _ "
Paul-em _ kiimsigh a qaa _ , _ " _ Jew -ngu unga _ , _ C il ic ia- gh mii _ , _ allgegh kau unga _ ne ghllag mi _ tarsus- mi _ . _ A legh quq aghn ay anghi sing ii _ yug t _ ? _ "
Pilluw aghtet _ umiileg ita _ angeghqe ma ke yatni _ , _ Paul _ nekeve luni _ tu tem qii raagh teggun _ iigge ni _ nengug tke ai _ ne pigh esqelluki _ . _ enkaam _ qalleg nanigh yata _ aleghqugh qu ai _ H eb r ew- stun _ .
Paul-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ anglegute mni llu _ siivanllegh ni llu _ nagate aghte ngnga _ , _ liigike ste naqutke aghte naqe amsi _ sa aqe te mneng _ . _ "
Jews-et _ nagate yamegteggu _ akuzi lghii _ ellmegestun _ elngaatall _ qall eg nanigh waagh utkat _ .
taagken _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Jew -ngu unga _ allgeghkagh _ tarsus- mi _ C il ic ia- melngugh mi _ iwernga _ maani _ Jerusalem-emi _ angli kau unga _ . _ gamaliel _ apeghtughiste ke luku _ liite u aqe aqe anka _ liilightuusagh t _ sivunegh mta _ apeghtuusagh kekagh it _ , _ enkaam _ tuune kau unga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qaat keng ngwaagh naluku _ katam _ tawaten _ elpesi stun _ .
elngaatall _ amyuqetagh tke kaqe anka _ tamaakut _ qaatke te nga lghiit _ Jesus-em _ apeghtuusagh anun _ repall _ tuqute naqutke kaqe anka _ . _ yug t llu _ aghnagh t llu _ tugu ste aqe luki _ anusimingllagh ste qugh kaqe anka _ .
