sivugh nghaani _ anusimingllaghagh stun _ ayuqe yagh ukut _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ tuqu kau te mnneng _ Christ- ami _ , _ iteme te kau ukut _ qaatke te yaghqaa lleg mnneng _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ enkaam _ qepghaat ngwaagh put _ kiyaghnegh _ unguvalleghraghagh mteggun _ Taghneghagnekun _ , _ nakaan _ unguvallegh lug mteggun _ liilightuusagh tgun _ .
Sameng 始ngam _ pi lleqe sta _ ? _ liilightuusagh at _ seghleghqe llegh u aat _ ? _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ liite stekaqe ai _ whanga mnun _ seghleghqe llegh t _ sa u ta i _ . _ liite nayagh nghite aqa _ qiliiqetu iqe llegh _ sa u ta a _ liilightuusagh _ whaten _ qelegh i mangite yagh kan _ , _ " _ qiliiqetu iqe gpenang _ . _ "
iwernga _ atuqe luku _ taana _ qelegh sagh _ , _ seghleghqe llegh m _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ qiliigh ketagh ngllagh kaqe aanga _ . _ liilightuusagh ngunateng _ seghleghqe llegh t _ tuqu u aat _ .
sivugh nghaani _ kiyaghteng nguyagh tunga _ liilightuusagh ngunaan _ ; _ iwernga _ liisagh kegka _ taana _ qelegh sagh _ , _ seghleghqe llegh _ unguvagh luni _ enkaam _ tuqu unga _ .
qelegh sagh _ unguva ste i yaghqaa yagh lghii _ whanga mnun _ , _ yeghlegi _ tuqu ste aanga _ .
taaggun _ qelegh sagh kun _ , _ seghleghqe llegh m _ puugh saqleg ugh taanga _ . _ enkaam _ atuqe luku _ qelegh sagh _ seghleghqe llegh m _ tuqute aanga _ .
iwernga _ liilightuusagh t _ agleghnagh lghii u ut _ , _ qelegh sagh llu _ agleghnagh lghii u uq _ , _ elqughute nga uq llu _ , _ pinigh uq llu _ .
Taam _ qelegh sagh m _ pinigh lghii m _ , _ tuqu ta nge a _ ? _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ seghleghqe llegh m _ tuqute aanga _ atuqe luku _ sa u a _ pinigh lghii _ . _ enkaam _ legh igh iitagh ut _ qelegh sagh kun _ seghleghqe llegh _ elngaatall _ seghlegh pigu uq _ .
liisimake aput _ liilightuusagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh aneng _ pi u ut _ , _ iwernga _ maghyaghqugh u nghite aanga _ taghneghagh m _ . _ M aghyagh qu ung waa nga _ yugusigh ma _ piyuke llegh an _ , _ enkaam _ qepghaghtelaagh uunga _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ .
liigike igate aqa _ sa aqe tke a _ qayughllak _ atuqe igate aqa _ sa u a _ atuqe yu kaqe a _ . _ itupill _ atuqe aqe aqa _ sa u a _ ugumi ke kaqe a _ .
iwernga _ atuqe gkumki _ ugumi kekagh nka _ atuqe yu nghite ghngaamki _ , _ taawa _ itagnagh kaqe anka _ liilightuusagh t _ pinigh ta i _ .
enkaam _ whanga u nghite uq _ tawaten _ pi aqe lghii _ , _ itupill _ seghleghqe llegh _ ilu mnite ngughk _ tawaten _ pi aqe uq _ .
liisimake aqa _ avangite unga _ pinigh lghii meng _ ilu mni _ , _ yugusigh mni _ . _ pinitun _ piyug aqe yagh ghngaaghma _ , _ pipagningite aqa _ .
pi igate aqa _ pinigh lghii _ piyuke kaqe a _ , _ yeghlegi _ seghlegh _ pi aqe aqa _ piyuk enghit k aqa _ .
enkaam _ piyuk enghit k aqa _ pinegh mkun _ , _ taawa _ whanga u nghite uq _ tawaten _ pi lghii _ . _ itupill _ seghleghqe llegh u aqe uq _ ilu mnite ngughk _ tawaten _ pi aqe lghii _ .
enkaam _ liite aqa _ taana _ : _ pinitun _ pinaq egh ng aghma _ , _ paninang _ seghlegh _ tawan taquq _ .
Q aam ke rugllak _ pinigh y uug usi q anka _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ .
iwernga _ liite aqa _ taawa _ ila a _ liilightuusagh _ yugusigh mnite uq _ . _ Pilluw aq angi _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ umyugagh ma _ itagnaq egkii _ . _ liilightuusagh m _ yugusim nil nguum _ seghleghqe ste aqe aanga _ , _ enkaam _ anusimingllaghagh stun _ ayuqe unga _ tea- mete te _ liilightuusagh mun _ .
Seghleghwaagh uunga _ ! _ kitum ngam _ iteme te lleqe anga _ whaken _ yugusigh meng _ tuqu ste i yaghqagh meng _ whanga mneng _ ?
iyamsiqa nagh ghhalek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ item us kang anga _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ atanegh mteggun _ ! _ Enkaangam _ qaatke anka _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ umyugagh mkun _ , _ iwernga _ yugusigh mkun _ qaatke aqa _ liilightuusagh _ seghleghqe ste i lghii _ whanga mneng _ .
Enkaangam _ kinku t _ alngunak _ Christ _ Jesus-mun _ ilate kau kata _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte naanghite ai _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki _ .
qayughllak _ liilightuusagh an _ taghneghagh m _ unguvall elit ilghii m _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ iteme te kaqe aanga _ liilightuusagh aneng _ seghleghqe llegh m llu _ tuqu llegh m llu _ .
Moses-em _ liilightuusagh i _ tawaten _ pipagningite ut _ qayughllak _ yugusigh mta _ piyuke llghite a _ kay aa legh qegk aqii _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ liilightuusagh t _ pipag nigh nge i tke aat _ . _ kayagtekaqe a _ ellmi _ katam _ ighnegh ni _ nuna mun _ seghleghqe ma lghii tun _ yug tun _ ayuqe luku _ . _ tuune kaqe a _ ighnegh ni _ aghqe te u luku _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ . _ tawaten _ nanqigtekaqe a _ seghleghqe llegh _ yugusigh mete luku _ ,
whangkunnun _ qaatk es aq leg ugh tesqelluki _ liilightuusagh t _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ qelegh sagh i _ . _ Whang kunguut _ kiyaghte lghiit _ malighqutagh ke luta _ taghneghagh m _ piyuke llegh anun _ , _ nakaan _ yugusigh mta _ piyuke llegh itnun _ .
tamaakut _ kiyaghte lghiit _ malighqutagh ke luteng _ yugusigh meng _ piyuke llegh itnun _ , _ sumeghtaghaat keng ngin agh aqiit _ piyuke lleg teng _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ kiyaghte lghiit _ malighqutagh ke luteng _ taghneghagh gnun _ , _ sumeghtaghaat keng ngin agh aqiit _ taghneghagh m _ piyuke llegh i _ .
umyugagh put _ malighqutagh ke gkata _ yugusigh mta _ piyuke llegh anun _ , _ tuqu lleqe ukut _ . _ iwernga _ umyugagh put _ malighqutagh ke gkata _ taghneghagh gnun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvall el illeq iinkutlu _ nekeggmell el illeq iinkutlu _ .
umyugagh put _ malighqutaq enghata _ yugusigh mta _ piyuke llegh anun _ , _ anguyag waa qu kut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qayughllak _ qaatke igate ke put _ liilightuusagh i _ . _ ipa _ qaatkepagningite aput _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ .
tamaakut _ malighqutagh ke nga lghiit _ yugusigh meng _ piyuke llegh anun _ efqugh te pagningit aat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ ig leq ataq ngun ghit iisi _ yugusigh gpesi _ piyuke llegh an _ . _ Ig leq at aqng w iisi _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ , _ qayughllak _ ipa _ kiyaghteng ngul ghii _ ilu gpesini _ . _ Christ-am _ taghneghagh kek _ kiyaghteng ngun ghil kay ek _ ilu ani _ yug m _ , _ pike nghite a _ Christ-am _ .
yugusigh si _ tuqu naqngu ut _ apallugh ke luki _ seghleghqe lleg si _ . _ iwernga _ Christ-a _ kiyagh tengng uk an _ ilu gpesini _ , _ taawa _ taghneghagh m _ unguvall el illeq iisi _ , _ qayughllak _ Christ-am _ nallghusagh stekaqe aisi _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh kek _ unguv aght ik ak _ Jesus-meng _ , _ kiyaghteng nguuk _ ilu gpesini _ . _ katam _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh ste llegh atun _ Christ _ Jesus _ , _ unguvagh ste lleqe ai _ yugusigh si _ taghneghagh gmikun _ kiyagh lleghh iig nekun _ ilu gpesini _ .
Enkaangam _ ugpeqaalgutem ni _ , _ kiyaghte yaghqaa ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh atun _ , _ nakaan _ yugusigh mta _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh atun _ .
Kiyagh teng ngu kufsi _ malighqutagh ke lusi _ yugusigh gpesi _ piyuke llegh anun _ , _ tuqu lleqe usi _ . _ iwernga _ Taghneghagnekun _ tuqute kufsiki _ yugusigh gpesi _ seghleghqeng 始 ngalghiit _ pi aqe kangit _ , _ taawa _ kiyaghte lleqe usi _ .
qayughllak _ tamaakut _ maghyaghqugh qu ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh ke ai _ .
taghneghagh m _ allgegh tek aghpesi _ kiyaghnegh meng _ qepghaghtelaagh ugh tes neq igg naanghit iisi _ alinge llegh mun _ . _ yeghlegi _ taghneghagh m _ kiyaghnegh mun _ avaqutagh ke ste aisi _ . _ enkaam _ ellnga kun _ tuqlugh agh aghput _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ " _ Ab b a _ ! _ Ataa y _ ! _ "
kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh kek _ ell meg neng _ ilate kau uk _ taghneghagh mnnun _ ungipaate na luta _ kiyaghnegh mun _ avaqutagh ke ni luta _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh ke ta aneng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ pag it istek iinkut _ , _ Christ- amllu _ pagite i ste lgutke ainkut _ . _ N igh ugh qell eng ellequ kut _ Christ- atun _ ikfiqe gkumta _ Christ-am _ ikfiqe llegh atun _ .
sume mni _ ikfiqe lleg put _ unguvallegh mnni _ inglutepagningite ut _ nighugh qellegh mun _ kiyaghnegh m _ aliighte yaghqagh anun _ whangkunnun _ .
ulima uq _ qamagte luni _ utaqa i u uq _ qelanegh lleg ligh luni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aliigh tesqelluki _ kinku u ta i _ avaquti a _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtekaqe a _ ulima uq _ aghyugh yaghqaa luku _ enkaam _ atugh u nanigh ste a _ . _ ulima uq _ nanqig tes un ghit kaaguq _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ tawaten _ piyuke kaqe a _ . _ naqamllu _ paninang _ sighima lleg lgu uq _ 
qayughllak _ ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ kiyaghnegh m _ iteme te lleqe a _ ulima uq _ aghu llegh meng _ . _ taagken _ ulima uq _ ila lleqe uq _ iteme nga llegh ghllag itnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh itnun _ .
liisimakagh ut _ wh av emun _ kenlanga _ iingunagh mi _ ulima uq _ ng illeg teng nguuq _ aqnighqe llegh atun _ ighni yu lghii m _ .
iwernga _ ulimaagh ghhagh u i naanghite uq _ ngillegte lghii _ , _ whangkuta llu _ ng illeg teng nguukut _ . _ Whang ku nguukut _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ pi leg ni _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunus aq sug wh aagh a _ whangkunnun _ . _ Ng illeg teng ngu u kutlu _ ilu mteggun _ utaqa i ma luta _ kiyaghnegh mun _ all ughq is qell uta _ avaqutagh u luta _ ellnga nun _ , _ item u tesqell ukillu _ yugusigh put _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ .
taaggun _ sighima llegh kun _ yugul i kaagukut _ . _ iwernga _ allgegh sim akum teggu _ sighimakekagh ut _ , _ taawa _ sighima llegh u nghite uq _ . _ yug t _ sighima igate ut _ sa meng _ allgegh tengng waa qam eggneng _ .
iwernga _ sighima ma kumta _ sa meng _ allgegh tekaq enghil kem nneng _ , _ utaq alleq aghput _ qelanegh gpenaamta _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ taghneghagh m _ kayusigh aqe ainkut _ kayaate lleg mnni _ , _ qayughllak _ nalluke lghiikut _ naten _ yughagh lleghqagh ke yagh ke mtestun _ . _ iwernga _ taghneghagh m _ ellmi neng _ katam _ yughagh te aqe ainkut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ngillegte llegh ghllag kun _ akuzite u na an _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake ai _ yug t _ sumeghtaghagh llegh it _ . _ liisimake ai llu _ sumeghtaghagh llegh i _ taghneghagh m _ , _ qayughllak _ taghneghagh m _ yughagh te kaqe ai _ yug i _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ ayuqe luki _ .
liisimakagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ qepghagh ste aqe ai _ qerngagh ita _ pinighqe lleghqagh itnun _ piniq iste mi _ . _ Ellng inguut _ tuqlugh qu ai _ uspeqe llegh mitun _ .
Tamaa kunguut _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kestaghkagh i _ . _ aaftekaqe ai llu _ ighnegh mitun _ lliigh esqelluki _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ ighnegh ni _ allgegh yuwhaagh ma sqellug qu _ angleg u tel ghut anganeng _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ aaftekagh ni _ tuqlugh kaqe ai _ . _ tamaakut llu _ tuqlughkagh ni _ nallghusagh kaqe ai _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ . _ tamaakut llu _ nallghusaghkagh ni _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ quulv aq aqii _ .
Sameng 始ngam _ pi naqe steggu _ una _ ? _ kiyaghnegh _ whangkunnun _ ayuqe u kan _ , _ kitum ngam _ teng v imun _ pi lleqe inkut _ ?
ighleke mangite a _ ellmi _ katam _ ighnegh ni _ ; _ itupill _ tuune kaqe a _ aghqe te u luku _ tea- ma ghhagh mnnun _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune ma kanginkut _ ighnegh mineng _ , _ taawa _ ellnga kun _ ighleg gpenani _ tuune lleqe ainkut _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ .
kitum ngam _ anaggute ni lleqe aki _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ yug t _ ? _ kiyaghnegh m _ ellmi neng _ katam _ anaggute llghite ni kaqe ai _ !
kina ngam _ pi lleqe a _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ nanqigte yaghqaa ni luki _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luteng _ ? _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ pi lleqe agu _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ qayughllak _ ellnga u uq _ tuquma tke ikagh _ whangkunnun _ , _ unguvagh te kaag uqlu _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ maaten _ yughagh te kaqe ainkut _ aqume luni _ aghenqignegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
Saam ngam _ iqite ste lleqe inkut _ piniqe llegh aneng _ Christ-am _ ? _ Seghl el ii llgh aam _ , _ piyaq lii llgh aam _ , _ amyuqetaatk ellgh aam _ , _ panegh n iqellgh aam _ , _ aklum allgh aam _ , _ y akugh naa m _ , _ nalighmeng _ tuqu tellgh aam _ ?
igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ , _ " _ elpek _ apallugh ke luten _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ yug t _ tuqute yug aqe ainkut _ . _ sumeghtaghagh llegh meggni _ penniigh stun _ ayuqe na iqe ainkut _ tuqute yaghqagh t _ . _ "
iwernga _ tamaakut _ qamagte luki _ kayaal qeng ngwaaq aqaput _ Christ-akun _ piniq is tem teggun _ .
Liisimak ngwaagh aqa _ saam _ alngunak _ iqite snaanghite ainkut _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh aneng _ : _ talwa _ tuqu llegh m _ , _ unguvallegh m _ , _ yaquleg t _ , _ nalighmeng _ tughneghagh- t _ . _ talwa _ sa u a _ sa ghngaan _ aghneghmi _ nalighmeng _ sivu mi _ agani _ , _ nalighmeng _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgh et _ .
talwa _ sa u aat _ qule mnni _ nalighmeng _ asi mnni _ . _ ulimaagh mi _ iq i test iyagh qaq ragg ii tuq _ whangkunneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh aneng _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ atanegh mteggun _ .
apegh yug kaqe a _ elpesi nun _ ipa u uq _ . _ iqlengiqe u nghite unga _ qayughllak _ Christ-am _ pi ke aanga _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m llu _ igleghte te u ak _ umyugagh gka _ .
ungipaate yug amsi _ whaten _ : _ qivghu ghllagu unga _ qayughllak _ qaam ggu rugllak _ ilu mkun _ naange igate ngugh meng _ aqnigh q utk eghllag w aanka
yug lgute nka _ , _ Jews-et _ . _ piyaqleg u yagh kan _ , _ ellngit _ apallugh ke luki _ kiyaghnegh m tuq _ nanqigtegkanganga _ aghyuugh na lunga _ , _ iqite stegkanganga llu _ Christ-ameng _ .
yug lgute nka _ Israel -em _ kingunegh ke ai _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ allughqi kaqe ai _ ellmi nun _ avaqutagh u luki _ . _ aliightekaqe a _ nighughqell eni _ ellngit nun _ . _ A ke qu uq aqii _ sa lleghqagh mineng _ ellngit nun _ . _ tuune kaqe ai _ liilightuusagh mineng _ . _ apeghtugh kaqe ai _ ellmi nun _ maniguute lleghqagh meng _ elqughute luki _ . _ A ke qu uq aq iillu _ quya ste lleqe ni luki _ qaatk egk ang atni _ .
kingunegh ke ait _ sivun eq suwh aamta _ , _ taa kutgun _ king unegh teggun _ Christ-a _ allgegh kau uq _ yugu luni _ . _ ellnga _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ igleghte te i lghii _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ . _ usuqe lleg nge i _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ amen _ .
Kiyaghnegh aam _ akequsagh ni _ pi mangite agu _ Israel-eghm iinun _ ? _ nakaa _ ! _ akequsagh ni _ pika qaa _ ellngit nun _ , _ iwernga _ ila inagh ghhagh i _ king ungh i _ Israel -em _ Israel-eghm ii pig uut _ .
ila inagh ghhagh i llu _ Abraham-em _ king ungh i _ ellnga n _ avaqut ap ii kii _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ abraham _ whaten _ , _ " _ K ing ungh et _ elpenun _ akequsagh nka _ Isaa c -e kun _ ayuqe yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
taana _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ ila i _ avaqutagh t _ allgeghkagh t _ Abraham -emun _ avaqutagh ke nghite ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ iwernga _ allgeghkagh ghhagh inagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh akun _ Abraham -emun _ kingun ep ii kii _ Abraham-em _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ Abraham -emun _ whatete uq _ , _ " _ ayumiqun _ uteghnigh kuma _ whaten _ lliigh kan _ sarah _ ighnegh nge lleqe uq _ . _ "
taana _ S ar ah-m _ ighnegh a _ Isaa c -nguuq _ , _ sivunegh ut _ . _ nulightugh luni _ R eb e c c a-meng _ , _ ata ke ak _ malghi k _ ighnegh gkenka _ R eb e c c a-m _ .
talwa _ salin _ allgegh llghite lukek _ , _ salin llu _ pi igate lukek _ pinigh lghii meng _ nalighmeng _ seghlegh meng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ rebecca _ , _ " _ N uy ek lii m _ qepghagh u lleqe a _ uyuqligh _ . _ " _ atanegh _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ liigike sqellug qu _ ellnginagh mi _ nak miigh teng un iluni _ sa lleghqagh mineng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe a _ taana _ ighnegh _ qayughllak _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqlugh yukagh a _ . _ nakmike kaqe nghite a _ qayughllak _ taam _ ighnegh m _ sa u a _ pi kaqe ta aneng _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe kau lghii _ , _ " _ piniqe kaqe aqa _ Jacob _ , _ naqam _ ugumi ke kaqe aqa _ Es a u _ . _ "
Sameng 始ngam _ pi naqe steggu _ taana _ ? _ kiyaghnegh _ anaggute a _ ? _ yeghlegi llu _ !
qayughllak _ moses _ whaten _ pika qaa _ , _ " _ nangllegtagh lleqe unga _ kitumun _ alngunak _ nang lleq saghq amnun _ ; _ nafughtagh lleqe unga _ kitumun _ alngunak _ nafuqe yaghqagh mnun _ . _ "
Enkaangam _ yug t _ allgegh te pagningit aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ piyuke luku _ nalighmeng _ sa llegh megteggun _ . _ kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh u uq _ nakmiigh yaghqagh _ nanglleg ke yaghqagh minun _ .
akuzite ni _ Ig ak egkani _ igaqe nga uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ pharaoh _ whaten _ , _ " _ umiileg ughte stekaqe amken _ kelgute na luku _ aghtughyaghqaanghi l qa _ elpegun _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ ungipagh ke lleqe aat _ ategh ka _ . _ "
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg yagute kayugu a _ kina _ alngunak _ piyukekagh ni _ , _ pi negh llu ug testaq aallu _ kina _ alngunak _ piyukekagh ni _ .
enkaam _ aap leq aghpenga _ whaten _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ tawatete u kan _ , _ sang an始ngam _ nanqigte lleqe aki _ kinku t _ alngunak _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki _ ? _ kitum _ alngunak _ aygugh ii nagh yaghqaqe nghite a _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ . _ "
iwernga _ kina u ziin _ , _ yug mi _ , _ vegh us naas ken _ kiyaghnegh _ ? _ qiku meng _ ulimaagh m _ sagnegh m _ aapte igate a _ ulim as teni _ whaten _ , _ " _ sangama _ whatete lunga _ ulima zinga _ ? _ "
yug m _ qiku meng _ sag neng llagh tem _ piyuke llegh mitun _ atuqe yaghqaqe a _ qiku _ . _ ulima yu kumikek _ maalghug _ ataasigh meng _ qiku meng _ pi yaghqaqe ak _ , _ aag llegh a _ megnu nagh lghii mun _ atugh u luku _ , _ ila a _ sa mun _ alngunak _ atugh u luku _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ kelgute yu kaqe a _ ugumi yug llegh ghllag ni _ , _ liisimake sug aa llu _ aghtughyaghqaanghill eni _ . _ iwernga _ nuqe tun negh pak aqii _ nanqigtekagh ni _ naaf qen naluki _ .
tawaten _ pi kau uq _ liisimake sqellug qu _ nighugh qellegh ll ani _ nanglleg kekagh minun _ . _ yataaghqe kestagh kaqe ai _ ellngit nun _ allgegh tesqelluku _ nighughqell eni _ .
talwa _ whangkuta llu _ tuqlugh kaqe ainkut _ , _ nakaan _ Jew - ngin aghneng _ iwernga _ Gentile- en engllu _ .
H os ea- m _ uuknaliqe llegh ani _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ whaten _ Gentile- eneng _ , _ " _ tamaakut _ yug ke nghite kenka _ , _ atigh lleqe anka _ , _ ' _ yug nka _ ' _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t _ piniqe nghite kenka _ , _ atigh lleqe anka _ , _ ' _ piniqekagh nka _ ' _ .
tawani _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipaate vig itni _ , _ ' _ yug ke nghite amsi _ ' _ , _ tawani llu _ atigh lleqe ait _ , _ ' _ avaquti a _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ ' _ "
Isai ah-m _ akilghuu tke kaqe a _ israel _ whaten _ , _ " _ qaywa _ Israel-eghmiit _ esne m _ qenaavzeghagh atun _ uglagh tatekagh ligh nga a ta _ , _ taw all iim a _ qafsinkuuragh ghhaat _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa ut _ ,
qayughllak _ Atanghem _ k im aaw ill ngunani _ nanqig tengngwaagh lleqii _ nuna m _ yug i _ . _ "
sivugh nghaani _ Isai ah-m _ pi naqe ni llegh atun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ " _ Atanghem _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngugh m _ siipte te mangite yagh kanginkut _ kingunegh meng _ , _ qamagtengngwaagh luta _ naafqe lleg nge nayagh ukut _ S od om -enkuk _ G om or rah - nkuk _ ne ghllag gketun _ . _ "
Sameng 始ngam _ pi lleqe sta _ ? _ Gentile-et _ , _ ellmeggneng _ nallghusagh naqutke mangite ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh kaqe ai _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ apallugh ke luku _ ugpeqe i llegh at _ .
Israel-eghmiit _ malighqutagh ke naqutke kau ut _ liilightuusagh nun _ elqughute nga na luteng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ iwernga _ pilaataqu mangite ut _ .
sangameng _ pilaataqu nghite aat _ ? _ qayughllak _ nallghusagh naqutke lghiit _ ellmeggneng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ sa llegh megteggun _ , _ neghyuke gpenaan _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nallghus iisqell uteng _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ . _ enkaam _ naagte aqe ut _ " _ naagte sigh kun _ uyghag kun _ . _ "
igaqe kau lghii _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ : _ " _ ii-i _ , _ Z i on -mi _ nekegte aqa _ uyghag _ yug t _ naag tesqelluki _ , _ taam _ uyghag m _ iquslegh ke ai _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ ugpegh kuni _ ellnga kun _ kayngu yug naanghite uq _ . _ "
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ qamagun _ ilu mkun _ piyuke pigte aqe anka _ whanga _ katam _ yug nka _ Jews-et _ yugulilleng esqelluki _ ! _ elngaatall _ kiyaghnegh mun _ yughagh te kaqe anka _ !
whaten _ piighhe naqe anka _ yug nka _ : _ qepghagh te yu pigte aqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ iwernga _ liigike igate aat _ naten _ kiyaghnegh _ qepghagh te sug aqe te ni _ ellngit nun _ .
liigike llghite aat _ naten _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh aqe ta i _ yug t _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ . _ enkaam _ elqughutngagh ngllagh naqutke aqe ut _ qaute kete luki _ liilightuusagh i _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh megteggun _ tugukligh igate aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh a _ .
Christ-a _ kenle ke aat _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ enkaam _ tamaghhagh mi _ ugpeqe i lleg leg _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh lleqe a _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ .
moses _ igagh kau uq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ nallghusagh i lghii meng _ yug neng _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ qaatke te llegh itgun _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ whaten _ igaqe kaqe a _ , _ " _ yug m _ qaatke ma kaki _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ taa kutgun _ kiyaghte lleqe uq _ . _ "
iwernga _ nallghusaghkagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ , _ qelegh kau uq _ , _ " _ aapte gpenang _ , _ ' _ kina _ mayugh lleqe a _ qilag mun _ ? _ ' _ " _ ( _ ukig g naluku _ Christ-a _ nuna mun _ ) _ .
nalighmeng _ aapte gpenang _ , _ " _ kina _ ukig lleqe a _ Ab y s s -mun _ ? _ " _ ( _ mayugh te na luku _ Christ-a _ tuqu meng _ . _ )
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ qantaghante uq _ elpenun _ . _ akuzi tke lleqe an _ qanegh gpegun _ , _ ugpeqe lleqe an llu _ ilu gpegun _ . _ " _ ( _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ ugpeqe i llegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ , _ taan anguuq _ ungipaq eg kefut _ . _ )
apegh kuvgu _ qanegh gpeneng _ , _ " _ Jesus _ Atangh uniluku _ , _ " _ ilu gpeneng llu _ ugpeqe gkuvgu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ unguvagh te sim aniluku _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe uten _ .
yuug _ ugpegh uq _ ilu mikun _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh aa _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ . _ apegh aa llu _ qanegh mikun _ ugpeqekagh ni _ , _ enkaam _ yuguligh lleg nge uq _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ ellnga _ kayngu yug naanghite uq _ . _ "
allangughte te ite ut _ Jews -etlu _ Greek -etlu _ qayughllak _ ataasigh u uq _ atanegh _ , _ atanegh ke a _ tamaghhagh an _ . _ quya ste ghllag aqe a _ tamaghhagh an _ tuqlugh i lghii _ ellmi neng _ .
katam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga lghii _ , _ " _ Tam agh aghmi _ tuqlugh i lghii _ ategh akun _ Atanghem _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ . _ "
iwernga _ naten _ yug t _ tuqlugh lleqe atgu _ ugpegh nghite kumeng _ ? _ naten _ ugpegh lleqe aat _ , _ nagaqugh te nghite kumeng _ ? _ naten llu _ nagaqugh lleqe aat _ ungipaq isteng un ateng _ ?
naten _ yug t _ ungipagh qite lleqe aat _ ellnga neng _ wetku _ kayagte lleg nge gkumeng _ ? _ katam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga lghii _ , _ " _ pinighnagh ghhagh meng _ itegagh it _ tamaakut _ ungipagh ke i lghiit _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ! _ "
iwernga _ ila inagh ita _ qaatke kaqe ait _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ . _ Isai ah _ aaptekau uq _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ kitum _ ugpeqe kaqe agu _ ungipagh ut _ ? _ "
kina _ alngunak _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu naanghite uq _ nagate gpenani _ ungipagh meng _ Christ-ameng _ ayuqe lghii meng _ .
iwernga _ pi aqe zinga _ Israel-eghmiit _ nagaqugh te nghite ni luki _ ungipagh meng _ ? _ aa-a _ , _ nagaqugh pestaagh kau ut _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga lghii _ , _ " _ me it _ aghulaqe ma ut _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ nuna m _ ; _ akuzi ta it llu _ kenle itnun _ nuna m _ . _ "
alla _ aapqugh aall elg uunga _ : _ Israel-eghmiit _ liigik enghit atk ii- i _ Israel-eghm iingun ghilnguut _ ellngit llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yuk atk ii _ ? _ aa-a _ , _ liigike ma ait _ . _ sivuke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ moses _ whaten _ pi sta _ : _ " _ elpesi nun _ aqinake ste naqe anka _ Israel-eghm iingun ghilnguut _ . _ Israel-eghm iingun ghil ngugh teggun _ liigike igate ngugh tgun _ ugumi yug ste naqe amsi _ . _ "
taagken _ Isai ah _ tetug gpenani _ apegh i kau uq _ whaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ pillgh aneng _ , _ " _ tamaakut _ ivagh i ma ite ngugh t _ whanga mneng _ , _ naalke kaqe aatnga _ . _ Tamaa kunun _ aapte i nghite ngugh nun _ whanga mneng _ , _ liite stekau unga _ . _ "
iwernga _ israel- meng _ kiyaghnegh _ whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ Aghn el qusigh llak _ nengug te anka _ iigge nka _ qaatke te igate ngugh nun llu _ , _ kipullgin aalghii nunllu _ whanga mneng _ . _ "
enkaam _ aapte amsi _ , _ " _ Kiyaghnegh aam _ Israel-eghmiit _ yuk sug nanigh tak ii _ ? _ " _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ whanga _ katam _ Israel-eghm ii nguunga _ , _ Abraham-em _ kingun gha _ , _ B en j amin -em _ ramke aneng _ pi u unga _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ yuk sug nan ill ghit ii _ yug ni _ qayughllak _ nakmike kaqe ai _ salin _ nuna ngllagh llghite luni _ . _ Liisimak en ghis tegguu _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ Elij ah-m _ qik egh q utkegk aqegkangi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ Israel-eghmiit _ ? _ whaten _ pi kau lghii _ ,
" _ atanegh _ , _ tuqu qugh kaqe ait _ uuknaliqiste ten _ , _ ullegh qugh kaqe ait _ aghqefig ten _ ; _ whanga inagh ghhagh u unga _ siipnegh _ , _ tuqute naqutke aqe aatnga llu _ . _ "
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ , _ " _ paninang _ 7 ,000 -meng _ yug lgu unga _ maniguute igate ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh mun _ B aal -mun _ . _ "
maaten llu _ tawatete ut _ . _ siipnegh lgu uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh aneng _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ .
kiyaghnegh _ nakmiigh ma kuni _ nanglleg yug llegh mikun _ , _ taawa _ nakmike llghite ai _ pinitun _ pill ghitgun _ . _ tawaten _ nakmike ma kumiki _ , _ taawa _ nakmike llghite ai _ nanglleg yug llegh mikun _ .
whaten _ pi aqe unga _ : _ Israel-eghmiit _ naalke llghite aat _ ivaghkagh eng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh ghhagh inagh ita _ naalke kaqe aat _ . _ ila i _ tamaakut _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi negh llu ug testek aqii _ .
katam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe kau lghii _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ umyugagh it _ liigike yaghqaa nanighqe kaqe ai _ . _ Wh av emun _ kenlanga _ aghnegh mun _ iye it _ esghagh yaghqaa nanighqe kaqe ai _ , _ sigute it llu _ nagaqugh te yaghqaa nanighqe kaqe ai _ . _ "
David -llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ neqenghaghqe llegh it _ negaghagh ughte lit _ , _ naapte llegh ughte lit _ , _ naagte sigh ughte lit _ , _ aghyuugh i sigh ughte lit _ ellngit nun _ .
iye it _ ayaa lleg nge lit _ esgh aghn an iisqelluki _ , _ qukagh it llu _ pak eg nengl it _ uqig itneng _ seghleliigh llghite a _ quunperugllag _ . _ "
enkaam _ aapte amsi _ , _ Israel-eghmiit _ naagte aqngameng _ , _ alla _ nekevepagningite aqe aat _ ? _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ iwernga _ Israel-eghmiit _ seghleghqe llegh it _ apallugh ke luki _ , _ Gentile-et _ yuguligh lleg nge ut _ . _ enkaam _ yuguligh lleg nge llghite a _ Israel-eghmiit _ aqina ste ait _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ atuqe kaqe ai _ seghleghqe llegh it _ Israel-eghmiit _ tagite na luku _ quya ste llegh ghllag _ nuna m _ yug anun _ . _ Israel-eghmiit _ iflii llghite a _ tagite aat _ quya ste llegh ghllag _ Gentile-enun _ . _ taagken _ qamagte luteng _ nakmikegkagh t _ Israel-eghmiit _ , _ ilate kumeng _ yugul ik anun _ , _ quya ste llegh t _ naten mi _ uglagh t atk alleq at _ !
maaten _ aleghqugh yug amsi _ elpek si _ Gentile- eni _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ apostle- ngulunga _ Gentile-enun _ . _ enkaam _ piraamsi pigte lunga _ pi aqe aqa _ una _ megnu nagh lghii _ qepghaqagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh tke a _ whanga mnun _ .
apeghtugh i lleg mkun _ elpesi nun _ aqina ste na luki _ pi anka _ Jews- el gut enka _ , _ ila i _ yugulilleng esqelluki _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ighsa kaqe yaki _ Jews-et _ , _ nuna m _ yug i _ Jew - ngun ghilnguut _ ilaliigh stekaqe ai _ ellmi nun _ . _ enkaam _ Jews-et _ tugukligh nqigtekumiki _ , _ unguvagh lleghh iistun _ tuqukagh t _ ayuqe yaghqaa ut _ .
neqekrangllagh m _ ik elleq suwhaagh a _ tuunekagh _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ agleghnagh u u kan _ , _ taawa _ iingunagh mi _ neqekrangllagh k _ agleghnagh uq _ . _ Ak ghw i _ uqfig m _ agleghnagh kata _ , _ avayagh i llu _ agleghnagh ut _ .
Jews-et _ piitesighaghkagh stun _ ol iv e-em _ uqfigagh tun _ ayuqe ut _ ila i _ avayagh an _ ayemtekagh t _ . _ elpek si _ Gentile- eni _ avayagh stun _ ayuqe usi _ ayemtekagh t _ piitesighagh llghite ngugh meng _ ol iv e-em _ uqfigagh neng _ . _ taameng _ uqfig meng _ , _ kitum _ tugu luku _ avayagh _ nekegtekunigu _ piitesighaghkagh mun _ ol iv e-em _ uqfigagh nun _ , _ allgegh te yaghqaa uq _ akugh m _ mesugh aneng _ piite na pigte lghii meng _ .
sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ pinigh aghagh ni lusi _ avayagh neng _ ayemtekagh neng _ . _ Qukaayug tegpenasi _ , _ qayughllak _ avayagh raaghinagh u usi _ . _ akugh t _ iknaqugh te sigat asi _ , _ akugh u ut _ iknaqugh sagh ilghiit _ elpesi neng _ .
iwernga _ pi lleqe usi _ , _ " _ aa-a _ , _ avayagh t _ ayemtekau ut _ nekegte na luta _ uqfig mun _ . _ "
taana _ ipa u uq _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ayemte aqe ai _ avayagh t _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe nghite kangat _ ellnga _ . _ iwernga _ elpek si _ nekegte stekaqe aisi _ uqfig mun _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kesi _ ellnga _ . _ enkaam _ qukaayug tegpenasi _ , _ yeghlegi _ alinge tek _ .
Jews-et _ av ayagh pig aagut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ayemtekaqe ta aneng _ av ayagh pig aat _ , _ taawa _ elpek si llu _ ayemte lleqe aisi _ uqfig meng _ nagnegh te nghite kufsigu _ ugpegh llegh i _ .
enkaam _ liigikagh i _ kiyaghnegh _ nangllegtagh uq _ , _ aghyuutagh pigte uq llu _ . _ aghyuugh aqe ai _ seghleghqekagh t _ , _ iwernga _ nanglleg ke aqe aisi _ neghyuke manginagh nghpesigu _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ . _ iwernga _ neghyuke nanigh ma kufsigu _ elpek si llu _ kepe te lleqe aisi _ .
Jews-et _ ugpeqe nqigtekumegteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ nekeggneqigte lleqe ai _ uqfig mun _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ aghtughyaghqaanghill elgu uq _ nekeggneqigte yaghqaa luki _ ne ke yagh ka itgun _ .
elpek si _ Gentile- eni _ avayagh pig ke nghite aisi _ piitesighaghkagh m _ ol iv e-em _ uqfig an _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ kepe kaqe aisi _ piitesighagh llghite ngugh meng _ ol iv e-em _ uqfigagh neng _ . _ taagken _ nekegtekaqe aisi _ piitesighaghkagh mun _ ol iv e-em _ uqfigagh nun _ , _ qaywa _ yug t _ nekegte i igate yagh nga a ta _ uqfig mun _ tawatel ngughmeng _ avayagh meng _ . _ Jews-et _ piitesighaghkagh meng _ ol iv e-em _ uqfigagh neng _ pi u te meggneng _ , _ kiyaghnegh mi _ piyaqnagh u i te ut _ nekeggneqigte yaghqaa luki _ ellngit a _ katam _ uqfig itnun _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ liigike sug amsi _ sa meng _ qayvighte ma ite ngugh meng _ sivugh nghaani _ . _ Ap el uug usi qa _ elpesi nun _ un anguuq _ : _ peghqin ghu yug negh uf qaafsi _ pis qellusi _ sumeghtaghagh llegh gpesigun _ . _ ila ita _ Israel-eghmiit _ ugpeqe yug mangite aat _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ tawatete lleqe ut _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ Gentile-et _ qamagte luteng _ tagi laghate te llegh itnun _ ellmi nun _ .
taagken _ qamagte luteng _ Israel-eghmiit _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe ut _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga lghii _ , _ " _ yuguligh i sta _ tagi lleqe uq _ Z i on -meng _ ; _ iqite lleqe ai _ qamagte luki _ seghlegh t _ king ungh aneng _ Jacob -em _ .
taana _ akequsagh ke aqa _ ellngit nun _ iqite kumki _ seghleghqe llegh it _ . _ "
Jews-et _ ighsake kaqe ait _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ anguyag ke ai _ . _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ Gentile- eni _ kiyaghnegh m _ atuqe kaqe a _ ighsake i llegh at _ quya ste na lusi _ . _ iwernga _ Jews-et _ paninang _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ yug t _ . _ piniqe manginagh u ai _ apallugh ke luku _ akequsagh ni _ sivun ghitnun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ umyugagh gni _ allangughte qaghte naanghite ak _ . _ veghte naanghite ai _ tunusagh ni _ , _ pegge naanghite ai llu _ nakmikegkagh ni _ ellmi nun _ yugu luki _ .
sivugh nghaani _ elpek si _ Gentile- eni _ qaatk ellghi taghsi _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ allgegh taghsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ qayughllak _ Jews-et _ qaatke te nghite ngugh t _ .
maaten _ Jews-et _ qaatke te igate ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ enkaam _ nanglleg ke aqe aisi _ Gentile- eni _ . _ iwernga _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ ellngit a llu _ allgegh lleqe aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ .
Qamagtengngwaagh luteng _ yug t _ qaatke igate aat _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ qaatke te nghite llegh at _ anusimingllaghvig tun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tawavek _ kanaghte aqe kangi _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe uq _ nanglleg ke na luki _ qamagte luki _ .
kaay _ , _ seghlegh ghllag u ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ aklungi i _ , _ peghqinellegh a _ , _ liisima llegh a llu _ ! _ kitum ngam _ liigike u aghte lleqe aki _ nanqigte i llegh i _ ? _ kitum ngam _ liigike u aghte lleqe aki _ iglegh neghi _ ?
katam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga lghii _ , _ " _ kitum _ liisima kakek _ umyugagh kek _ Atanghem _ ? _ kitum ngam _ aleghqugh lleqe agu _ apaqu tete na luku _ ?
kitum _ alngunak _ salisigataguu- u _ atanegh _ , _ atanegh mun _ llivike sqellug qu _ uteghmun _ ? _ "
sa u a _ qamagte luni _ ellnga neng _ pi u uq _ , _ ellnga kun _ pi u uq _ , _ ellnga nun llu _ pi u uq _ . _ ellnga _ usuqe lleg nge li _ quunperugllag _ ! _ amen _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ nangllegtagh pigtu ta aneng _ , _ elngaatall _ kayeme amsi _ tuun esqelluki _ yugusigh si _ kiyaghnegh mun _ unguva lghii u luki _ aghqe te t _ . _ pelungite lit _ , _ tugukligh yugnagh lit llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ Taananguuq _ maniguute lleg pig i _ .
U um _ nuna m _ yug atun _ kiyaghte gpenasi _ . _ yeghlegi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ allangughte stek _ nutaghte ste luki _ umyugagh si _ . _ taagken _ liigik elleq aghsi _ piyuke llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ pinigh lghii _ , _ tugukligh yugnagh lghii _ , _ qamag tii ngwaagh ng alghii llu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tuune kaqe ta aneng _ tunute yameng _ apostle- ngulunga _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinun _ pi unga _ : _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenasi _ elpesi neng _ pinigh aghagh ni lusi _ ayuqe llegh gpesineng _ . _ yeghlegi _ ipapigh qellusi _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe tek _ ugpeqillegh tu leg pesigun _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh akun _ elpesi nun _ .
yugusigh put _ nalighneghtu pigte ut _ , _ tam agh aghmi _ nalighnegh _ alla tun _ sa yaghqaa uq _ .
uglagh yagh ghngaamta _ , _ ataasi gu kut _ Christ-am _ yugusigh ani _ . _ enkaam _ whangkuta _ nalighnegh ni _ whangkunneng _ pi ku tukut _ .
qamagte luta _ allake te lghii neng _ tunusagh lgu ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh aneng _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ . _ tunusagh ut _ ungipagh ke i u kan _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ ungipagh ke i lta _ ugpeqe i lleghtu ta leg mtestun _ .
tunusagh ut _ qepghagh te i u kan _ , _ qepghagh te i lta _ , _ apeghtugh i u kan _ , _ apeghtugh i lta _ ;
kayeme i u kan _ ila meng _ , _ kayeme i lta _ ; _ tuune i u kan _ , _ ighleg gpenaamta _ tuune i lta _ ; _ igleghte te i u kan _ , _ sagiqe luta _ igleghte te i lta _ ; _ nanglleg ke i u kan _ , _ quyake sigh ke luku _ nanglleg ke i lta _ .
piniqe tek _ ipapigh qellusi _ . _ ugumi ke luku _ seghlegh _ , _ piyuke manginagh teggu _ sa u a _ pinigh lghii _ .
piniqe te utek _ anglegute ke te lghii stun _ . _ Quul v aa tu taq itek _ pakig gu lluku _ quulv iis qes ullegh pesineng _ .
Taaku ngin aghhaag neng _ qepghagh tek _ , _ ighsani fqaafsi _ . _ sagiqe te luku _ qepghagh ta qite ggu _ atanegh _ qamaken _ ilu gpesineng _ .
quya nga tek _ qayughllak _ sighima lleg lgu usi _ , _ nuqete aqe tek _ nekeggmell usi _ seghleliigh negh gpesini _ , _ yughagh aqe tek llu _ iiwleng _ .
Ugpeq aalgu teg pesinun _ aklu lghii nun _ tuune i aqe tek _ , _ upugha ta iqe tek _ kinku neng _ alngunak _ .
yughagh te kaqe teki _ amyuqetaatk iste si _ kiyaghnegh mun _ quyas tesqelluki _ , _ nakaan _ aqnigh tesqelluki _ .
quya lgusigh aqe teki _ tamaakut _ quya lghiit _ , _ qiya lgusigh aqe teki _ tamaakut _ qiya lghiit _ .
kiyaghte tek _ nekegg me tull usi _ . _ Qukaayug tegpenasi _ yeghlegi _ ila ke teki _ ukav an t alghiit _ . _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenasi _ peghqin gh un ilusi _ ila gpesineng _ .
kitum _ seghletun _ pi kangisi _ , _ akite gpenaki _ seghletun _ . _ pi aqe teki _ pinigh lghiit _ tugukligh yugnagh lghiit _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
pi yaghqaa kan _ , _ pi aqe teggu _ sa u a _ pi yaghqagh i _ kiyagh tesqellusi _ nekeggmell usi _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ akiniigh naqe gpenaki _ seghletun _ pis tesi _ , _ itupill _ pegte ki _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh anun _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga lghii _ whaten _ , _ " _ whanga u uq _ aghyuugh i yaghqagh _ , _ whanga u uq _ akiniigh yaghqagh _ , _ pi uq _ atanegh _ . _ "
igaqe nga uq llu _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ " _ anguyag n _ iyatagh u u kan _ neghe ste naken _ , _ meqsug u kan _ meghsi naken _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuvgu _ naasqw akun _ may- ughte vike lleqe an _ kumang alghiimeng _ co al -meng _ . _ "
kayaalqe ste gpenasi _ seghlegh mun _ , _ itupill _ kayaalqe teggu _ seghlegh _ pinitun _ pi llegh kun _ .
tamaghhagh mi _ qaatke te yaghqaa uq _ aangwaagh ugh tek anun _ igleghut ist enun _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ igleghte te i ste u naanghite uq _ wetku qun _ kiyaghnegh m _ igleghte te i ste ngughte stekunigu _ . _ igleghte te i ste u ut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekegtekaqe ai _ igleghut is qelluki _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ qaatke nghite kumiki _ igleghutistet _ , _ qaatke igate ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ . _ enkaam _ aghyuugh ste lleqe uq _ .
pinitun _ pikayug t _ alike igate ait _ igleghutistet _ , _ iwernga _ seghletun _ pikayug t _ alike yaghqaqe ait _ . _ alike yu nghite kufsiki _ igleghutistet _ , _ pinitun _ pi tek _ , _ enkaam _ usuqe lleqe aisi _ .
Igleghut istet _ kiyaghnegh m _ qepghagh tekii _ aneghnegh qellegh qagh pesinun _ . _ iwernga _ seghletun _ pi kufsi _ , _ alike nakesi _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh ma ai _ aghyuugh esqelluki _ seghletun _ pikagh t _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ qepghagh tekii _ , _ aghyuugh i stekagh i llu _ seghletun _ pi lghii nun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qaatke teki _ igleghutistet _ . _ qaatke teki _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aghyuugh tes unghil nguusi _ . _ iwernga _ taan anginaq _ apallugh u nghite uq _ . _ qaatke teki _ qayughllak _ liisimakagh i _ qaatke te llegh _ elqughute nga uq _ .
taake uk llu _ apallugh ke lukek _ llivike aqe asi _ tax - esi _ , _ qayughllak _ igleghutistet _ qepghagh u ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qepghagh katen _ pi nghmegteki _ .
Enkaangam _ tax -et _ aseng esi _ qamagte luki _ llivike teki _ iglegh utes teg pesinun _ . _ sii vag qite ki llu _ quulvagh tek illu _ qamagte luki _ .
asenge gpenaan _ kina _ alngunak _ , _ iwerngaqun _ piniqe llegh i _ aseng ek ngin agh teggu _ ila gpesinun _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkumiki _ yug lgute ni _ qaat keng ngw ii _ iingunagh ita _ liilightuusagh t _ .
igaqe nga ut _ liilightuusagh ni _ whaten _ , _ " _ gelgaghniigh gpenang _ , _ yugtagh gpenang _ , _ tegleg gpenang _ , _ qiliiqetu iqe gpenang _ . _ " _ qaatke lleqe aten _ taakut _ qelegh sagh t _ , _ alngunak llu _ qelegh sagh t _ , _ qaatke gkuvgu _ una _ qelegh sagh _ : _ " _ piniqe luku _ yug lgute n _ piniqe llegh gpetun _ elpeneng _ . _ "
kina _ alngunak _ piniqe i kuni _ yug lgute mineng _ , _ seghletun _ pi naanghite ai _ . _ piniqe i llegh mikun _ qaatke te u uq _ ii- u nigh itnun _ liilightuusagh t _ .
tamaakut _ pi teki _ qayughllak _ liisimakagh i _ pi lleghqagh _ kaate ma uq _ . _ qavagh lghii stun _ ayuqe usi _ iwernga _ maaten _ taghtugh yaghqaaghte usi _ . _ yuguligh llegh ut _ tugh aagh tuq _ ugpegh yuggaagh lleg mnneng _ .
unuk _ alpag yaghtugh uq _ , _ whaa _ aghte yaghtugh ngestagh aa _ . _ taaqe lteki ngam _ atuqe nghmeng _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ pi aqe kangit _ mamleg mi _ . _ enkaam _ tugu lteki _ pi llu waa sigh qat _ nighug mi _ .
pinitun _ kiyaghte lta _ katam _ yug stun _ kiyaghte lghiit _ nighug ani _ aghnegh m _ . _ seghletun _ teghigniqe fqaamta _ , _ suume fqaamta _ , _ alngunak _ sex-kun _ seghleghqe fqaamta _ , _ pilluw u tef qaamta _ , _ aqina te fqaamta _ .
itupill _ akul gh aagh estun _ aate ggu _ atanegh _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ , _ sumeghtaghagh tke fqiita llu _ atuqe na luki _ yugusigh gpesi _ piyuke llegh it _ .
upugha teggu _ yuug _ ugpeqillegh q estaaghh aq _ akule gpesinite ngughk _ . _ aaghtiiraagh sigh ke gpenaan _ sa u a _ u peq egkaa _ elqughute nga ta a _ nalighmeng _ anaggute nga ta a _ .
ataasigh m _ yug m _ ugpeqe a _ negh yaghqaa ni luni _ alngunak _ neqe meng _ . _ iwernga _ yuug _ ugp ellegh q estaaghh aq _ negh aqe uq _ nunivagseghagh ghhagh inagh meng _ .
yug m _ neghe kayug m _ alngunak _ neqe meng _ , _ siiv akl igu _ yuug _ neqagh yu k _ nunivagseghagh ghhagh inagh meng _ . _ yug m _ neghe kayug m _ nunivagseghagh ghhagh inagh meng _ , _ nanqigte nghite ligu _ yuug _ neqagh yu k _ alngunak _ neqe meng _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh ma a _ .
kina u ni luten _ pi aqe ziin _ nanqigte i lghii _ kitum _ qepghagh teng aneng _ ? _ Qepghagh tem _ pi liite i ste inagh te _ nanqigte lleqe a _ pinitun _ pi ma ta a _ nalighmeng _ seghletun _ pi ma ta a _ . _ Atanghem _ qepghaghte nga _ pinitun _ pi lleqe uq _ qayughllak _ Atanghem _ kayusigh yaqleg uk anga _ pinitun _ pi sqellug qu _ .
yug m _ ugpeqe a _ ataasigh _ aghneq _ megnu nagh aghagh ni luku _ ila itneng _ aghnegh neng _ . _ ila yan _ yug m _ ugpeqe ai _ qamagte luteng _ aghnegh t _ tawatel kun niluki _ . _ tamaghhagh mi _ yug m _ umyugagh gni _ ataasiigh tengngwaagh l ikek _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ megnu nagh luku _ aghneq _ tawaten _ pi aqe uq _ quulv aghnaluku _ atanegh _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ neghe gkunigu _ alngunak _ neqe _ tawaten _ pi aqe uq _ quulv aghnaluku _ atanegh _ , _ qayughllak _ iyamsiqa yug vike aqe kanga _ kiyaghnegh _ neqe meng _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ neghyu nghite kumiki _ ila i _ neqe t _ tawaten _ pi aqe uq _ quulv aghnaluku _ atanegh _ , _ iyamsiqa yug vike aqe kanga llu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
unguva igate ukut _ whangkunnun _ , _ tuqu igate ukut llu _ whangkunnun _ .
unguva kumta _ , _ atanegh mun _ unguva u ukut _ . _ tuquma kumta _ , _ atanegh mun _ tuqu lleqe ukut _ . _ enkaam _ unguva yagh ghngaamta _ nalighmeng _ tuqu yagh ghngaamta _ Atanghem _ pi ke ainkut _ .
Christ-a _ tuqu luni _ , _ unguvagh tekaaguq _ Atangh un aluni _ unguva lghii nun llu _ tuqukagh nun llu _ .
elpek si _ , _ sangan _ nanqigte aqe steki _ ugpeqaalgu tesi _ ? _ sangan llu _ siiv ak ig as teki _ ugpeqaalgu tesi _ ? _ neqamike luku _ , _ qamagte luta _ nekeve yaghqaa ukut _ sivungagh kun _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ ellnga nun _ nanqig tesqelluta _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ atanegh _ pi uq _ , _ qayughllak _ whanga _ unguva lghiinga _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ tamaghhagh mi _ yuug _ segesqughte uute lleqe uq _ whanga mnun _ , _ tamaghhagh mi llu _ yug m _ usuqe lleqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ "
enkaam _ qamagte luta _ kiyaghnegh mun _ apegh yaghq aqaghput _ sa llegh ut _ , _ sangan llu _ tawaten _ pim at fut _ .
Enkaangam _ taaqe lta _ nanqig tun neghmeng _ . _ yeghlegi _ , _ umyugagh put _ ataasiighte lteki _ ugpeqaalgut fut _ naagte ste fqaan _ nalighmeng _ seghleghqe ste gpenaan _ pi steggu _ .
atanegh kun _ Jesus-kun _ liisimakngwaagh aqa _ avangite uq _ iinghutekagh meng _ neqe meng _ . _ iwernga _ yug m _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ sa u a _ iinghute kau luku _ , _ taawa _ ellnga ni _ iinghute kau uq _ .
ugpeqagh u lguten _ uniigh miqe ma kan _ sa meng _ neghekagh gpeneng _ , _ taawa _ piniqe nanigh magh an _ . _ neghekagh gpenun _ naafqe ste gpenaan _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ Christ-am _ tuquma tkekagh a _ .
ugpeqe gkan _ pinigh uq _ ; _ akuzi tke ste gpenaan _ seghleghu luku _ .
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ sa u aat _ neghekagh put llu _ meghekagh put llu _ megnu nagh nghite ut _ . _ ukut _ megnu nagh ut _ : _ elqughutngagh llegh _ , _ nekeggmellegh _ , _ quya llegh llu _ ; _ taakut _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ pi u ut _ .
taakut _ atuqe luki _ qepghagh te i lghii m _ Christ-amun _ , _ efqugh lleqaa _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ itagnagh kete lleqe aat llu _ yug t _ .
enkaam _ atugh lteggu _ nekeggmellegh nge ste i yaghqagh _ , _ kayemughtu te lta llu _ ugp ellegh tugh tagh aghnal uta _ .
naafqe gpenaan _ kiyaghnegh m _ qepghagh llegh a _ apallugh ke luku _ neqe _ . _ qamagte luni _ neqe _ negh yaghqaa uq _ , _ iwernga _ anaggute nga uq _ neghe lleghqagh _ alngunak _ neqe meng _ seghleghqe ste i yaghqagh _ kitu meng _ .
itagnagh yaghqaa uq _ kemekragtu nghite llegh _ , _ wine- e tun ghi telleq _ , _ sa u a llu _ alngunak _ naagte ste i yaghqagh _ ugpeqaalgu teg pesinun _ .
kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh llu _ liisimake yaghqaqe atek _ tamaakut _ ugpeqekagh ten _ . _ quya nga aqe uq _ yuug _ atuqe nghminiki _ ugpeqekagh ni _ elqughute nga ni luki _ seghleghni tke gpenaki _ .
iwernga _ yug m _ neghekagh ni _ , _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ anaggute nga ni luku _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe a _ qayughllak _ pi nghite kanga _ sa u a _ ugpeqekagh ni _ . _ sa u a _ alngunak _ ugpeqekagh ni _ anaggute nga ni luku _ atuqe ma kunigu _ seghleghqe lleqe uq _ .
whangkuta _ ugpeqe i lleghtuqagh ni _ kayusiite yaghqaqe aput _ ugpeqillegh q estaaghh aat _ seghleliigh nghata _ . _ E f qugh saghq aanghi tukut _ whangkunneng _ .
itupill _ , _ tamaghhagh emta _ efqugh hnaq el teggu _ ugpeqaalgut fut _ ellnga n _ katam _ pinighqe lleghqagh anun _ , _ ugpeqillegh tugh tesqelluku _ .
talwa _ Christ-a _ efqugh sim angituq _ ellmi neng _ katam _ . _ yeghlegi _ igaqe kau uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ " _ yug t _ seghlequ ulghiit _ elpeneng _ , _ seghlequ ull ghit _ tekite aqe ut _ whanga mkun _ . _ "
sivugh nghaani _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ igaqe kau ut _ apeghtugh na luta _ . _ nuqete neghtu ste ainkut _ , _ kayeme ainkut llu _ sighima lleg nge na yukagh mta _ .
nuqete neghtu llegh nkuk _ , _ kayeme llegh nkuk _ kiyaghneghtagh u uk _ . _ ellnga n _ kiyaghtes li si _ itagnagh kete te lusi _ katam _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ pillgh atun _ .
taagken _ qamagte lusi _ qerngagh gpesi _ ataasigh stun _ usuq elleq aghsi _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ata a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ tugukligh utu tete lusi _ katam _ Christ-am _ tugukligh kayugu kangisi _ elpek si _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ yug t _ usuqe lleqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
amenqun _ Christ-a _ qepghagh tengugh te kaalghii _ Jews-enun _ liigik esqelluki _ kiyaghnegh _ iiwleng _ ip ap ii quq _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ Jews-et _ liisimakngwaagh aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi yaghqaqe ai _ akequsagh kekagh ni _ sivun ghitnun _ .
Christ-a _ tagi kau lghii llu _ Gentile-enun _ usuqe sqellug qu _ kiyaghnegh _ nangllegtagh llegh anun _ . _ igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ " _ Enkaangam _ usuqe lleqe amken _ akule itni _ Gentile-et _ , _ ilagagh lleqe unga llu _ usuqe i llegh meng _ ategh gpenun _ . _ "
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq llu _ whaten _ , _ " _ Gentile- eni _ , _ quya tek _ maligte te lusi _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ ! _ "
alla _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ usuqe teggu _ atanegh _ , _ qamagte lusi _ Gentile- eni _ ; _ usuqe teggu _ , _ qamagte lusi _ yug ni _ ! _ "
Isai ah _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ K ingun gha _ Jes s e- m _ tagi lleqe uq _ igleghte te na luki _ Gentile-et _ , _ enkaam _ ellnga kun _ sighima lleqe ut _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh u uq _ sighima ste i lghii _ . _ imigh lisi _ quya llegh ghllag meng llu _ nekeggmellegh meng llu _ ugpeqe llegh gpesigun _ ellnga _ . _ taagken _ sighima lleg nge aghagh lleqe usi _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ liisimakngwaagh amsi _ pi niigh pigte usi _ yug ni _ . _ liisimake aqa llu _ liigikngwaagh luki _ ayuqe asi _ apeghtuusagh t _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ apeghtuusaq leg waa si _ ila itnun _ .
iwernga _ te tull ngun anga _ lata kaqe amsi _ sa meng _ ila itneng _ negh ka ughte na lusi _ tamaaken _ . _ tawaten _ lata unga _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusug ightugh aanga _ 
qepghaghte ngulunga _ Christ _ Jesus-mun _ Gentile-enun _ . _ Priest- etun _ ayuqe aqe unga _ ungipagh ke i negh mni _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ Gentile-enun _ . _ tawaten _ ungipagh kau iqe unga _ ellngit _ tunusagh tun _ ayuq esqelluki _ tugukligh yugnagh lghii _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ agleghnagh ste a _ tunusagh _ .
enkaam _ qukaayug taqu nga _ qepghaqagh mneng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ .
akuzite kete yaghqaqe anka _ Christ-am _ apeghiighkagh ghhagh inagh i _ whanga mkun _ . _ ellnga u uq _ Gentile- eneng _ qaatke te ste i lghii _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ungipagh ke i lleg mkun llu _ qepghaqagh mkun llu _ .
tawaten _ pi kau uq _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ allaaghlluwhaght illgh et _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgh akunllu _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ . _ ungipagh ke u aqe aqe anka _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ Christ-ameng _ ayuqe lghiit _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ Jerusalem-emeng _ taag av erugllak _ I ll y ri cum -emun _ .
iiwleng _ piyuke llegh kesagh aqa _ ungipagh ke na luki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ nuna ni _ nagaqugh te igate ngugh ni _ Christ-ameng _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau unga _ qayughllak _ nekefte i yug u nghite ngugh u nga _ tunemagh kun _ ila yan _ yug m _ piinlighkagh akun _ .
katam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga lghii _ whaten _ , _ " _ tamaakut _ salin _ ungipaate igate ngugh t _ ellnga neng _ , _ esghagh lleqe aat _ , _ salin llu _ nagaqugh te igate ngugh t _ ellnga neng _ , _ liigike lleqe aat _ . _ "
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ uglagh ghngaan _ elpesi nun _ pipagningite aqe unga _ qayughllak _ ila itni _ nuna ni _ ungipagh kau iqe lghiinga _ .
iwernga _ maaten _ apeghiigh aqa _ qepghaqagh ka _ maani _ . _ uglagh lghii ni _ ayumiqullegh ni _ elpesi nun _ piyug pigte aqe yagh unga _ ,
enkaam _ sunanguq _ maaten _ laalighfike lamsi _ S p a in -mun _ pi tkellug qu _ . _ laalighte te aghte lleg mta _ kingu aneng _ sunanguq _ kayusigh tengnga _ aghulaqe naqe gkuma _ S p a in -mun _ .
iwernga _ elpesi nun _ pi vagilgama _ , _ Jerusalem - men naq aqunga _ kayusiite na luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ tamaan lenguut _ .
ugpeqagh t _ Macedonia- mel nguutlu _ , _ A ch a ia- mel nguutlu _ quyake sigh ke luku _ tuune i kau ut _ mani meng _ kayusiite na luki _ akluma lghiit _ akulng it nilnguut _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug an _ Jerusalem-emi _ .
quyake sigh ke luku _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ . _ taakut _ Gentile-et _ aseng em iit _ Jews-et _ qayughllak _ allgegh te kau lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste i llegh aneng _ ellngitgun _ . _ enkaam _ Gentile-et _ kayusigh yaghqaqe ait _ Jews-et _ ugpeqe ait _ Jerusalem -em el nguut _ tuyugh luki _ mani meng _ .
whaa _ kel qen naqaqa _ Gentile-et _ mani at _ Jews-enun _ . _ apeghiigh kumkun _ una _ qepghaqagh _ tuune luku _ mat- ni _ ellngit nun _ , _ laalighfike yaghtugh lleqe amsi _ , _ taagken _ S p a in - ellequ nga _ .
liisimake aqa _ kaate kuma _ elpesi nun _ , _ pi lgu lleqe unga _ Christ-am _ iingunagh an _ quya ste llegh aneng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ atanegh mteggun _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ , _ piniqe llegh akun llu _ taghneghagh m _ , _ maligte te lusi _ whanga mnun _ yughagh tke ghllag qaghte ngnga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ kayusii tesqell unga _ .
yughaghte k _ kiyaghnegh mun _ p aq niigh s iisqell unga _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh neng _ Judea- mi _ . _ yughagh tke teggu llu _ qepghaqagh ka _ Jerusalem-emi _ tugukligh yugnigh sqellug qu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ .
taagken _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ , _ elpesi nun _ pi lleqe unga _ quya lleg ligh ghllag lunga _ , _ enkaam _ pinigh y uug g neqig llequnga _ laalighfike ma lusi _ .
kiyaghnegh _ nekeggmell elit ilghii _ tam aghagh pesi nilli _ . _ amen _ .
ungipaate yug amsi _ ugpeqaalgutem nneng _ , _ Ph o eb e-meng _ . _ pinigh lghii u uq _ d e ac on es s -a _ ugpeqagh nun _ qerngughte te kayug nun _ yughaghvig ani _ C en ch re a e- m _ .
upugha tete nakesi _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ pii qell ghistun _ qayughllak _ Atanghem _ pi ke aa _ . _ Kay utk es unghi si _ kayusigh aqe luku _ qayughllak _ kayute ghllag u uq _ uglagh lghii nun _ yug nun _ , _ whanga mnun llu _ talwa _ .
ungipaate aghte nakegsi _ P ris c ill a-nkuk _ A qu il a-nkuk _ suumqagh ke agka nguq _ . _ qepghagh lgutke agka _ Christ _ Jesus-mun _ .
talwa _ tuqute lleghqagh ek _ pi tke gpenaan _ p aq niigh saghqaq aag ne nga _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ iyamsiqa yug ghllagu unga _ el k egk eneng _ . _ qamagte luteng llu _ ugpeqagh t _ Gentile-et _ yughaghvig it nilnguut _ iyamsiqa yug u ut _ .
ungipaate aghte nakesi _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte te kayug t _ mangteghagh gkeni _ suumqagh ke anka nguq _ . _ ungipaate aghte nakesi _ piniqe kaqe a _ E p a en e tu s _ suumqagh ke aqa nguq _ . _ Asi a-mi _ ellnga _ ugpegh yuggaagh kau uq _ Christ-akun _ .
ungipaate aghte nakesi _ mary _ suumqagh ke aqa nguq _ ; _ qevuute luni _ qepghagh te kaqe aisi _ .
ungipaate aghte nakegsi _ An dr onic us-enkuk _ J uni as-enkuk _ Jew - lgu teg ka _ , _ anusimingllaghagh lgu tke kaqe agka llu _ , _ suumqagh ke agka nguq _ . _ Apostle- nguuk _ yug t _ liisimake u aqe ke t _ ; _ sivu mni _ ugpeqagh ughtekau uk _ .
ungipaate aghte nakesi _ Am p li atu s _ , _ piniqe kaqe a _ atanegh kun _ , _ suumqagh ke aqa nguq _ .
Un ip aat aghh nakesi _ U r b an us _ , _ qepgh algut fut _ Christ-amun _ , _ piniqe kaqe a llu _ S ta ch y s _ , _ suumqagh ke agka nguq _ .
ungipaate aghte nakesi _ Ap ell es _ suumqagh ke aqa nguq _ . _ nanghiighsaghagh lleg nge aqngami _ ipapigh qegk aqaa _ ataasigh mi tell eni _ Christ-amun _ . _ ungipaate aghte nakesi _ nengllug utangi _ A ris t ob ul us-em _ suumqagh ke anka nguq _ .
ungipaate aghte nakesi _ Herod i on _ , _ Jew - elg utk a _ , _ suumqagh ke aqa nguq _ . _ ungipaate aghte nakesi llu _ ugpeqagh t _ nengllugut ang anilnguut _ N ar cis s us-em _ suumqagh ke anka nguq _ .
ungipaate aghte nakegsi _ T r y ph a en a-nkuk _ T r y ph os a-nkuk _ suumqagh ke agka nguq _ . _ taake uk _ aghnagh k _ qepghaghte nguuk _ atanegh mun _ . _ ungipaate aghte nakesi llu _ piniqe kaqe a _ P er si s _ , _ suumqagh ke aqa nguq _ ; _ qevute luni _ qepghaqagh u uq _ atanegh mun _ .
ungipaate aghte nakegsi _ R uf us-enkuk _ naa ke te lghiik _ , _ suumqagh ke agka nguq _ . _ rufus _ Atanghem _ nakmike kaqe a _ , _ naa an llu _ ighnegh ke lghii stun _ pi aqe aanga _ .
ungipaate aghte nakesi _ A s y n c r itu s -enkut _ , _ Ph leg on -enkut _ , _ Her mes -enkut _ , _ P at ro b as -enkut _ , _ Her m as -enkut _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ ugpeqaalgu tet _ ellng it nilnguut _ , _ suumqagh ke anka nguq _ .
ungipaate aghte nakegsi _ Phil ol o g us-enkuk _ , _ Jul ia- nkuk _ , _ N ere us-enkuk _ nayag ke te lghiik _ , _ O l y m pas -llu _ qamagte luki llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ ellng it nilnguut _ , _ suumqagh ke anka nguq _ .
quyake te aqe tek _ naagh te meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh akun _ . _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ Christ-am _ yughaghvig anilnguut _ , _ liisimake sug aisi _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ qelegh amsi _ kelengas qellusi _ tamaakuneng _ aafqugh te ste i kayug neng _ , _ tunute ste i lghii neng _ yug t _ ugpeqe i llegh itneng _ , _ kipullgin aalghii neng _ apeghtuusagh neng _ liitekagh gpesineng _ . _ iqite nga tek _ tamaakuneng _ .
yug t _ tawaten _ pikayug t _ qepghagh te u nghite aat _ Christ-a _ atanegh ut _ . _ Taaw angin aghhaq _ ellmeng _ katam _ efqugh kekagh ghhagh inagh teng _ pi aqe ait _ . _ apeghtugh i negh meggni _ akuz itegh lluwh aat _ atuqe aqe ait _ , _ us uqu ugh taq iitlu _ yug t _ puughhe na luki _ puughte yuguma lghiit _ .
qamagte luteng _ yug t _ nagaqugh ma ut _ qaatke te nga llegh i _ atanegh mun _ , _ enkaam _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ quyake ghllagu amsi _ . _ Pegh qin ghus ug amsi _ sa mun _ pinigh lghii mun _ , _ iwernga _ anaggutell ngun asi _ seghlegh mun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nekeggmell elit ilghii m _ qantaghaqun _ kagimte lleqe a _ tughneghagh _ itegagh gpesi _ asi ani _ . _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ nangllegtagh li _ elpesi nun _ .
Qepgh algut ma _ Timoth y- m _ , _ Jew - l gut m allu _ L uc i us -enkut _ , _ J as on -enkut _ , _ S o si p ate r -enkut _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ .
T er ti us -ngu unga _ , _ igagh te aqe aqa _ Paul _ lata aneng _ . _ whanga llu _ suumqagh ke amsi _ atanegh kun _ .
whanga _ Paul _ , _ G ai us - me taqunga _ . _ mangteghagh ani _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte te kayugu ut _ . _ ellnga n llu _ ugpeqagh t llu _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ . _ ne ghllag mta _ mani meng _ aflengake i ste yan _ , _ E r as tus -em _ , _ ugpeqaalgutem tallu _ Qu ar tus -em _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ .
usuqe lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ ! _ ellnga n _ ayep sug igh sagh yaqleg w ii _ ugpeqe i lleg si _ pinigh lghii tgun _ ungipagh tgun _ Jesus _ Christ-ameng _ ayuqe lghii meng _ ungipagh qu manginagh aqe ke mkun _ yug nun _ . _ Taananguuq _ aksaqekagh _ ungipagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ qayvighte ma nge i tke a _ ima _ piinligh yuggaagh llegh aneng _ nuna m _ .
iwernga _ maaten _ , _ piinlegh ite ngugh m _ kiyaghnegh m _ qayvighte ma ai _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ igaqugh llegh itgun _ uuknaliqistet _ . _ qelegh te ma ai _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ lii tesqelluki _ yug nun _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ ellngit nun _ ugpeq esqell un illu _ qaatk esqell un illu _ .
Ellng in aaguq _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ peghqinegh lghii _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ yug t _ usuqe litgu _ quunperugllag _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ ! _ amen _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Paul -meng _ pi u ut _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh aneng _ Jesus _ Christ-amun _ apostle- nguluku _ . _ Ugpeq aal gut fut _ S ost h en es _ whanga mnite uq _ .
lata aqe unga _ kiyaghnegh m _ ugpegh teng itnun _ Cor in th - melngughnun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aaftekagh anun _ yuk nalusi _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ . _ nakmike kaqe aisi llu _ pelung i tesqellusi _ maligte te lusi _ yug lghute ghllag nun _ tam ang anil ngughnun _ , _ yughagh kayug nun _ atanegh mnnun _ Jesus _ Christ-amun _ , _ qamagtengngwaagh luta _ Atan qaghput _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ nanglleg ke lisi llu _ nekeggmell elg us l il sillu _ .
iyamsiqa yug vike aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ nanglleg ke kaqe aisi _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ .
enkaam _ ellnga kun _ aklungi igh i kau usi _ liigike llegh meng llu _ akuzillegh meng llu _ . _ enkaam _ maaten _ liigik ataghagh lleqaghsi _ Christ-a _ , _ akuzitk ataghagh lleq agh sillu _ atanegh _ .
allangughtekagh m llu _ kiyaghtaallegh pesi _ ipapigh qaa _ ungipagh kekagh ut _ Christ-a _ .
agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ tunusagh lgu usi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ , _ utaqa i u lusi _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ tagi nqigte lleghqagh aneng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ugpegh lleg si _ iknaqugh saam angin aghn aa ghii _ kenlanga _ kingulighpigagh mete te _ aghnegh mun _ . _ inqun _ anaggu tellghi tesqellusi _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ nanqigte i kan _ yug neng _ .
Ataa siigh mel nguum _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ ila tesqellusi _ ighnegh minun _ Jesus _ Christ-amun _ atanegh mnnun _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ ategh akun _ pi amsi _ taa qes qellusi _ aaghtiiraagh te nghmeng _ . _ aafqugh te gpenasi _ . _ sumeghtaghagh lleg si llu _ sa naqe lleg si llu _ ataasiighte naqe luki _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ ila ita _ Ch lo e-em _ nengllugut angan _ ungipaate kaqe aatnga _ aaghtiiraagh te aqe ni lusi _ .
ila si nguq _ pi aqe ut _ , _ " _ whanga _ Paul-em _ maligte yaaghtekau nga _ . _ " _ ila si _ , _ " _ whanga _ Ap oll os -em _ . _ " _ ila si _ " _ whanga _ Peter-em _ . _ " _ paninang _ ila si nguq _ pi aqe ut _ , _ " _ whanga _ Christ-am _ maligte yaaghtekau nga _ . _ "
Enkaangam _ qafsin aghq aghsi _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ . _ Paul-em _ qaq ur aatk egkaq i sii _ ? _ paaptaayekagh u tsi _ Paul-em _ ategh akun _ ?
iyamsiqa yug vike aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ paaptaay em angil k egka _ naligh ghhagh inagh i _ iwerngaqun _ C ris p us-enkuk _ G ai us-enkuk _ .
Enkaangam _ kina _ alngunak _ pi naanghite uq _ paaptaay em anil uni _ ategh mkun _ .
( _ atwhay _ paaptaayekagh ke anka llu _ Steph an as -enkut _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ . _ iwernga _ neqamike nghite aqa _ kina _ alla _ alngunak _ paaptaay em at ka _ ) _ .
Christ-am _ paaptaaye ligh sqe mangite aanga _ , _ iwernga _ kayagtekaqe aanga _ ungipaq is qell unga _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ . _ ungipagh ke i igate unga _ atuqe luki _ yug m _ peghqinellegh i _ , _ luuraq _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite lghiite ste na yukagh mkun _ qaquuragh a _ Christ-am _ .
ungipagh _ Christ-am _ tuqu llegh a _ qaquuragh kun _ temngingu uq _ ifla naqe lghii nun _ . _ iwernga _ yuguligh lleg nge lghii ni _ whangkuta _ liisimakagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghi l qaa _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ Pegh qin ghet _ peghqinellegh at _ atugh u nanigh ste lleqe aqa _ . _ liitekagh ghllag t llu _ liite llegh at _ sasii nanigh ste lleqe aqa _ . _ "
enkaam _ sanaq an始ngam _ nuna m _ peghqinegh lghii i _ ? _ San aq an始ngam _ apeghtughiste i _ liilightuusagh t _ ? _ San aq an始ngam _ aaghtiiraagh tet _ ? _ Qamagtengngwaagh luni _ lii tellegh ll allgh at _ sasii nghite uq _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ temngitwha ngllagh kaqe a _ peghqinellegh a _ nuna m _ .
peghqinellegh mikun _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ nuna m _ yug anun _ nalluke lleqe ni luni _ peghqinellegh itgun _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike ai _ yugul in aluki _ qamagte luki _ ugpegh lghiit _ Christ-ameng _ ungipagh kekagh mnneng _ . _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe aat _ taana _ ungipagh kekagh ut _ temngingu ni luku _ .
Jews-et _ esghaate yug aqe ut _ allaaghlluwhaght illegh neng _ ugpeqe na luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ ; _ Gentile-et _ peghqinellegh nge yug aqe ut _ ugpeqe na luku _ ungipagh _ ipa u ta a _ .
iwernga _ paninang _ ungipaq naq ngwaagh put _ Christ-amun _ tuqu tke kaqe ni luki _ qaquuragh kun _ . _ una _ ungipagh _ Jews-en i _ piyaqnagh pigte uq _ ugpeqe yaghqaa luni _ , _ Gentile- eni _ teme igh u u uq _ .
iwernga _ whangkunnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh anun _ Jews -ngugh ngaamta _ , _ Gentile- ngugh ngaamta _ tawatete nghite uq _ . _ Christ-am _ tuqu llegh an _ qaquuragh kun _ liite stekaqe ainkut _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgh anengllu _ peghqinellegh aneng llu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ temngitwha llegh a _ peghqin gh atagh g aghtuq _ yug m _ peghqinellegh aneng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayaate llegh a _ iknaqe aghagh uq _ yug m _ iknaqe llegh aneng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ neqamike luku _ natete yagh u tsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqlugh aqng isi _ . _ qafsinkuuragh ghhagh ni _ peghqin ghu yagh tusi _ nuna m _ yug an _ sumeghtaghagh tke llegh itni _ . _ qafsinkuuragh ghhagh ni _ aghtugh igate yagh usi _ igleghutistet _ , _ nalighmeng _ aklung ilngugh neng _ nengllugute neng _ pi u yagh usi _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ tamaakut _ nall uuq at _ nuna mi _ kayngu s aak naluki _ peghqinegh lghiit _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ kayaal nguut _ nuna mi _ kayngu s aak naluki _ tamaakut _ iknaqe lghiit _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ ukav an le nguutlu _ asit ngin aaq iitlu _ nuna mi _ . _ Tamaa kunguut _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ , _ yug nun _ liigik esqelluki _ sumeghtaghagh tkekagh it _ aangwaagh u luki _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh mi _ aangwaagh u nghite ut _ .
Enkaangam _ kina _ alngunak _ aangaayugte naanghite uq _ nekeve gkuni _ sivungagh ni _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
kiyaghnegh u uq _ tuun iste si _ unguvallegh meng _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ Christ _ Jesus-mun _ tuune ste ainkut _ peghqinellegh meng _ , _ elqughute ste ainkut llu _ kiyaghnegh mi _ , _ aglegh nagh test iin kut u _ , _ iteme te ste ainkut llu _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ .
Enkaangam _ atuqe lteggu _ , _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga lghii _ , _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ aangaayugte yu kuni _ , _ aangaayugte te kete liki _ Atanghem _ apeghiighkagh i _ ellmi nun _ . _ "
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ ungipagh ke i yaghtugh aqngama _ elpesi nun _ , _ atuqe mangite anka _ akuzite t _ liig i ke pagning il k esi _ . _ peghqigh llegh ghllag mkun _ ungipagh ke i yu nghite unga _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ elpesi nun _ .
pakig kaqe anka _ tamaakut _ qayughllak _ ungipagh ke i yu lghiinga _ Jesus _ Christ- angin aghhaghmeng _ tuqu llegh aneng llu _ qaquuragh kun _ .
elpesi nite aqngama _ tetug aatagh kau unga _ , _ alingruugh kau unga _ , _ ungelegtekau unga llu _ .
K uk rag n alghiimeng _ akuzi tke mangite unga _ peghqinegh ghllag m _ akuzi ta aneng _ . _ iwernga _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgh an _ ipapigh qegk aqii _ apeghtugh i llegh nka _ ipa u ta i _ .
Enkaangam _ ugpegh usi _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ , _ nakaan _ apallugh ke luku _ yug m _ peghqinellegh a _ .
Ang tan iitk anun _ ugpeqagh nun _ apeghtuusagh ke aqa _ kiyaghnegh m _ peghqinellegh a _ . _ iwernga _ taana _ peghqinellegh _ nuna meng _ pi u nghite uq _ , _ talwa _ igleghutisteng aneng _ . _ qantaghaqun _ aviighute yaghqaa ut _ .
peghqinellegh _ apeghtuusagh ka _ kiyaghnegh m _ peghqinellegh ke a _ , _ nalluke aat _ yug t _ . _ yug t _ nallukngwaagh yagh kangat _ taana _ peghqinellegh _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ liite ste llegh anun _ . _ talwa _ nuna ngllagh mangite luni _ kiyaghnegh m _ usuqe yaghqaa luta _ pi kaqe ainkut _ peghqinellegh mikun _ .
naligh ghhagh inagh ita _ nuna m _ igleghutisteng ita _ liigike mangite aat _ taana _ peghqinellegh _ . _ liigike kaqsagh kumegteggu _ , _ qaquuragh nayagh nghite aat _ Atan gha _ nighughqell ghem _ .
igaqegkagh ni _ akuzite ni _ igaqe kau uq _ , _ " _ tamaakut _ iye m _ esgh am angil k angi _ , _ tamaakut _ sigute m _ nagaqugh ma ite kangi _ , _ tamaakut _ umyugagh m _ sumeghtaghagh tke ma ite kangi _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqe kaqe ai _ piniq iste minun _ . _ "
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ liigike stekaqe ai _ whangkunnun _ Agleghnalghiig nekun _ taghneghagh gmikun _ . _ taghneghagh m _ yuvghiigh aqe a _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ talwa _ kiyaghnegh m _ qaam n ar ug llag anilnguut _ .
yug m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh a _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke a _ iwerngaqun _ ellnga n _ katam _ taghneghagh gkenka _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh a _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke a _ iwerngaqun _ ellnga n _ katam _ taghneghagh gkenka _ .
nuna m _ taghneghagh aneng _ allgegh te mangite ukut _ . _ yeghlegi _ , _ allgegh tekaq ag put _ taghneghagh k _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi k _ , _ liigike na luki _ qamagte luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh i _ whangkunnun _ .
enkaam _ akuzi igate ukut _ yug m _ peghqinellegh akun _ , _ iwernga _ atuqe aqe aput _ akuzite t _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ apeghtugh tke ai _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe ukut _ apeghtuusaq nemteki _ taghneghagh m _ ipapi llghi _ tamaakunun _ allgegh tekagh nun _ Ag legh nal iig neng _ taghneghagh gneng _ .
iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ allgegh te ma ite ngughk _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ tugukligh i igate uq _ tunusagh neng _ taghneghagh gneng _ pi neng _ . _ tamaakut _ tunusagh t _ temngitwha u ut _ ellnga ni _ . _ liigikepagningite ai _ qayughllak _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ kayusillegh igh inagh u kete te _ liigike yaghqaa uq _ .
yug m _ allgegh tekagh m _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ nanqigte aqe a _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ nanqigte yaghqaqe nghite a _ ellnga _ .
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pill ghistun _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke a _ Atanghem _ sumeghtaghagh llegh a _ . _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ liilightugh naanghite a _ . _ " _ iwernga _ whangkuta _ ugpeqagh ni _ sumeghtaghagh aqe ukut _ Christ-am _ sumeghtaghagh llegh atun _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ elpesi nite aqngama _ aleghqughpagningite kaqe amsi _ aleghqugh w aq ell emtun _ ugpeqagh ghllag t _ . _ yeghlegi _ aleghqugh kaqe amsi _ ugpegh lleg si _ angl ill ghil ngughestun _ ayuqe luki _ . _ ugpeqe i lleg si _ Christ-akun _ taghnughh aghhagh estun _ ayuqe ut _ .
K uk rag n angun aan _ apeghtugh kaqe amsi _ . _ katam _ tawaten _ mamagh ghhagh meng _ meghe ste lghii stun _ pi kaqe amsi _ . _ neqe pig meng _ neghe stepag nigh nge i te kaqe amsi _ qayughllak _ neq epig tugh pagning il nguusi _ salin _ . _ paninang _ maaten _ neqe pigtughpagningite aqe usi _ , _ qayughllak _ ugpeqaanghil ngughestun _ ayuqe usi _ salin _ . _ Liigik es tengngwaagh si _ ugpegh llegh gpesi _ angli nghite llegh a _ aqina llegh gpesigun llu _ aghiva te llegh gpesigun llu _ . _ Ugpeq aanghil ngughestun _ kiyaghteng nguusi _ .
naligh i _ pi nghmini _ , _ " _ whanga _ Paul-em _ maligte yaaghtekau nga _ , _ " _ ila si llu _ pinegh meggni _ , _ " _ whanga _ Ap oll os -em _ maligte yaaghtekau nga _ , _ " _ ugpeqaanghil ngughestun _ pi aqe usi _ .
kinangaawa _ apollos _ ? _ kina u zinga _ whanga _ ? _ Qepghagh tek iinkung _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ kayusiite kaqe amsi _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ Christ-a _ . _ qepghaqagh leg staghhiinagh u ukung _ Atanegh em _ qelegh tekagh aneng _ .
elpek si _ kiyaghnegh m _ piitesighagh vike aisi _ . _ piitesighagh aqe unga _ , _ Ap oll os -em _ meghqe aqe a _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nagu sta qaa _ .
Enkaangam _ kina _ alngunak _ piitesigh u aghagh lghii llu _ meghqe i lghii llu _ ukav an tuq _ . _ kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh _ aange ghllag uq _ nagu ste i kayugu uq _ .
piitesigh u aghagh a llu _ meghqe i sta llu _ tawatel ku tuk _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ akileghtugh yaghqaqe ak _ qepghagh llegh gkenkun _ .
qepghagh lgutke te ukung _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ; _ elpek si _ kiyaghnegh m _ piitesigh u aghagh vike aisi _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ mangteghagh ke aisi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh _ tagivagh qagh a _ atuqe luku _ piinligh kaqe aqa _ qepghaqagh _ elpesi ni _ . _ peghqinegh lghii stun _ tunemagh iqe aqe aqa _ mangteghagh _ ulima yaghqagh _ . _ Jesus _ Christ- angin aaguq _ tunemagh _ , _ alla _ saaghw akun _ tunemaghqagh ite uq _ . _ ila ita _ ulima vike u aat _ qaye akun _ . _ qamagte luni _ piraamsi luni _ ulima li _ .
ila ita _ atugh lleqe aat _ gold -a _ , _ silver- a _ , _ j ew el -a _ , _ ila ita _ unaghsigh _ , _ paligh iqe aq _ vegaagh _ , _ ungagagh llu _ tunemagh kun _ taaggun _ .
sa u a _ atuqekagh ut _ esghagh yaghq aqaghput _ ataasi kagh taam ta _ qamagtengngwaagh luta _ aghneghmi _ tawani _ Christ-am _ nanqigte i lleghqagh ani _ . _ Ken ghem _ esghaghtesaghqagh ke a _ qepghaqagh ut _ nateghtu langa _ .
sa u a _ yug m _ atuqekagh a _ kumagh nghite kuni _ , _ akileghtugh sag nge yaghqaa uq _ .
iwernga _ ila yan _ yug m _ qepghaqagh a _ ifla yaghqaa uq _ kumagh kuni _ , _ akileghtugh sag nge naanghite uq llu _ . _ Naqam enraq _ ellnga _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ kenegh meng _ aane lghii stun _ .
Liisimak ngwaagh aghsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- ke aisi _ . _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh kek _ kiyaghteng nguuk _ ilu gpesini _ !
kitum _ alngunak _ naafqe gkagu _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nga _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ naafqesaghqagh ke a _ ellnga _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nga _ agleghnagh lghii u uq _ . _ elpek si _ temple- ke aisi _ .
kina _ alngunak _ puughte te qugh a mi _ ellmi neng _ pi li _ . _ naligh i _ sumeghtaghagh u u kuni _ liite pagllag kau ni luni _ nuna m _ peghqinellegh aneng _ , _ yeqay _ maligte ligu _ Christ-a _ , _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ temng ingun igh ngaat gu _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuni _ elngaatall _ peghqin gh ugh te piig lleqaa _ .
kiyaghnegh mi _ nuna m _ peghqinellegh a _ temngingu uq _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ Pegh qin ghet _ yug t _ nuna mi _ whani _ kiyaghnegh m _ pipagningite te ste aqe ai _ ellngit a _ katam _ peghqinellegh itgun _ . _ "
igaqe kau uq llu _ , _ " _ Atanghem _ liisimake a _ peghqin ghem _ yug m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh a _ sasii nghite uq _ . _ "
Enkaangam _ kitum _ alngunak _ qukaayug te kete yaghqaqe nghite ai _ sa u aat _ yug t _ pi aqe kangit _ . _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ pinighqe sighqagh ughte stekaqe a _ elpesi nun _ ,
talwa _ Paul _ , _ apollos _ , _ peter- llu _ . _ nuna llu _ una _ , _ unguvallegh llu _ , _ tuqu llegh llu _ , _ sa u a llu _ alngunak _ kiyaghtaallegh melnguq _ maaten _ , _ sa u a llu _ alngunak _ kaate yaghqagh _ , _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ elpek si _ pi kasi _ .
enkaam _ elpek si _ Christ-am _ pi ke aisi _ , _ Christ-a _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi ke aa _ .
sumeghtaghagh tke tekut _ qepghagh tek nil uta _ Christ-amun _ . _ Qepghagh tengu ukut _ apeghtugh i lghiit _ ipapigh qellegh meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghtugh tekagh aneng _ whangkunnun _ .
Christ-am _ qepghagh tengi _ ataasiighmete yaghqaa ut _ .
whanga _ , _ ataasiighmete ni lunga _ qepghagh a _ pi kufsinga _ , _ nalighmeng _ ataasiighmete nghite ni lunga _ kitum _ alngunak _ pi kanganga _ , _ sumeghtaghagh te kete naanghite aqa _ . _ talwa _ whanga mneng _ nanqigte igate unga _ .
nalluke aqa _ sa meng _ anaggute mate ka _ , _ iwernga _ anaggute llghite ni lunga _ pi nghite unga _ . _ Atan ghh iin aam _ nanqigte yaghqaqe aanga _ .
Enkaangam _ wiin _ nanqigte gpenaan _ kina _ alngunak _ s allgh aneng _ . _ Atanghem _ tagi nqigtekuni _ kukegte yaghqaqe ai _ yug t _ ilu it _ aliigh qelluki _ sa u aat _ iigh nga yagh lghiit _ tesqamani _ . _ Al iigh qesaghq aqii _ sangameng _ sa aqe ta i _ . _ taagken _ usuqe yaghqagh t _ tamaakut _ usuqe lleg nge yaghqaa ut _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ Ap oll os - lu _ whangkutung _ uspute aqe u ukung _ . _ usputagh u ukung _ elpesi nun _ liite sqellug qu _ una _ igaqe na lghii _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ . _ " _ qaatke aqe teki _ sa u aat _ igaqe nga lghiit _ akuzite ni _ igaqekagh ni _ . _ " _ naligh ghhagh inagh gpesi _ aangaayugte te kete yaqunaan _ ataasigh _ yuug _ , _ aag llegh a _ ugumi ke luku _ .
kitum _ pinigh aghagh ste isi _ ugpeqaalgu tegpesineng _ ? _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pikagh i _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune ma kangisi _ , _ aangaayugte gpenasi _ . _ ungipagh gpenasi _ whaten _ , _ " _ Sang wa _ qamagte luku _ whanga mneng _ pi kaqe aqa _ . _ "
All gegh tengngwaagh um aagh si _ aklukegk aghsi _ qamagte luku _ ! _ Ak lung ighi ngwaagh lusi _ ayuqe usi _ ! _ Whang ku ngun asi _ umiileg ughte ma usi _ ! _ umiileg u lghiisi tuq _ , _ enkaam _ umiileg u te i lgusigh nayagh amsi _ !
sumeghtaghagh lleg mni _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekegtekaqe ainkut _ apostle- eni _ uk aligh pig aaluta _ yug neng _ . _ anusimingllaghagh stun _ ayuqe ukut _ , _ tuqute yaghqagh stun _ . _ yug t _ qamagtengngwaagh luteng _ , _ yaquleg t llu _ esghapag aqe ainkut _ .
whangkuta _ nallungughtekau ukut _ Christ-a _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ iwernga _ elpek si _ sumegh gpesini _ peghqinegh pigu usi _ ugpeqagh ni _ . _ yug t _ waakigate ainkut _ , _ iwernga _ sumegh gpesini _ elpek si _ nagate aqe aisi llu _ quulv aghaq iisillu _ , _ whangkuta _ pi igate ainkut _ .
Wh av emun _ kenlanga _ neqangisag aqe ukut _ , _ meghyaghqagh isag aqe ukut _ , _ aatkagh isag aqe ukut _ . _ yug t _ qevute kaqe ainkut _ . _ ne ite ukut _ , _ iglegh taag ukut _ quunpeng _ .
qepghagh aqe ukut llu _ qevuute luta _ mani nge na luta _ kiyagh taagh usigh qameng _ . _ Seghl equ ulghiit _ whangkunneng _ pinitun _ aleghqugh aqe aput _ . _ ugpeqagh u te mnneng _ amyuutk enghi nkut _ akuz ilg iig atu kutlu _ akite igate aput llu _ .
Iqleng iq utk enghi nkut _ pinitun _ aleghqugh aqe aput _ tawaten _ pi fqiita _ pisqelluki _ . _ Wh av emun _ kenlanga _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe ainkut _ sakwaagh stun llu _ sasiin ghil ngugh es tunllu _ .
lata u nghite unga _ kayngu yugg nalusi _ . _ iwernga _ piniqe pigte lusi _ whanga _ katam _ taghnughh aq el ghistun _ liilightugh yug aqe amsi _ kiyaghtaalleghqagh gpesineng _ .
qaywa _ apeghtughiste tupig sagh ngaagh pesi _ Christ-ameng _ , _ atatu ghllag nghite usi _ . _ Ugpeq suwh aghaq ng afsi gu _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ nagaqugh luki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ , _ tawani ta _ ata stun _ lliigh kanga _ elpesi nun _ .
Enkaangam _ kiyaghte sug pigte amsi _ whanga mtun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ Timoth y _ kayag tengngwaaq a _ elpesi nun _ . _ ighnegh ke lghii stun _ ayuqe aqa _ atanegh kun _ . _ Ataa siigh melnguq _ ugpeqe aq _ piniqe pigte aqa _ . _ negh ka ughte naagh aisi _ naten _ whanga _ kiyaghte aqe lleg mneng _ Christ-amun _ . _ Tawatel nguq _ kiyaghtaa lleq _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe aqa _ ugpeqagh nun _ tam ang anil ngughnun _ .
ila si _ aangaayug negh ugh taqut _ , _ qayughllak _ sumegh meggni _ laalighte naanghite ni lunga _ pi kaqe aatnga _ Cor in th -mun _ .
iwernga _ Atanghem _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ , _ elpesi nun _ pi yaghtugh ngestagh unga _ . _ taagken _ liigike lleqe anka _ aangaayug neghet _ aangaayugte llegh megestun _ pi yaghqaa ta i _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ akuzite tgun _ ayuqe nghite uq _ iwernga _ aghtughyaghqaanghillegh qun _ ayuqe uq _ .
kaate kuma _ sas qesug es tengnga _ ? _ Anag ut aligh lung aa _ aghyuugh l amsi i _ , _ nalighmeng _ piniqe lusi _ , _ pinitungwaaq _ pil amsi i _ ?
nagaqugh aqe aqa _ naligh gpesi nguq _ a ta mi _ nulighh a _ nuligh q elghiistun _ ayuqe a _ . _ seghlegh pigte lghii meng _ seghleghqeng nguuq _ talwa _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ atuqe ste nayagh nghite aat _ taana _ seghleghqe llegh _ .
paninang _ yuuke te kaqe tsi _ elpesi neng _ katam _ ? _ Q iv gh ughllag yaqleg estun _ ! _ elpek si _ iq is aq leg estun _ yuug _ taana _ akule gpesineng _ .
Uy av an teghllag yagh ngaaghma _ sumeghtaghagh tke ghllagu aqa _ . _ Taw an leng ugh estun _ elpesi ni _ agghi tke kaqe aqa _ naten _ pi lleghqagh meng _ taana _ yuug _ ategh akun _ atanegh mta _ Jesus-em _ . _ ugpeqagh ni _ , _ allameng _ qerngugh us kufsi _ , _ tawan leng ugh estun _ umyugagh mig ke lunga _ , _ aghtughyaghqanghillegh akun _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ yuug _ taana _ elpesinite ste gpenaan _ allameng llu _ pi nakesi _ . _ tuune teggu _ tughneghagh- mun _ , _ piyuke llegh mitun _ yugusigh a _ naaf qell igu _ , _ enkaam _ taghneghagh kek _ yuguligh lleg nge sqellug kek _ atanegh _ tagi nqigtekan _ .
Pin ii yug tellegh si _ seghleghu uq _ . _ liisimakagh i _ whaten _ pi llegh _ , _ " _ Y e ast- am _ ghhuugh tes tegh llak ay u waa _ akuute aq _ . _ "
tamaaken _ apallug ke luku _ seghleghqe llegh t _ aku leg pesi nilnguut _ iqite ki _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ pelungite lleqe usi _ akuutagh stun _ ye ast- angil ngughestun _ . _ ipa _ pelungite usi _ qayughllak _ Christ-a _ P ass ov er-em _ pennagh ii aghagh aqe a _ aghqe tke kau uq _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ .
katam _ Jews-et _ iq i tell ghistun _ ye ast- at _ mangteghagh meggneng _ yataaghqe te vagilgamegteggu _ P ass ov er-em _ neqenghaghqe llegh a _ , _ tawateghpigaq _ seghleghqe lleg put _ iqite lleqe aput _ . _ Enkaangam _ pelungite lleqe ukut _ , _ ipapigh qengng all equ kutlu _ .
ila itgun _ lata ma _ ilate nga snanigh amsi _ ugpeqagh nun _ anagnga lghii kun _ atuqe te lghii nun _ .
Akuz it keng ngunghi tanka _ uum _ nuna m _ yug i _ anagnga lghii kun _ atuqe te lghiit _ , _ nalighmeng _ pakignegh t _ , _ way aghniigh tet _ , _ nalighmeng _ tamaakut _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ . _ iqite yu kufsi _ tawatel ngughneng _ yug neng _ nuna _ un isaghq aqaghsi _ .
iwernga _ lata mkun _ ilate snanigh kaqe amsi _ tamaakunun _ ugpeqagh u lgute u ni luteng _ pi lghii nun _ sex-kun _ seghleghqeng nguk ata _ , _ nalighmeng _ pakignegh u kata _ , _ maniguute kayugu kata _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ seghlequugh utng uk ata _ yug lgute meng _ , _ meghe ste u kata _ , _ wayagh nigh ughte u kata llu _ . _ talwa _ neghe lgusigh gpenaki _ tawatel nguut _ .
whanga _ nanqigte yaghqaqe nghite anka _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ ; _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte yaghqaqe ai _ . _ iwernga _ elpek si _ nanqigte yaghqaqe yagh asi _ ugpeqaalgu tesi _ . _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi ut _ , _ " _ seghleghqe sta _ iqite ggu _ akule gpesineng _ . _ "
naligh i _ aaghtiiraagh nghmini _ ugpeqaalgut mineng _ , _ sangan _ aglagh te aqe agu _ nanqigtivig mun _ ? _ Kay ngu yug igat sii _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh nun _ nanqigte ste negh gpesini _ elpek si _ ugpeqagh ni _ ? _ ugpeqagh t _ ugpeqaalgut meggnun _ taklaghte tesaghqagh u yagh ut _ aaghtiiraagh te llegh meggneng _ .
