ellngit a _ ugpeqe igate aat _ ungipagh ut _ qayughllak _ tughneghagh m _ , _ uum _ nuna m _ kiyaghnegh an _ , _ ayaa stekaqe ai _ umyugagh it _ . _ esghagh nghite sta qaa _ nighug a _ pinigh lghii m _ ungipagh m _ nighugh qellgh aneng _ Christ-am _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ Christ-a _ kiyaghnegh tun _ ayuqe uq _ .
Whang kun neng _ katam _ ungipagh ke u nghite ukut _ , _ itupill _ ungipaq ngwaagh put _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ Atangh uniluku _ . _ Qepghagh tek agh pesi kut _ Jesus _ apallugh ke luku _ .
kiyaghnegh u uq _ whaten _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ yeqay _ nighug _ kuukgute li _ mamleg llegh meng _ ! _ " _ ellnga u uq _ ataasigh _ kiyaghnegh _ kuukgute ste i lghii _ nighug meng _ ilu mnnun _ . _ taaggun _ nighug kun _ legh igh iitagh ut _ nighughqell gha _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ kuukgute lghii _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ gginagh aneng _ .
iwernga _ whangkunnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ kanaghtekaqe a _ taana _ nighug _ kuukgute sqellug qu _ ilu mnni _ . _ whangkuta _ qiku stun _ qantaghqagh stun _ ayuqe ukut _ , _ enkaam _ tea- ma yan _ liigike lleqe aat _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ghllag _ kiyaghneghtagh u ni luku _ , _ whangkunneng _ pi u nghite ni luku _ .
seghleliigh lleg nge aqe ukut _ aw llaag ghhagh inaghtu te _ iwernga _ kayaalqe igate ainkut _ . _ ilangakun _ kukrag yug lleg nge aqe ukut _ iwernga _ sighima llghite te igate ukut _ .
amyuqetagh tke lleg nge aqe ukut _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ unite igate ainkut _ ; _ aqnigh qwaa lleng aqukut _ , _ iwernga _ tuqu igate ukut _ .
iiwleng _ tuqu llegh a _ Jesus-em _ yugusigh mnnite uq _ , _ esghigh sqellug qu _ unguvallegh a _ Jesus-em _ yugusigh mnni _ .
unguva u luta _ iiwleng _ yakugh nagh llegh anite ukut _ tuqu llegh m _ apallugh ke luku _ Jesus _ , _ esghigh sqellug qu _ Jesus-em _ unguvallegh a _ yugusigh mnni _ tuqu kayug ni _ .
enkaam _ whangkuta _ yakugh nagh llegh anite ukut _ tuqu llegh m _ qayughllak _ qepghaat nguk efut _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ iwernga _ qepghagh lleg mta _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvall eng es tengng w iisi _ .
igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ " _ ugpeqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ enkaam _ akuzite kaqe aqa _ . _ " _ ugpeqe i llegh ut _ tawatete uq _ igaqe stetu te _ . _ whangkuta llu _ ugpeqagh ut _ kiyaghnegh _ enkaam _ akuzitk aqaghput _ .
liisimakagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh tekaqaa _ atanegh _ Jesus _ . _ whangkuta llu _ unguvagh lleqe ainkut _ Jesus-kun _ . _ taagken _ aglagh u lleqe ainkut _ qerngagh emta _ elpek si llu _ tawan tellegh minun _ .
qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ apeghiighkagh t _ whangkunnun _ elpesi nun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh an _ nula ste lleqe ai _ yug t _ ugpeqe i lghiit _ Christ-akun _ . _ enkaam _ iyamsiqa yug llegh ghllag _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nula lleqe uq _ , _ quulv alleng eghllag llequ qlu _ .
enkaam _ iilqayugigate ukut _ . _ qaywa _ yugusigh put _ kayaali kestagh yagh nga a ta _ , _ taghneghagh put _ nutagh teng nguut _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ .
seghleliigh lleg put _ sa squghhagh u ut _ mulu yaghqaa nghite ut _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ yataaghqe te u ainkut _ allgegh tesqelluku _ kiyaghnegh meng _ kenle ite ngughk _ quya llegh ghllag _ . _ enkaam _ seghleliigh lleg put _ av angil ngughestun _ ayuqe ut _ .
sumeghtaghagh tke manginagh igate aput _ seghleliigh lleg put _ . _ itupill _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe aput _ esghagh pagning il keput _ . _ qantaghaqun _ seghleliigh lleg put _ kenlet gh uu llequt _ , _ iwernga _ quya llegh ut _ es ghii gal kefut _ quun pek aghq aaguq _ .
whani _ nuna mi _ ukut _ yugusigh put _ kiyaghfig put _ tiinta stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ liisimakagh ut _ yugusigh put _ tuqu kata _ kiyaghnegh _ mangteghagh lgu uq _ qilag mi _ whangkunnun _ kiyaghfigkagh meng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe a _ mangteghagh _ , _ yug m _ ulima aqe nghite a _ . _ taana _ mangteghagh _ quun pek aghq aaguq _ .
ipa _ ngillegte ukut _ nuna mete u luta _ qayughllak _ kiyaghte yu pigte lghiikut _ yugusighraghagh mnni _ qilag mi _ .
aatkagh stun _ aate lleqe aput _ tamaakut _ yugusigh igh ragh aat _ amsikaghmete nghite na luta _ .
yugusigh put _ tiinta stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ tiinta mete luta _ ngillegte aqe ukut llu _ , _ seghleliigh ukut llu _ qayughllak _ mat- aghte yug igate ke put _ . _ itupill _ simigh yug aqe aput _ yugusigh nun _ tuqu igate ngugh nun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqe te kaqe ainkut _ whavek _ allangughte llegh mun _ . _ Whang kun nunllu _ tuune kaqe ak _ taghneghagh gni _ liisimake sqellug qu _ allangughte lleghqagh ut _ ipapestaaq _ apeghiigh lleqe ni luku _ .
enkaam _ iiwleng _ ilutu aqe ukut _ . _ liisimakagh ut _ ne mete u luta _ yugusigh mnni _ , _ atanegh mete igate ukut _ .
Kiyagh teng nguukut _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ , _ nakaan _ esghaqagh yu mteggun _ .
enkaam _ ilutu aqe ukut _ . _ unite yug aqe aput _ yugusigh put _ ne mete na luta _ atanegh mi _ .
ne mete yagh ghngaamta _ nalighmeng _ ne mete nghite ghngaamta _ , _ efqugh sug aqaghput _ atanegh _ .
qamagte luta _ nekeve pestaagh yaghqaa ukut _ Christ-am _ sivungagh kun _ nanqig tesqelluta _ . _ Ataa sik agh taam ta _ allgegh u lleqe ukut _ pinigh lghii meng _ nalighmeng _ seghlegh meng _ apeghiigh te lleg mtestun _ yugusigh mteggun _ .
Enkaangam _ alik aqaghput _ atanegh _ , _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ugpegh ste naqutke aqe aput _ yug t _ Christ-akun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake ainkut _ n atel ngu ut fut _ yug ni _ , _ sunanguq _ elpek si llu _ liisimake tekut _ tawatete luta _ .
elpesi nun _ tugukligh tes naq ut keng ngunghi tukut _ allameng _ . _ itupill _ ungipaate aqe amsi _ whangkunneng _ elpesi nun _ qukaayug utk esqell uta _ . _ taagken _ apegh yaqleg ugh lleq agh pesi kut _ qukaayug tke i lghii nun _ yug m _ qaas tul ngin aghh aaneng _ . _ waakigate aat _ sa u ta a _ yug m _ ilumikekagh a _ .
Nall utu y iq ngu kumta _ , _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ iwernga _ nall utu y iq ngun ghil kumta _ , _ elpesi nun _ ayuqe uq _ .
Christ-am _ igleghte te u ainkut _ piniqe llegh mikun _ . _ Liisimak ngwaagh aghput _ yug m _ ataasigh m _ tuquma tke kaqe a _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ yuug _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qamagtengngwaagh luteng _ yug t _ tuqu kau ut _ .
Christ-am _ tuquma tke kaqe ai _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ yug t _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghte lghiit _ kiyagh saqleg ull equt _ ellnga nun _ , _ nakaan _ ellmeggnun _ katam _ . _ tuqu luni _ unguvagh tekaaguq _ ellngit _ apallugh ke luki _ .
whaken _ kenle ke luku _ kina _ alngunak _ sumeghtaghaat ken nan iim aagh put _ nuna m _ yug an _ sumeghtaghagh tke llegh atun _ . _ qaywa _ ataasigh meng _ sumeghtaghaatk egkaq aghput _ Christ-a _ nuna m _ yug an _ pillgh atun _ , _ tawaten _ sumeghtaghaat ken nan iim aagh put _ .
kina _ alngunak _ Christ-am _ pi liite nghminigu _ nutaghaghllug ughte aqe uq _ . _ Kiyaghtaa ll el ug a _ aviighute aqe uq _ , _ iwernga _ nutaghaghllug _ kiyaghtaa llgha _ piinligh aqe uq _ .
kiyaghnegh u uq _ tawaten _ pi ke aq _ . _ ellnga n _ ilaliigh te stekaqe ainkut _ ellmi nun _ Christ-akun _ . _ qepghaqagh lightu ainkut llu _ ila i llu _ yug t _ ilaliigh utes qelluki _ ellmi nun _ .
Christ-akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilaliigh u ai _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ yug t _ , _ umyugagh mig ke gpenaki _ seghleghqe llegh it _ . _ Enkaangam _ ungip aghq al itk aqiinkut _ aapgh esqelluki _ naten _ ellmi nun _ ilaliigh ta i _ ellngit _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ kayagtekaqe ainkut _ ungipaghte u luta _ Christ-amun _ , _ enkaam _ whangkutgun _ tagis qellusi _ ellmi nun _ . _ akuzi ste u ukut _ Christ-amun _ kayeme i lghiit _ ilaliigh u tesqellusi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Christ-a _ seghleghqe mangite u aghte uq _ , _ iwernga _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh kaqe a _ seghleghqe kau luku _ . _ enkaam _ Christ-akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh ngllagh kaqe ainkut _ .
Qepgh algut ku tu tem nneng _ kiyaghnegh llu _ , _ taawa _ kayeme amsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ tugukligh gpenaan _ temngitwha u luku _ .
kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ P illegh qagh llu waagh mi _ nagaqugh kaqe amken _ , _ aghnegh ani _ yuguligh llegh m _ kayusigh kaqe amken _ . _ " _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ maa te nguuq _ kiyaghnegh m _ pillegh qagh llu waagh a _ ; _ nagate tek _ , _ maa te nguuq _ aghnegh a _ yuguligh i llegh m _ !
Kiyaghtaa ll emteggun _ naagte yaghagh ngllagh igate aput _ yug t _ , _ seghlequ uf qaan _ pi sqellug qu _ qepghaqagh ut _ atanegh mun _ .
iwernga _ salleg mteggun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ liigike ste aqe ukut _ yug nun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qepghagh tek nil uta _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ nuqe tut im all emteggun _ suflughtagh aqe aput _ seghleliigh llegh t _ , _ piyaqli i llegh t _ , _ ikfiqe llegh t _ .
Q ev ut quq aagukut _ , _ anusimingllagh kau ukut _ , _ uglagh te lleg nge kau ukut llu _ . _ ughleghiigh kau ukut _ , _ qavagh llegh ke mangite ukut _ , _ iyatagh kau ukut llu _ .
Liigik es teng ngu u kutlu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qepghaghte kut fut _ pinitun _ kiyaghtaall emteggun _ , _ liisimake i lleg mteggun _ , _ nuqe tut ill emteggun _ , _ nangllegtagh lleg mteggun _ , _ piniq i pill emteggun _ , _ Agleghnalghiig nekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ .
Qepgh aat ngwaagh put _ kiyaghnegh _ ungipagh ke lleg mteggun _ ipapilleq _ . _ atugh qaghkagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ , _ elqughutngagh llegh llu _ guutute kellug qu _ aghenqignegh mnnun llu _ saghumignegh mnnun llu _ .
Quul v alleng aqu kutlu _ ukav aghll eng aqu kutlu _ ; _ seghlequugh sigh aqu kutlu _ usuqe lleg nge aqe ukut llu _ . _ iqlengagh lghii u na iqe ainkut _ , _ iwernga _ akuzi aqe ukut _ ipa pig meng _ .
yug t _ nalluke nigh ke ainkut _ , _ naqamllu _ liisimake luta _ ; _ uglagh ghngaan _ tuqu vzigh aqe ukut _ , _ iwernga _ paninang _ unguva ukut _ . _ aghyuugh yagh ghngainkut _ , _ tuqute igate ainkut _ .
qivghu u ghngaamta _ , _ naqamllu _ quya nga ghllagu aqe ukut _ ; _ akluma ghngaamta _ , _ naqamllu _ aklungi igh i ste aqe aput _ yug t _ ; _ avaq ragg ii tegh ngaamta _ , _ naqamllu _ pi lgu aqe ukut _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ Cor in th -eghm iini _ , _ ipapigh qull usi _ ayuqe amsi _ . _ ungipaate amsi _ piniqe pigte amsi _ .
nuqnegh te mangite amsi _ piniqe lleg mnneng _ , _ iwernga _ elpesi u ut _ nuqnegh te ikagh t _ piniqe i llegh gpesineng _ whangkunnun _ .
maaten _ aleghqugh amsi _ avaqutagh ke pigte lghii stun _ , _ piniq eq egh tikut _ katam _ whangkuta _ piniqe lleg mtestun _ elpek si _ .
inglu ke gpenaki _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ . _ elqughutngagh llegh nkuk _ seghlegh nkuk _ inglu ke tepagningite uk _ . _ nighug nkuk llu _ mamleg nkuk llu _ qerng aghme te pagning itu k _ .
Christ-am _ itagnaq saghqaq enghit ngwaagh aa _ tughneghagh _ . _ ugpeqagh t _ piyuke llegh it _ alla u ut _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh neng _ .
kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ manigugh yaghqaa nghite ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nga ni _ . _ qayughllak _ whangkuta _ temple- ke ainkut _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau lghii _ , _ " _ ellngitnite lleqe unga llu _ akulng it nill equ ngallu _ ; _ kiyaghnegh ke lleqe aatnga _ , _ ellngit llu _ yug ke lleqe anka _ . _ "
" _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ atanegh _ pi kau lghii _ , _ unite ki _ tamaakut _ yug t _ , _ aafte tek _ ellngit neng _ . _ saafte gpenaki _ ukmangite nghite ngugh t _ ; _ enkaam _ tugukligh lleqe amsi _ .
At ak elleq aghpesinga _ , _ enkaam _ elpek si _ ighnegh ke lleqe amsi llu _ panike lleqe amsi llu _ , _ pi uq _ atanegh _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngughk _ . _ "
piniqekagh mni _ ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ tamaakuneng _ akequsagh ngllagh kau ta aneng _ whangkunnun _ , _ ukmangighsagh lteki _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ nukeggnagh i _ yugusigh mta llu _ taghneghagh mta llu _ . _ Pel ungigh tengngwaagh el ta _ qayughllak _ alik aghput _ kiyaghnegh _ .
ilaliigh qagh kut _ ilu gpesigun _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ anagnga lghii meng _ ping ig atagh put _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ naaf qumang it aghput _ , _ talwa _ puugh neq guu simangit aghput _ .
ungipaate u nghite amsi _ tamaakuneng _ av utken nalusi _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ ungipaate kaqe amsi _ piniqe pigte ni lusi _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghte lgusigh lleqe amsi _ nalighmeng _ tuqu lgusigh lleqe amsi _ .
neghyuke ghllag lusi _ ayuqe amsi _ , _ qukaayug tke pigte amsi _ . _ Kay em eghllag aqagh pesinga _ . _ enkaam _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag mnni _ paninang _ tevugha aqe unga _ quya llegh meng _ .
kaate aqngamta _ Macedonia- mun _ , _ meghnaalipagningite kau ukut _ . _ seghleliigh kau ukut _ tea- ma ani _ , _ yug t _ aaghtiiraagh kaqe ainkut _ , _ teggellghiigh kau ukut llu _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilutughsagh aqe ai _ iil qeng ngalghiit _ , _ enkaam _ ilutughsagh ainkut _ tagi ste llegh mikun _ titus _ whangkunnun _ .
ilutughtekau ukut _ tagi aqngan _ titus _ , _ iwernga _ ilutugh lleng ataghagh tukut _ ungipagh sigh nkut _ elpesi nun _ ilutughsagh ma ni luni _ . _ ungipaate ainkut _ elpesi nun _ esghagh yug pigte ni lunga _ , _ qivghuke ni lunga _ seghleliigh qellegh pesineng _ , _ kayusigh yug pigte ni lunga llu _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesi _ wanlegi _ quya ste ghllag aanga _ .
qaywa _ lata mkun _ qivghu ste ghngaamsi _ , _ avutegh qut keng ngunghi tanka _ lata nka _ . _ sivukun _ avuteghqesagh unga _ qayughllak _ lata ma _ qivghu ste aghtegkangisi _ .
quya u nghite unga _ lata mnun _ qivghu te ma ni lusi _ . _ iwernga _ quya ghllagu unga _ qivghu llegh gpesi _ allangughte stekaqe kangi _ kiyaghtaall esi _ . _ qivghu llegh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ atuqe kaqe a _ elpesi nun _ , _ enkaam _ naten _ alngunak _ whangkuta _ aqnighte llghite amsi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ atuqe aqe a _ qivghu llegh _ yug nun _ avutegh qelluki _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ , _ yugulilleng esqelluki _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ avuteghqe te kete naanghite a _ yuguligh llegh _ . _ iwernga _ qivghu llegh _ nuna meng _ pi _ tuqu ta iqe uq _ .
esghaqagh teggu qun _ sa u ta a _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh qagh a _ qivghu llegh gpesigun _ . _ qivghu llegh gpesi _ efqughute sug ghllag aisi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ elngaatall _ ipapigh qen naqutk egkaa yagh tusi _ anaggute llghite ni lusi _ . _ Ug um iyag utk aqaghsi _ anaggute llegh _ , _ alingruugh kau usi llu _ . _ Esghagh yupig tek aqagh pesinga _ , _ pinitun _ pi kau usi _ , _ aghyuugh qaghkagh i llu _ anaggutekagh _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesigun _ ipapigh qeg kaagusi _ apallugh ite ni lusi _ .
enkaam _ qaywa _ tawaten _ lata yagh ghngaamsi _ , _ apallugh ke u nghite aqa _ anaggutekagh _ , _ nalighmeng _ tawavek _ seghletun _ pikagh anun _ . _ itupill _ lata kaqe amsi _ liigikngwaagh esqellusi _ kiyaghnegh m _ esghagh ma nghaani _ tuun 始 ngwaagh lusi _ whangkunnun _ ayuqe lghiisi _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ilutugh tengng aakut _ . _ I lu tugh teng ngin agh penaamta _ , _ iwernga _ quy aagh ataghagh tukut _ esghagh luku _ Titu s-em _ quya ma llegh a _ . _ qamagte lusi _ sumegh y aling ii te sim aagh si _ .
Qan atk egkaq amsi _ titus- mun _ efqugh ke ni lusi _ . _ elpesi nun _ pi aqngami _ liite kaqe ai _ ipa u ta i _ sa meng _ pillgh enka _ elpesi neng _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ kayngu yagute llghite anka _ qan atk illgh enka _ . _ iiwleng _ ipapighqell uta _ aleghqugh aqe amsi _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ ipa u ut _ qan atk illegh put _ titus- mun _ .
enkaam _ Titu s-em _ wanlegi _ pinigh kau aghte aisi _ sumeghtaghagh te kete nghminigu _ qaatke te nga llegh i _ ellmi nun _ . _ upugha te kaqe kesi llu _ alinge lleg ligh lusi _ , _ up- nge llegte llegh ligh lusi _ .
quya ghllagu unga _ qayughllak _ neghyuke ghllag lusi _ ayuqe amsi _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ !
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ whangkuta _ liisimak es uw amsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh aneng _ ugpeqagh nun _ yughaghvig itni _ Macedonia- m _ .
Ik f iq liigh tellegh llag ita _ nanghiighsaghagh lleg nge ste ghllag kaqe ait _ . _ qaywa _ akluma ghllag yagh ghngaaghmeng _ , _ paninang _ quya ma ghllag kau ut _ repall _ ighleg gpenateng _ tuune i kau ut _ kayusigh na luki _ ila i _ ugpeqagh t _ .
ungipaate amsi _ tuune i kau ut _ tuun yaghq aghtu tal megestun _ , _ talwa _ tuun iigh atagh aq aagut _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ qayughllak _ ellngit _ tuune i yu lghiit _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ pi sqe mangite ai _ .
talwa _ aapute uute ghllag kau ut _ tuune i lgusigh i na luteng _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ .
tuune i llegh at _ uglagh kau uq _ sighimake lleg mnneng _ . _ sivuke luteng _ ellmeggneng _ pegte ut _ atanegh mun _ , _ taagken _ whangkunnun _ piyuke llegh akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
titus _ elpesi nite aqngami _ piinligh i kau uq _ qerngughte i llegh gpesineng _ mani meng _ . _ enkaam _ kayem aghput _ kayusii sagh tiis qellusi _ apeghiigh sqellug qu _ nanglleg ke sagh i _ tunusagh _ .
sa llegh gpesigun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ pinitun _ pi aqe usi _ : _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ , _ akuzillegh gpesigun _ , _ liisima llegh gpesigun _ , _ kayusigh i yu kestagh llegh gpesigun _ , _ piniqe i llegh gpesigun llu _ whangkunnun _ . _ mate- te mi llu _ pinitun _ pi aqe tek _ tuune i llegh gpesigun _ .
qelegh u nghite amsi _ tuun is qellusi _ , _ iwernga _ ungipaate u amsi _ naten _ ila it _ tuune i ma ta i _ . _ enkaam _ tuune i llegh gpesi _ ipapigh qelleq aa _ piniqe i llegh i _ ipa u ta a _ .
liisimakagh i _ piniqe i nga llegh ghllag a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ . _ aklungi ghllag mini _ taw all iim a _ ellmi neng _ katam _ akluma aghtekau uq _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ aklungi igh i sqe qaghte lusi _ akluma llegh mikun _ .
awatangani _ elpek si _ qerngughte i yuwhaagh kau usi _ mani meng _ , _ tuune i kau usi llu _ qayughllak _ tuune i yu lghiisi _ . _ sume mni _ whatete luku _ pi yagh kufsigu _ , _ itagnagh nayagh usi _ ,
nagnegh te yagh kufsigu _ piinlighkagh i _ ! _ sagiqe nga kau usi _ qerngughte i yuwhaagh aqngafsi _ mani meng _ . _ enkaam _ sagiqe nqigte lusi _ apeghiigh teggu _ qerngughtekagh i _ . _ tuune tek _ tuune i lleghqagh gpesistun _ .
tuune i yu pigtekufsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh lleqe ai _ tunute yasi _ . _ piyuke aqe a _ yuug _ tuune i sqellug qu _ tuune yaghqagh lgu kan _ , _ iwernga _ avangite kan _ tuune i nghite yagh ghngaan _ .
nuuqragti ste sug u nghite amsi _ ila si _ n uuq rag tin ghi sim aluki _ .
maaten _ llilegh ghllag lusi _ ayuqe usi _ enkaam _ kayusigh yaghqaqe asi _ tamaakut _ aklu lghiit _ . _ iwernga _ aklu kufsi _ taawa _ ellngit a _ kayusigh lleqe aisi _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ kayu siightu lleqe usi _ enkaam _ atunem _ pi lleqe usi _ .
katam _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ igaq ell ghistun _ , _ " _ yuug _ saghna ghllagkagh _ suyvaghte mangite uq _ , _ iwernga _ yuug _ saghnapag ma ite ngughk _ aklu naanghite uq _ . _ "
iyamsiqa yug vike aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ titus _ kayusigh i yug ste ghllag kanga _ elpesi neng _ katam _ whangkutestun _ .
titus _ angeghqe ma kau uq _ elpesi nun _ pis qes am teggu _ . _ elpesi nun _ piyug pigtekau uq _ , _ taana _ ellnga n _ piyuke llegh ke a _ .
Ugpeq aal gut fut _ titus- mun _ maligte te ste naqagh ut _ . _ Qamagtengngwaagh luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ni _ usuqe pigte aqe aat _ ungipagh ke i llegh aneng _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ .
Taan angin aag penaan _ , _ ugpeqagh t _ nakmike kaqe aat _ maligte te sqellug qu _ whangkutgun _ , _ tuune i yaghtugh kumta _ nanglleg ke te yameng _ tunute yameng _ ugpeqagh nun _ . _ tawaten _ pi u ukut _ usuqe lleg nge sqellug qu _ atanegh _ , _ yug nun llu _ liite sqellug qu _ kayusigh i yu llegh ut _ .
piraamsi u ukut _ kitumun _ alngunak _ seghlequ uf qaamta _ pisqell uta _ naten _ aflengak aqut fut _ taana _ tunute yagh ghllag _ .
enkaam _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ atuq sug aqaghput _ kiyaghnegh mi _ elqughutngagh lghii _ , _ yug ni llu _ elqughutngagh lghii _ .
Titu s -en kug nunllu _ maligte te ste naqagh ut _ ila a _ ugpeqaalgut fut _ . _ awen _ esghagh na luku _ nateghtu langa _ pi iqagh ut _ , _ pi yalghiikut _ iiwleng _ kayusigh i yu kestagh luni _ ayuqe uq _ . _ wanlegi _ maaten _ kayusighi yug llag ugh tuq _ qayughllak _ neghyuke ghllag kangisi _ .
titus _ qepghagh lgutke aqa _ , _ qepghagh lgusigh aqe aanga _ kayusiite na lusi _ . _ taake uk llu _ ugpeqagh u lgute tek _ ugpeqagh t _ yughaghvig nilnguut _ kayagtekaqe agket _ . _ Quul v aghllag luku _ Christ-a _ ayuqe ak _ .
enkaam _ Cor in th -eghm iini _ , _ esghaghte steggu _ piniqe i llegh i _ taa kugnun _ yug gnun _ . _ taagken _ piniqe i llegh gpesi _ ipapigh qes leq iit _ ugpeqagh t _ yughaghvig nilnguut _ sangan _ qan atk ell emnneng _ elpek si _ .
lata tke nghite yagh ghngaamkun _ ayuqe aqa _ tunusagh _ tuyugh yaghqagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ Jerusalem -em _ .
liisimake amsi _ kayusigh i yug lusi _ ayuqe usi _ enkaam _ qan atk aqamsi _ ugpeqagh itnun _ Macedonia- m _ . _ whaten _ pi kau unga _ , _ " _ awatangani _ ima _ ugpeqaalgu tet _ A ch a ia- melnguut _ yataaghqe kau ut _ tuune i na luteng _ . _ " _ sagiqe llegh gpesi _ allute luki _ ugpeqagh t _ maan lenguut _ tuune i yug stekaqe ait llu _ .
iwernga _ kayagte naqe anka _ ila i _ ugpeqaalgu te put _ elpesi nun _ . _ apallugh ke aqa _ qan atk il qa _ elpesi neng _ temngingu fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ . _ yataaghqe sqe sug amsi _ katam _ whanga _ pi sqe lleg mtun _ elpek si _ ,
luuraq _ Macedonia- ghmiit _ ila ita _ maligte na yu kangatnga _ Cor in th -mun _ . _ esghagh kunisi _ yataaghqe llghite lusi _ tunute yaghqagh gpesineng _ , _ taawa _ whangkuta _ kayngete te yaag kete lleqe ainkut _ , _ elpek si llu _ kayngu yug lleqe usi _ .
enkaam _ sumeghtaghagh unga _ sivu mni _ kayagte kestagh na luki _ ila i _ ugpeqaalgu te put _ . _ tawaten _ kayusiite lleqe aisi _ yataaghqe sqellug qu _ akequsagh kekagh i _ tunusagh _ . _ taagken _ kaate kuma _ tunusagh i _ apeghiigh nga lleqe uq _ , _ enkaam _ yug t _ liisimake lleqe aat _ tuune i yu llegh i _ , _ nakaan _ qayughllak _ tuune i yaghqaa te gpesineng _ .
neqamike luku _ una _ , _ yuug _ pal aghhaghmeng _ piitute meng _ piitesighagh kuni _ , _ palaghhagh an _ saghna lleqe uq _ . _ yuug _ uglagh luku _ piitute meng _ piitesighagh kuni _ , _ uglagh luku _ saghna lleqe uq _ .
tamaghhagh gpesi _ sumeghtaghagh tke teggu _ tuune i lleghqaghtu ta leg si _ . _ ighleg magh gpesi _ tuune i gpenasi _ nalighmeng _ tuune i yaghqaa te gpesineng _ . _ iwernga _ quyake sigh ke luku _ tuune i aqe tek _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe ai _ tawatel nguut _ tuun istet _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tuun yaqleg w iisi _ aklukegk agh pesineng _ qaayghute luku _ . _ enkaam _ iiwleng _ sa meng _ alngunak _ pi lgu aqe lleqe usi _ , _ siipngaan llu _ kayusii tesqelluki _ ila si _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ Igh l ell ngunani _ tuune i aqe uq _ aklumalghii nun _ ; _ pinitun _ pi nga llegh a _ nagnegh yaghqaa uq _ quunpeng _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh u uq _ tuune i kayug _ piitute meng _ piitesighagh te mun _ , _ neqe meng llu _ neghyaghqagh meng _ . _ tuune lleqe a _ qamagte luku _ piitute _ aklukegk aghsi _ , _ nagu ste lleqe ai llu _ . _ Enkaangam _ unatagh ghllag lleqe usi _ qayughllak _ igh leg il nguusi _ .
sa kun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ aklungi igh i ste lleqe aisi _ , _ n ar an 始 ngun aan _ tuun is qellusi _ sa llegh mi _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ . _ enkaam _ tuune i llegh gpesigun _ whangkutgun _ uglagh lghii m _ iyamsiqa yug vike lleqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ Jerusalem -em el nguut _ allgegh lleqe ait _ aklukegk ateng _ tunusagh gpesigun _ . _ enkaam _ yug lghute ghllag t _ iyamsiqa yug llegh meng _ tevugha lleqe ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
tuune yaghqagh gpesigun _ ipapighqell equsi _ ugpeqe i nga ni lusi llu _ qaatke te nga ni lusi llu _ pinigh lghii nun _ ungipagh anun _ Christ-am _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ yug t _ usuqe lleqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ usuqe lleqe aat llu _ igh l ell ngun asi _ tuune i llegh gpesineng _ Jerusalem -eghm iin unllu _ ila itnun llu _ .
Enkaangam _ piniqe pigte lusi _ yughagh tke lleqe aisi _ apallugh ke luku _ piniqe llegh ghrug ghllag _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuun 始 ng akanga _ elpesi nun _ .
yeqay _ iyamsiqa yug vike lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ tunusagh anun _ akuzite t _ apegh pagning il kangat _ .
ila ita _ yug gpesi _ pi aqe aatnga _ tetugtagh ni lunga _ elpesinite negh mni _ , _ iwernga _ tetug igate na iqe aatnga _ elpesinite nghite negh mni _ . _ whanga _ Paul _ , _ whanga mneng _ katam _ , _ Christ-am _ quseveg ng allgh akunllu _ piniqe llegh akun llu _ ,
tetug ste nghite aghte nakefsinga _ laalighfike nqigtekumsi _ . _ iwernga _ tetug yaghqaqe nghite kumki _ tamaakut _ yug t _ pi lghiit _ kiyaghteng ngun ilunga _ nuna m _ yug istun _ , _ elngaatall _ tetug naanghite anka _ .
nuna mete u ghngaamta _ pilluw iig a tukut _ nuna m _ yug an _ pilluw all ghistun _ .
guutute t _ pi llu waa si put _ nuna m _ yug an _ guutute ke nghite ai _ . _ guutute put _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgh aneng _ pi lgu ut _ . _ N aaf qes aq leg w iit _ ayep sug ilnguut _ mingllute t _ anguyag m _ nekefte qugh qu ai _ yug t _ uvit angit gun _ .
Taa kutgun _ guutute tgun _ naafqe aqe aput _ anguyag m _ iqlengagh u i _ , _ sumeghnegh it llu _ aangaayug neghet _ . _ apeghtugh i llghite a _ amig igh aqe ait _ yug t _ liite lleghqagh itneng _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ katam _ pilluwaghtet _ tugu tell ghistun _ anusimingllagh yaghqagh meng _ , _ whangkuta llu _ tug waaq aput _ qamagte luki _ sumeghnegh t _ qaatku tesqelluki _ Christ-amun _ .
Christ-amun _ qaatkut ng ngwaa qu fsi _ , _ taawa _ aghyuugh i yaghqaaghte lleqe ukut _ qaatke te nghite ngugh nun _ .
nanqigte i aqe usi _ esgh all ghii nagh pesigun _ . _ Christ-amun _ pike pestaagh ni kufsi _ , _ neqamike luku _ whangkuta llu _ Christ-am _ pi ke ainkut _ , _ elpesi stun _ .
kayngu ke igate aqa _ qan atk iv legh ap al qa _ Atanghem _ igleghte te i ste ngughte stegkanganga _ elpesi nun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ whangkunnun _ kayeme sqellug qu _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ , _ nakaan _ naaf qen naluku _ .
sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ aling es naq ut keng ngun ilusi _ lata mkun _ .
ila ita _ pi aqe ait _ Paul-em _ lata i _ seghlegh ghllag u ni luki _ agh saagh mik agh ng anil uki _ , _ naqam _ whangkun nin neghmini _ , _ aghsaan _ ayuqe aqe uq _ , _ akuzi yiite aqe uq llu _ !
tamaakut _ yug t _ tawaten _ pikagh t _ liigike litgu _ sa meng _ pi llegh ut _ lata tgun _ , _ tamaaku nguut _ ataasigh t _ pi yaghqagh put _ ellngit nun _ pi kumta _ .
inglute naqute kete naanghite ukut _ tamaakunun _ aangaayugte lghii nun _ . _ sumeghtaghagh aqe ut _ aange ni luteng _ qayughllak _ ungipagh utu te aqe lghiit _ aange ni luteng _ . _ Nall uugh h aghmeng _ !
Qukaayug utken naanghi taghput _ alngunak _ qepghaqagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayagte te ma ite kanga _ whangkunnun _ . _ iwernga _ qukaayug ut keng ngin agh lleq aghput _ qepghaqagh _ kayagte tke a _ whangkunnun _ . _ elpek si llu _ ilate nga usi _ qepghaqagh mnnun _ .
Sivul igh pig aagukut _ ungipagh ke i yaghtuqagh ni _ elpesi nun _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh aneng _ Christ-am _ . _ enkaam _ al pag ig atagh put _ qepghaqagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayagte tke a _ whangkunnun _ .
Qukaayug utk elleq aghput _ taan anginaq _ qepghaqagh _ pikagh ut _ , _ nakaan _ ila ita _ qepghaqagh at _ . _ Ug p ellegh tugh te kufsi _ sighima ukut _ kayusigh atagh iisqell uta _ qepghaqagh mnneng _ .
enkaam _ ungipagh ke i yaghtugh lleqe ukut _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ila itnun _ nuna t _ . _ Qukaayug utk esug unghi taghput _ qepghaqagh _ ila ita _ apeghiighkagh at _ .
iwernga _ igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ , _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ qukaayug su kumi _ , _ qukaayug te kete ligu _ Atan ghh iinaq _ . _ "
Atanghem _ tugukligh igate ai _ pinighnagh igh lghiit _ . _ itupill _ Atanghem _ tugukligh aqe ai _ tamaakut _ pinigh ni luki _ pikani _ .
sighimake amsi _ nekegg me tu tesqell unga _ akuzi kuma _ temngitwha lghii stun _ natengiighhaq _ . _ Nek egg me tu teqagh tengnga _ .
qungyagh aqe unga _ kiyaghnegh m _ qungyaqe llegh atun _ elpek si _ , _ qayughllak _ tuute ma amsi _ Christ-amun _ . _ Pel ung ilngugh estun _ ugiigh naqe lghii stun _ aang 始gh usim aam si _ ellnga nun _ , _ ugi ke sqellug qu _ ellngin aa _ .
iwernga _ alingutke aqe amsi _ anguyag m _ puughhe na yu kangisi _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ nemeghyagh m _ peghqiniqe te kete luku _ puughte llegh atun _ E v e _ . _ enkaam _ elpek si _ piniq nanigh waagh nayuk afsi gu _ Christ-a _ .
ungipagh kaqe yamteki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ elpesi nun _ , _ ugpeq egkaq aghsi _ Jesus _ , _ tugukligh agsi llu _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ . _ iwernga _ nagate yu kestagh luki _ ayuqe kaqe asi _ ungipagh ke i yaghtugh lghiit _ ila aneng _ Jesus-em _ . _ tugukligh i yug usi llu _ ila aneng _ taghneghagh m _ , _ ugpeqe yukagh kasi llu _ ila i _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ .
tamaakut _ ungipaq istet _ apostle- ngun iluteng _ pi aqe ut _ . _ sumegh meggni _ aangwaagh u na iqe ut _ apostle-et _ . _ iwernga _ liisimake anka _ aangwaagh u nghite ut _ whanga mneng _ .
akuzi llgite ghngaaghma _ , _ liisima ghllag unga _ . _ uglagh ghngaan _ liigike ste aqe amsi _ liisima lleg mneng _ .
elpesi nun _ akileghtughsagh qu mangite unga _ ungipagh kaqe yamki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau unga _ qusevegte lunga _ quulv aghnal usi _ . _ Seghlegh qe sing aa -a _ tawaten _ pi lunga _ ?
ugpeqagh t _ ilang it nilnguut _ yughaghvig t _ akileghtugh kaqe aatnga _ elpesi nite lunga _ . _ W ay aq allgh uugh anka _ mani itneng _ kayusiite na lusi _ .
elpesi nite aqngama _ ugh legh iigh tellghi tamsi _ kayusii tesqell unga _ akluk egkam neng _ . _ Ugpeq aalgu tet _ Macedonia- meng _ tagite kaqe aatnga _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ akluk egkam neng _ . _ enkaam _ aapte vike llghite amsi _ akluk egkam neng _ , _ aapte vike naanghite amsi _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ A ch a ia- mi _ aghula i aghte naanghite a _ qukaayug tel qa _ taagken _ . _ tawaten _ pi unga _ Christ-am _ ipapigh qellgh akun _ whanga mnite ngugh qun _ .
kayute ngllagh nghite u te mneng _ elpesi nun _ , _ sumegh pesi nii - i _ piniqe nghite ni lusi _ pi tsi _ whanga mnun _ ? _ kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake a _ piniqe i llegh ka _ elpesi nun _ .
taawa _ ighsa ke ii vike manginagh naqe amsi _ mani gpesineng _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe unga _ qukaayug g nan iisqelluki _ apostle- e sighwaaghet _ whangkutestun _ qepghagh ni lghiit _ akileghtuusagh ngunateng _ .
tamaakut _ yug t _ apostle- e sighwaagh uut _ puughte i lghiit _ yug neng _ iqlengiqe llegh megteggun _ . _ yug nun _ sumeghtaghagh tke ste aqe ut _ Christ-amun _ apostle- ep iik niluteng _ .
Taam eng wh aqun _ . _ talwa _ tughneghagh _ allangughte aqe uq _ ellmi neng _ katam _ aliigh yaghqaa luni _ kuukgute nga lghii tun _ yaquleg tun _ .
enkaam _ saghiigha nagh ite ut _ tughneghagh m _ qepghagh tengi _ tawaten _ pi kumeng _ . _ yug nun _ sumeghtaghagh tke ste aqe ut _ elqughutngagh lghii u ni luteng _ qepghagh tengi _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ iwernga _ kenle mi _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleqe ai _ elqughutngagh lghii meng _ aghyuugh llegh meng _ anaggute llegh itnun _ .
alla _ pi amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ sumeghtaghagh tke nghite linga _ temngitwha u lunga _ . _ iwernga _ tawaten _ sumeghtaghaat keng ngu kuf singa _ , _ tugukligh qaghte ngnga _ temngitwha u lunga _ . _ taagken _ whanga llu _ qukaayug tev legh agh llequnga _ .
qukaayug tke llegh ka _ whanga mneng _ atanegh meng _ pi u nghite uq _ . _ itupill _ akuzi u unga _ temngi _ pi lghii stun _ .
uglagh lghiit _ ugpeqaanghil ngughestun _ qukaayug taqut _ qepghaqagh meggneng _ , _ enkaam _ whanga llu _ tawaten _ qukaayug lleqe unga _ .
sumegh gpesini _ peghqinegh pigte ni lusi _ pi aqe usi _ . _ enkaam _ quyake sigh ke luku _ nagate aqe asi _ temngitwha lghiit _ .
tugukligh aqe asi _ qelegh llegh it _ nikimqun _ elpek si _ qepghaghtelaagh et _ ellngit nun _ . _ kagu kaqe ste aqe usi _ , _ tegleg vike ste aqe usi _ , _ ukaligh ke ste aqe usi llu _ , _ talwa _ gginagh gpesigun _ qasaghte ste aqe lusi _ .
kayngu yug unga _ kayaate pigte ukut _ tawaten _ pi lleghqagh mnneng _ elpesi nun _ tamaaku stun _ apostle- e sighwaagh estun _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ qukaayugsaghqagh u kan _ , _ whanga llu _ qukaayug lleqe unga _ . _ iwernga _ tawaten _ pi lleghqagh _ temngitwha u uq _ .
taakut _ apostle- e sighwaaghet _ , _ H eb r ew -ng waat _ ? _ whanga llu _ H eb r ew -ngu unga _ . _ Israel-eghm iing waat _ ? _ whanga llu _ Israel-eghm ii nguunga _ . _ Abraham-em _ kingun qak ii _ ? _ whanga llu _ kingunegh ke aanga _ .
Christ-am _ qepghagh tek ak ii _ ? _ iwernga _ whanga _ pinigh aghagh unga _ qepghagh a _ ellngit neng _ . _ taawa _ akuzi unga _ nall ek aghn ilngugh estun _ . _ qepghagh aghagh kau unga _ ellngit neng _ , _ an usim ingl aghvig met aagh aq aag ungallu _ ellngit neng _ . _ kagsagmig lleg nge kau unga _ kestekau nghite ngugh meng _ , _ uglagh ghngaan _ tuqu vzigh aatagh kau unga _ .
Tallim ag yag neng _ Jews-et _ igleghutisteng ita _ kagsagmig ste aatagh aatnga _ . _ ( _ 3 9 -ng waa qut _ ataasigh t _ kagsagmig llegh t _ . _ )
Rome-eghm iit _ umiil waa ghita _ pi nga yu neng _ anag ul egh testek aqaatnga _ . _ ataasigh meng _ ila ita _ yug t _ milugh agaatagh aatnga _ . _ pi nga yu neng _ angyagh igh utu te aqe aanga _ enkaam _ ataasigh meng _ unug llegh ke sigh _ , _ aghn elqusiq _ ughhe te kaqe aanga _ kellii ni _ .
uglagh pigte lghii mi _ iglegha lleg mni _ elngaatall _ yakugh nagh igh unga _ kiiw ni _ , _ way aghniigh ten eng _ , _ talwa _ yug lgute mneng llu _ , _ Gentile- en engllu _ . _ yakugh nagh igh unga llu _ ne ghllag ni _ , _ kilgaa ni _ , _ kellii ni llu _ . _ talwa _ yakugh nagh igh unga _ ugpeqaalgu te sighwaagh neng _ .
ughleghiigh ghllag kau unga _ , _ piyaqleg iigh aqe lunga _ . _ ilangani _ qavagh gpenanga _ , _ iyatagh nga aqe lunga _ , _ meqsug nga aqe lunga _ . _ awen _ neqe ite aqe lunga _ , _ azigutigh te aqe lunga _ , _ ghhuute aqe lunga llu _ aatkagh ii te m _ .
tamaakut _ saaghw itgun _ , _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ sumeghyali tke kaqe anka _ ugpeqaalgu tet _ tamaghh itni _ yugh ag vig ni _ .
Ugpeq aalgu tem _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ kayaate nghaani _ , _ whanga llu _ kayaate aqe unga _ . _ ugpeqagh u lgute a _ kitum _ seghleghqe ste nghagu _ , _ sakrite aqe unga _ .
Qukaayug gnaq ngu kuma _ , _ qukaayug lleqe unga _ kayaaghlliqe sigh mneng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake aanga _ iqlengiqe naanghite unga _ . _ ellnga _ ata ke a _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ , _ usuqe yaghqagh _ quunperugllag _ .
Damascus - mell unga _ , _ g overnor -em _ tugu ste sug kaqe aanga _ . _ ( _ umiileg m _ Ar et as-em _ g overnor -ngugh testekaqaa _ . _ ) _ enkaam _ tug us qell unga _ pilluw aght eni _ kelengake i stekaqe ai _ ne ghllag m _ amig ghllag itni _ .
iwernga _ ilakumtaagh ma _ ukig tekaq aatnga _ pas ke teg nekun _ mingllute m _ qergese gkenkun _ enkaam _ anag kau unga _ g overnor -meng _ .
qukaayugsaghqagh u unga _ , _ aneghnegh ghqu sigh u nghite ghngaan _ . _ paninang _ ungipaate naqe amsi _ esghaghwaagh lleg mneng _ , _ Atangh emllu _ aliigh qughkagh aneng _ whanga mnun _ .
liisimake aqa _ yuug _ Christ- amel nguq _ . _ qula _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luki _ ayumiqullegh ni _ agani _ naghughtekagh ni _ kiyaghnegh m _ mayugh te qaghtekaqe a _ pingay aanun _ qilag m _ . _ nallukngwaagh aqa _ yuug _ yugusim in itu t anga _ nalighmeng _ yugusigh mineng _ aan 始 ng ak aatanga _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake a _ .
liisimake aqa _ taana _ yuug _ kiyaghnegh m _ mayugh te qaghtekaqe a _ P ar ad is e- mun _ . _ nallukngwaagh aqa _ yuug _ yugusim in itu t anga _ nalighmeng _ yugusigh mineng _ aan 始 ng ak aatanga _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake a _ .
tawani _ nagate kaqe ai _ sa u aat _ apegh yaghqaa nghite ngugh t _ . _ tamaakut _ iinghute kau ut _ yug mun _ akuzite kete yaghqaa luteng _ .
qukaayug te kete naqe aqa _ taana _ yuug _ , _ iwernga _ qukaayug te kete naqe nghite unga _ whanga mneng _ iwerngaqun _ kayaaghlliqe sigh kekagh ghhagh inagh mneng _ .
qukaayug tke sug kuma _ whanga mneng _ , _ temngingu naanghite unga _ qayughllak _ apegh lleqe aqa _ ipapilleq _ . _ iwernga _ qukaayug te kete na nghite unga _ whanga mneng _ , _ qayughllak _ yug nun _ sumeghtaghagh tke sug unga _ elqughte lunga _ esghapag llegh itgun llu _ nagate llegh itgun llu _ whanga _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ aliightekaqe ghngaaki _ whanga mnun _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ sa u aat _ qilag mi _ , _ qukaayug ste sug nghite aanga _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ quseveg tesqell unga _ sikughllug ngestagh u nga _ yugusigh mkun _ . _ taana _ sikughllug _ ungipaghte u uq _ tughneghagh- meng _ . _ Taam _ ikfiqe ste aanga _ quseveg ng as qell unga _ .
pi nga yu neng _ ket w el l _ atanegh mun _ yughagh aqe unga _ iqite sqellug qu _ .
iwernga _ pi unga _ , _ " _ kayusillegh ka _ naama uq _ elpenun _ suflughte sqellug qu _ taana _ ikfiqe llegh _ qayughllak _ aghtughyaghqaanghi l qa _ iknaq elleghpig aag w aquq _ kayaaghlliqe negh gpeni _ . _ " _ enkaam _ quyake sigh ke luku _ qukaayug taqu nga _ kayaaghlliqe sigh mneng _ whangam n i tesqelluku _ Christ-am _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ .
taana _ apallugh ke luku _ quya aqe unga _ kayaaghlliqe nga negh mni _ , _ seghlequ ull eng nemni _ , _ piyaqli i negh mni _ , _ amyuutke lleg nge negh mni _ , _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng llu _ seghleliigh negh mni _ Christ-a _ apallugh ke luku _ . _ qayughllak _ kayaaghlliqe nga negh mni _ taawa _ iknaqe aqe unga _ .
akuzi u unga _ temngitwh astun _ , _ iwernga _ elpek si _ tawaten _ pis tagh pesinga _ . _ elpek si _ pinitun _ akuzite kete yaghqaqe yaghagh zinga _ ila gpesinun _ . _ qaywa _ sasii nghite ghngaaghma _ , _ tamaakut _ " _ aw nge aaghet _ apostle-et _ " _ aangwaagh u nghite ut _ whanga mneng _ .
elpesi nite lunga _ nekeg lluw aan _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ allaaghlluwhaght illgh et _ pi kaqe anka _ . _ tamaakut _ ipapigh qaat nga _ apostle- ep iig utk a _ .
sa kaqe zingi _ ugpeqagh t _ ilang it nilnguut _ yughaghvig t _ elpesi nun _ pi ma ite ke mneng _ ? _ ataasigh ghhagh inagh _ alla u uq _ , _ akilguqe mangite amsi _ . _ seghevute aghte ngnga _ anagte ma kumsi _ !
laalighfike naqe aqe amsi _ pingayut ii te kun _ , _ iwernga _ ughleghiigh tke ste sug nghite unga _ elpesi nun _ . _ elpek si _ sumeghmike aqe amsi _ , _ nakaan _ saghya si _ . _ taghnughhagh ke lghii stun _ ayuqe amsi _ . _ taghnughhagh t _ aflengake i yaghqaa nghite ut _ angayuqagh meggneng _ , _ iwernga _ angayuqagh t _ aflengake yaghqaqe ait _ taghnughhagh teng _ .
tuune yaghqaaghte amsi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ whanga _ pi mneng _ , _ talwa _ whanga mneng _ tuune lleqe unga _ elpesi nun _ . _ Piniq atagh an em si _ , _ llangaqa _ elpek si _ piniq ep agig atagh pesinga _ .
elpek si llu _ whanga llu _ liisimakagh ut _ ugh legh iigh te simangit amsi _ . _ iwernga _ ila gpesi _ anaggute ma ni aatnga _ . _ pi aqe ut _ puugh neq gu un nilusi _ iqlengiqe lleg mkun _ .
naten _ tawaten _ pis tem si _ ? _ sakenge kau zinga _ elpesi neng _ kayagte aqe yamki _ yug t _ elpesi nun _ ?
kayagtekaqe aqa _ titus _ elpesi nun _ pi sqellug qu _ , _ ugpeqaalgut f utlu _ maligte te sqe aqa _ . _ Titu s-em _ puughtekagh qite yu ai _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ Titu s- lu _ whangkutung _ qepghaqagh ung _ ataasigh u uq _ , _ ataasigh kun _ taghneghagh kun _ .
Sumegh pesi nii - i _ elpesi nun _ ipapigh qen naqutk es teg neg uu _ anaggute llghite ni lutung _ ? _ nakaa _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ nagaqugh ma nghaani _ , _ akuzi aqe ukung _ Christ-am _ akuzi sqe llegh atun _ . _ piniqekagh mni _ , _ sang wa _ qamagte luku _ pi iqagh ung _ iknaqugh s aghnaluku _ ugpegh llegh i _ .
sumeghyali te kaqe amsi _ elpesi nun _ kaate kuma _ esghagh kumsi _ allake nayuke amsi _ whanga _ sighimake lleg mneng _ . _ elpek si llu _ whanga _ esghagh kufsinga _ allak nayuk afsi nga _ sighimake llegh gpesineng _ . _ sumeghyali te kaqe amsi _ agh iv at ngun ayuk afsi _ , _ aqin aku t ngun ayuk afsi _ , _ sakr aa tut ngun ayuk afsi _ , _ ellngin aayug ut ngun ayuk afsi _ , _ seghlequugh ut ngun ayuk afsi _ , _ y iill g it ngun ayuk afsi _ , _ qukaayug ut ngun ayuk afsi _ , _ suug ll iq ut ngun ayuk afsi _ .
sumeghyali aqe unga _ alla _ taku kumsi _ kiyaghnegh ma _ kayngu s aak nayuk anganga _ sivu gpesini _ apallugh ke luki _ seghleghqe lleg si _ . _ enkaam _ qivghu ghllag lleqe unga _ qayughllak _ uglagh lghii ni _ elpek si _ seghleghqe manginagh u usi _ avuteghqe gpenasi _ . _ paninang _ sumeghtaghagh aqe usi _ sex -meng _ pelungite nghite ngugh meng _ , _ sex -a _ seghletun _ atugh qaghkagh i _ , _ sex - ellgh etlu _ anagnga lghiit _ nuqe tu sigat asi _ .
una _ pingayut ii tke a _ laalighte naqe llegh ma _ elpesi nun _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ whaten _ , _ " _ yuug _ anaggute ma ni katgu _ , _ maalghug _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yu t _ liisimak istet _ ipapigh qesaghq aqaat _ anaggute llegh a _ . _ "
tuungligh ghhagh ani _ laalighfike aqe yamsi _ kelenga sagh uqagh ke amsi _ tamaakut _ sivugh nghaani _ seghleghqe lghiit _ . _ ila it llu _ kelenga sagh uqagh ke anka _ , _ tagi nqigtekuma _ aghyuugh mig lleq niluki _ seghleghqe manginagh kata _ . _ tamaa uute nghite ghngaaghma _ kelengas aagh naq anka _ .
whanga mnun _ ipapigh qes tes uk esi _ Christ-a _ akuzi aqe ta a _ whanga mkun _ . _ Christ-a _ kayaate nghite uq _ aghyuugh mi kum isi _ , _ itupill _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite uq _ .
qaywa _ Christ-a _ kayaate kaayagh uq _ qaquuragh aqe yamegteggu _ , _ maaten _ kiyaghteng nguuq _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ . _ whangkuta llu _ kayaate ukut _ katam _ Christ-am _ kayaate kaayagh llegh atun _ . _ iwernga _ elpesi nite kumta _ kayusiite lleqe amsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ .
yuvghiigh tek _ elpesi neng _ liigike sqellug qu _ ugpeq ep iig ut si _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ . _ Liigik en ghis teg guu - u _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ kiyagh tengng utanga _ ilu gpesini _ ? _ Il ug pesi nin neghit nguk an _ , _ taawa _ ugpeq ep iill ghi taghsi _ .
sunanguq _ liigike teggu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ itagnagh qu ma ni luta _ .
yughagh aqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ kayusii tesqellusi _ anaggute fqaafsi _ pis qellusi _ . _ iwernga _ yughagh u u nghite ukut _ ipapigh qen naluku _ elpesi nun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ itagnagh qu ma ni luta _ . _ itupill _ whangkuta _ yughagh te kaqe amsi _ elqughute nga an _ pis qellusi _ , _ qaywa _ yug t _ pi ghngainkut _ itagnaq ell ghin nil uta _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
K ipull gin aagh pagningit aghput _ ipapilleq _ ; _ itupill _ il ap g ayaghq aqaghput _ .
quya aqe ukut _ kayaate negh mta _ , _ iknaqe u negh gpesini _ . _ enkaam _ yughagh te kaqe amsi _ vegh un neqig tesqellusi _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ lata aqe amsi _ elpesi nun _ pi vagilgama _ qayughllak _ nanqigte yu nghite kemsi _ aghyuugh mig yaghq aal usi _ . _ Atanghem _ qelqe aqe aanga _ nanqigte ste u lunga _ elpesi nun _ . _ enkaam _ nanqigte yug amsi _ kayusiite na lusi _ ugpeqillegh tugh tesqellusi _ , _ nakaan _ kayaal is qellusi _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ tawaten 始ngam _ pi unga _ . _ quya nga tek _ . _ veghute tek _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ pi sqe sug lleg mtun _ pi tek _ . _ kiyaghte tek _ itagnagh kete te lusi _ , _ nekegg me tull usi _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh _ ten em enga _ piniqe llegh m llu _ nekeggmellegh m llu _ elpesi nite li _ .
Quy aku tu taq itek _ agleghnagh lghii kun _ naagh llegh kun _ .
qamagte luteng _ ugpeqaalgu tet _ piniqe aisi nguq _ .
nangllegtagh llegh a _ Atanghem _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ , _ piniqe llegh a llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ qerng aghme tellgh allu _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ elpesi nite li _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Paul -meng _ pi u ut _ , _ apostle- meng _ . _ yug t _ nakmike llghite aatnga _ apostle- ngulunga _ , _ talwa _ kayagte llghite aatnga _ . _ Apostle- ngu ugh te kaagunga _ Jesus _ Christ- akunllu _ kiyaghnegh kun llu _ ata kun _ , _ unguvagh ste ikagh _ ellnga neng _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
lata aqe amsi _ ugpeqagh ni _ Gal at ia- melngugh ni _ . _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqaalgut ma _ maan lenguut _ pinigh ke ii sigh nge uk _ whanga mnun _ maligte te luteng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ nanglleg ke lisi llu _ nekeggmell elg us li sil illu _ .
Christ-a _ ellmi neng _ aghqe tke kau uq _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ , _ iteme te na luta _ whaken _ seghlegh meng _ kiyaghtaa lleghmeng _ . _ kiyaghnegh mta _ ata m _ piyuke llegh atun _ pi kau uq _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh _ usuqe lleg nge li _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ amen _ .
saghiigha yagute amsi _ aawallu _ peg tagh taghsi _ tuqlu ghis te z i _ nangllegtagh llegh akun _ Christ-am _ , _ tugukligh aisi _ alla neng _ " _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ " _ .
Av aq ragg ii tuq _ alla _ " _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ " _ . _ iwernga _ ila ita _ yug t _ teggellghiigh ste aqe aisi _ allangughte naqutke llegh megteggun _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ Christ-ameng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
qaywa _ yaquleg _ qilag meng _ , _ nalighmeng _ naligh mta _ whangkuta _ ungipagh ke gkumteki _ " _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ " _ alla u luki _ ungipagh kekagh mnneng _ elpesi nun _ , _ taana _ ungipaq il gh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte ligu _ aghyuugh llegh mun _ .
sivugh nghaani _ ungipaate kaqe amsi _ , _ whaa _ ungipaate naqlaatagh amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ ungipagh ke gkumiki _ " _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ " _ alla u luki _ ugpeqekagh gpesineng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte ligu _ aghyuugh llegh mun _ .
tawaten _ akuzillegh mkun _ efqugh hnaq ut keng ngunghi tanka _ yug t _ . _ nakaa _ , _ kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh u uq _ efqugh suk aqa _ . _ paninang _ yug nun _ efqugh tin aqut keng ngu kuma _ , _ Christ-amun _ qepghagh teng un aanghi tunga _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ una _ liisimake sug aqa _ elpesi nun _ , _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh kaqe kenka _ yug neng _ pi u nghite ut _ .
nagaqugh kaqe nghite anka _ yug neng _ , _ talwa _ kitum _ alngunak _ apeghtugh tke mangite ai _ whanga mnun _ . _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ aliightekaqe ai _ whanga mnun _ .
nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ natete yagh tke a _ malig teng nguluki _ Jews-et _ kiyaghtaall ghit _ . _ elngaatall _ nanglleg y ull ngun anga _ amyuutke kaqe anka _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ taaku ngin aghhaag neng _ aviighute ste naqutke kaqe anka _ .
ingyagh kaqe anka _ allute luki _ angtaagh lgute nka _ atuqe u luki _ Jews-et _ kiyaghtaall ghit _ , _ qayughllak _ sagiqnegh ghllag u yagh unga _ sivunegh mta _ nangaghnegh itnun _ .
iwernga _ allgegh mangite lunga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ , _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ tuqlugh kaqe aanga _ .
enkaam _ whanga mnun _ aliightekaqe a _ kina u ta a _ ighnegh ni _ ungipagh ke sqellug qu _ Gentile-enun _ . _ kinku nun _ alngunak _ akuzi tkesaghtugh llghite aqa _ taana _ ,
talwa _ Jerusalem-e tellghi tunga _ akuzite kete na luku _ apostle- ngugh tek anun _ sivu mni _ . _ yeghlegi _ A ra b ia- mun _ pi unga _ . _ tagtalmi _ uteghnigh unga _ Damascus -mun _ .
tamaani _ pi nga yu t _ ayumiqullegh t _ atugh luki _ Jerusalem-e tunga _ aleghqugh na luku _ C ep h as _ ( _ peter _ ) _ . _ ellnga nite unga _ aki mig aq _ unuk _ .
kina _ alla _ apostle- a _ aleghqugh nghite aqa _ iwerngaqun _ James _ , _ Atanghem _ angleg utanga _ .
apeghkagh nka _ ukut _ ipa u ut _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake aanga _ iqlengiqe u nghite unga _ .
taagken _ iglegha unga _ S y ri a- munllu _ C il ic ia- munllu _ .
tamaani _ Judea- mi _ ugpeqagh t _ Christ-akun _ salin _ nallagh igate kangatnga _ gginasaghqugh lunga _ .
taawanginaq _ liisimake aat _ nagaqugh llegh eng _ whaten _ , _ " _ yuug _ amyuqet iq es tek egk aghput _ , _ naafqii naqutkekagh llu _ ugpeqe i lleg mnneng _ Christ-ameng _ maaten _ whaa _ ungipagh kau iqe uq _ ugpeqe i llegh meng _ Christ-akun _ ! _ "
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh _ usuqe aqe aat _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ .
qula _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luku _ ayumiqullegh _ atugh luku _ uteghnigh unga _ Jerusalem-emun _ ; _ Barnab as-em _ maligte aanga _ Titu s- lu _ kelqe aqa _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ liigike ste aanga _ Jerusalem-e tesqell unga _ . _ kaate yamta _ ugpeqagh t _ igleghutisteng in iit _ qerngughte te aghte sqe anka _ . _ tawani _ ungipamsug te anka _ naten _ Gentile-enun _ ungipagh ke i lleg mneng _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau unga _ luuraq _ taakut _ igleghutistet _ apeghtugh i llegh nka _ temngingu ni na yu katki _ sivugh nghaani llu _ maaten llu _ .
liigike anka _ apeghtugh i llegh nka _ tugukligh ait _ qayughllak _ maligte i steke _ titus _ , _ Greek -ngugh ngaan _ , _ circumcise- es qen ghil kangat _ .
iwernga _ ila i _ ugpeq asigh waaghet _ aksaqe luku _ ilate ut _ whangkunnun _ riirngi na luku _ iteme nga llegh ut _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ . _ Qepghagh te laagh ughh neqig tesqelluta _ pi inkut _ liilightuusagh anun _ .
ellngit nun _ malighqutagh ke llghite ukut _ talwa _ natengiighhaq _ alme siq esqelluki _ ipa u llegh it _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ apeghtuusagh ke lleg mtestun _ elpesi nun _ .
taakut _ ugpeqagh t _ igleghutisteng ita _ allangughte mangite ait _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh kaqe kenka _ . _ ( _ Igleghut iste nguyagh ngaata _ , _ whanga mni _ allangughte te ite ut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh _ tanem ii llghite uq _ . _ )
Igleghut istet _ liigike ma ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ neghyuke te ma ni luki _ whanga mnun _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipaq esqelluki _ Gentile-enun _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ neghyuke te llegh atun _ peter- mun _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipaq esqelluki _ Jews-enun _ .
katam _ kiyaghnegh _ qepghaqagh u uq _ peter- kun _ apostle- ken naluku _ Jews-enun _ , _ whanga mkun llu _ qepghaqagh u uq _ apostle- ken nalunga _ Gentile-enun _ .
enkaam _ taakut _ igleghutistet _ , _ James -enkut _ Peter -enkut _ John -enkut _ , _ nekevgha te i lghiit _ ugpeqagh nun _ , _ liigike aat _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tun usal i sim anil unga _ tawaten _ qep ghiis qell unga _ Gentile-enun _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ Barnab as - lu _ iigge pung _ aghulate ait _ tugukligh ni luku _ qepghagh u u llegh ung _ Gentile-enun _ , _ ellngit _ Jews-enun _ .
Taan anginaq _ puygu snanigh aat _ kayusii tesqelluki _ akluma lghiit _ , _ taana ta _ nagnegh te yu pigtegkegka _ .
tagtalmi _ taakwani _ peter _ Antioch - mell uni _ sa meng _ anaggutekagh _ . _ enkaam _ sivu itni _ ugpeqagh t _ aghyuugh mig aqa _ anaggute llegh aneng _ apallugh ke luku _ .
peter _ neghe lgusigh i kayugu yagh lghii _ Gentile-et _ ugpeqagh itneng _ kenlanga _ James -em _ yug t _ Antioch -e tes tell ghitnun _ . _ iwernga _ kaa sa ta _ neghe lgusigh nanigh ai _ Gentile-et _ , _ aaftekagh llu _ ellngit neng _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau lghii _ qayughllak _ alinge lghii _ taakut _ yug t _ sagiqe te u kangit _ Gentile-et _ ugpeqe ait _ circumcise- e yaghq aan iluki _ .
taagken _ qamagte luteng _ Antioch -eghmiit _ Jews-et _ ugpeqe ait _ maligte tke aat _ Peter-em _ anaggute llegh anun _ , _ talwa _ Barnab as - lu _ ilate luni _ .
liigike yamki _ qaatke te nghite llegh it _ apeghtuusagh itnun _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ , _ sivu itni _ yug t _ peter _ pi aqa _ , _ " _ elpek _ qaywa _ Jew -ngugh ngaagh pek _ kiyaghte u uten _ Gentile- estun _ , _ nakaan _ Jews- estun _ . _ sangita ngam _ Gentile-et _ Jews- estun _ kiyaghte ste naqute kesi ki _ ? _ "
Jews -ngu luta _ allgegh kau ukut _ , _ nakaan _ Gentile-et _ seghleghqes tet _ .
naqamllu _ liisimakagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ nallghusagh naanghite a _ yuug _ qaatke te llegh akun _ liilightuusagh nun _ , _ tawateng inaq _ nallghusagh lleqe a _ ugpeqe i llegh akun _ Jesus _ Christ-ameng _ . _ talwa _ whangkuta _ Jews-en i _ ugpeq egkaq aghput _ Christ _ Jesus _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ nallghus iisqell uta _ ugpeqe lleg mteggun _ Christ-a _ , _ nakaan _ qaatke te lleg mteggun _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ qaatke te llegh akun _ liilightuusagh nun _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ nallghusagh yaghqaqe nghite a _ .
Jews-en i _ whangkuta _ nallghusagh sug u kumta _ Christ-akun _ , _ nakaan _ liilightuusagh tgun _ , _ ila ita _ Jews-et _ seghleghqe ste u ni lleqe ainkut _ Gentile- estun _ . _ enkaam _ Christ- ang uf taa _ seghleghqe ste ngughte ste i lghii _ ? _ yeghlegi llu _ !
liilightuusagh t _ pegtekaqe anka _ , _ atuqe nqigte yagute kumki _ taawa _ liilightuusagh nun _ anaggute lleqe unga _ .
liilightuusagh tgun _ tuqu kau unga _ liilightuusagh nun _ kiyaghte yaghqaa lunga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
qaquuragh te kau unga _ Christ-amun _ maligte te lunga _ , _ enkaam _ whanga u nanigh ma uq _ kiyaghte lghii _ ; _ Christ- angugh simaaq _ kiyaghte lghii _ ilu mni _ . _ Kiyagh teng ngugh ngaaghma _ yugusigh mni _ , _ kiyaghteng nguunga _ ugpeqe i lleg mkun _ ighneghagh neng _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ piniqe kanganga _ , _ tuune kau lghii llu _ whanga mnun _ .
enkaam _ pakig igate aqa _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusagh a _ . _ yuug _ qaatke te llegh mikun _ liilightuusagh nun _ nallghusagh yaghqaa yagh kan _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ , _ taawa _ Christ-am _ tuqu llegh a _ temngingu nayagh uq _ .
Nall ughh aghmeng _ elpek si _ Gal at ia- gh m iini _ ! _ kitum _ puughte isi _ ? _ P uyg us tegguu _ apegh u aqe aqe yaqegka _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ tuqu llegh a _ qaquuragh kun _ ?
Aap tagh ll amsi _ : _ naten _ allgegh tekaq es tekek _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ , _ qaatke te llegh gpesigun _ liilightuusagh nun _ nalighmeng _ ugpeqe llegh gpesigun _ nagatekagh i _ ?
Nall uu pig et sii _ ? _ Agleghnalghiig nekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ piinligh luku _ nutaghagh _ unguvallegh i _ , _ apeghiigh naq es teg guu - u _ elpesi neng _ katam _ ?
ikfiqe llegh i _ temngingu a _ ? _ ugpeqe pestaagh aqa _ temngingu nghite uq _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tuun egkaq is ii- i _ taghneghagh gmineng _ , _ allaaghlluwhaght i kaa w all uu _ akule gpesini _ qayughllak _ qaatke kesi _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ nalighmeng _ ugpeqe kesi _ nagaqughkagh i _ ?
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ apegh kaqe aat _ Abraham-em _ ugpeqe kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh kaqe a _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ .
enkaam _ elpek si _ liisimake lleqe asi _ tamaakut _ ugpeqe i lleg leg t _ kiyaghnegh kun _ Abraham-em _ king unegh pig aqii _ .
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ aap qes taq aqaat _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nallghusagh naqe ni luki _ Gentile-et _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ ugpeqe i llegh itgun _ . _ neghigh luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh kaqe a _ taana _ pinigh lghii _ ungipagh _ Abraham -emun _ , _ whaten _ pi aqngami _ , _ " _ Qamagtengngwaagh luteng _ nuna m _ ramke i _ quya ste lleg nge naqngu ut _ elpegun _ . _ "
Abraham-em _ ugpeqe kaqe a _ enkaam _ quya ste lleg ngekagh _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ tamaghhagh mi _ ugpeqe i lghii _ quya ste lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ ellnga tun _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe ai _ tamaakut _ sighima lghiit _ qaatke te llegh megteggun _ liilightuusagh nun _ nallghusagh lleqe ni luteng _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ . _ qayughllak _ igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ qaatke nghite kaki _ tamaghhagh ita _ igaqe nga lghiit _ igagh itgun _ liilightuusagh t _ nanqigte lleg nge lleqe uq _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luni _ . _ "
Wh ateghlluwaaq _ liigike nagh uq _ , _ kina _ alngunak _ nallghusagh yaghqaa nghite uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ qaatke te llegh mikun _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ qayughllak _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ taana _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh qagh a _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ kiyaghte lleqe uq _ ugpegh llegh mikun _ . _ "
iwernga _ qaatke te lghii _ liilightuusagh nun _ sighima u nghite uq _ ugpegh llegh kun _ , _ qayughllak _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ sighima lghii _ liilightuusagh tgun _ kiyaghte lleqe uq _ qaute kete luki _ . _ "
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtekaqe ainkut _ aghyuugh na luta _ apallugh ke luki _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ iwernga _ Christ-am _ nav egh qell ik aqiinkut _ nanqig llegh qam nneng _ tugu llegh mikun _ aghyuugh lleghqagh ut _ . _ qayughllak _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ nanqigtekau uq _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luni _ tamaghhagh mi _ agaghtekagh _ uqfig kun _ . _ "
Christ _ Jesus-em _ nav egh qell ik aqiinkut _ enkaam _ ellnga kun _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya stekaqe ai _ Gentile-et _ taagken _ ataasigh meng _ quya ste llegh meng _ akequsagh kekagh minun _ Abraham -emun _ . _ enkaam _ ugpegh llegh kun _ allgegh ta gput _ taghneghagh k _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ke gkakek _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ ungip aatagh ll amsi _ usputaghqagh meng _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ pi aqe lghii neng _ : _ yug k _ akequs kum ek _ sa meng _ , _ igaqe luku _ igagh kun _ , _ ategh tek llu _ igaqe lukek _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ aghula i aghte yaghqaqe nghite a _ akequ tu tellgh ak _ nalighmeng _ ila yaghqaqe nghite a _ .
kiyaghnegh _ akequ sang llagh te q aaguq _ Abraham -em unllu _ king ungh anunllu _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ngllagh mangite ai _ , _ " _ K ing ungh i _ , _ " _ A ke qu sang llagh te q aaguq _ ataasigh inagh mun _ kingunegh mun _ , _ taana _ Christ- anguuq _ .
taana _ liigike sug aqe yagh aqa _ : _ kiyaghnegh _ akequsagh ngllagh kau uq _ Abraham -emun _ enkaam _ akequsagh ni _ pi naqe ni kaqe a _ . _ 4 3 0 _ ayumiqullegh t _ kingu itneng _ akeqe i llegh mi _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh i _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ taana _ akequsagh _ sat ngun anigh qen naanghitaa _ nalighmeng _ naaf qen naanghitaa _ .
liilightuusagh tgun _ allgegh hnaq ngu kum teggu _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusagh a _ , _ taawa _ akequsagh akun _ allgegh h naanghi taghput _ . _ iwernga _ akeqe i llegh mikun _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusagh ni _ tuune kaqe a _ Abraham -emun _ .
sangameng _ liilightuusagh t _ tuune kau aat _ ? _ tuune kau ut _ yug nun _ liigik esqelluki _ anaggute llegh it _ seghleghqe llegh u ni luki _ . _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ tawatete kau ut _ kenlanga _ kingunegh _ tagi llegh anun _ . _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ngllagh qagh a _ . _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg tgun _ tuune kaqe ai _ Moses -mun _ . _ taagken _ Moses-em _ uygu kut istem _ tuune kaqe ai _ yug nun _ .
iwernga _ uygu ke te i stesugh niite uq _ ataasigh _ akeqe i kuni _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ ataasigh ghhagh u te mineng _ uygu ke te i stesugh niite uq _ .
liilightuusagh at _ teng v imun _ ayuq atk ii _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh i _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ liilightuusagh m _ unguvallegh ngesaghqagh ke yagh kumikut _ , _ taawa _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh nayagh ainkut _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ taaggun _ liilightuusagh kun _ .
iwernga _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ qamagte luki _ nuna m _ yug i _ seghleghqe llegh m _ anusimingllagh aqe ai _ . _ Enkaangam _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh ni _ tuune lleqe a _ ugpeqe ikagh ghhagh inagh nun _ Jesus _ Christ-ameng _ .
salin _ ugpegh llghite luku _ anusimingllaghagh u yagh ukut _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ liilightuusagh t _ aaghqute aqe u yagh ainkut _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ whangkunnun _ liite ste llegh anun _ ugpegh llegh _ .
liilightuusagh t _ apaqu te i steke yagh aput _ kenlanga _ Christ-am _ tagi llegh anun _ . _ enkaam _ maaten _ ugpeqe i lleg mteggun _ Christ-akun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh yaghqaaghte ainkut _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ .
ugpegh llegh _ tagi ta aneng _ Christ-akun _ liilightuusagh t _ ap aqut istek nanigh aput _ .
ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ , _ qamagte lusi _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh ke aisi _ .
Paaptaay aaq ng afsi _ Christ-amun _ , _ aate lghii stun _ Christ-a _ pik aqaghsi _ tawaten _ pilugug aqe llegh gpesistun _ .
allangughte te ite ut _ Jews -etlu _ Gentile- etlu _ ; _ allangughte te ite ut _ qepghaghtelaagh etlu _ qepghaghtelaagh unghil nguutlu _ ; _ allangughte te ite ut _ yug t llu _ aghnagh t llu _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte lusi _ atunem _ ayuqe usi _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ .
Christ-am _ pik nguk angisi _ taawa _ Abraham-em _ kingunegh ke aisi _ . _ enkaam _ elpek si llu _ pilii lleqaghsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ Abraham -emun _ .
nagnegh te aghte lakun _ whaten _ , _ ighnegh _ pi liite i yaghqagh _ a ta mi _ saghya aneng _ qepghaghtelaagh estun _ kiyaghute kayugu uq _ mekestaaghhaa luni _ , _ qaywa _ ellnga n _ pik sagh ng aagu _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ a ta mi _ pi a _ .
mekestaaghhaa luku _ yug t _ aflengake kaqe aat _ , _ sa u aat llu _ tamaakut _ ellnga n _ pi kaghqagh i _ kenlanga _ ata an _ pi yaghqaaghte ni llegh anun _ .
whangkuta llu _ tawatete yagh ukut _ . _ taghnughhagh u luta _ qepghaghtelaagh uyagh tukut _ nuna m _ igleghutisteng itnun _ tughneghagh nun _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh a _ aghneq _ kaate yan _ kayagtekagh a _ ighnegh ni _ , _ allgeghkagh _ aghnagh kun _ . _ ellnga n _ qaatke kaqe ai _ liilightuusagh t _ 
iteme te na luta _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ avaqut alii tesqell ut allu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
elpek si _ avaqutagh ke te mineng _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ ighnegh mi _ taghneghagh kek _ kayagtekaqe ak _ ilu mnnun _ , _ qevute lutek _ pikagh k _ , _ " _ Ab b a _ , _ a ta _ ! _ "
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh kun _ qepghaghtelaagh un anigh tuten _ , _ avaqutagh ke aaten _ . _ Av aq utaq aagh tut mineng _ ellmi _ pi ni _ elpenun _ pi liite ste lleqe ai _ .
sivugh nghaani _ nalluk sagh aghsi _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ enkaam _ qepghaghtelaagh uyagh tusi _ kiyaghnegh u nghite ngugh nun _ .
iwernga _ maaten _ liisimakagh i _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ nalighmeng _ ipapestaaq _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ liisimak iste z i _ . _ sangafsi ngam _ uteghte yug tsi _ kayaal ngughnun _ sasii nghite ngugh nun _ igleghte te i lghii nun _ tughneghagh nun _ ? _ sangan _ tamaakunun _ qepghaghtelaagh ughh neqig sug etsi _ ?
paninang _ qaatke aqe asi _ apeghtugh allghit _ aghnegh nun _ , _ tanqigh nun _ , _ ayumiqullegh nun _ aghnegh nun llu _ sal qum siv ik aqegk ang itnun _ .
alingutke aqe amsi _ , _ qamagte luni _ qepghagh te i llegh ka _ elpesi nun _ sasii nghite na yu kan _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ tungsigh vike amsi _ , _ whanga mtun _ lliigh sqe qaghte lusi _ qayughllak _ whanga llu _ elpesi stun _ lliigh kau unga _ Gentile- estun _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ ungipagh qite aqe yamsi _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ seghletun _ pi ma nge itagh zinga _ . _ Neqamik aghsi _ tawani _ taku kaqe amsi _ qayughllak _ qinuyug u lghiinga _ .
qaywa _ qinuyug llegh ma _ seghlegh ligh u aghtesagh ghngaaghmisi _ ukav agh simangit aghpesinga _ nalighmeng _ ighsake ma nge itagh zinga _ . _ yeghlegi _ , _ upughatagh zinga _ nikimqun _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg atun _ , _ nalighmeng _ Christ _ Jesus -etun _ .
naagu _ quya nga llegh kesagh kesi _ ? _ liisimake amsi _ piyaqleg u yagh kata _ iye si _ nusug luki _ tagivagh nayagh asi _ .
enkaam _ anguy ii tes tengng aa _ qayughllak _ ungipaate kemsi _ ipa pig meng _ ?
tamaakut _ yug t _ qaatke te sug kangisi _ Jews-et _ liilightuusagh itnun _ , _ piyuke pigte aisi _ ellmeggnun _ malighqutaq esqellusi _ , _ iwernga _ apallugh at _ pinigh nghite uq _ . _ ellngit a _ aafte sug aisi _ whanga mneng _ , _ ellnginagh meng _ malig tesqell uteng _ .
pinigh uq _ yug t _ sumegh ke gkumegteki _ yug lgute teng _ , _ taaw angin aghhaq _ apallugh it _ pinigh kata _ . _ quunpeng _ taana _ ipa u uq _ , _ aviite yagh ghngaaghma _ .
taghnughhagh ghhagh mni _ , _ katam _ aghnagh m _ aqnighqe llegh atun _ ighni yu llegh mini _ whanga llu _ tawaten _ aqnigh q utken neqig tengng waam si _ kenlanga _ Christ- atun _ lliigh lleghqagh gpesinun _ .
whaa tuq _ maaten _ elpesi nil nguunga _ enkaam _ liisimake na yalghiinga _ naten _ aleghqugh yaghqaa lusi _ . _ sumeghyali tke ghllagu amsi _ .
elpek si _ atuqe i yu lghii ni _ Jews-et _ liilightuusagh itneng _ , _ talwa _ liigike igate asi _ liilightuusagh t _ sa meng _ pi sigh u ta i _ .
igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ Abraham - nguq _ maalghug gneng _ ighnegh lgu uq _ , _ aag llegh a _ qepghaghtelaagh qun _ aghnagh kun _ , _ ila a _ qepgh ate laagh unghil ngugh qun _ aghnagh kun _ .
ighnegh a _ qepghaghtelaagh qun _ allgegh kau uq _ yug stun _ kitumtu te _ alngunak _ . _ iwernga _ ila a _ ighnegh an _ qepghaghtelaagh unghil ngugh qun _ allgegh kau uq _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ke kanga _ .
taake uk _ aghnagh k _ usputagh u uk _ maalghug gnun _ akequsagh gkenun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ Qepghagh tel aaq _ H ag ar _ akequsagh atun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ayuqe uq _ M oun t _ S in ai -mi _ enkaam _ allgegh kau ut _ qepghaghtelaagh q aaluteng _ .
H ag ar _ M oun t _ S in ai -ngu luni _ ayuqe uq _ , _ A ra b ia- melnguq _ . _ Aghnegh m im llu _ Jerusalem -ng atun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ qayughllak _ avaqutagh ke te lghiit _ qepghaghtelaagh uut _ liilightuusagh nun _ .
iwernga _ paamna _ Jerusalem _ qepghagh tel aa ghituq _ , _ ellnga _ naakagh ut _ .
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ quya ghllag i _ , _ elpek _ quminge igate ngugh u te n _ , _ aqnighqe igate ngugh u te n _ ighni yu llegh meng _ . _ ugi gpek _ unite ghngaaten _ , _ aragh a _ quyagh llagem _ angtalanganeng _ qayughllak _ taghnughh aght aagh as aghq aag uten _ aghnagh meng _ ugi leg meng _ . _ "
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ Isaa c -etun _ ayuqe usi _ qayughllak _ avaqutagh ke aisi _ kiyaghnegh m _ apallugh ke luku _ akequsagh ni _ Abraham -emun _ .
tamaani _ aghnegh ni _ taana _ ighnegh _ allgeghkagh _ yug stun _ kitumtu te _ alngunak _ amyuqetagh tke kaqe a _ ighnegh _ allgeghkagh _ taghneghagh m _ pillgh akun _ . _ paninang _ maaten _ tawatete uq _ .
iwernga _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ sa meng _ pi atgu _ ? _ " _ Qepghagh tel aaq _ aghnagh _ , _ ighnegh a llu _ aghulaqe stekek _ . _ qayughllak _ qepghaghtelaagh em _ aghnagh m _ ighnegh a _ nengigh naanghite uq _ a ta mi _ saghya aneng _ maligte te luni _ ighneghagh nun _ qepghaghtelaagh unghil nguum _ aghnagh m _ . _ "
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ whangkuta _ avaqutagh ke nghite ainkut _ qepghaghtelaagh em _ aghnagh m _ , _ iwernga _ avaqutagh ke ainkut _ qepghaghtelaagh unghil nguum _ aghnagh m _ .
Christ-am _ whangkuta _ iteme te kaqe ta aneng _ , _ item ep iig um aakut _ . _ Enkaangam _ nekevgha tek _ aghul iil kaa lusi _ , _ qepghaghtelaagh ughh neqig tegpenasi _ liilightuusagh nun _ .
nagate tek _ ! _ whanga _ , _ Paul _ , _ ungipaate amsi _ : _ circumcise- este kufsi _ liilightuusagh m _ pi sqe llegh atun _ , _ taawa _ Christ-am _ apeghiigh qagh a _ kay utken naanghi taghsi _ .
alla _ kelenga sagh u aghagh ke _ tamaghhagh an _ yuug _ , _ circumcise- este kumi _ taawa _ qaat keng ngwaagh yaghq aqii _ qamagte luki _ liilightuusagh t _ .
liilightuusagh tgun _ nallghusagh ste naqutke gkufsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ , _ aafte lleqe usi _ elpesi neng _ Christ-ameng _ , _ un illeq agh sillu _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ .
Agleghnalghiig nekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ utaq angwaagh put _ sighima llegh ut _ apeghiigh sqellug qu _ . _ sighima llegh ut _ taan anguuq _ : _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nallghus iisqell uta _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ ugpeqe lleg mteggun _ Christ-a _ .
Christ _ Jesus-em _ pik nguk anginkut _ , _ yuug _ megnu nagh nghite uq _ circumcise- e kaa kumi _ nalighmeng _ circumcise- ell ghil kumi _ . _ una _ esgha _ megnu nagh lghii _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh _ Christ-akun _ piniqe i ste i lghii _ yug lgute mnneng _ .
sivugh nghaani _ pinitungwaaq _ pi u yagh usi _ . _ kitum _ qaatke te nanigh ste isi _ ipapigh qellegh mun _ ?
kiyaghnegh m _ tuqlu ghis teg pesi _ pil qen ghit aa _ .
neqamike luku _ , _ " _ Y e ast- ang iighhaam _ ghhuugh ste ghllag aqe a _ akuute aq _ . _ "
elpek si llu _ whanga llu _ pi kut anganeng _ Atanghem _ , _ nallun eq suk enghi tanka _ ugpeqe nanigh fqiita _ apeghtuusagh nka _ elpesi nun _ pisqelluki _ . _ liisimake aqa llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleqe a _ seghleliighqagh igh lghii _ elpesi neng _ , _ kina u yagh ghngaan _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ ungipagh ke i igate unga _ yug t _ circumcise- esqelluki _ . _ tawaten _ ungipagh ke i u yagh kuma _ Jews-et _ amyuqetagh te kete nanigh nayagh aatnga _ enkaam _ qaquuragh a _ Christ-am _ sugag niigh te kete nayagh nghite aat _ .
tamaakut _ seghleliighqagh igh lghiit _ elpesi neng _ circumcise- ellegh meng _ , _ ellng is tuq _ circumcise- es teng ngu luteng _ e un u ch - eng l all ghiit _ ellmeggneng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagsigh kaqe aisi _ iteme nga llegh mun _ Christ-akun _ . _ taawanginaq _ atuqe gpenaan _ iteme nga llegh i _ atugh yaghqaa luki _ seghleghqeng ngalghiit _ piyuke llegh i _ yugusigh m _ . _ itupill _ qepghagh te ki _ ila si _ piniqe llegh gpesigun _ .
qayughllak _ qaatke lleqe asi _ qamagte luki _ liilightuusagh t _ qaatke gkufsigu _ una _ liilightuusagh _ : _ " _ piniqe luku _ yug lgute n _ piniqe llegh gpetun _ elpeneng _ katam _ . _ "
iwernga _ elpesi neng _ qani iqe te naqngu kufsi llu _ pillugute naqngu kufsi llu _ ugighsagh lghii stun _ teghig ke sagh stun _ , _ kelenga tek _ , _ qayughllak _ naafte qughtu tete naqe usi _ .
whaten _ pi amsi _ , _ kiyaghte tek _ qaatkellug kek _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ atuqe naanghite asi _ seghleghqeng ngalghiit _ piyuke llegh i _ yugusigh m _ .
qayughllak _ seghleghqeng ngalghiit _ piyuke llegh i _ yugusigh m _ kipull eg ng aat _ taghneghagh gnun _ , _ piyuke llegh i _ taghneghagh m _ kipull eg ng aat _ piyuke llegh anun _ yugusigh m _ . _ taake uk _ anguyag ke te uk _ enkaam _ atuqe naanghite asi _ piyuke lleg si _ .
taghneghagh m _ maghyaghqugh u u kangisi _ taawa _ liilightuusagh t _ atuqe yaghqaa nanigh asi _ .
yugusigh m _ seghleghqe lleghtuqagh m _ piyuke llegh i _ nalluniite ut _ . _ U kunguut _ : _ al ngun as egh aq _ , _ seghletun _ atuqe te llegh _ , _ nuqete igate ngugh t _ alngunak _ atuq imun _ ,
man iig uu telleq _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ uyviinegh iqe llegh _ , _ anguyiqe llegh _ , _ pillugute llegh _ , _ qungyaqe i llegh _ , _ sakrite llegh _ , _ ellngin aayug telleq _ , _ aaf qem er aa lleq _ , _ qerngugh pag taa telleq _ ,
aqina llegh _ , _ suume llegh _ , _ qerngughte te luteng _ agh sagh paag taqut _ seghletun _ pi llegh mun _ , _ ila aneng llu _ seghleghqe llegh neng _ . _ Keleng as aagh naq laatagh amsi _ sivugh nghaani _ pilleg mtun _ , _ tamaakut _ tawaten _ kiyaghte lghiit _ ilate nga naanghite ut _ quyas legh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh an _ .
Naqam enraq _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ piite stekagh i _ uku nguut _ : _ piniqe llegh _ , _ quya ma llegh _ , _ nekeggmellegh _ , _ nuqete neghtu llegh _ , _ nangllegtagh llegh _ , _ pinigh llegh _ , _ ataasiighmete llegh _ ,
y aku mang ing i telleq _ , _ nuqete llegh llu _ . _ taakut _ iinghute llghite ut _ alngunak _ liilightuusagh ni _ .
Christ _ Jesus-em _ pi ita _ qaquuragh te kaqe ait _ seghleghqeng ngalghiit _ piyuke llegh it _ yugusigh meng _ .
Kiyagh teng ngu kumta _ Taghneghagnekun _ , _ qaatke ltekek _ taghneghagh k _ .
Qukaayug negh uf qaamta _ , _ qinuyugte i fqaamta _ , _ aqinake te fqaamta _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ kina _ seghleghqe llegh m _ kaat f allug tek agu _ , _ elpek si _ kiyaghte lghii ni _ Taghneghagnekun _ , _ pinitungwaaq _ yakugh ke luku _ kayusiite ggu _ malig un neqig tesqelluku _ atanegh mun _ . _ elpek si llu _ , _ keleng angwaagh lusi _ luuraq _ nanghii qull eng nayuk afsi _ .
Kay ut ku tull usi _ seghleliigh llegh gpesini _ ; _ tawaten _ qaatk elleq aghsi _ liilightuusagh _ Christ-am _ qelegh tke a _ .
kina _ sumeghtaghagh kuni _ sa u ni luni _ , _ sa u nghite ghngaaghmi _ , _ ellmi neng _ puugh teng nguuq _ .
yeqay _ tamaghhagh mi _ yug m _ yuvghiigh waagh ligu _ kiyaghtaall eni _ . _ enkaam _ pinigh kan _ quyake nakanga _ ellmi _ katam _ apeghiighkagh ni _ usp utaq ell ngun aan _ kitum _ apeghiighkagh anun _ .
tamaghhagh mi _ yug m _ igleghte te yaghqaqe ai _ ellmi _ pi yaghqagh ni _ .
kina _ alngunak _ apeghtuqagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghtuusagh aneng _ , _ pinigh lghii meng _ tuune i li _ apeghtughiste minun _ .
sumeghtaghagh kuvek _ puughte lleqe ni luku _ kiyaghnegh _ elpeneng _ puugh teng ngu uten _ . _ yug m _ sa u a _ piitesigh u aghaghkagh ni _ unatagh yaghqaqe a _ .
piitesighagh kuvek _ efqugh h naluku _ seghleghqeng ngalghii _ piyuke llegh n _ , _ taagken _ unatagh lleqe an _ tuqu llegh _ . _ iwernga _ piitesighagh kuvek _ efqugh h nal ukek _ taghneghagh k _ , _ taagken _ taghneghagh gneng _ unatagh lleqe an _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ .
enkaam _ qinuyagute gpenaan _ pinitun _ pi llegh _ pi lteggu _ , _ qayughllak _ iilqayug nghite kumta _ pi lleghqagh _ kaate kan _ akileghtuusagh nge lleqe ukut _ .
enkaam _ pi lleghqagh lgu negh mta _ iiwleng _ pinitun _ pi aqe lteki _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ yug t _ , _ kiyang _ tamaakut _ anglegute ligh tke aput _ Christ-akun _ .
esghaqagh teki qun _ yaagtu ghllaget _ igagh llegh nka _ lata ma lusi _ !
yug t _ esghaghte yagh ke yug neghtuqagh t llu _ qan atk iy unegh tuq atlu _ pinitun _ qepghagh llegh meggneng _ , _ ellng inguut _ circumcise- es qu ugh waa ghil ghiit _ elpesi neng _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe ut _ qayughllak _ alinge aqe lghiit _ amyuqetagh tke lleg nge na yukagh meng _ ungipagh ke gkumegteggu _ qaquuragh ghhagh inagh a _ Christ-am _ , _ avelghagh luku _ circumcise- elleq _ .
qaywa _ circumcise- e kaa yagh ngaaghmeng _ , _ ellngit _ katam _ qaatke te igate ut _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ C ircumcise- es qesug aqiisi _ qan at ke pig esn aghnal usi _ ellmeggnun _ circumcise- es tekaq nilusi _ .
iwernga _ whanga _ qan an aanghi tunga _ sa meng _ alngunak _ iwerngaqun _ qaquuragh aneng _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ . _ tuqu llegh akun _ qaquuragh mi _ nuna _ qaquuragh ma uq _ whanga mnun _ , _ enkaam _ whanga _ qaquuragh ma unga _ nuna mun _ .
megnu nagh nghite uq _ yuug _ circumcise- e kaa kumi _ , _ nalighmeng _ circumcise- ell ghil kumi _ . _ una _ megnu nagh lghii u uq _ : _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe ainkut _ nutaghagh u luta _ yug ni _ .
tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ qaatke te lghii nun _ apeghtuusagh mnun _ , _ yeqay _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekeggmellegh a llu _ nangllegtagh llegh a llu _ ellngit nite li _ , _ israel- nga ni llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
whaken _ kenle ke luku _ kitum _ alngunak _ alla _ seghleliigh ste fqaama _ pi linga _ qayughllak _ yugusim nilnguut _ maamellegh t _ kelgute u aat _ qep h agh te laagh ul qa _ Jesus-mun _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ yeqay _ piniqe i nga lghii _ kayusillegh a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinite li _ . _ amen _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Paul -meng _ pi u ut _ . _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ apostle- kaa nga _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh akun _ . _ lata u unga _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ Ephesus - melngughnun _ , _ ataasiigh melnguut _ maligsaagh tengi _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ nanglleg ke lisi llu _ nekeggmell elg us li sillu _ .
usuqe lleg nge li _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ata a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ ! _ Christ-akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ quyas tengng w iinkut _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ tunute yameng _ qilag ta meng _ .
nuna _ ulima llghite luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ainkut _ Christ-akun _ pelung i tesqell ut allu _ av utng i tesqell ut allu _ ellmi nun _ .
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe kanginkut _ , _ neghigh luku _ all ugh qin ak egkaq iinkut _ avaqutagh u luta _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ qayughllak _ piyuke kanga _ , _ efqugh ke kanga llu _ .
enkaam _ usuq aghput _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ ighleg gpenani _ nanglleg ke ghllag ainkut _ piniqekagh mikun _ ighnegh mikun _ .
Christ-am _ aaw akun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ iteme te kaqe ainkut _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ . _ seghevute ai _ seghleghqe lleg put _ apallugh ke luku _ nangllegtagh llegh ghllag ni _ 
aq egh qu siq eghll akanga _ whangkunnun _ . _ Pegh qin ghus tiin kutlu _ liigike ste ainkut llu _ 
uspeqe llegh mineng _ salin _ aliigh sigal kem mineng _ sivugh nghaani _ . _ Taananguuq _ kiyaghnegh m _ uspeqekagh a _ , _ pika qaa _ Christ-akun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ uspeqe lleg ni _ apeghiigh lleqe a _ pillegh qagh llug waagh mi _ . _ Qamagtengngwaagh luki _ ulimaagh ni _ qilagmel nguutlu _ nunamel nguutlu _ qerngughte lleqe ai _ , _ Christ-amun _ iglegh utes qelluki _ .
Christ-akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ainkut _ ellmi nun _ yugu luta _ . _ Ayum ir ugllak _ piyuke llegh mitun _ uspeqe kaqe a _ . _ ellnga n _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ piyuke llegh mitun _ pi sta qaa _ .
whangkuta _ Jews-en i _ ugpeqagh ni _ sighimake i yuwhaagh kau ukut _ Christ-akun _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghtaall emteggun _ usuq esleq aghput _ kiyaghnegh _ aange llegh ghllag anun _ .
Christ-akun _ elpek si llu _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ ipapik _ ungipagh _ . _ pinigh lghii u uq _ ungipagh _ ungipaate i lghii _ yuguligh llegh gpesineng _ . _ ugpeqe aqe yafsigu _ Christ-a _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nalluniigh kaqe aisi _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ akequsagh kekagh mineng _ tuune lleqe ni lukek _ .
agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ ipapigh q est iinkut _ pagitaghqagh mnneng _ kenlanga _ whangkuta _ pi liite lleghqagh mnnun _ . _ enkaam _ usuq elleq aghput _ kiyaghnegh _ aange llegh ghllag anun _ !
nagaqugh ma aqa _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ atanegh kun _ Jesus-kun _ , _ piniqe llegh i llu _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ,
neqamike aqe amsi _ yughagh negh mni _ , _ iyamsiqa yagute nghmeng _ taaqe igate amsi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
ata ghllag ke a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ . _ ellnga nun _ tungsigh te aqe amsi _ peghqin ghus qellusi _ taghneghagh gkenkun _ , _ liigik atagh iis qellusi _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
yughagh tke aqa _ nighug _ kuukgute sqellug qu _ ilu gpesinun _ , _ liigike sqellug qu _ sighima llegh _ kiyaghnegh m _ elpesi nun _ pike stekagh a _ qayughllak _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ . _ yughagh tke amsi llu _ liigik esqelluki _ kemnagh ghllaget _ quya ste llegh ghllag t _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh i _ yug minun _ .
yughagh unga llu _ liigike sqellug qu _ seghlegh ghllag u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillegh llaga _ qepghagh lghii _ whangkunni _ ugpeqe i lghii ni _ . _ taana _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite llegh ghllag _ ataasigh u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguv aght i siq egkaa _ Christ-amun _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ taagken _ qilag mi _ kiyaghnegh m _ aqum e simaa _ aghenqignegh mikun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ qu lighpig aagh testekaqaa _ Christ-a _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ igleghut ist eneng _ , _ qelegh i kayug neng _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghill el egneng _ , _ umiileg neng llu _ . _ ategh a _ ingyagh te nga ghllag uq _ ategh yag g aghneng _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ nun agh ragh aghq am illu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ lli kaqe a _ sa u a _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ Christ-am _ itegagh an _ asi anun _ , _ naas quut isteng llaq aqaallu _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ apallugh ke luki _ ugpeqagh t _ .
qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ yugusigh ke ai _ Christ-am _ , _ enkaam _ ellnga _ iighwigh uq _ . _ Christ-am _ iighwigh a _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ nani _ alngunak _ .
sivugh nghaani _ taghneghagh si _ tuqu nga yagh ut _ qayughllak _ qaatke ma ite kesi _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ seghleghqe ste u yagh usi llu _ .
tawatete yagh usi _ kiyaghteng ngu lusi _ nuna m _ seghlegh mun _ iglegh negh anun _ . _ Qaat keng nguyagh agh sillu _ igleghutisteng at _ tughneghagh t _ qilag amel nguut _ . _ ellnga u uq _ aangwaagh lleghpigagh _ tughneghagh _ igleghte te i lghii _ yug neng _ qaatke te igate ngugh neng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
qamagte luta _ kiyaghtekau ukut _ tamaaku stun _ yug stun _ . _ atuqe kaqe aput _ seghleghqeng ngalghiit _ piyuke llegh i _ yugusigh mta llu _ umyugagh mta llu _ . _ enkaam _ qamagte luta _ allgegh kau te mnneng _ seghleghqe ste u luta _ , _ aghyuugh lleg nge naqngu yagh ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh akun _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh _ nangllegtagh ghllag uq _ , _ piniqe pigte ainkut llu _ .
qaywa _ taghneghagh put _ tuqu nga yagh ghngaita _ apallugh ke luki _ seghleghqe lleg put _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvaghtu inkut _ maligte te luta _ Christ-amun _ . _ ( _ Yugul i kaagusi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg ke llegh akun _ . _ )
kiyaghnegh m _ unguvaghtu inkut _ maligte te luta _ Christ _ Jesus-mun _ , _ whangkun nunllu _ aqume lgusigh ste a _ qilag mi _ .
kiyaghnegh _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ kingu liigh aghnun _ liite sqellug qu _ piniqe llegh ghrukutaaghllag ni _ whangkunnun _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh akun _ yugul i kaagusi _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ . _ yuguligh llegh i _ elpesi neng _ pil qen ghi taghsi _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusagh ke a _ elpesi nun _ .
yuguligh llghite aisi _ apallugh ke luku _ sa llegh i _ , _ enkaam _ qukaayug utk esaghq aq enghi taghsi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ulima aqe ainkut _ tawatete luta _ . _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ ulima aqe ainkut _ qep ghiis qelluki _ pinigh lghiit _ qepghaqagh t _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ taakut _ pinigh lghiit _ qepghaqagh t _ yataaghq eng ngwaaq aqii _ whangkunnun _ qep ghiis qelluki _ kiyaghte lleg mnni _ .
