aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ teghig ke sagh t _ , _ qawaag t _ , _ nemeghyagh t _ , _ megh m _ teghig ke sagh i _ qimugtekayugu ut _ , _ aaqun _ yug m _ qimugtaghkagh i _ 
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ qimugte naanghite a _ ulu _ . _ nekleg igate ngugh u uq _ , _ seghleghu uq _ , _ esleqnga uq _ tuqunagh lghii meng _ p o is on -meng _ .
ulu _ us uqu siq aqaghput _ atanegh mnnun _ ata mun _ . _ naqam _ seghlegh meng _ neghyugtaghagh usigh qaghkagh ut _ yug lgute mnnun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulimaagh itnun _ ellmite yu gnite luki _ .
usuqe i llegh llu _ , _ seghlegh meng llu _ neghyugtaghagh llegh _ aane kayugu uk _ ataasigh meng _ qanegh meng _ . _ Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ tawatete yaghqaa nghite yagh uq _ .
pinigh lghii llu _ seghlegh llu _ megh _ maaq egk ay uw aak _ ataasigh meng _ sengngugh meng _ ?
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ fig s-em _ uqfig a _ piite ste i naanghite uq _ ol iv es -meng _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ grapes -em _ vine- nga _ piite ste i naanghite uq _ figs- meng _ . _ talwa _ meghtaghvig _ tagh yugh nil ngughmeng _ meqe lghii _ pinigh lghii meng _ megh ite uq _ .
kina _ akule gpesinite a _ peghqinegh lghii _ , _ liigike i ma lghii llu _ ? _ tawatete lleg ni _ kelgute ligu _ pinitun _ kiyaghtaallegh mikun _ , _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh mikun llu _ quseveg ng aghmi _ .
iwernga _ ilu gpesigun _ aqina nga kufsi llu _ , _ ellng iin aayug neghu kuf sillu _ iqlengiqe tke gpenaan _ ipapighqell eq _ , _ qaghya llegh gpesigun _ liisima ni lusi _ .
Tawatel nguq _ peghqinellegh _ qilagtagh u nghite uq _ , _ nuna meng _ pi u uq _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkeneng _ pi u nghite uq _ , _ tughneghagh meng _ pi u uq _ .
nani _ alngunak _ aqina lleg lgu nghaani llu _ , _ ellngin aayug ll elg ungh anillu _ taawa _ kipullgin aall el waa quq _ , _ sa u aat llu _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ seghlegh t _ tawan taqut _ .
iwernga _ peghqinellegh _ qilagte aq _ kiyang _ pelungite uq _ . _ Am alleq aa _ nekegg me tuq _ , _ kavyugite uq _ , _ malighqutagh ke i nga uq _ , _ nangllegtagh uq _ , _ pi nigh staghhiinaghtu te _ pikayug u uq _ , _ tanem ii llghite uq _ , _ yu piin gh uuq _ .
nekeggmellegh _ piitute stun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ tamaakut _ nekeggmellegh mun _ qepghagh kayug t _ piitesighagh aqe ait _ , _ enkaam _ saghna aqe ut _ elte qugh nga lghii meng llu _ pinigh lghii meng llu _ kiyaghtaallegh meggni _ .
Saam _ aaghtiiraagh te ste aqe isi llu _ , _ pillugute ste aqe aisi llu _ ? _ apate lugh qaghkagh i _ , _ seghlegh m _ piyuke llegh gpesi _ pilluwagh aqii _ pinigh lghiit _ piyuke lleg si _ .
qiliigh aqe usi _ avangite negh gpesini _ enkaam _ yugtagh yaghqaghte aqe usi _ allgegh h naluki _ qiliigh ke gkasi _ . _ qiliigh ghllag aqe usi _ taawanginaq _ allgegh te pagningit aqasi _ enkaam _ aaghtiiraagh te aqe usi _ , _ pilluw utaq usi _ . _ allgegh te igate usi _ kiyaghnegh _ aap sig atu tegpesineng _ .
talwa _ aapte ghngaaghpesigu _ kiyaghnegh _ allgegh sigat asi _ qayughllak _ seghlegh mun _ atughqagh u luki _ aapte aqe lghiisi _ . _ piyukekagh i _ elpek si _ katam _ piyukekagh ghhagh inagh gpesinun _ ayuqe aqe lghii _ .
ukughsi _ ataasiigh negh ilngugh ni _ ! _ Liisimak en ghis tegguu _ piniqe gkufsigu _ nuna m _ seghlegh a _ , _ ugumik aghsi _ kiyaghnegh _ ? _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkunigu _ nuna m _ seghlegh a _ anguyag u uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ temngingu ni luku _ whaten _ pillgh at _ , _ taghneghagh k _ kiyaghte lghiik _ ilu mnni _ aqina naqe neghtu uk _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusiite aghagh aqe ainkut _ nuqe tu tesqelluki _ piyuke lleg lug put _ . _ iwernga _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi ut _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusigh aqe ai _ quseveg ngalghiit _ puuru _ kipullegmun _ pi aqe ai _ qukaayug neghet _ . _ "
tuune lusi _ elpesi neng _ katam _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ayag qlighte ggu _ tughneghagh _ , _ anagniigh lleqe uq _ elpesi neng _ .
qantaghalli i aghagh tek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ qantaghalli i aghagh lleqe uq _ elpesi nun _ . _ Seghlegh q est eni _ , _ uughtugh tek _ ! _ elpek si _ ataasiighte llghite ngugh ni _ , _ ukmangigh teki _ ilu si _ qaamkut _ .
quya nghite tek _ , _ asemeghqe tek _ , _ qiya tek _ ! _ nenglaghqagh iqe lleg si _ qiya llegh ughte ki _ , _ quya lleg si _ quya nghite ngugh ughte steki _ .
qusevegte tek _ atanegh mun _ , _ quulvagh lleqiisi _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ seghlequugh u tegpenasi _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ seghlequ uqu m igu _ ugpeqaalgut eni _ , _ seghlequugh lleqii _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ nanqigtekunigu llu _ ugpeqaalgut eni _ nanqig tengng w ii _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ nanqigtekufki _ liilightuusagh t _ qaat keng ngun ghit aten _ . _ yeghlegi _ liilightuusagh t _ nanqigte i stekau te n _ .
kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh u uq _ liilightuusagh ngllagh a _ , _ nanqigte i sigh u luki _ atuqe aqe ai _ , _ enkaam _ sang an始ngam _ nanqig sigu _ yug lgute n _ ? _ kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh u uq _ yuguligh i yaghqagh _ , _ naafqe i yaghqagh _ .
ila si _ whaten _ pi aqe ut _ , _ " _ aghneghmi _ nalighmeng _ unaami _ tawavek _ nuna mun _ aghulaqe lleqe unga _ . _ Tamaan llequnga _ ataasigh _ ayumiqullegh _ , _ mani ngllagh lleqe unga _ . _ "
iwernga _ nallukagh i _ unaami _ sa lleghqagh i _ ! _ talwa _ nallukagh i _ unguvallegh gpesi _ tagtale kaghqagh a _ . _ unguvallegh i _ tan- squghhagh u uq _ , _ agep sugh rug g agh estun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ mulu gpenani _ aviighute kayug _ .
itupill _ whaten _ pi aqe tek _ , _ " _ Atanghem _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ unguva kestagh lleqe ukut _ enkaam _ apeghiigh te aqe lleqe ukut _ sa meng _ alngunak _ . _ "
tawaten _ pi nghite kufsi _ aangaayugte lleqe usi llu _ qan ang ull equ sillu _ . _ tamaakut _ aangaayugte llegh t _ seghleghu ut _ .
enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ liisimake ghngaaghmigu _ pinitun _ pi llegh _ atuqe nghite kunigu _ , _ seghleghqeng nguuq _ .
nagate tek _ aklung ilngugh ni _ ! _ qiya kestagh tek _ , _ iilqe kestagh tek _ qayughllak _ seghleliigh naqngu usi _ .
aklungi si _ aghu ma ut _ , _ aate kasi _ m oth -em _ negh ma ai _ .
G old -e sillu _ silv er -e sillu _ anaghtaa ma ut _ . _ anaghtaa llghite a _ ipapigh qen naq ng waa _ ellngin aayug negh ullegh sillu _ , _ pakignegh u llegh i llu _ nanqigte lleg nge gkufsi _ . _ taagken _ anaghtaa llegh m _ yugusigh si _ naafqe lleqe ai _ katam _ kengh estun _ . _ qaywa _ kinguligh nun _ aghnegh nun _ lliigh ngaagh pesi _ , _ qerngughte i manginagh u usi _ wata _ aklungi igh i na lusi _ .
talwa _ akileghtugh llghite asi _ qepghaghte si _ unatagh ke aat _ piitesigh u aghagh vig gpesini _ . _ nagate ki _ akuz ilg allghit _ . _ Atanghem _ aghtughyaghqaanghi teghllag em _ nagaqugh ma ai _ akilghuu llegh it _ .
Kiyaghtaa llegh pesini _ whani _ nuna mi _ , _ aklungitu te gpesineng _ sa u a _ alngunak _ piyukekagh i _ allgegh taqagh i _ efqugh h nalusi _ elpesi neng _ katam _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesigun _ penniigh stun _ ayuqe usi _ . _ penniigh t _ q ug il i sigh at _ nalluke aat _ qantaghaqun _ tuqute lleghqagh eng _ . _ Nalluk es tegguu _ qantaghaqun _ Atanghem _ nanqigte i lleghqagh a _ ?
elpesi u ut _ nanqigte i ste ikagh t llu _ tuqute i ste ikagh t llu _ anaggute ma ite ngugh neng _ yug neng _ , _ ellngit a _ ayag qligh u mangite aisi _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ qelanegh gpenasi _ kenlanga _ Atanghem _ tagi nqigte lleghqagh anun _ . _ piitesigh u aghagh a _ usputagh qite ggu _ . _ nuna mi _ piitesigh u aghagh luni _ qelanegh yukagh gpenani _ utaqa i aqe uq _ uksaagh m llu _ upengh aam llu _ esl all uw aneng _ nagu ste i kayug meng _ piite yaghqagh neng _ .
elpek si llu _ qelanegh neghllug te k _ neghyu manginagh lusi _ qayughllak _ atanegh _ tagi yaghtugh uq _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ seghlequugh penaki _ ila si _ enkaam _ Atanghem _ nanqig g negh ill isi _ . _ ellnga u uq _ nanqigte i sta _ kaate yaghtugh ngestagh lghii _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ neqamike luki _ uuknaliqistet _ akuzikagh t _ ategh akun _ Atanghem _ . _ usputagh qite ki _ qelanegh gpenateng _ nuqete neghtu luteng _ ikfiqe llegh mi _ pikagh t _ .
quya nga na iqe aput _ uuknaliqistet _ qayughllak _ ikfiqe u ghngaaghmeng _ paninang _ neghyuke manginagh kaqe aat _ atanegh _ . _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ Jo b -em _ nuqete neghtu llegh a _ , _ quya ste llegh a llu _ atanegh meng _ ikfiqe llegh a _ alpag yan _ . _ enkaam _ Jo b -kun _ Atanghem _ liite ste aisi _ nafughtagh llegh mineng llu _ nangllegtagh llegh mineng llu _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ apegh naqe kegka _ una _ megnu nagh pigte uq _ . _ akeqe i negh gpesini _ , _ akeqe i gpenasi _ qilag kun _ , _ nalighmeng _ nuna kun _ , _ nalighmeng _ sa kun _ alngunak _ . _ pi yaghqaa kufsi _ legan _ aang 始 ghh aasi _ , _ pi yaghqaa nghite kufsi _ legan _ nak aaghh aasi _ . _ enkaam _ atuqe aqe teki _ akequsagh si _ , _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ Atanghem _ nanqigte naanghite aisi _ aghyuugh yaghqaa lusi _ .
kina _ akule gpesini _ ikfiqe u a _ ? _ yughagh li _ . _ kina _ quya nga a _ ? _ ilagagh li _ usuqe i llegh meng _ .
kina _ qinuy u waa _ ? _ tuqlugh liki _ Elder -et _ enkaam _ yughagh te kete litgu _ mesiighqellug qu _ ategh akun _ Atanghem _ .
yughagh llegh m _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ naallghute yaghqaqe a _ qinuyug lghii _ yuug _ . _ enkaam _ Atanghem _ yug un qw uugh tes neqig lleqaa _ , _ seghleghqe llegh i llu _ seghevute lleqe ai _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ apegh aqe luki _ seghleghqe lleg si _ ila gpesinun _ , _ yugh aat ku tu taq lusi _ naallgh u telleng esqellusi _ . _ elqughutngagh lghii m _ yug m _ yughagh llegh i _ iknaqe ghllag ut _ , _ allgegh te kayugu ut _ .
elijah _ yugu uq _ whangkutestun _ ayuq elg ii _ . _ Taaku ngin aghhaag neng _ yughaghkagh _ eslallugughte fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ . _ enkaam _ eslallugughte ma ite ngughk _ pi nga yu t _ ayumiqullegh t _ alla _ aghvinleg _ tanqigh _ ilate luku _ .
taagken _ alla _ yughaghkagh _ eslallugughte sqellug qu _ . _ enkaam _ eslallugughte yalghiimi _ nuna _ piite ste ikagh _ neghyaghqagh meng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ una _ kinguligh u uq _ apegh yug kegka _ elpesi nun _ . _ naligh i _ ugpeqe i nanigh kan _ apeghtuusagh pig neng _ , _ kitum _ kayusigh ligu _ ugpeqe i nqigte llegh mun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kunigu _ yugul is leq aak _ seghleghqes tem _ unguva te zikek _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ segh uv ulleq ii _ taam _ seghleghqes tem _ seghleghqe lleg lghute ghllag i _ .
ukut _ lata t _ peter- meng _ pi u ut _ apostle- nganeng _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh itnun _ yug nun _ aghulaqe uute stekagh t _ P on tus -mun _ , _ Gal at ia- mun _ , _ C ap p ad o c ia- mun _ , _ Asi a-mun _ , _ B it h y n ia- munllu _ .
neghigh luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata m _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ ellmi nun _ yugu lusi _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m llu _ taghneghagh m _ pelungighsagh kaqe aisi _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uk _ qaatku tesqellusi _ Jesus _ Christ-amun _ , _ ukmang iigh tesqell usillu _ aaw akun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusillegh a llu _ nekeggmellegh a llu _ wata _ nula lik _ elpesi nun _ .
usuqe lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ata a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ ! _ apallugh ke luku _ nangllegtagh llegh ghllag ni _ allgegh nqigte ste ainkut _ unguvagh tellegh mikun _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ Taam _ sighima lleg nge ste ghllag ainkut _ nallun eq niil ngughmeng _ .
enkaam _ utaqa u aput _ pi liite yaghqagh put _ quya ste llegh ghllag t _ kiyaghnegh m _ aflengake kangi _ yug minun _ . _ aflengake u ai _ qilag mi _ elpesi nun _ enkaam _ aghu naanghite ut _ , _ naave naanghite ut _ , _ gheve naanghite ut llu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillegh mikun _ p aq niigh sagh lleqiisi _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ . _ enkaam _ kenlet gh uu tellegh mi _ aliigh lleqe a _ yuguligh llegh _ yat aghq egkaq _ elpesi nun _ .
Taam _ quya ma ste aisi _ , _ qaywa _ maaten _ natengiighhaq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ seghleliigh yagh ngaagh pesi _ .
tamaakut _ seghlegh ligh u aaghet _ nanghiiqu sigh u ut _ ipapigh qen nalusi _ ugpeqill ep iil gut si _ . _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ megnu nagh aghagh lghii nguq _ gold - nneng _ . _ G old -et _ nanghiiqu nghmegteki _ kenegh kun _ naafqe kayugu ut _ . _ paninang _ ken ghet _ atuqe aqe ait _ pelungigh na luki _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ nanghiiqu yaghqaa uq _ . _ aghula i uute kan _ pelungite luni _ , _ allgegh lleqaghsi _ usuqe llegh _ , _ nighughqell eq _ , _ quulv alleq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ aliightekagu _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ .
esghagh igate ghngaaghpesigu _ pinighkagh i _ , _ esghagh nghite ghngaaghpesigu _ maaten _ ugpeqagh i _ . _ enkaam _ quya ghllagu usi _ repall _ aapgh waagh pagningit aghsi _ angtal anga _ quya llegh gpesi _ ,
qayughllak _ allgegh tengng uk esi _ yuguligh llegh a _ unguva sigh gpesi _ . _ Taananguuq _ apallugh a _ ugpeqe i lghiisi _ Christ-akun _ .
neghigh luku _ uuknaliqistet _ liigikngwaagh naq egkaqaat _ taana _ yuguligh llegh _ . _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe aat _ tunusagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune yaghqagh a _ elpesi nun _ .
taghneghagh kek _ Christ-am _ uuknaliqistet _ ilung it nit kaagu k _ . _ ungipaate kestagh kaqe ai _ ikfiqe lleghqagh aneng _ Christ-am _ , _ quulv alleng ellegh qagh llag anengllu _ ikfiqe llegh an _ kingu aneng _ . _ enkaam _ uuknaliqistet _ liigike naqutke kaqe aat _ kina u yaghqaa ta a _ Christ-a _ , _ qakun llu _ tamaakut _ pi yaghqaa ta i _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ uuknaliqistet _ liigike stekaqe ai _ uuknaliqe tkekagh it _ ellngit nun _ pi u nghite ni luki _ , _ iwernga _ elpesi nun _ pi u ni luki _ . _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ kayagtekau uk _ qilag meng _ . _ ellnga n _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ ungipagh ke i lghiit _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ungipaate kaqe aisi _ tamaaken _ . _ talwa _ yaquleg t _ liigike yu pigtekaqe ait _ tamaakut _ .
Enkaangam _ umyugagh si _ apeghiigh sagh waaghluki _ ayuqe teki _ sa lleghqagh mun _ . _ umyugagh si _ wh ategh llu waagh uluki _ , _ sighimake u aghte ggu llu _ tunusagh _ yuguligh lleg nge llegh _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune yaghqagh a _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ tagi kan _ .
qaatke te lusi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qayughllak _ avaqutagh ke aisi _ . _ enkaam _ atuqe gpenaki _ seghlegh t _ piyuke lleg si _ atuqe u yagh kesi _ . _ tawatete yagh usi _ nalluke te gpesineng _ naten _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh an _ ayuqe ta a _ .
kiyaghnegh _ nakmik este z i _ , _ pelungitu ta aneng _ elpek si llu _ pelungi tek _ sa llegh gpesigun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ pelungi tek _ qayughllak _ whanga _ pelungite unga _ . _ "
yughagh negh gpesini _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ata ke niighkagh i _ . _ nanqigte aqe a _ atu neng waaq _ yuug _ tamaghhagh an _ sallegh tul ng atun _ . _ enkaam _ tallugh ke teggu _ nunatagh ma lusi _ nuna mi _ whani _ .
liisimakagh i _ sivugh nghaani _ kiyaghtekau usi _ sasii gpenasi _ katam _ sivunegh gpesistun _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ iteme te kaqe aisi _ taagken _ sasii nghite ngugh meng _ kiyaghtaa lleghmeng _ . _ tukfigh llghite aisi _ silver- meng _ nalighmeng _ gold-meng _ naave kayug meng _ ,
iwernga _ tukfigh kaqe aisi _ megnu nagh pigte lghii meng _ aaw aneng _ Christ-am _ . _ ellnga _ penniigh aghagh tun _ ayuqe uq _ sall wh aaghh iilnguq _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe a _ Christ-a _ talwa _ sivungagh ni _ nuna _ ulima llghite luku _ . _ maaten _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ aliightekaqe a _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ .
Christ-akun _ ugpeqagh i _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ ellnga n _ unguvagh tekaqaa _ Christ-a _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ quulvagh llak aqaallu _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ , _ sighima llegh i _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ayuqe uq _ .
qaatke te llegh kun _ ipapigh qellegh mun _ pelungigh tekaq asi _ unguva sigh si _ , _ enkaam _ piniq ep iig asi _ ugpeqaalgu tesi _ . _ piniqe te kestagh tek _ ilu gpesineng _ qamaken _ .
allgegh nqigtekau usi _ . _ unguvalleghraghagh i _ tuqu kayug meng _ pi u nghite uq _ , _ iwernga _ tuqu igate ngugh meng _ pi u uq _ . _ allgegh nqigtekau usi _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta itgun _ , _ unguva lghiit _ , _ kenle ite ngugh t _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ qamagte luteng _ yug t _ vegaagh stun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ pinighnagh llegh i llu _ piitesighagh estun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ vegaagh t _ paligh aqe ut _ , _ piitesighagh at llu _ ifkagh aqe ut _ ,
iwernga _ akuzi ta i _ kiyaghnegh m _ quun pek aghq aagut _ . _ " _ Taaku s ta _ akuzite t _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh ke kangit _ elpesi nun _ .
enkaam _ taaqe teggu _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ seghlegh _ atuqekagh i _ . _ iqlengiqe nanigh tek _ , _ pinii yugg nanigh tek _ , _ aqina nanigh tek _ , _ seghlequugh un nanigh teklu _ .
allgegh nghhagh ghhagh t _ quunpeng _ mamagh yug aqe ut _ . _ ellngistun _ quunpeng _ mamagh yug tek _ pelung ilngughmeng _ taghneghagh m _ mamagh aneng _ . _ Ang tan ii tesleq aa _ yuguligh llegh i _ ,
qayughllak _ naa siigh aghsi _ Atanghem _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ .
tagi tek _ atanegh mun _ , _ ellnga _ unguva lghii u uq _ uyghag _ . _ yug t _ ighsakekagh at _ sasiin ghil ngughestun _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe a _ megnu nagh luku _ .
elpek si llu _ unguva lghii stun _ uyghag stun _ ayuqe usi _ , _ enkaam _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ nekefte sigh ke lisi _ kiyaghnegh m _ mangteghagh anun _ . _ Qepgh aa lleqaghsi _ aaftekau lusi _ priest-et _ tuune i lghiit _ aghqe te meng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ellnga n _ tugukligh lleqe ai _ aghqe te t _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ .
igaqe kau lghii _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ , _ " _ Z i on -mi _ nekegte aqe aqa _ megnu nagh lghii _ uyghag _ ; _ kangighagh m _ uyghag ke a _ nakmikegkagh ka _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ ugpeqe i lghii _ ellnga neng _ kayngumiqe naanghite uq _ . _ "
taana _ uyghag _ megnu nagh pigte uq _ elpesi nun _ ugpeqe i lghii nun _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqe i igate ngugh nun _ wh atel nguug uq _ , _ " _ taana _ uyghag _ mangtegh angllagh tet _ ighsakekagh at _ , _ kangighagh m _ uygh ak aagh simakanga _ . _ "
amalleqa _ , _ " _ Taam _ uyghag m _ yug t _ naagte ste aqe ai _ , _ iqu ste aqe ai llu _ . _ " _ naagte aqe ut _ qayughllak _ qaatke te igate ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta anun _ . _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ uspeqe kaqe ai _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ yug ni _ nakmike kau usi _ , _ umiileg m _ priest- ek iisi _ , _ aaftekau usi _ yug ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ ellnga n _ katam _ yug ke aisi _ . _ nakmike kau usi _ aapgh esqelluki _ allaaghlluwh aat _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ tagsigh ikagh _ elpesi neng _ mamleg ghllag meng _ ellmi _ katam _ allaaghlluwh aghmun _ nighug minun _ .
sivugh nghaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ke nghite yagh aisi _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ yug liite ma aisi _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ nalluk sagh aghsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ allgegh sim aagh si _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ .
ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ nunatagh u usi llu _ allaneghtagh u usi llu _ nuna mi _ whani _ . _ enkaam _ kayeme amsi _ ilapga te gpenasi _ yugusigh gpesi _ piyuke llegh anun _ , _ qayughllak _ yugusigh m _ piyuke llegh an _ pilluw aang waa _ unguva sigh i _ .
pinitun _ kiyaghte tek _ akule itni _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ , _ luuraq _ ellngit a _ seghletun _ pi ste u ni na yu kangisi _ . _ esghagh kumegteki _ aneghneghqagh igh lleg si _ usuqe lleqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ aghnegh ani _ Christ-am _ tagi llegh an _ .
atanegh _ apallugh ke luku _ malighqutagh ke lusi _ kiyaghte tek _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ kav em em _ igleghutisteng itnun _ . _ qaatke te lusi _ umiileg mun _ ; _ ellnga u uq _ angegh lleghpigagh _ igleghte te i sta _ .
qaute kete luki llu _ igleghutistet _ ; _ umiileg m _ aghyuu ghi yaqleg ugh testaq ii _ seghletun _ pis tenun _ , _ usuq iyaq legh ugh testek aq iillu _ pinitun _ pis tenun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh ke a _ pinitun _ pi llegh gpesigun _ nepiigh tesqelluki _ nall uuq at _ temngitwh ameng _ akuzite lghiit _ .
kiyaghte tek _ iteme nga lghii stun _ iwernga _ iteme nga llegh i _ atuqe fqaan _ seghlegh mun _ . _ kiyaghte tek _ qepghaghtelaagh ul usi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Quul v aghluku _ tea- ma ghhagh a _ yuug _ , _ piniqe luki _ ugpeqaalgu tesi _ , _ alike luku _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ quulvagh luku llu _ umiileg _ .
elpek si _ qepghaghtelaagh ni _ qaatke utek _ pilii tes teg pesinun _ siiv ak ell eligh lusi _ . _ qaatke gpenaki _ nangllegtagh ghhagh inagh t llu _ , _ umyugaqegtagh ghhagh inagh t llu _ , _ iwernga _ qaatke aqe teki llu _ amyuqetagh lghiit _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ efqugh ke aqe aisi _ sumeghmike nghpesigu _ ellnga _ ikfiqe u lusi _ sa meng _ sapiglleghhiistun _ .
iwernga _ suflughsi ma kufsiki _ qev ut qull esi _ , _ seghletun _ pilleg si _ apallugh ke luki _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ usuqe naanghite aisi _ . _ Naqam enraq _ suflughsi ma kufsigu _ ikfiqe llegh _ pinitun _ pi llegh gpesinun _ , _ taawa _ kiyaghnegh m _ efqugh ke lleqe aisi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ suf lugh tesqelluki _ ikfiqe llegh t _ qayughllak _ Christ-am _ ikfiqe tke kaqe aisi _ . _ ikfiqe llegh a _ usputagh u uq _ elpesi nun _ maligte sqellug qu _ .
ellnga _ seghleghqe igate uq _ , _ iqlengiqe igate uq _ .
Seghl equ ull eng aqng ami _ akite mangite ai _ . _ ikfiqe aqngami _ akeqsagte mangite ai _ . _ itupill _ neghyuke te kau uq _ ellmi neng _ nanqigte i kayug mun _ elqughaghte luku _ .
Christ-am _ ellmi neng _ katam _ aglagh te kaqe ai _ seghleghqe lleg put _ yugusigh mig ke luki _ qaquuragh mun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ tuqung as qell uta _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ unguv as qell uta _ elqughutngagh llegh mun _ . _ kiitigh qu llegh akun _ naallghute kau usi _ .
penniigh stun _ aghulaqe aatagh lghii stun _ ayuqe yagh usi _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ uteghnigh ma usi _ Penniigh niigh te mun _ Keleng ak isteng anun _ unguva sigh gpesi _ .
elpek si _ ugiighkagh ni _ , _ kiyaghte tek _ qaatke te lusi _ ugi gpesinun _ . _ ila i _ nuliigh leg t _ ugpeqe i igate ngugh u ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ . _ iwernga _ tawaten _ kiyaghte llegh gpesigun _ ugpeqagh ughte na yu kata _ sa meng _ pi nghite ghngaaghpesiki _ ,
qayughllak _ esghapag kangat _ pelungi tun _ kiyaghtaallegh si _ , _ alike i llegh i llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
nuyagh kegte yagh llegh m _ , _ ull ng aq ell ghem _ gold-meng _ , _ aarragh llegh m _ pinighnaghsigh igate ai _ ilu si _ .
itupill _ pinighnagh tek _ ilu gpesigun _ qusev egll eligh lusi _ , _ nekeggmellegh ligh lusi llu _ . _ Tawatel nguq _ pinighnagh llegh _ quun pek aghq aaguq _ , _ megnu nagh ghllag uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
sivugh nghaani _ agani _ , _ aghnagh t _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ pinighnaghsagh kayugu ut _ ilu megteggun _ , _ qusev egll eligh luteng _ , _ nekeggmellegh ligh luteng llu _ . _ neghyuke kaqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ qaatke kaqe ait llu _ ugi teng _ .
sarah _ tawatete kau uq _ ! _ qaatke kaqe a _ abraham _ , _ at an qen nik aqaallu _ . _ enkaam _ elpek si _ panike aisi _ pinitun _ pi ma kufsi _ , _ alinge igate kufsi llu _ sa meng _ alngunak _ .
elpek si llu _ nulighhtuqagh ni _ kiyaghute ki _ nula isi _ liigike luki _ nateghtu langi _ qayughllak _ kayaate aghagh ut _ elpesi neng _ . _ Quul v aghluki _ nula isi _ qayughllak _ atunem _ allgegh saghqaq aghsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusagh a _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ saam _ alngunak _ pillgilliqe naanghite ai _ yughagh lleg si _ .
Taaq nigh naq anka _ sa meng _ pillgh enka _ whaten _ : _ qamagte lusi _ ataasigh stun _ sumeghnegh lgute k _ , _ aqniqe te utek _ , _ piniqe utek _ anglegute ke te lghii stun _ , _ nanglleg ke te utek _ , _ qusevegte te utek _ .
yug t _ seghletun _ pi kangisi _ akite gpenaki _ seghletun _ , _ nalighmeng _ seghlequ uq angisi _ akite gpenaki _ seghlequugh meng _ . _ itupill _ akite ki _ quya ste llegh meng _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ tawaten _ pis qellusi _ elpesi nun _ allgegh tesqelluku _ quya ste i lleg ni _ .
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pill ghistun _ , _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ quya nga lghii meng _ unguvallegh lgu yu kuni _ , _ quya ma lghii neng llu _ aghnegh lgu yu kuni _ , _ seghletun _ akuzi nghmeng _ taaqe li _ , _ iqlengiqe nanigh li llu _ .
seghletun _ pi nanigh luni _ , _ pinitun _ pi li _ . _ Nek egg men naq lun illu _ kiyaghte li _ ,
qayughllak _ Atanghem _ esghapag u ai _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ , _ nagate aqe ai llu _ yughagh llegh it _ . _ iwernga _ Atanghem _ teng v imun _ ayuqe ai _ seghletun _ pi lghiit _ . _ "
kitum ngam _ aqnigh lleqe isi _ sagiqe u kufsi _ pinitun _ pi llegh mun _ ?
iwernga _ ikfiq egh ngaagh pesi _ pinitun _ pi llegh mun _ quya ste lleg nge lleqe usi _ . _ alike gpenaki _ yug t _ , _ talwa _ sumeghyali gpenasi _ .
iwernga _ ilu gpesigun _ manigugh aqe teggu _ Christ-a _ Atangh uluku _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ aaptegkangisi _ sighima llegh meng _ ilug pesi nil ngughmeng _ quunpeng _ liigike natu te _ kiimsigh yaqleg g iin aaw aq iteki _ .
iwernga _ kiimsigh aqe teki _ qusev egll eligh lusi _ , _ sii vag ke igh lleg ligh lusi _ . _ seghleghqe nghite kufsi _ umyugagh si _ seghleghni naanghite ut _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ seghlequ uq angisi _ pinitun _ kiyaghte llegh gpesineng _ Christ-akun _ , _ kayngu yug lleqe ut _ tawaten _ akuzillegh meggneng _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyukelq eng nguk agu _ ikfiq esqellusi _ pinitun _ pi llegh mun _ , _ taana _ itagnagh aghagh uq _ ikfiqe lleghqagh gpesineng _ seghletun _ pi llegh mun _ .
Christ-a _ tuqu kau uq _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ apallugh ke luki _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh it _ . _ seghleghqe mangite uq _ , _ iwernga _ tuquma tke kaqe ai _ seghleghqes tet _ tagite na luki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ yugusigh a _ tuqute kau uq _ iwernga _ taghneghagh kek _ unguvagh te kaagu k _ .
enkaam _ taghneghagh u luni _ ungipagh yaghtugh kau uq _ taghneghagh nun _ anusimingllaghvig melngughnun _ .
Taaku nguut _ qaatke te ma ite ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ neghigh luku _ noah _ kiyaghteng nguluku _ . _ noah _ ar k - engll aaluku _ kiyaghnegh _ qelanegh gpenani _ utaqa i kau uq _ qaatke te ma ite ngugh nun _ avutegh qes qelluki _ . _ pi nga yu neng _ inglu llgagh inagh t _ yug t _ itegh luteng _ ark- mun _ yugul i kaagut _ megh kun _ .
Taananguuq _ megh _ uspute aq _ paaptaaye llegh mun _ yuguligh i lghii _ elpesi neng _ maaten _ unguvagh tellgh akun _ Jesus _ Christ _ . _ paaptaaye llegh _ iqangigh sigh u nghite uq _ yugusigh mun _ . _ itupill _ paaptaaye llegh kun _ akeqe i ukut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ umyugagh mnneng _ seghleghni ite ngugh meng _ .
Jesus _ Christ-a _ qilag mun _ mayugh luni _ aghenqignegh anite uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ enkaam _ igleghte te u ai _ qamagte luki _ yaquleg t _ , _ qilag m _ igleghutisteng i _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgh etlu _ .
ikfiqe kau ta aneng _ Christ-a _ yugusigh mikun _ elpek si llu _ yataaghqe tek _ ikfiqe yaghqaa lusi _ Christ- atun _ , _ qayughllak _ kina _ alngunak _ yugusigh mikun _ ikfiqe lghii _ seghleghqe sug nanigh ma uq _ .
enkaam _ whaken _ kenle ke luku _ unguvallegh gpesi _ tagtale atun _ malighqutagh ke gpenasi _ yugusigh gpesi _ piyuke llegh anun _ , _ iwernga _ atuqe teggu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ .
sivugh nghaani _ seghletun _ kiyaghte lqinagh usi _ qaatku sigal ngughestun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ whaten _ pi kau usi _ : _ seghleghnagh pigte luku _ atuqe te kayugu yagh usi _ , _ qiliigh ke te aqe lusi _ , _ suume uute aqe lusi _ , _ qerngugh u tull usi _ uglagh pestaagh t _ seghlegh t _ atuqe aqe luki _ , _ neqenghaghqete lusi _ , _ meghe uute ghllag lusi _ enkaam _ al ngun as egh aghllag ugh taq usi _ , _ manigugh kaqe asi llu _ iinghutekagh t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ .
kiyaghte nanigh lghiisi _ ugpeqaanghil ngughestun _ , _ liigike igate aat _ sangan _ ilate nanigh u tsi _ seghletun _ kiyaghtaallegh meggnun _ , _ enkaam _ seghlequugh aqiisi _ .
iwernga _ salleg teng _ ellmeggneng _ katam _ apegh yaghqaqe ait _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ nanqigt iyaq leg g iin aghmun _ unguva lghii neng llu _ tuqukagh neng llu _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh ke kau ut _ talwa _ tuqukagh nun _ . _ tamaakut _ nanqigtekau ut _ unguva u luteng _ nuna mi _ whani _ . _ iwernga _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh ke kau ut _ ellngit nun _ , _ enkaam _ taghneghagh it _ kiyaghte yaghqaaghte lleqe ut _ katam _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghte llegh atun _ .
sa u a _ qamagte luni _ kenlet ghu us aghtugh tuq _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ wh ategh llu waagh uluki _ umyugagh si _ , _ nuqete neghtu lusi _ yughagh yaghqaa lusi _ yughagh lleghqagh gpesistun _ .
megnu nagh lleghpigagh u uq _ una _ : _ piniqu te piig lusi _ qayughllak _ piniqe llegh m _ seghevute ste aqe ai _ seghleghqe lleg lghute ghllag t _ .
Upugh angh ul usi _ qikeghte qugh fqaafsi _ .
tamaghhagh gpesi _ allgegh te kau usi _ tunusagh neng _ atughqagh meng _ ila gpesinun _ . _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ tunusagh t _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi si _ atuqe aqe teki _ pinitun _ .
tunusagh leg t _ akuz imun _ akuzi lit _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ . _ tunusagh leg t _ qep ghh aat imun _ qep ghh aat il it _ iknaqe lleg ligh luteng _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh aneng _ . _ enkaam _ sa llegh gpesigun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ kiyaghnegh _ usuqe lleg nge lleqe uq _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ . _ ellnga n _ pikagh ak _ nighugh qelleq lu _ aghtughyaghqaanghi lleq lu _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ amen _ .
piniqekagh mni _ ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ quupkagh gpenasi _ seghleliigh ghrukutaagh ghllaget _ kaate kangisi _ nanghiighsaghagh na lusi _ . _ nanghiighsaghagh lleg si _ allak aa yag unghitut _ .
itupill _ quya tek _ ilate lghiisi _ Christ-am _ ikfiqe llegh anun _ quy ang aghllag esqellusi _ nighughqell gha _ aliightekan _ .
Seghl equ uq angisi _ apallugh ke luku _ maligte yaaghte u ma llegh i _ Christ-amun _ , _ quya ste lleg lgu usi _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh kek _ nighugh qengng alghiik _ kiyaghteng nguuk _ elpesi ni _ .
ikfiqe yaghqaa kufsi _ , _ ikfiqe gpenasi _ yugte aghte u lusi _ , _ tegleg nigh ughte u lusi _ , _ seghletun _ pi ste u lusi _ , _ nalighmeng _ yanutqu ste u lusi _ .
Naqam enraq _ ikfiqe yaghqaa kufsi _ Chris ti an -ngu tegpesineng _ , _ kayngu yug gpenasi _ iwernga _ usuqe nakesi _ kiyaghnegh _ atigh kangisi _ Christ-am _ ategh aneng _ .
nanqigte i lleghqagh _ kaa tuq _ , _ sivuke luni _ piinligh lleqe uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ nengllugut angakun _ . _ piinligh naqngu kan _ whangkutgun _ , _ sall eq an始ngam _ qaatke te igate ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ pinigh lghii nun _ ungipagh anun _ ?
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pill ghistun _ , _ " _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ pegnem _ yugul i kaa kuy eng _ , _ avelgh asing waal ghiit _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ seghleghqes tetlu _ naten 始ngam _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe aat _ ? _ "
Enkaangam _ tamaakut _ ikfiqe lghiit _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ , _ elqughute luteng _ pi lleqe ut _ , _ neghyuke te lleqe ait llu _ unguva sigh teng _ ataasiigh melngugh mun _ Ulim agh iste mun _ .
sa meng _ piighhe yug anka _ Elder -et _ yughaghvig pesi nilnguut _ . _ whanga llu _ Elder -ngu unga _ , _ esghapag kaqe kegka llu _ Christ-am _ ikfiqe llegh a _ , _ ilate yaghqaa unga llu _ Christ-am _ aange llegh ghllag anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ aliightekagu _ .
enkaam _ qelegh yug amsi _ Elder -en i _ whaten _ : _ pennagh igh nigh ughte u tek _ kiyaghnegh m _ penniigh itnun _ ; _ neghyuke te kaqe ai _ elpesi nun _ aflengak esqelluki _ . _ aflengake teki _ qayughllak _ aflengake yu kesi _ , _ nakaan _ qayughllak _ pi yaghqaa te gpesineng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tawaten _ pi sqe sug aisi _ . _ aflengake teki _ nakaan _ akileghtuusagh nge pigesnagh na lusi _ , _ iwernga _ qayughllak _ kayusigh yug u kesi _ .
agghi te kaqe gpenaki _ aflengake gkasi _ , _ iwernga _ malig sug n aghq itek _ ellngit nun _ .
enkaam _ Igleghut isteng at _ Penniigh niigh tet _ tagi kan _ allgegh u lleqe usi _ pinighnagh pigte lghii meng _ qaghpa meng _ qelmegh i uute yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ elpek si _ uyuqligh ni _ malighqutagh ke lusi _ siivanllegh nun _ . _ qamagte lusi _ qusev gu tull usi _ qayughllak _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ kipullegmun _ ayuqe ai _ qukaayug neghet _ , _ iwernga _ kayusigh aqe ai _ quseveg ngalghiit _ . _ "
Enkaangam _ elpesi neng _ katam _ quseveg ng atek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aghtughyaghqaanghi teghllag mun _ . _ taagken _ quulvagh lleqiisi _ nakmikegkagh mini _ aghneghmi _ .
qamagte luki _ sumeghyali tke gkasi _ pegte ki _ ellnga nun _ , _ qayughllak _ aflengake u aisi _ .
liisima lusi _ , _ kelenga lusi _ . _ anguyag i _ tughneghagh _ iglegha u uq _ ugini lghii tun _ li on -etun _ , _ ivagh i aqe uq _ kina _ naaf qen naluku _ .
ayag qlighte ggu _ tughneghagh _ ayep sug ilngugh qun _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ , _ liisimake luki _ ugpeqaalgu tesi _ nunataghh aan ilnguut _ tawaten _ ellngit llu _ ikfiqe u ut _ .
iwernga _ natengiighhaq _ ikfiqe llegh gpesi _ kingu aneng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniq ing aghllagem _ tea- ma anun _ , _ ellnga n _ katam _ nallghusagh u lleqe aisi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ . _ ugpeqe i lleg si _ iknaqugh sagh lleqii _ , _ ayepsugighsagh lleqe ai _ , _ aghul iil k aagh tesleq ii _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ Christ-akun _ ila tesqellusi _ kenle ite ngugh mun _ aange llegh ghllag minun _ .
qamagte luku _ aghtughyaghqaanghi lleq _ ellnga n _ pi ke aa _ quunperugllag _ ! _ amen _ .
silas _ ataasiigh mel nguug uq _ ugpeqagh u lgute a _ ; _ igagh te aqe aanga _ takestaaghhagh tgun _ lata mkun _ elpesi nun _ . _ lata nka _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqell ep iig aneng _ ayuqe ut _ . _ ungipaate amsi llu _ kayeme amsi llu _ kiyagh tek est iis qellusi _ piniqe llegh ani _ .
Ugpeq aalgu tesi _ Babyl on- melnguut _ , _ elpesi stun _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ . _ ellngit a llu _ , _ eight- nghma llu _ Mar k -em _ piniqe aisi nguq _ .
quyake te aqe tek _ naagh llegh kun _ Christ-am _ piniqe llegh akun _ . _ nekeggmellegh _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinite li _ Christ-am _ pi liite ke ii te ni _ .
ukut _ lata t _ simon _ peter- meng _ pi u ut _ . _ Qepghagh tekaa ngallu _ , _ apostle- kaa ngallu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ . _ lata aqe amsi _ qamagte lusi _ allgegh tekagh ni _ ugpeqe i llegh meng _ whangkutestun _ ayuqe lghii meng _ . _ All gegh tek aqaghput _ ugpeqe i llegh ut _ elqughutngagh llegh akun _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ , _ Kiyagh neqeg kef utlu _ Yugulighis tek eg kef utlu _ .
piniqe llegh nkuk _ nekeggmellegh nkuk _ wata _ nula lik _ elpesi ni _ liisimake llegh gpesigun _ kiyaghnegh llu _ Jesus- lu _ atanegh ut _ .
Jesus _ aghtughyaghqaanghill elgu uq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ taaggun _ aghtughyaghqaanghillegh qun _ tuune kaqe ainkut _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ akluk egkam nneng _ kiyagh tesqelluta _ kiyaghnegh yug neghtu luta _ . _ tamaakut _ allgegh tek aqaput _ qayughllak _ liisimak eg kefut _ Jesus _ . _ tuqlugh ainkut _ ila tesqelluta _ quulv allegh min unllu _ pinigh llegh minun llu _ .
Aghtugh yaghqaanghi llegh mikun _ , _ Jesus-em _ tuune kaqe ainkut _ akequsagh mineng _ megnu nagh pigte lghii neng llu _ pi vag na pigte lghii neng llu _ . _ tamaagun _ akequsagh tgun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilate ste lleqe aisi _ nangaghnegh minun _ . _ taagken _ anag yaqleg ugh lleq asi _ seghlegh m _ piyuke llegh i _ nunamel nguut _ naaf qii yaqleg et _ elpesi neng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nang aghn el itk aqut anganeng _ elpek si _ , _ taaku ngin aghhaag neng _ pinaq ell ghagh si _ qamagte luku _ ilate ki _ ukut _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesinun _ : _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesinun _ ilate ggu _ pinigh llegh _ , _ pinigh llegh gpesinun _ ilate ggu _ liisima llegh _ ,
liisima llegh gpesinun _ ilate ggu _ nuqe tut illeq _ , _ nuqe tut illegh pesinun _ ilate ggu _ aghul iil kaam alleq _ , _ aghul iil kaam ellegh pesinun _ ilate ggu _ kiyaghnegh yug neghtu llegh _ ,
kiyaghnegh yug neghtu llegh gpesinun _ ilate ggu _ nangll e ku tu telleq _ ugpeqaalgu teg pesinun _ , _ nangll e ku tu tellegh pesinun _ ilate ggu _ piniqe llegh _ .
tamaakut _ atuqe u kufsiki _ , _ nula stekufsiki llu _ kayusiite lleqe aisi _ atughqagh u lusi llu _ kayute kaghqagh u lusi llu _ liisimake llegh gpesigun _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ .
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ atuqe nghite kumiki _ tamaakut _ , _ amugtagh pigte uq _ enkaam _ esghaatepagningite uq _ . _ puygu kaqe a llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ ukmangigh kaqe kanga _ seghleghqe lleqe yagh ka aneng _ .
Enkaangam _ ugpeqaalgutem ni _ , _ nallun eq niigh waagh teggu _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqlugh kaqe aisi llu _ nakmike kaqe aisi llu _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ taawa _ iqiteqaghte naanghite usi _ Christ-ameng _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ quyake sigh ke ghllag lusi _ itegh ste lleqe aisi _ kenle ite ngugh mun _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ atanegh mta llu _ Yugulighis tem tallu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ .
qaywa _ liisimake ghngaaghpesiki _ taakut _ ipapi llghet _ , _ sagiqe te u ghngaaghpesiki llu _ qaute kete na luki _ , _ iiwleng _ neqangugh lleqe amsi _ taaku neng _ ipapi llegh neng _ elpesi nun _ apeghtugh tekagh mnneng _ .
sume mni _ itagnagh uq _ negh ka ughte aatagh kumsi _ tamaakuneng _ unguva u lunga _ .
liisimake aqa _ tuqu yaghtugh unga _ qayughllak _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ ungipaate kestagh kaqe aanga _ .
pi naqe llegh ka _ qamagte luku _ apeghtugh amsi _ tamaaken _ , _ enkaam _ tuqu llegh ma _ kingu aneng _ neqagh te aqe lleqe asi _ .
atuqe mangite aput _ peghqin iq ut ngwaagh luki _ ungipaghaate ngllaghkagh t _ apegh aqe yamtekek _ elpesi nun _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgh allu _ tagi llegh a llu _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ . _ whangkuta _ katam _ iy egh lluw aam nneng _ esghaqaghkagh ut _ ellnga n _ aange llegh ghllag a _ .
Jesus-em _ allgegh taq ng agu _ quulv alleq lu _ nighugh qelleq lu _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ata meng _ , _ nagaqugh kaqe a _ me a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ Qul igh pig aalghii _ N igh ugh qengng aghllak _ . _ ata m _ pika qaa _ , _ " _ Un anguuq _ piniqe pigtegkegka _ ighnegh ka _ , _ efqugh ke pigtegkegka _ . _ "
whangkuta _ whangkunneng _ katam _ nagatk aqaghput _ me _ qilag meng _ Jesus- me taq ng amta _ agleghnagh lghii mi _ naayghagh mi _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ whangkunni _ nallun eq naq ragg ii tut _ uuknaliqistet _ uuknaliqe tkekagh it _ ipa u ta i _ . _ elpesi nun _ pinigh lleqe ut _ sumeghtaghaat keng ngwaa qu f siki _ uuknaliqe tkekagh it _ , _ qayughllak _ kenegh lghutagh m _ kuukgute llegh atun _ ayuqe ut _ mamleg mun _ . _ tawatete kestagh tek _ kenlanga _ Christ-am _ tagi lleghqagh an _ aghnegh anun _ . _ taagken _ nighug a _ kuukgute lleqe uq _ ilu gpesinun _ , _ unaa ngu m _ ighaleqetaagh atun _ ayuqe luni _ .
Liigik ngwaagh yaghq aqaghsi _ una _ : _ kitum _ alngunak _ ellmi neng _ katam _ liigikepagningite ai _ sa meng _ pi sigh u ta i _ uuknaliqe llegh t _ Akuz it nilnguut _ igaqegkagh ni _ .
Uuk naliq istet _ nakmike mangite ait _ uuknaliqe te kete yaghqagh teng _ . _ itupill _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ uuknaliqistet _ akuzi tel itk aqii _ akuz is qelluki _ kiyaghneghtagh meng _ .
sivugh nghaani _ agani _ uuknaliq is tesiigh waaghet _ akulng it n is agh tut _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itni _ , _ katam _ apeghtughiste sighwaaghet _ aku leg pesi nill equt _ . _ nallu negh gpesini _ apeghtugh lleqe aisi _ iqleng ameng _ naaf qen naluki _ ugpeqe i lleg si _ . _ qaywa _ Christ-am _ Pil ii tes tengita _ tukfigh kaqe ghngaisteng _ iteme te na luki _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ , _ paninang _ pik nanigh lleqaat _ . _ enkaam _ n uus kag an _ ellmeggneng _ naafqe ste lleqe ut _ .
yug lghute t _ maligte te lleqe ut _ apeghtughiste sighwaagh nun _ kay ngun al ghi nun _ kiyaghtaall ghitnun _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ seghlequugh lleqiit _ apeghtuusagh pig t _ atugh put _ .
P ak ig tellegh megteggun _ apeghtughiste sighwaaghet _ aklungi igh i yug lleqe ut _ elpesi neng _ . _ enkaam _ apegh lleqe ait _ apeghtuusagh ngllaghkagh teng _ mani nge na luteng _ elpesi neng _ . _ ima _ negh ighh aaneng _ kiyaghnegh _ Nanqig t isteng atlu _ N aaf q iis teng atlu _ qavagh igate uq _ aghyuugh yaqleg ugh ll ukillu _ ayuqe ai _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh mangite nghite ai _ yaquleg t _ seghleghqe aqngata _ , _ iwernga _ miluute kaqe ai _ hell- mun _ . _ tawani _ pisaghtiigh ghllag mi _ qiipragh usigh ng aat _ , _ utaqa i lghiit _ aghnegh anun _ nanqigte i llegh m _ .
neghigh luku _ noah _ kiyaghteng nguluku _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh mangite nghite ai _ yug t _ avelgh asing waa ghi kat _ ellmi neng _ , _ enkaam _ uleve stekaqe a _ nuna _ . _ iwernga _ yugul ik aqaa _ noah _ , _ ila i llu _ maaghraghvinleg _ yug t _ . _ ( _ noah _ ungipaghte u kau uq _ elqughutngagh lghii mun _ kiyaghtaallegh mun _ . _ )
kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh kaqe ak llu _ ne ghllag k _ S od om -enkuk _ G om or rah - nkuk _ . _ naafqe kaqe ak _ kenegh kun _ kenlanga _ ashes- ngughte llegh gkenun _ . _ enkaam _ usputagh ughtekaqe ak _ sa yaghqaa ta i _ yug t _ avelghagh sighwaagh ikagh t _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
L o t _ elqughutngagh lghii u yagh uq _ yuug _ kiyaghtekagh _ akule itni _ tamaakut _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ . _ Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ seghleliigh tke ghllag kaqe ai _ unguva sigh gmikun _ esghapag luki _ , _ nagate luki _ seghletun _ kiyaghtaall ghit _ , _ nuqete gpenateng llu _ sex - ell ghit _ . _ enkaam _ Atanghem _ yugul ik aqaa _ .
taawa _ legh igh iitagh ut _ , _ atanegh _ liisimake uq _ naten _ yuguligh lleghqagh meng _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ yug t _ , _ nanghii gh sagh alleng enghata _ . _ kelengake u ai llu _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ aghyuu lleng ellegh melnguut _ , _ utaqa i ma luki _ aghnegh anun _ nanqigte i llegh m _ .
taana _ aghyuugh llegh _ kiyang _ tamaakunun _ ayuqe uq _ maligte te lghii nun _ yugusigh meng _ seghletun _ piyuke llegh ghllag itnun _ , _ qaatke te yug igate ngugh nun llu _ kitumun _ alngunak _ . _ tamaakut _ apeghtughiste sighwaaghet _ tetug igate ut llu _ ell m ingu yug negh uut lu _ . _ alinge gpenateng _ seghlequugh aqiit _ nighug rak egtat _ .
yaquleg t _ iknaqe aghagh ut _ , _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghiteaghaghte ut _ taaku neng _ nighug rakeg tan eng _ , _ paninang _ sivungagh ni _ Atanghem _ anaggute ma ni naanghite ait _ nighug rak egtat _ .
iwernga _ tamaakut _ apeghtughiste sighwaaghet _ seghlequugh aqiit _ sa u aat _ liigike gpenaki _ . _ teghig ke sagh stun _ sumeghtagh agh pagning il nguug ut _ . _ tuqute lleg nge lleqe ut _ teghig ke sagh stun _ allgegh luteng _ teghig tugh luki _ tuqu tke aat _ .
uglagh lghiit _ ikfiqe ste aqe ait _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ ikfiqe ste lleqe ai _ . _ talwa _ aghnegh raaghinagh mi _ meghe uute ghllag aqe ut _ , _ yugusigh meng llu _ seghlegh t _ piyuke llegh it _ atuqe aqe ait _ . _ kayngusaghagh te ghllag aqe ut _ neqenghaghqe lgusigh ma lusi _ , _ enkaam _ akule gpesini _ nukeggnaghqekagh stun llu _ ell m iig utk as tunllu _ ayuqe ut _ .
esghagh nghmegteki _ aghnagh t _ qiliigh ke aqe ait _ . _ seghleghqe sug neghtu ut _ iwernga _ seghleghqe lleg lghutagh nge i ta _ kep sugh sigat ngwaagh iit _ . _ manu igh aqe ait _ yug t _ puughhe negh kegtagh t _ seghleghqes ug esqelluki _ , _ pakignegh pigte ut llu _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe ai _ !
tamaakut _ apeghtughiste sighwaaghet _ ugpeqe nanigh kaqe ait _ apeghtuusagh pig t _ . _ enkaam _ aghulaqe kau ut _ B al aam -em _ pillgh atun _ pi na luteng _ . _ ( _ ighnegh ke yagh kanga _ B e or -em _ . _ ) _ quya aqe uq _ yug t _ akileghtugh nghatni _ seghletun _ pi sqellug qu _ .
iwernga _ d on ke y- m _ akuz ip agning il nguum _ , _ yug m _ me akun _ ineghtekaqe a _ Balaam _ . _ enkaam _ aghula i aghtekaqe a _ uuknaliqe i sta _ sumeghnegh igh ulliqe llegh aneng _ .
tamaakut _ apeghtughiste sighwaaghet _ pateghkagh stun _ sengngugh stun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ qilag waagh es tunllu _ ayuqe ut _ anuqe ghllag m _ teng tek angi _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekaghqagh ngllagh te kaqe ai _ pisaghtiigh ghllag mi _ .
Agh saagh mik ameng _ aangaayugte aqe ut _ temngitwh ameng _ akuzite kete luteng _ . _ pi aqe ut _ itagnagh ni luku _ malighqutagh ke lleghqagh _ seghlegh nun _ yugusigh m _ piyuke llegh anun _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ taaqe aqe ut llu _ tawaten _ kiyaghte llegh meggneng _ , _ manu igh aqe ait _ tawaten _ pin qig tesqelluki _ .
Apeghtughis te sighwaaghet _ ungipaate kaqe ait _ tamaakut _ yug t _ iteme nga ni luki _ sa mun _ alngunak _ piyuke llegh itnun _ , _ ellngit _ katam _ iteme nga u nghite ghngaaghmeng _ . _ Qepghagh te laagh uut _ seghleghqe llegh meggnun _ enkaam _ seghleghqe llghite a _ naaf qes aq leg w ii _ . _ yuug _ qepghaghtelaagh uuq _ alngunak _ sa mun _ ig leq ataq ilghii meng _ ellmi nun _ .
yug t _ liite aqe yamegteggu _ atanegh ut llu _ Yugulighis tev utlu _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ anag yaghqaqe aat _ nukeggnagh a _ nuna m _ . _ iwernga _ uteghnigh nqigtekumeng _ seghletun _ kiyaghtaallegh meggnun _ uaf- ghqutagh kesi ma kumeng llu _ tamaakunun _ , _ taawa _ kiyaghtaall ghit _ seghlegh atagh aa yaghqaagut _ pi yuwhaagh llegh meggneng _ .
tamaakut _ yug t _ , _ liit ngwaagh luku _ agleghnagh lghii _ qelegh sagh _ allgegh tek aghteng _ , _ tunute kaqe aat _ . _ It aghnagh atagh aghnayagh tut _ liite mangite yagh kumegteggu _ elqughutngagh lghii _ kiyaghtaa lleq _ .
tawaten _ aneghte llghite a _ ipa ughte ste aat _ yug t _ pillgh at _ , _ " _ qikmigh m _ uteghte vike aqe a _ mighyaghkagh ni _ , _ kurugagh llu _ ughvughqekagh _ aglagh nqigte luni _ ugh ar r amun _ ming ugh un neqig taquq _ . _ "
ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ ukut _ alghigh tke ai _ lata llegh ma _ elpesi nun _ . _ tea- ma ghhagh gkenkun _ lata llegh ma _ neqangugh ste naqutke amsi _ liisimakekagh gpesineng _ . _ sumeghtaghigh sqe sug amsi _ tamaakuneng _ ipapigh qellusi _ .
elpesi nun _ neqamike sug anka _ agleghnagh lghiit _ uuknaliqistet _ uuknaliqe tkekagh it _ . _ neqamike sug aqa llu _ qelegh sagh _ atanegh mta _ Yugulighis tem _ aapte qugh a _ apostle- eg pesigun _ .
Liigik ngwaagh yaghq aqaghsi _ una _ : _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ leg asiighw agh telgu yaghqaaguq _ ; _ tamaaku nguut _ malighqutagh ke nga lghiit _ seghlegh nun _ piyukekagh meggnun _ . _ legasiighwagh tke lleqe aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ ,
whaten _ pi lleqe ut _ , _ " _ Jesus _ akeqe i kau uq _ tagi nqigte lleqe ni luni _ . _ naagu _ ? _ ima _ sivunegh put _ tuqu laghate te llegh itneng _ , _ paninang _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ almesiqe aqe a _ nuna m _ piinlillegh aneng _ . _ "
nakmiigh kau ut _ avelgh asi ngwaagh naluku _ una _ ipapilleq _ : _ neghigh luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzite mikun _ ulima kaqe a _ qilag a _ , _ ulima kaqe a llu _ nuna _ megh meng _ , _ megh kun llu _ .
taagken _ kiyaghnegh m _ megh meng _ uleve ste luku _ nuna _ naafqe kaqe a _ .
iwernga _ taaggun _ akuzite kun _ kiyaghnegh m _ aflenga kaqe ai _ qilag a llu _ nuna llu _ naafqesaghqagh u luki _ kenegh kun _ . _ aflengake u ut _ kenlanga _ aghnegh anun _ nanqigte i llegh m _ . _ tawani llu _ aghneghmi _ naafqe lleqe ai _ yug t _ avelgh asing waa ghi kat _ ellmi neng _ .
ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ puygu gpenaan _ una _ ! _ atanegh mi _ aghneq _ ataasigh _ th o us and _ ayumiqullegh stun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ th o us and _ ayumiqullegh t _ ataasigh tun _ aghnegh tun _ ayuqe uq _ .
atanegh _ egnaangite nghite uq _ akequsagh ni _ pi yaghqaa luku _ , _ ila ita _ yug t _ sumeghtagh all ghistun _ . _ yeghlegi _ nekegg me tu taq iisi _ qayughllak _ kina _ alngunak _ ifla yug u nghite kanga _ . _ itupill _ tamaghhagh an _ yuug _ avuteghqe sqe sug aa _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ .
iwernga _ aghnegh a _ Atanghem _ tagi lleqe uq _ tegleg nigh ughtetu te _ . _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ qilag a _ aviighute yaghqaa uq _ eftughuute te ghllag meng _ . _ sa u aat _ qamagte luteng _ qilag amel nguut _ ken ghem _ ughug lleqe ai _ . _ qamagte luteng llu _ nunamel nguut _ panegh lleqe ut _ .
qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ ughug yaghqaa ta itneng _ , _ elpek si _ yug ni _ n atel ngu unaq etsi _ ? _ Kiyaghtaa ll esi _ pelungite lit _ , _ kiyaghnegh mun llu _ ayuqligh t _ ,
utaqa i ma lusi _ aghnegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ Pin aq ell ghagh si _ qamagte luku _ pinitun _ pi tek _ aghneq _ tagi ragkiigh sqellug qu _ . _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ ken ghem _ naafqe lleqe a _ qilag a _ , _ maatnegh m llu _ ughug lleqe ai _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ qilag amel nguut _ .
iwernga _ whangkuta _ utaqa i u ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh aneng _ . _ pi kau uq _ nutaghagh meng _ qilaga ngllagh lleqe ni luni _ nutaghagh meng llu _ nuna ngllagh lleqe ni luni _ . _ tawani _ elqughutngagh lghii inagh t _ kiyaghte lleqe ut _ .
Enkaangam _ ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ utaqa i ma lusi _ tawavek _ aghnegh mun _ pinaq ell ghagh si _ qamagte luku _ pelungi tek llu _ afkuyagh ii tek llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ esghagh ma llegh ani _ . _ Nek egg me teklu _ ellnga ni _ .
sumeghmike teggu _ atanegh mta _ nuqe tut illgha _ elpesi neng _ yuguligh lleg nge sqe qaghte lusi _ . _ piniqekagh mta _ ugpeqaalgutem ta _ Paul-em _ apegh kaqe ai _ taakut _ ataasigh t _ lata aqe yamisi _ peghqinellegh ligh luni _ kiyaghneghtagh meng _ .
lata tke kaqe ai _ tamaakut _ qamagte luki _ lata mikun _ . _ nalighnegh i _ Paul-em _ lata yan _ liigike neghllug u ut _ . _ yug t _ liigik ell ep ag ilnguut _ , _ ugpeqill ep ag ilnguut _ allangughte aqe ait _ sa meng _ pi sigh u ta i _ lat ang anilnguut _ . _ tawaten llu _ pi aqe ait _ ila i _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ enkaam _ naaf qeng nguut _ ellmeggneng _ .
ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ liisimake te gpesineng _ sa aqe ta i _ qaatke te igate ngugh t _ liilightuusagh nun _ , _ kelenga tek _ . _ aghulaqe te ste gpenasi _ anaggute nga lghii nun _ apeghtugh i llegh itnun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ malghukli naanghite usi _ ugpeqekagh gpesineng _ .
iwernga _ nagnegh tek _ wataqaaghaq _ liisimake luku _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ , _ atanegh ut _ , _ Yugulighis tev ut _ , _ nagnegh tek llu _ wataqaaghaq _ piniqe llegh akun _ . _ enkaam _ Christ-a _ usuqe lteggu _ , _ quulv aal teggu _ maaten _ , _ quunperugllag llu _ ! _ amen _ .
taana _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ : _ nagaqughkagh ut _ , _ esghaghkagh ut _ whangkuta _ katam _ iye mnneng _ , _ esghapagkagh ut _ , _ saaftekagh ut _ iigge mnneng _ , _ taan anguuq _ akuzite _ unguvallegh _ .
taana _ unguvallegh _ esghagh yaghqaaghte ste aqngan _ esghaqaghkagh ut _ ; _ enkaam _ whaa _ aap ghagh putlu _ ungipaghkagh ut llu _ elpesi nun _ taana _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ ata mete yagh lghii _ , _ esghagh stekagh _ whangkunnun _ .
Aap ghagh put _ elpesi nun _ sa u a _ esghaghkagh ut llu _ nagatekagh ut llu _ ila tesqellusi _ whangkunnun _ , _ ilate nga lleg mnnun llu _ ata mun _ , _ ighneghagh nun llu _ Jesus _ Christ-amun _ .
lata tke aput _ tamaakut _ quya llegh ut _ iighwigh sqellug qu _ .
una _ ungipagh _ nagaqughkagh ut _ ighneghagh neng _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh naqagh ut _ elpesi nun _ , _ Kiyaghnegh nguq _ nighug u uq _ , _ mam l elleq ragg ii tuq _ .
iwernga _ ilate nga ni kumta _ ellnga nun _ naqam _ paninang _ mamleg mi _ kiyaghteng ngu luta _ , _ iqlengiqe u ukut _ , _ atuq ig atagh putlu _ ipapighqell eq _ .
iwernga _ nighug mi _ kiyaghtekumta _ ellnga n _ nighug mete llegh atun _ taawa _ ilate nga ukut _ ila mnnun _ , _ aaw an llu _ Jesus-em _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh an _ , _ ukmang iiw iinkut _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ .
seghleghqe llghite ni kumta _ puugh teng nguukut _ whangkunneng _ katam _ , _ ipapighqell ghi tu kutlu _ .
iwernga _ apegh kumteki _ seghleghqe lleg put _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ seghevute yaghqaqe ainkut _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ , _ ukmangigh yaghqaqe ainkut llu _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ anaggute aghagh lleg mnneng _ qayughllak _ ataasiighmete uq llu _ elqughute luni llu _ ayuqe lghii u uq _ .
seghleghqe igate ni kumta _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ iqlengiq es tengugh lleq aghput _ , _ akuzi ta i llu _ atuqe u nghite aput _ .
taghnughhagh ghhagh mni _ , _ whaten _ lata u amsi _ seghleghqe fqaafsi _ pis qellusi _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ seghleghqe gkan _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ elqughutngagh lghii m _ manigugh utu te aqe ainkut _ ata mun _ .
ellnga u uq _ iqite sigh _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ , _ whangku ngin aamta _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ pi u nghite uq _ , _ iwernga _ tam agh aghllag an _ yug m _ seghleghqe llegh anun _ ayuqe uq _ .
esgha _ whaten _ ipapigh q utk esaghq aghput _ liisimake i llegh ut _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ qaatke lleg mteggun _ qelegh sagh i _ .
kina _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ liisimake aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ " _ naqam _ qaatke gpenaki _ qelegh sagh i _ , _ iqlengiqe ste u uq _ , _ nalluke a llu _ ipapighqell eq _ .
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ qaatke gkumiki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ , _ piniqe i llegh a _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ipapestaaq _ iighwigh kau uq _ , _ tawaten _ ipapigh q utk esaghq aqaghput _ ellng an itu l v ut _ .
kina _ alngunak _ pi lghii _ kiyaghteng ngun iluni _ ellnga ni _ , _ kiyaghte yaghqaa uq _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ pillgh atun _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ una _ qelegh sagh _ lata tke kegka _ elpesi nun _ nutaghagh u nghite uq _ . _ Taananguuq _ neghightagh _ qelegh sagh _ nagate kayug i _ ima _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ , _ taana _ ungipagh u uq _ nagate kayug i _ .
iwernga _ una _ qelegh sagh _ lata tke kegka _ elpesi nun _ nutaghagh u uq _ . _ Taam _ ipapighqell gha _ esghagh luni _ ayuqe uq _ Christ- akunllu _ elpesigun llu _ qayughllak _ mamleg _ aga _ naghugh teng nguuq _ , _ nighug pig _ kuukgute u uq _ .
kina _ alngunak _ pi lghii _ nighug mete ni luni _ naqam _ ugumi ke luku _ ugpeqaalgut ni _ , _ paninang _ mamleg mel nguug uq _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkunigu _ ugpeqaalgut ni _ nighug mi _ kiyaghteng nguuq _ , _ nighug me tut mineng _ naagte sighqagh ite uq _ .
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugumi ke gkunigu _ ugpeqaalgut ni _ , _ mamleg mete uq _ . _ Iglegh teng nguuq _ mamleg mi _ , _ talwa _ nalluke uq _ navek _ pi u te ni _ qayughllak _ mamleg m _ ayaa stekaqe a _ .
taghnughhagh ghhagh mni _ , _ lata aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ seghleghqe lleg si _ seghevute lleg nge kau ut _ apallugh ke luku _ Christ-a _ .
ata ni _ , _ lata aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ liisimake kesi _ ellnga _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ nukalpigagh ni _ , _ lata aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ kayaalqe kaqe kesi _ tughneghagh _ . _ taghnughhagh ni _ , _ lata aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ liisimake kesi _ a ta _ .
ata ni _ , _ lata aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ liisimake kesi _ ellnga _ ima _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ nukalpigagh ni _ , _ lata aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ iknaqe lghiisi _ , _ akuzi ta i llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilug pesi nilnguut _ , _ kayaalqe kaqe kesi llu _ tughneghagh _ .
piniqe gpenaan _ nuna _ talwa _ sa u a _ alngunak _ nuna m _ pi a _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkunigu _ nuna _ , _ piniqe llghite uq _ ata mun _ .
ukut _ esgha _ qamagte luki _ nuna m _ pi i _ : _ sa u a _ yugusigh m _ piyuke llegh a _ seghleghqe sigh ke aqe lghii _ , _ iye m _ qiliigh ste llegh a _ , _ sa u aat llu _ yug t _ qukaayug te kaqe kangit _ nuna mi _ whani _ . _ taakut _ ata meng _ pi u nghite ut _ , _ nuna meng _ pi u ut _ .
nuna _ aviighute u uq _ , _ tamaakut llu _ seghleghqu sii w aqelghiit _ yug m _ piyuke aqe kangi _ ; _ iwernga _ kitum _ atuqe gkunigu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ kiyaghte yaghqaa uq _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ .
taghnughhagh mni _ , _ kenle a _ qantaghalli i aghagh uq _ ! _ ungipaate kau usi _ anguyag ke i lghii _ Christ-ameng _ tagi lleqe ni luku _ , _ whaa _ maaten _ uglapig llegh iit _ anguyag ke i lghiit _ Christ-ameng _ allgegh tuut ngwaagh luteng _ ayuqe ut _ , _ enkaam _ liisimakagh ut _ kenle a _ qantaghalli i aghagh uq _ .
tamaakut _ whangkun n is agh tut _ iwernga _ unite kaqe ainkut _ qayughllak _ ilat ngwaagh um angil nguut _ whangkunnun _ . _ Il at ngwaaq aa yaq umeng _ unite nayagh nghite ainkut _ . _ unite llegh megteggun _ liigikes tengngwaagh aat _ ilat ngwaagh um angi tellegh teng _ whangkunnun _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ , _ Christ-am _ kuuve kaqe aisi _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ enkaam _ qamagte lusi _ liisimakagh i _ ipapighqell eq _ .
L atang us tem sii - i _ ipapighqell eq _ nalluke te gpesineng _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ lata u amsi _ liisimake te gpesineng _ . _ liisimake kesi llu _ iqlengiqe llegh _ ipapigh qellegh meng _ pi u nghite ngughk _ .
kina _ iqlengiqe ste u a _ ? _ iqlengiqe ste u uq _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ Jesus _ , _ Christ- ang unghituq _ . _ " _ taana nguq _ anguyag ke i lghii _ Christ-ameng _ qayughllak _ ighsake kek _ ata nkuk _ ighnegh nkuk _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ighsake gkunigu _ ighnegh _ , _ a ta llu _ ighsake yaghqaqe a _ ; _ kitum _ alngunak _ tugukligh kunigu _ ighnegh _ , _ a ta llu _ tugukligh yaghqaqe a _ .
Enkaangam _ iiwleng _ neqamike luku _ apeghtuusagh _ , _ apeghtuusagh kekagh _ elpesi nun _ ugpegh yuwhaagh llegh gpesineng _ ima _ . _ atuqe manginagh kufsigu _ nagaqughkagh i _ taawa _ iiwleng _ ighnegh mete lleqe usi llu _ ata mete lleqe usi llu _ .
Un anguuq _ akequsagh kekagh a _ tuune lleqe ni luku _ whangkunnun _ , _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ .
lata sigh ke anka _ elpesi nun _ tamaakut _ puughte i naqutke lghiit _ elpesi neng _ apallugh ke luki _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ Christ-am _ kuuv ik egkaq iisi _ taghneghagh gmineng _ . _ taghneghagh kek _ ilug pesi n itu t meg neng _ alla _ kina _ alngunak _ Apeghtughis tek sug naanghi taghsi _ , _ qayughllak _ taghneghagh gkenka _ apeghtugh aqe aisi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ . _ apeghtuusagh i _ ipa u ut _ , _ temngingu nghite ut _ enkaam _ taghneghagh m _ apeghtu l gh atun _ Christ- am e tekestagh tek _ .
taghnughhagh mni _ , _ Christ- am e tekestagh tek _ enkaam _ uka _ aliigh kan _ ilutu yaghqaa luta _ , _ iigh naqe fqaamta _ kayngu yugem _ ellnga neng _ pi lghaakut _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ tagi llegh ani _ .
liisimake kesi _ Christ-a _ elqughutngagh lghii _ . _ enkaam _ liisimake yaghqaqe asi _ kinku t _ alngunak _ elqughute nga an _ pikayug t _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghnughhagh ke ai _ .
esghaqagh teggu qun _ ata m _ piniqe i ma llegh ghllag a _ whangkunnun _ , _ avaqutagh ke na iqe ainkut _ ellmi nun _ , _ ipa _ avaqutagh ke ainkut _ . _ tamaaken _ apate lugh qu luku _ nuna m _ yug an _ nalluke ainkut _ qayughllak _ nalluke kangat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ taawa _ avaqutagh ke kanginkut _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ iwernga _ salin _ wh ateghlluwaaq _ liigik ig atagh put _ naten _ lliigh lleghqagh ut _ . _ iwernga _ liisimakagh ut _ , _ Christ-a _ aliigh kan _ ellnga tun _ ayuqe lleqe ukut _ qayughllak _ esghagh lleq aghput _ legan _ tawatete luku _ .
taana _ kitum _ alngunak _ ellmi neng _ sighimake gkunigu _ Christ-akun _ pelungighsagh yaghqaa uq _ , _ katam _ Christ-am _ pelungite llegh atun _ .
kina _ alngunak _ segh llegh qegk ayuk _ qaatke te igate uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh anun _ . _ seghleghqe llegh u uq _ qaatke te nghite llegh _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh anun _ .
liisimakagh i _ Christ-a _ allgegh kau uq _ iqite na luki _ seghleghqe lleg put _ , _ ellnga _ seghleghqe llghite uq _ .
kina _ alngunak _ Christ- ami _ kiyaghte lghii _ seghleghqu mangin aghn aang ituq _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ seghleghqe manginagh kuni _ , _ liigike mangite a llu _ nallu kaqe a llu _ Christ-a _ .
taghnughhagh ghhagh ni _ , _ kitumun _ alngunak _ puughte ste gpenasi _ ! _ kina _ alngunak _ elqughute luni _ pikayug _ elqughute nga uq _ katam _ Christ-am _ elqughutngagh llegh atun _ .
kina _ alngunak _ seghleghqe manginagh lghii _ tughneghagh m _ pi ke aa _ qayughllak _ tughneghagh _ seghleghqeng ngul ghii _ ima _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ . _ ighnegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ allgegh kau uq _ una _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ naaf qen naluku _ tughneghagh m _ qepghaqagh a _ .
kina _ alngunak _ taghnughhagh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghleghqe manginagh igate uq _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangaghnegh a _ ellnga nite ngughk _ ; _ qayughllak llu _ kiyaghnegh _ ata ke kanga _ , _ enkaam _ seghleghqe manginagh naanghite uq _ .
whaten _ liisimake yaghqaqe aput _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ avaquti a _ , _ tughneghagh m llu _ avaquti a _ : _ kina _ alngunak _ elqughute luni _ pi igate ngughk _ nalighmeng _ ugumi ke i nga lghii _ yug lgute mineng _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh ke nghite a _ .
ungipagh _ nagaqughkagh i _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh gpesineng _ un anguuq _ : _ piniqe te saghqagh u ukut _ .
Ca in -etun _ ayuqe yaghqaa nghite ukut _ . _ Ca in _ tughneghagh m _ pi ke aa _ enkaam _ tuqute kaqe a _ ellmi _ katam _ anglegute ni _ . _ sangan _ tuqute agu _ ? _ qayughllak _ s allghi _ anaggute nga lghiit _ naqam _ anglegut angan _ s allghi _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ saghiigha yug gpenasi _ nuna m _ yug an _ ugumi ke kangisi _ .
liisimake ukut _ tuqu meng _ alpag kau ukut _ unguvallegh mun _ qayughllak _ piniqe ke put _ ugpeqaalgu te put _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ piniqe i igate ngughk _ paninang _ tuqu me tuq _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ugumi ke gkunigu _ ugpeqaalgut ni _ yugte aghte u uq _ . _ liisimakagh i _ yug tagh tem _ ilu ani _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ kiyaghteng ngunghituq _ .
whaten _ esgha _ liisimak eg kefut _ piniqe llegh _ sa u ta a _ : _ Christ-am _ tuune llegh akun _ unguvallegh ni _ whangkunnun _ . _ enkaam _ whangkuta llu _ tuune lteki _ unguvallegh put _ ugpeqaalgutem nnun _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ naam aghmi _ kiyagh taagh em _ esghagh luku _ ugpeqaalgut ni _ akluma lghii _ nanglleg ke nghite kunigu _ , _ naten 始ngam _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh a _ ilu nga ni lleqe a _ ?
taghnughhagh ghhagh ni _ ! _ piniqe i yaghqaa nghite ukut _ akuzite raaghinagh tgun llu _ akuzillegh mteggun llu _ . _ yeghlegi _ piniqe i lta _ ipapighqell uta _ nangaghnegh mteggun _ .
Enkaangam _ liisimake lleqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ipapigh qellegh mun _ pi kut fut _ . _ seghleghni negh mta llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ sivungagh ni _ nallun eq suk naanghi taghput _ seghevute i nga llegh a _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh _ aange aghagh uq _ seghleghyug nga lleg mnneng _ , _ liisimake kanga llu _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ seghleghni nghite kumta _ tetug naanghi taghput _ kiyaghnegh _ .
aapte negh mta llu _ sa meng _ alngunak _ allgegh te aqe ukut _ ellnga neng _ qayughllak _ qaatke aqe ke put _ qelegh u uute yu ai _ , _ atuqe aqe ke put llu _ efqugh nagh lghiit _ ellnga ni _ .
una _ esgha _ qelegh sagh a _ : _ whangkunnun _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ ighnegh mi _ ategh a _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ , _ pinigh qutu tete luta llu _ Christ-am _ qelegh llegh atun _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ qaatke gkumiki _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh u uute yu ai _ kiyaghteng nguuq _ kiyaghnegh mi _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ ellnga ni _ . _ whaten _ esgha _ liisimak eg kefut _ kiyaghnegh m _ whangkun n ite llgha _ : _ Taghneghagnekun _ tuunekagh mikun _ whangkunnun _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ ugpeqe gpenaki _ qamagte luki _ taghneghagh t _ . _ yeghlegi _ liigike naqe aqe teki _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ta i _ , _ qayughllak _ uglagh pigte lghiit _ uuknaliqiste sighwaaghet _ mingite ma ut _ nuna mi _ .
esgha _ whaten _ liisimake yaghqagh gsi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ taghneghagh ke te kek _ : _ tamaghhagh mi _ taghneghagh m _ apegh kagu _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ yugu luni _ allgegh kau ni luku _ , _ kiyaghneghtagh u uq _ .
iwernga _ tamaghhagh mi _ taghneghagh m _ mesag ii aghagh u uute kagu _ Jesus _ yugu luni _ allgegh kau nghite ni luku _ kiyaghneghtagh u nghite uq _ . _ taake uk _ taghneghagh k _ anguyag ke i lghii meng _ Christ-ameng _ pi u uk _ nagaqughkagh gpesineng _ tagi i yaghqaa ni lukek _ . _ taawa _ maaten _ kaat ngwaagh lutek _ nuna mun _ ayuqe uk _ .
taghnughhagh ni _ , _ elpek si _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi kut anganeng _ , _ kayaalqe kaqe asi _ tamaakut _ qayughllak _ ilu gpesinite ngughk _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghiteaghaghte uq _ nunamel ngughmeng _ .
tamaakut _ nuna m _ pi ke ai _ , _ apeghtuusagh it _ nuna meng _ pi u ut _ , _ enkaam _ nuna m _ yug an _ nagate aqe ait _ .
iwernga _ whangkuta _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi ke ainkut _ , _ enkaam _ kitum _ liisimake i lghii m _ kiyaghnegh meng _ nagate aqe ainkut _ . _ tamaakut _ ila ita _ kiyaghnegh m _ pike nghite ka an _ nagate igate ainkut _ . _ enkaam _ tawaten _ esgha _ liisimake yaghqagh gput _ taghneghagh kek _ ipapighqell ghem _ nalighmeng _ taghneghagh kek _ ipa u nghite ngugh m _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ yeqay _ pinigh qutu te lta _ qayughllak _ piniqe llegh _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u uq _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ piniqe i nga lghii _ taghnughhagh ke a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ liisimake a llu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe i nghite ngugh m _ nalluke a _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh _ piniqe llegh u uq _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ kayagtekaqe a _ taan angin aghhaq _ ighnegh ni _ nuna mun _ , _ unguvall eng esqell uta _ ellnga kun _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ kiyaghnegh m _ kelgute kaqe a _ piniqe lleg ni _ whangkunnun _ .
piniqe llegh _ akuzi tke kegka _ whangkuta _ piniq el qen ghi taghput _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ yeghlegi _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh ke a _ whangkunnun _ keleg tke a _ kayagte llegh mikun _ ighnegh ni _ iqitute yu i luku _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh a _ whangkunnun _ tawatete kan _ whangkuta llu _ piniqe te saghqagh u ukut _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ es ghii g at ngwaagh aa _ kiyaghnegh _ ; _ piniqu s kumta _ kiyaghnegh _ kiyaghteng nguuq _ ilu mnni _ , _ piniqe llegh a llu _ iighwigh yaghqaa uq _ ilu mnni _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tuune kaqe ainkut _ ellmi _ katam _ taghneghagh gmineng _ enkaam _ liisimakagh ut _ kiyaghteng nguuq _ whan kun ni _ , _ whangkuta _ ellnga ni _ .
esghaqaghkagh ut _ ighnegh a _ . _ enkaam _ ungipaq ngwaagh put _ kiyaghnegh mun _ kayagtekaqe ni luku _ yuguligh i ste u luku _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ apegh kagu _ Jesus _ ighnegh ke ni luku _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ kiyaghteng nguuq _ ellnga ni _ , _ ellnga _ kiyaghnegh mi _ .
enkaam _ whangkuta _ liisimakagh ut llu _ ugpeqagh ut llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe i llegh a _ whangkunnun _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ piniqe llegh u uq _ , _ enkaam _ kina _ alngunak _ kiyaghte lghii _ piniqe llegh mi _ kiyaghteng nguuq _ kiyaghnegh mi _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ ellnga ni _ .
enkaam _ piniqe llegh _ iighw igh tekaaguq _ ilu mnni _ ilu tus qell uta _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ . _ tawatete ukut _ qayughllak _ Christ- atun _ ayuqe lghiikut _ nuna mi _ whani _ .
piniqe llegh mi _ alinge llegh _ aviite uq _ qayughllak _ iighwighkagh m _ piniqe llegh m _ igh lleq ay u waa _ alinge llegh _ . _ Enkaangam _ piniqe llegh _ iighwigh mangite uq _ tamaa kuni _ paninang _ alinge kayug ni _ , _ qayughllak _ alinge lleg lgu uq _ aghyuugh llegh _ .
piniqe i aqe ukut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ sivuke luni _ piniqe kaqe ainkut _ .
kina _ pikumi _ , _ " _ piniqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ " _ naqam _ ugumi ke luku _ ugpeqaalgut ni _ , _ iqlengiqe ste u uq _ . _ qayughllak _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe nghite kunigu _ ugpeqaalgut ni _ esghaqagh yu ni _ , _ piniqe naanghite a _ kiyaghnegh _ esghagh igate kete ni _ .
una _ qelegh sagh ke a _ Christ-am _ whangkunnun _ , _ kitum _ piniqe gkunigu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ piniqe yaghqaqe a _ ugpeqaalgut nillu _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ugpeqe u kunigu _ Jesus _ , _ Christ- ang utanga _ , _ avaqutagh ke a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkunigu _ a ta _ piniqe yaghqaqe ai _ avaquti a _ .
whaten _ liisimak saghq aqaghput _ piniqe i llegh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh itnun _ : _ piniqe lleg mteggun _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ qaatke lleg mteggun llu _ qelegh sagh i _ .
una _ piniqe llegh u uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ : _ qaatke te llegh ut _ qelegh sagh anun _ . _ qelegh sagh i _ piyaqnagh ghllagu nghite ut _ ,
qayughllak _ tamaghhagh mi _ avaqutagh liitekagh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayaalqe kaqe a _ nuna _ . _ whaten _ esgha _ kayaalqesaghqagh ut _ nuna _ , _ ugpeqe i lleg mteggun _ .
kinangaawa _ kayaalqe i i sta _ nuna meng _ ? _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ Jesus _ ighnegh ke ni luku _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ taana ta _ kayaalqe i i sta _ .
Jesus _ Christ- anguuq _ tagikagh _ . _ tagi kau uq _ megh kun llu _ aawhkun llu _ . _ tagi mangite uq _ meghhagh inagh kun _ iwernga _ megh kun llu _ aawhkun llu _ tagi kau uq _ .
taghneghagh m _ apegh aa _ taana _ ipa u ni luku _ qayughllak _ taghneghagh k _ ipapigh qellgh ulghii k _ .
taawa _ pi nga yug u ut _ aap ghis tet _ , _ taghneghagh k _ , _ megh _ , _ aa kw h _ ; _ taakut _ qamagte luteng _ itagnagh kete te luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
ugpeqe u kumteki _ yug t _ apeghkagh it _ whangkunnun _ , _ ipapestaaq _ ugpeqe aghagh yaghqaqe aput _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghkagh i _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh llegh a _ ighnegh mun _ ipa u uq _ .
enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ ighnegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ qama _ ilu anite uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ aapte qugh a _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugpeqe nghite kunigu _ kiyaghnegh _ iqlengiqe ste ngllagh lleqe a _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ aapte qugh a _ ighnegh mineng _ ugpeqe nghite kanga _ .
una _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh kaqe a _ , _ kiyaghnegh m nguq _ tuune kaqe ainkut _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ , _ taana _ unguvallegh _ ighneghagh nite uq _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ tugukligh kunigu _ ighnegh _ , _ unguvallegh lgu uq _ ; _ kitum _ alngunak _ tugukligh ma ite kunigu _ ighnegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvallegh nge llghite uq _ .
lata sigh ke anka _ tamaakut _ elpesi nun _ ugpeqe i lghii nun _ ategh aneng _ ighnegh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ elpesi nun _ liisimake sqellug qu _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh i _ .
Nall un eq suk ig atagh put _ kiyaghnegh _ ; _ liisimakagh ut _ nagate aqe ainkut _ aap nem teggu _ sa meng _ alngunak _ piyuke llegh akun _ ayuqe lghii meng _ .
liisimake gkumteggu _ nagate llegh a _ sa meng _ alngunak _ aapte lleg mnneng _ , _ liisimakagh ut _ allgegh te aqe ukut _ tungsighkagh mnneng _ ellnga neng _ .
kitum _ esghagh kunigu _ ugpeqaalgut ni _ seghleghqe lghii _ tuqu mun _ ayuqe nghite ngugh meng _ yughagh te kete ligu _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune ligu _ unguvallegh meng _ . _ Akuz it keng ngw aanka _ yug t _ seghleghqe llghite a _ tuqu mun _ pi yaghqaqe nghite ka itneng _ . _ seghleghqe lleg lgu uq _ tuqu mun _ ayuqe lghii mun _ . _ iwernga _ yughaatk es qeng ngunghi taqa _ tawaten _ seghleghqe lghii _ .
qamagte luni _ seghletun _ pi llegh _ seghleghqe llegh u uq _ . _ iwernga _ seghleghqe lleg lgu uq _ tuqu mun _ ayuqe nghite ngugh meng _ .
liisimakagh ut _ kina _ alngunak _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh a _ seghleghqe manginagh naanghite uq _ , _ qayughllak _ ighnegh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ aflengake u kanga _ enkaam _ tughneghagh m _ seghletun _ pi naanghite a _ .
liisimake ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi ke ainkut _ qaywa _ tughneghagh m _ igleghte te u ghngaagu _ qamagte luku _ nuna _ .
liisimakagh ut _ ighnegh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagi luni _ liigike stekaqe ainkut _ liisimake sqellug qu _ kiyaghnegh pig _ . _ kiyaghnegh pig mete ukut _ Ighnegh an itu tem nneng _ Jesus _ Christ- ami _ . _ taana ta _ kiyaghnegh pig llu _ kenle ite ngughk llu _ unguvallegh _ .
taghnughhagh ghhagh ni _ , _ iqite nga lusi _ kiyagh ne sighwaagh neng _ !
ukut _ lata t _ Elder -meng _ pi u ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh anun _ aghnagh mun _ , _ avaqutagh anun llu _ ipa pig meng _ piniqekagh mnun _ . _ Ellng in aanghi tunga _ piniq iste z i _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ liisimake lghiit _ ipapigh qellegh meng _ piniqe aisi _ ,
qayughllak _ ipapighqell eq _ ilu mnnite ngughk _ . _ taana _ ipapighqell eq _ ilum n n isaghq aaguq _ quunperugllag _ .
kayusillegh _ , _ nanglleg yug llegh _ , _ nekeggmellegh llu _ whangkun nill equt _ kiyaghteng ngu luta _ ipapigh qellegh q unllu _ piniqe llegh kun llu _ . _ taakut _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ata meng _ , _ Jesus _ Christ- amengllu _ , _ ata m _ ighneghagh neng _ pi u ut _ .
quya pigtekau unga _ nagaqugh luki _ ila i _ avaqutagh ten _ kiyaghteng ngun iluki _ ipapigh qellegh qun _ tawateghpigaq _ ata m _ qelegh llegh atun _ whangkuta _ .
aghnagh mi _ , _ pi amken _ pinigh qutu te lta _ . _ taana _ nutaghagh u nghite uq _ qel ghu us aq _ lata tke kegka _ elpenun _ ; _ qelegh sagh u uq _ ima _ piinligh yuggaagh llegh meng _ .
una _ piniqe llegh u uq _ , _ qaatke te llegh _ kiyaghnegh m _ qel ghu us aanun _ . _ Qel ghu us aq _ nagaqughkagh i _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ un anguuq _ : _ qamagte lusi _ piniqe te lusi _ kiyaghte tek _ .
uglagh pigte lghii _ puughte i sta _ nuna mi _ mingite luni _ ayuqe uq _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t _ apegh naanghite aat _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ yugu luni _ allgegh kau ni luku _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe igate aat _ . _ Tawatel nguq _ yuug _ puughte i ste u uq llu _ , _ anguyag ke i lghii u uq llu _ Christ-ameng _ .
enkaam _ kelenga lusi _ , _ pegte yaqunaan _ qepghagh tekagh i _ akileghtugh te yaghqagh i _ qamagte luku _ allgegh saghqaq aghsi _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ qaasghute kumiki _ apeghtuusagh i _ Christ-am _ kiyaghnegh _ ellngan ite nghite uq _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ atuqe manginagh kumiki _ apeghtuusagh i _ Christ-am _ , _ a ta llu _ ighnegh llu _ ellnga nite uk _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ apeghtugh yaghtugh kangisi _ atuqe gpenaki _ Christ-am _ apeghtuusagh i _ , _ aqelqagh ngllagh gpenaan _ nalighmeng _ quyake gpenaan _ ,
qayughllak _ kitum _ alngunak _ quyake gkunigu _ qepgh algu siq allgh uugh lleqaa _ seghlegh meng _ qepghaqagh aneng _ .
apegh yaghqagh ghllag u ghngaaghma _ elpesi nun _ lata tgun _ piyug nghite anka _ . _ iwernga _ sunanguq _ laalighfike lamsi _ , _ aleghquute nayagh ukut _ gginasaghqugh te luta _ , _ enkaam _ quya te ghllag nayagh ukut _ .
avaqutagh ita _ nakmikegkagh m _ aakagh gpesi _ piniqe aisi nguq _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Elder -meng _ pi u ut _ G ai us -mun _ ipapik _ piniqekagh mnun _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ liisimake aqa _ unguva sigh gken _ itagnagh uq _ . _ yughagh te kaqe amken _ itagn iisqell uten _ sa kun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ , _ yug un qeg tesqell ut enllu _ .
quya pigtekau unga _ ila ita _ ugpeqaalgu tet _ kaate luteng _ ungipaate yatnga _ ataasiighmete llegh gpeneng _ ipapigh qellegh mun _ , _ iiwleng _ elpesi nun _ atuqe u ni luku _ ipapighqell eq _ .
quya pigte aqe unga _ nagaq un em ki _ avaqutagh ligh tke anka _ atuqe i u ni luki _ ipapigh qellegh meng _ . _ alla _ saam _ alngunak _ quya te igate aanga _ tawaten _ .
piniqekagh mni _ ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ pi niigh pigte uq _ ataasiighmete luten _ qepghagh llegh n _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aflengake llegh gpegun _ ugpeqaalgu tet _ talwa _ tamaakut _ nallukekagh ten _ .
maani _ yughaghvig mi _ apegh aqe aat _ piniqe llegh n _ . _ kayusiite aghte ki _ nagnegh utes qelluki _ iglegha llegh it _ . _ kayusigh i llegh n _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ ayuqe luku _ 
qayughllak _ iglegha u ut _ apallugh ke luku _ Christ-a _ . _ tugukligh i igate ut _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh neng _ kayusillegh meng _ 
enkaam _ whangkuta _ ugpeqagh ni _ kayusigh yaghqaqe aput _ tamaakut _ yug t _ . _ tawaten _ pi kumta _ qepghagh lgutke lleqe ainkut _ apeghtugh i u luteng _ ipapigh qellegh meng _ .
lata kaayagh unga _ ugpeqagh nun _ iwernga _ D i o t rep h es -em _ umiilgu yug neghem _ waakigate ai _ liilightugh llegh nka _ .
elpesi nun _ pi kuma _ apegh lleqe aqa _ sa aqe ta a _ . _ seghletun _ akuzite kaqe ainkut _ , _ iqlengiqe te kaqe ainkut llu _ . _ Taw ateng inaq _ pi igate uq _ upugha sug igate ai _ ugpeqaalgu te put _ kaate nghata _ . _ upugha te i yu lghiit _ ineghte aqe ai _ , _ upugha te i nghata llu _ eflequgh aqe ai _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte te vig itneng _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ seghletun _ pikayug stun _ pi gpenang _ , _ yeghlegi _ pinitun _ pikayug stun _ pi aqe i _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ pinitun _ pikayug _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi ke aa _ ; _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ seghletun _ pikayug m _ nalluke a _ kiyaghnegh _ .
tamaghhagh mi _ ugpeqagh m _ D em et ri us _ pinigh na iqe aat _ yuug _ . _ Ip apigh qelluni _ kiyaghtaa llgh an _ ipapigh q utk estaa _ . _ taawa _ whangkuta llu _ tawaten _ piigh ut _ , _ liisima kasi _ akuzillegh put _ ipa u ut _ .
apegh yaghqagh ghllag u unga _ elpenun _ iwernga _ lata tgun _ piyug nghite anka _ .
sunanguq _ qantaghaqun _ esghagh laken _ enkaam _ aleghquute lleqe ukung _ gginasaghqugh te lutung _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Jud e-meng _ pi u ut _ , _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ qepghagh teng aneng _ , _ James -em _ uyughagh aneng _ . _ lata aqe unga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh itnun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ piniqe aisi _ , _ Jesus _ Christ- amllu _ aflenga kaqe aisi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a llu _ , _ nekeggmellegh a llu _ , _ piniqe llegh a llu _ nula li _ elpesi ni _ .
piniqekagh mni _ , _ lata yu pigte aqe amsi _ yuguligh lleg mnneng _ . _ iwernga _ nagaqugh yamki _ apeghtughiste sighwaaghet _ elpesi nilnguut _ , _ apegh yug kaqe a _ elpesi nun _ simigh aqa _ . _ liisima kasi _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayagtekaqe ai _ Apostle- etlu _ ila i llu _ yug t _ apegh tiis qell uta _ ugpeqe yaghqagh mnneng _ . _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ allangughte yaghqaqe nghite ait _ ellngit a _ apeghtugh i llegh it _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ lata u unga _ qevuute lusi _ kipullgin aagh esqelluki _ apeghtughiste sighwaaghet _ . _ apeghtugh i ste gpenaki _ ipa u nghite ngugh neng _ apeghtuusagh itneng _ .
qerngughte te negh gpesini _ maligte te aqe ut _ , _ iwernga _ ungipaate igate aisi _ sa meng _ apeghtugh yug aqe ni lusi _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t _ tugukligh yug igate aat _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ taan angin aghhaq _ Igleghut iste v ut _ , _ atanegh ut llu _ . _ enkaam _ allangughte aqe aat _ apeghtuusagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh aneng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ whaten _ pi aqe ut _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ n angleg tagh llagtuq _ , _ seghevute i kayugu uq _ enkaam _ itagnagh uq _ seghleghqesagh ghngaamta _ sex-kun _ . _ " _ Qav ng ar ugllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipaate kaqe ainkut _ aghyuugh lleqe ni luku _ kina _ alngunak _ apeghtugh i lghii _ tawaten _ .
Ungipaat kaa yagh ngaagh pesi _ sivugh nghaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh i llegh aneng _ seghleghq est enun _ , _ negh ka ughte yug amsi _ allameng _ taakut _ uspute aqe luki _ . _ neqamike luku _ Atanghem _ yugul ik aqii _ Israel-eghmiit _ Egypt- eghm iineng _ , _ aghulaqe stekaqe ai _ Egypt- meng _ . _ iwernga _ kingu aneng _ taam _ ila i _ Israel-eghmiit _ ugpeqe i nanigh yata _ , _ qaatke te nanigh yata _ ellmi nun _ , _ tuqu stekaqe ai _ .
neqamike luki _ yaquleg t _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi sqekagh a _ nagnegh te ma nge i tke aat _ , _ unitekagh at llu _ ne eng _ qilag _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ asighqekagh i _ qiipraghute neng _ nekegnga yaghqagh neng _ quunperugllag _ , _ nekegte stekagh i _ mamleg ghllag kun _ . _ Taw an tes naq ngw ii _ kenlanga _ aghyuugh lleghqagh minun _ nanqigtivig m _ aghnegh ani _ .
neqamike luki _ S od om -eghm iitlu _ G om or rah - gh m iitlu _ , _ uvit angit nil nguutlu _ nuna t _ . _ yaquleg stun _ seghleghqe kau ut _ . _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ seghleghqe llegh _ sex-kun _ pi ke aat _ , _ talwa _ yug t _ yug lgu tke te lghiit _ atuqe te aqe luteng _ , _ sa u aat llu _ seghlegh atagh aat _ atuqe kaqe ait _ . _ usputagh u ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyugh i llegh aneng _ seghleghq est enun _ kenle ite ngugh qun _ kenegh kun _ .
Apeghtughis te sighwaaghet _ tawatete ut _ . _ pi aqe ut _ qavangugh llghite a nguq _ seghleghqe ste aqe ait _ sex-kun _ , _ qaatke sigate ait llu _ yug t _ igleghutistet _ , _ seghletun llu _ akuzi tke ste aqe ait _ yaquleg t _ igleghutistet _ .
naqam _ michael _ , _ yaquleg t _ igleghutisteng ita _ ila at _ , _ tawaten _ pi llghite uq _ . _ tughneghaan- ke uk _ aaghtiiraagh te kaqe yamegnegu _ Moses-em _ yugusigh a _ , _ M i ch a el -em _ seghletun _ akuzi tke mangite a _ , _ anaggute ma ni luku llu _ pi llghite a _ . _ yeghlegi _ pika qaa _ , _ " _ Atanghem _ aghyuugh mig li ten _ . _ "
iwernga _ tamaakut _ apeghtughiste sighwaaghet _ sa u a _ alngunak _ liigik enghil kes eng _ seghletun _ akuzite kaqe aat _ . _ sa u a _ ila a _ liigike aqe aat _ teghig ke sagh stun _ sumeghtagh iigal ngughestun _ . _ teghig ke sagh t _ piyuke llegh megestun _ pikayug u ut _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ apeghtughiste sighwaaghet _ pikayug u ut _ . _ enkaam _ seghleghqes tengugh tagh aghaqut _ .
Seghleghwaagh unaq nguut _ ellngit _ ! _ Ca in -etun _ pi u ut _ , _ tuqute kaqe a _ anglegute ni _ . _ allgegh teqaghte na luteng _ mani meng _ seghletun _ pi kau ut _ B al aam -em _ pillgh atun _ . _ K o rah - tun _ pi u ut _ , _ qaatk es un ghit k aqegkangi _ igleghutistet _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ naafqe kaqe a _ ellnga _ , _ apeghtughiste sighwaagh etlu _ naafqesaghqagh ke ai _ .
